"Class rep! Ding Sihan! I reserved these two seats for you! Come sit here!" Lin Li immediately stood up and raised his hand, calling out to Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan who had just boarded the bus looking for seats.
His voice was loud, everyone on the bus heard him and instinctively turned their gaze to Lin Li.
Two gazes were especially intense and burning.
Zhou Baowei.
Bai Bufan.
At this moment, their faces showed expressions more surprised and unbelieving than when they caught Lin Li listening to English comprehension exercises on the bus.
Their eyes seemed to say nothing, yet said everything: virtual dad, virtual mom, virtual genealogy sprouting flowers.
Is this guy even human?
If Lin Li’s human they’d rather eat shit!
Getting us up was for this!?
Really going all-out for a brother, but stabbing brothers for women huh?
Yet Lin Li really had no time to deal with these two classmates he wasn’t very familiar with; who the heck were they?
No choice, the system demanded he observes, learns, and mimics Chen Yu Ying’s actions, but if they were far apart, this task wouldn’t be easy at all. He couldn’t keep running over to Chen Yu Ying thinking about what she was doing, right?
Not to mention, provoking the bus to veer towards a mental hospital.
So to complete this task, the friendliest situation is for Chen Yu Ying to sit next to him. Then learning and mimicking would be most convenient.
And Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan heard Lin Li’s voice.
Chen Yu Ying froze for a moment, not expecting this situation, but Ding Sihan reacted first, grabbing Chen Yu Ying’s hand: "Yu Ying, then let’s sit over there."
Pulled along, Chen Yu Ying pointed at her roommate Qu Wanqiu hesitantly: "Wanqiu already reserved for us..."
Knowing they’d be the last onto the bus, they naturally asked their roommate to reserve spots ahead of time.
"Oh, anywhere is fine, they can sit together in pairs, Wanqiu won’t mind." Ding Sihan eagerly urged Chen Yu Ying toward Lin Li.
As she passed Qu Wanqiu, she exchanged a glance and Wanqiu smiled and gestured an OK at the two who ’ignored’ her.
No sadness at being ’stood up’, Qu Wanqiu was already looking forward to tonight’s girls’ talk session.
Despite asking Chen Yu Ying previously, she got no useful information, it was always ’nothing much’, ’just studying’...
With Ding Sihan supervising this time, there’d definitely be tons of new things to discuss, way more important than sitting near her roommate.
Lin Li had no idea what was going through their minds, the outcome was what mattered; if not for the crowd, he’d want to bow to Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu.
As Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan arrived next to Lin Li, Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei hadn’t left yet, making the area seem crowded.
Chen Yu Ying glanced at Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei, then softly and embarrassedly confirmed: "Are these two seats really empty?"
"Nope! Haha! Empty! Lin Li reserved them specially for you two! Haha!" Bai Bufan nodded through gritted teeth, forcing a smile.
Then Bai Bufan was surprised at how calm he’d become.
He suddenly realized he no longer felt as anxious facing girls, even able to speak and make eye contact without stammering with classmates.
This was something Bai Bufan could never imagine before.
All thanks to Feifei.
No wonder Lin Li’s changed so much recently, it must be Xiaojing’s influence on him.
Wondering how Feifei is doing at the institute? Would she remember this pure and handsome guest, and if they’d meet again?
Why do guys suddenly space out? Chen Yu Ying wondered, shifting her gaze to Zhou Baowei for confirmation.
"Yep! No one’s sitting! Nope!" Zhou Baowei also nodded through gritted teeth.
Lin Li treats them like animals, but they still treated Lin Li as a brother.
This year, they’ll definitely be among Tokyo University’s ten most inspirational people.
But Lin Li won’t get away with this betrayal.
The scar of betrayal never heals, unless they also get sweet-voiced female companions!
"What are these two backpacks..." Ding Sihan wanted Chen Yu Ying to sit in the middle — couldn’t let herself be stuck in the middle like a 250-watt bulb and saw two backpacks on the floor, asking.
"Haha, I wondered where my backpack disappeared, turns out dumped here! Thank you, finally found it!" Bai Bufan’s fake smile widened, smoothly bent to grab his and Zhou Baowei’s backpacks, turning and leaving without pause.
Not so awkward sitting by Qu Wanqiu’s side.
The bus has 45 seats; even with accompanying Xue Jian, the four classes don’t total forty, leaving several extra spots.
After negotiating with others, the two ended up in the row behind Lin Li, ensuring they’d keep a dark gaze fixed on this scoundrel friend the entire journey.
Meanwhile.
Wang Yuezhi’s heart broke.
All his efforts went to waste.
He, upon boarding, first observed where Chen Yu Ying’s roommates sat then chose a seat nearby, picking an aisle spot to ease interaction, aiming for unforgettable autumn trip memories.
Crushing on someone invokes subtle strategies.
But suddenly Lin Li appeared as a disruptive force!
Initially mocking Lin Li’s stupidity when he saw his seat choice at the back.
Yet when he carefully maneuvered his hand, Lin Li flipped the table! With cheats thrown in, this was unplayable!
Despite the pangs of jealousy, Wang Yuezhi envied Lin Li’s nerve, the composure of the strong ones, daring to invite girls to sit beside him in front of Xue Jian.
Even if given ten courage pills, Wang Yuezhi wouldn’t dare.
He rubbed his rosy nose and sighed.
Yet Lin Li discreetly monitored Xue Jian’s reaction.
Though his intent wasn’t romantic, Lin Li knew others wouldn’t see it that way, with Nansang Middle School’s no dating rule.
Perhaps due to being off-campus or trust in him — even aggressive pursuit from Chen Yu Ying wouldn’t break rules, his noble character wouldn’t wrong her, hence Xue Jian said nothing, merely chuckling before taking the reserved ’teacher’s front seat’.
— These are Lin Li’s thoughts.

chapters.title: Chapter 106 - 98 It Turns Out to Be the Luckiest Person in the World
chapters.content:
Chapter 106: Chapter 98 It Turns Out to Be the Luckiest Person in the World
Fortunately, Xue Jian doesn’t know the Mind Reading Technique. If he knew what Lin Li was thinking, he would definitely sit beside him the whole time, smiling and staring at him, not for any reason but to make Lin Li uncomfortable.
He just thinks there’s nothing wrong with boys and girls sitting together, and overly emphasizing gender differences is the real mistake. Besides, although Lin Li is unreliable, he indeed trusts Chen Yu Ying.
The space in a luxury bus is naturally spacious. Although the three of them sit together, it’s not cramped, and the three of them are quite comfortable.
Lin Li observed the system. After Chen Yu Ying sat down, the progress bar of the system started to change.
It’s probably because Lin Li ’mimicked’ Chen Yu Ying and also sat down at that moment.
However, the change in speed is better than nothing. At this growth rate, even sitting on this bus for three days and two nights wouldn’t complete it.
So, he definitely has to mimic Chen Yu Ying’s behavior in more ways.
After realizing this, Lin Li leaned back slightly, using his peripheral vision to observe Chen Yu Ying, who had just sat down and was now rummaging through her little bag.
Lin Li’s backpack was with Zhang Haoyang, and it would practically mean little to get it now, as Chen Yu Ying wouldn’t be sorting her bag endlessly. So Lin Li thought for a bit and started looking through his pockets, fumbling with his wired earphones.
The progress jumped a bit faster; this time, sitting on the bus for three days and two nights should do it.
But the completion idea was confirmed again: the more accurately he mimics, the faster it completes.
Everyone had arrived, and after the driver confirmed with Xue Jian, the bus started.
"Yu Ying, do you want to eat?" Ding Sihan had already opened a pack of onion rings and placed it in front of Chen Yu Ying.
"Mm, thank you." Chen Yu Ying politely and elegantly reached out and took one.
"Mm, thank you too." A large hand followed suit, grabbing a handful, but in the end, only took out one.
Reaching out was mimicking, grabbing a handful was instinct, taking only one meant mimicking triumphed over instinct.
The progress bar nudged forward slightly.
Ding Sihan: "?"
Did I ask you to take it? So rude, minus points!
Fortunately, Lin Li immediately turned his head, reaching over to snatch a piece of gummy from Bai Bufan’s hand and handed it to Ding Sihan: "Do you want these?"
Ding Sihan nodded and took one, which was more or less fair, reciprocation, plus points!
Seeing Chen Yu Ying also took one to eat, Lin Li followed suit.
However, this time, the anticipated boost in progress did not occur.
Lin Li thought for a moment, realizing that interfering with Chen Yu Ying’s actions before mimicking can’t speed up the task completion.
Some of the original plans instantly fell apart.
"Being generous with others’ generosity, could the leftovers after being generous be returned so that others might taste it too?" A slightly bitter voice came from behind.
Spooky occurrences again in Nansang Sect, one full of Ghost Cultivators.
"Sorry, it was an unconscious habit to pocket it; I thought no one would pick it up!" Lin Li returned the leftover candy he instinctively put in his pocket to Bai Bufan, expressing his gratitude: "Next week, breakfast is on me."
Then he continued to observe Chen Yu Ying and saw that she had already taken out her phone.
Lin Li also immediately took out his phone.
Chen Yu Ying opened Tencent Video.
Lin Li also opened Tencent Video.
The bus hit a speed bump, causing a slight shake.
Lin Li and Chen Yu Ying’s phone screens instantly switched to the Pinduoduo Double Eleven event site, and both became the world’s luckiest people, receiving messages like ’Heaven-sent Fortune, Lucky Boost, Congratulations Again’... In short, they could receive ¥500 in cash withdrawals with no threshold by inviting just one more friend.
What the hell.
"Class monitor, do you know how modern technology predicts earthquakes?" Lin Li sighed and asked.
"How do they predict it?" Chen Yu Ying turned her head and inquired.
"Place a phone in each of the eight directions. If one of them switches to Pinduoduo, that area is having an earthquake." Lin Li confidently claimed.
Chen Yu Ying was startled for a moment and then burst out laughing.
"Modern Zhang Heng, acknowledged." Ding Sihan, upon hearing this, gave a big thumbs up.
"Whoever invented the shake-your-phone-to-open-ads feature should really be shot, and it should be executed repeatedly." Lin Li exclaimed from the heart.
"I second that, and that fast app thing, whoever invented it should really be shot with a machine gun." Ding Sihan evidently shared similar feelings.
Chen Yu Ying, however, didn’t participate in their sentencing discussion.
After chatting simply for a bit, she started a variety show, and after taking out her earphones, she shared them with Ding Sihan. The two started watching the show to pass the time.
Lin Li remembered the variety show’s name and searched for it on his phone.
What the hell, it’s subscription-only.
But for the task, for a deeper mimicry, this small amount of money is inconsequential.
Sign up for a new user first month of continuous monthly subscription for just ¥12!
Payment, switch back to WeChat, cancel the continuous monthly service, all done effortlessly by Lin Li.
Thus, Lin Li began to watch the show.
A few minutes later, Lin Li noticed something was amiss.
Not only did the progress bar speed not increase, but it even slowed down, even slower than just sitting at the beginning, almost to a halt.
But when Lin Li glanced at Chen Yu Ying, she was still watching the variety show with Ding Sihan. He even mimicked her way of watching, with one hand supporting his cheek, so the stagnant speed made no sense.
Wait.
Lin Li looked at the system again, realizing that when he watched Chen Yu Ying’s screen, the speed returned to normal.
"..."
The problematic system.
To mimic Chen Yu Ying watching the variety show, he had to watch the show on her phone, did he? Oh, it’s truly frustrating.
But with the system having the sole right to explain, Lin Li had no choice but to comply.
Before complying, though, Lin Li had one thing to do:
"Tencent User 9000821: Hello, support, my kid accidentally subscribed to a membership on my phone, can I get a refund?"
Twelve yuan, well, is still spring breeze elf fragment (Komodo dragon mold), saving when necessary, spending when necessary.
...
"Lin Li, are you watching too?"
After a segment of the variety show ended, as Chen Yu Ying moved her body, she noticed that Lin Li had been watching his phone all along, so she curiously asked.
"Yeah, I just took a peek, it’s quite interesting." There’s nothing to hide here; the more you try to hide it, the weirder it looks. So, Lin Li naturally admitted, nodding.
In just over ten minutes, the progress bar increased at a pace that was quite satisfying.
"Isn’t it? It’s super interesting! This variety show is really good, it..."
Upon hearing that, Chen Yu Ying immediately started describing the show’s details to Lin Li, who nodded in response.
"Isn’t it uncomfortable to watch it without sound? How about I give you this earphone?" After finishing her introduction, Chen Yu Ying took off her earphone and handed it to Lin Li.
"What about you?"
"I recommended this show to Si Han; I’ve actually watched it once. You two go ahead, I’ve brought my tablet anyway." Chen Yu Ying waved her hand dismissively.
For girls, successfully getting others to enjoy what you like is a fulfilling task.
"That’s not right." Lin Li undoubtedly refused.
His watching of the show only held meaning because Chen Yu Ying was also watching it.
Her stopping to watch and him continuing would be doing things backward, wouldn’t it?
But naturally, the words couldn’t be said so bluntly:
"How can it be that you can’t watch it on your phone? No worries, I’m good like this. Don’t insist, class monitor. If you’re not watching, then neither will I."
Next to him, Ding Sihan couldn’t help but smile upon hearing that.
It is known that there are three people right now.
The class monitor doesn’t watch, Lin Li doesn’t watch; the class monitor watches, Lin Li watches. The earphones support only two people watching, not three.
She shouldn’t be in the bus; she should be under it.
Ding Sihan removed her own earphones and handed them to Lin Li: "How about I give you my earphones?"
"Thank you, Si Han! And you have the most beautiful eyes." Lin Li immediately accepted them and expressed his sincere gratitude.
Not even a moment of hesitation?
Even better, Lin Li.
"Should I just play it out loud?" Chen Yu Ying asked upon seeing the situation.
"No need, playing it out loud isn’t ideal, you two can watch. Yu Ying, I’m much clumsier than you, I really need to spend some time watching this," Lin Li said as he fiddled a bit, smiling as he put on the earphones, "Don’t worry, class monitor, I can just watch like this—don’t try to persuade me, if you’re not watching, I’m not watching either."
There you go.
Ding Sihan folded her now empty hands, her face maintaining a smile.
Not a second of hesitation?
She should probably be under the bus rather than inside.
Ding Sihan removed her earphone and handed it to Lin Li: "Here, take my earphone then?"
"Thank you so much, Ding Sihan, you’re the best Nansang girl ever, your eyes shine like stars." Lin Li immediately took the earphones, expressing his heartfelt thanks.
Sure enough, with the earphones on, listening improved the experience.
Not even a moment’s hesitation?
Good, good, Lin Li.
"How about I just play it out loud? Should I?"
"No need, playing it out loud isn’t a great idea. You two just watch it. Yu Ying, my hands are much clumsier than yours, I need to focus now to watch for a while," Chen Yu Ying suggested.
"Alright then." Chen Yu Ying thought for a moment and then nodded.
When people aren’t around, Lin Li owes Ding Sihan two bows.
He gave a thankful look to Ding Sihan, even if she probably didn’t notice, and then Lin Li continued to immerse himself in watching the show.
As they drew closer together, the light fragrance of her shampoo became more intense, lingering at the tip of his nose, quite pleasant to smell.

chapters.title: Chapter 107 - 99: I never care what day of the week it is when I eat KFC, we are people from two different worlds
chapters.content:
Chapter 107: Chapter 99: I never care what day of the week it is when I eat KFC, we are people from two different worlds
Ding Sihan leaned back with her phone in hand, then slightly adjusted the angle to take some photos of Lin Li and Chen Yu Ying with their heads together.
Unfortunately, all six of them in the dorm had a great relationship, so there was no exclusive group without Chen Yu Ying to share this photo and let the other four indulge in it.
After thinking about it, Ding Sihan decided not to create a separate group. Although her intention in making a small group wasn’t bad this time, it might lead to unwanted outcomes. She figured she’d just send it to the dorm group after they got off, which would also let her see her deskmate’s embarrassed reaction.
So, Ding Sihan continued to take stealthy photos.
Yu Guang noticed other people’s cameras.
Ding Sihan met the gaze of Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei, who were also taking sneak shots.
The three of them exchanged knowing smiles and continued to capture the moment individually.
...
The progress bar of their mission was synchronized with the progress bar of the variety show, steadily advancing amidst their low giggles.
"Yu Ying, we’re getting on the highway now." Ding Sihan suddenly patted Chen Yu Ying’s shoulder and said.
"Alright, let’s begin then." Chen Yu Ying nodded in response, took off her earphones, and handed them to Lin Li, "Lin Li, you can have these earphones."
And then she straightforwardly lowered the small table in front of Lin Li and placed her phone on it.
"Class representative, aren’t you watching?" Lin Li inquired.
"No, Si Han and I are going to start practicing makeup now." Chen Yu Ying nodded.
Only then did Lin Li notice that under the snacks in Ding Sihan’s big backpack were all kinds of bottles and jars, seemingly makeup products.
"Makeup?" he asked.
"Yeah, we can’t wear makeup at school, but since we’re out to have fun, we wanted to give it a try. Although we’ll have to remove it by tonight, it’s just for practice for the next morning, and it’s a good way to kill time." Chen Yu Ying continued explaining.
Lin Li understood immediately.
As for why they only started now, they didn’t need to ask. Before getting on the highway, the bus often accelerated, decelerated, or even made sudden stops, making it unsuitable for makeup. But on the highway, they wouldn’t have such trouble, it could maintain a constant speed almost the whole way.
"So it’s perfect, letting you watch immersively on your own." Chen Yu Ying chuckled.
Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying had already set up a makeup mirror on the small table, with a phone next to Ding Sihan playing a tutorial. The two of them started working with the bottles and jars, beginning their makeup routine.
Watching as the mission progress bar visibly slowed down due to their makeup session, Lin Li sighed inwardly.
Without you, representative, this variety show has no value to me—even though it’s really quite entertaining.
And out of all the things to do, why makeup?
But to not appear too deliberate, Lin Li decided to hold on and finish watching the variety show—not because it’s good, just to maintain nonchalance.
The show was just at its conclusion anyway. After Lin Li finished watching it, he turned off Chen Yu Ying’s phone screen and set it back on her table.
Then he ’curiously’ examined Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying’s processes.
Ding Sihan was clearly a bit clumsy, often letting out small gasps of surprise at little mishaps. Chen Yu Ying was also pretty inexperienced, but her dexterity made everything go smoothly.
"Class representative, I want to try makeup too, can I?" After being curious for a while, Lin Li finally spoke up.
Both Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan looked at Lin Li in surprise.
"You want me to help you with it?" Chen Yu Ying hesitated before asking.
There’s actually nothing wrong with guys wearing makeup, but in high school, a guy showing interest in makeup pretty much equates to losing his male card and being labeled as effeminate.
Plus, based on Lin Li’s usual behavior and character, he didn’t seem like someone who would be interested in this.
"No, I want to do it myself, it looks fun, and I want to try." Lin Li wasn’t embarrassed by their looks but responded with a bright smile.
If Chen Yu Ying is applying her own makeup, then naturally, he ought to do his own too.
After a moment of being dumbfounded, Chen Yu Ying also showed a look of interest. She nodded and pointed at her makeup bag:
"Except for lipstick and lip gloss—I doubt you can apply them—you can use anything else from mine."
She suddenly felt curious about how Lin Li would turn out.
"Thank you so much." Lin Li clasped his hands together gratefully.
"There are no extra makeup mirrors... Can you make do with this small mirror?" Chen Yu Ying rummaged through her little bag but only found a small round mirror the size of her palm.
"Sure, I’m not picky." Lin Li replied easily.
"Do you know anything about makeup, Lin Li?" Chen Yu Ying asked again.
"Not at all!" Lin Li blinked.
As expected, Chen Yu Ying chuckled softly, then set her phone up in front of Lin Li again, "This collection is all about makeup tutorials. You can watch and learn. Good luck."
"Thanks, class representative, you’re the most beautiful Tokyo University girl I’ve ever met. Your eyes hold the universe." Lin Li gave a thumbs up.
"It feels like Yu Ying’s makeup will all go to waste. Lin Li, use it carefully, they’re expensive." Ding Sihan, whose eyes only saw sparkles, made a dissatisfied remark.
She wasn’t stingy, just couldn’t bear to see those products go to waste.
"It’s okay, feel free to use them; most of them here are samples, not worth much." Before Lin Li could respond, Chen Yu Ying casually responded.
"Alright, alright~ our class representative’s so rich, truly doesn’t care about little things like this. Lin Li, enjoy the royal grace, use them freely." Ding Sihan teased indulgently.
"Is the class representative’s family really wealthy?" Lin Li was still watching a video to distinguish between primer and foundation, but looked up when he heard, missing the point.
"Yu Ying never checks the day of the week when eating KFC, choosing to order separately even when there’s a set meal, never using any delivery discounts. What do you think?" Ding Sihan answered.
"Can’t argue with that, that’s real wealth!" Lin Li responded with a thumbs-up.
"Hey! Wealthy doesn’t mean crazy. I’ve never ordered separately when there’s a set meal, and I do use discount codes!" Chen Yu Ying argued back.
"Did you hear that, Lin Li? Yu Ying didn’t deny having money." Ding Sihan made a face.
"Got it, sir! I’m holding on tight to these beautiful slender thighs." Lin Li saluted.
"You’ve got ambition and taste; Yu Ying’s legs are indeed beautiful! Keep it up!"
"Yes!"
"Pervert."
The two of them played along with each other, while Chen Yu Ying muttered softly, crossing her straight legs more closely.
Lin Li heard it and turned to her, assessing with his gaze.
Before she could speak, this time Chen Yu Ying realized her mistake:
"Sorry, sorry, I forgot, you’re a good pervert."

chapters.title: Chapter 108 - 100: He Is the Great Qing’s Number 1 Assassin
chapters.content:
Chapter 108: Chapter 100: He Is the Great Qing’s Number 1 Assassin
Lin Li realized that he actually didn’t need to look at any tutorials at all.
All he needed to do was stare at Chen Yu Ying, see what she was doing, and blindly smear stuff on his own face the same way.
This was the fastest way to make progress.
Chen Yu Ying didn’t look at any tutorials, so him looking at them was unnecessary.
By now, it had been more than twenty minutes since Lin Li started putting on makeup. The task progress bar had moved a quarter of the way in these twenty minutes, and now it was nearly halfway. You couldn’t say it wasn’t fast.
If only this makeup time could keep going.
But unfortunately, Chen Yu Ying had reached the final step of makeup, dabbing a layer of hydrating grapefruit-colored lip gloss on her lips, pressing them lightly so the lovely color blended out.
Lin Li followed suit—although Chen Yu Ying didn’t offer him any lip gloss, it didn’t matter; he just smeared the excess foundation on his lips. Eating a little of it was no big deal anyway.
After glancing at herself a few times in the mirror, Chen Yu Ying turned to see how Lin Li was doing.
Lin Li was already watching Chen Yu Ying, so at this moment, the two of them made eye contact.
Makeup really was a magical thing.
The streetlight’s sheen, coming through the car window, highlighted Chen Yu Ying’s face, giving her skin a near-transparent fairness. The eyeshadow at the corners of her eyes gave her clear, spring-like eyes a hint of elusive liveliness, like a deer hiding within.
Lin Li’s vocabulary failed him; he didn’t know how to describe this makeup. Although it was faint, you could even call it pseudo-natural, it truly had that dazzling quality.
It was probably a kind of elegant freshness. In any case, the color palette was harmonious, complementing each other and fully showcasing Chen Yu Ying’s pure vitality.
Ma Xiaotiao came over, exclaiming she was like white moonlight.
Xiaojing Xiaojing Xiaojing Xiaojing Xiaojing.
Mentally repeating "dark secret moonlight" to himself, Lin Li’s expression remained calm, his cultivator’s steady heart still firm.
As for Chen Yu Ying, who was not a cultivator, her mind was not so steady.
Just as she wanted to speak, seeing Lin Li’s face with his imitation makeup, she stopped short.
Then the whole of Chen Yu Ying started trembling, holding her mouth tightly as the full moon shattered into two crescents, reflecting in her eyes.
Her trembling body became unstable, collapsing into Ding Sihan’s arms, still shaking.
Lin Li chuckled softly. Clearly, the class president was completely captivated by his charm, almost fainting.
It would be better if Chen Yu Ying could control her laughter a bit. Otherwise, Lin Li felt a bit unconvincing when trying to deceive and comfort himself.
And Ding Sihan, who had been ’attacked,’ had just finished her makeup too, so she also turned to look at Lin Li.
Her laughter was neither ladylike nor contained nor did it possess any decorum.
"Lin Li, what kind of makeup did you do! Hahaha!"
The commotion in the front was making Bai Bufan curious. He stood up, leaning over to see Lin Li’s face, nearly spitting out a mouthful of water. Fortunately, Lin Li was prepared and slapped it aside, so the saliva sprayed onto Zhou Baowei’s face beside him.
But Zhou Baowei didn’t lose out too much because as Lin Li slapped at Bai Bufan, he turned his head to the back, so when Zhou Baowei saw Lin Li, he also sprayed water onto Bai Bufan’s face.
You could only say they were in a crazy exchange of bodily fluids.
Wishing them eternal happiness and growing old together.
Laughter gradually began to spread outward from the center.
Feeling indignant, Lin Li picked up the small mirror on the table and looked at himself, and then he was relieved.
No way to fake it, this was genuinely ugly.
Lin Li realized one thing: when he was putting on makeup, he was so focused on following Chen Yu Ying’s steps that he didn’t pay attention to whether he put things in the right places on his face.
He ended up laughing too.
"Lin Li, come on, let’s take a selfie!" Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei leaned out from behind, holding a phone with the front camera on.
Lin Li had no fear of the camera, confidently flashing a peace sign.
He was the kind of guy who’d get busted in a sweep and still be beaming at the camera; what did he care about an ugly photo?
Beside him, Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan finally calmed down a bit, sitting up straight.
"Can we take a selfie too?" There was still some laughter in Chen Yu Ying’s voice.
"Of course you can."
Lin Li had long arms. He took Chen Yu Ying’s phone, extended it toward the window, and snapped a few photos of the three of them together.
After taking the photos, Lin Li zoomed in on his own part, studied it carefully, and seriously said to Chen Yu Ying:
"Class president, I think inner beauty is more important, don’t you?"
That statement finally dissolved Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan’s attempts to stifle their laughter.
Lin Li gently smiled too. He was also quite happy, as there was nothing embarrassing about this. Lin Li was even sure this would become a cherished memory in the future.
Especially when he saw the task progress bar rapidly rising, he felt even more delighted.
It seemed the system couldn’t account for Lin Li deliberately guiding Chen Yu Ying’s actions, but it acknowledged the butterfly effect triggered by this mimicry.
"It’s okay, just try harder next time." Tired from laughing, Chen Yu Ying rubbed the corners of her mouth, half-heartedly comforting Lin Li.
"There probably won’t be a next time." Lin Li chuckled.
"Can I post this picture to my Moments?" Chen Yu Ying looked at the selfie on her phone and asked.
"Of course, go ahead."
Lin Li didn’t mind and was even starting to look forward to one thing: whether his good buddy (nap time version) Wang Yuezhi would like Chen Yu Ying’s post after she shared it to Moments?
Whenever it was about Chen Yu Ying, whether it was a post, a Moment, or even a status message, this kid seemed afraid to be even a second late in liking it.
And this time?
Hehe.
Lin Li leaned out and just made eye contact with Wang Yuezhi, who had been silently watching since hearing Chen Yu Ying’s laughter.
Urgent notice! Physics doesn’t exist anymore!
According to the conservation of hehe, hehe doesn’t disappear or appear out of nowhere. It only transforms from one form to another or transfers from one object to others, keeping the total amount constant.
But at this moment, Lin Li saw non-laughing Wang Yuezhi become more hehe after seeing what Lin Li looked like now! He even hehe’d too!
How did the hehe just appear out of nowhere?
The sky has fallen.
"Lin Li, does my makeup look nice?" Meanwhile, Chen Yu Ying, looking at the photos in her album, poked Lin Li and asked.
Eyelashes gently tremble, like a butterfly brushing past petals, eyebrows are long and soft, slightly raised, hiding anticipation.
Luckily, Lin Li is a Cultivator, with a stable mind, otherwise he really couldn’t handle it.
He thought for a moment and gave a thumbs-up: "Lost north and south in direction, quite stunning."
Chen Yu Ying had already built some resistance to Lin Li’s compliments, but when this little flirt came out, she couldn’t help but feel a bit shy.
"Thank you."
"My turn, my turn!" Ding Sihan raised her hand, pointing at her own face with both hands, sincerely asking: "Lin Li, what about me, what about me, how do you think my makeup is, does it look good?"
Lin Li looked at Ding Sihan.
This makeup is real makeup.
"Ding Sihan, do you want to hear the truth or a lie?" Lin Li thought for a while and sincerely asked.
Ding Sihan: "..."
Changed the tune at my turn!
The eager smile turned fake, Ding Sihan took a deep breath, then said with a smile: "I want to hear a lie."
The toad mustn’t eat swan meat! I, Ding Sihan, will not allow it if you want to be with Yu Ying! Lin Li? Do you deserve it!
Tonight I’ll blow and blow and blow the pillow wind to death!
Humph!
But for now, listening to compliments makes me feel better.
"Not good-looking." Lin Li shook his head.
Knew it.
Hey, wait.
Is a lie not good-looking?
After realizing, Ding Sihan’s lips twitched up and down, repeatedly, like twitching.
Trying to suppress but couldn’t hold it down.
Dead mouth! Be reserved! Don’t laugh!
Speaking of which, Lin Li does seem quite suited for Yu Ying, huh.
Lin Li, he’s so cheeky.
His little tricks are really skilled, my emotions were truly stirred by this kid, up and down.
Sigh, will Yu Ying be deceived round and round like this in the future?
Ding Sihan observed Lin Li, then was a bit surprised — isn’t Lin Li much more handsome compared to last semester when I met him? And his physique has improved?
There’s no doubting Lin Li’s height, but he used to be quite thin. This lanky figure is fine in winter, a walking coat hanger, but in summer short sleeves, sometimes even seems scary, a top-tier skeleton soldier. But Ding Sihan now noticed, Lin Li doesn’t seem as thin as before?
Feels like his arms have beefed up, the whole person looks, whether in temperament, physique, or features, much better than last semester.
Has he been working out?
Alright, Ding Sihan had to admit, Lin Li might not be merely a toad, at least a frog.
And still willing to praise me looking good, fine, fine, forget past grievances, the pillow wind continues to blow, but blow in a good direction instead.
Ding Sihan chuckled foolishly, shook her head, and asked Lin Li: "Then I want to hear the truth, hehe."
"Really not good-looking." Lin Li immediately replied.
"Hehe, thank you, hehe." Ding Sihan kept laughing.
1.14514 seconds later, Ding Sihan’s smile froze.
Just what did I hear?
The lie is not good-looking, the truth is really not good-looking?
Damnit! Is this how real truth works!
Alright, alright Lin Li! You damn toad! I’ll blow, blow, blow, blow, blow you with pillow wind to death!!!
"Lin Li you’re a nasty stinky dog, I hate you!"
Girl, you curse like you’re whining.
"Just kidding, your skin looks much better after brightening, really perfect!" After seeing Ding Sihan pouting, and getting a glare from Chen Yu Ying, Lin Li began to backtrack.
"Humph!" Late compliments are cheaper than grass, I, Ding Sihan, won’t accept this.
Might as well blow your pillow wind one less time.
Just then Wang Ze in the front row turned his head, saw Ding Sihan’s look, disdainfully said to Lin Li: "Ding Sihan’s makeup isn’t quite good?"
Wang Ze good, Lin Li bad.
Even before Ding Sihan could react proudly to this compliment, she heard Wang Ze continue: "However, Ding Sihan, I still prefer your look after removing makeup, ready to celebrate Halloween."
Ding Sihan: "?"
"You! You!" As Ding Sihan gritted her teeth in anger, Lin Li suddenly leaned over, signaled Ding Sihan to bring her ear closer.
After pondering for a moment, Ding Sihan leaned in, listened to the teaching, suddenly brightened, pointed at Wang Ze’s nose:
"Ha, Wang Ze, when you take off your pants, you can still celebrate Children’s Day!"
Wang Ze: "?"
Chen Yu Ying lowered her head and began to chuckle.
It’s really hard to tell whose attack is stronger.
"Lin Li! Beast! Your male citizenship is revoked!" Wang Ze, as expected, realized instantly this was taught by Lin Li to Ding Sihan, said heartbrokenly.
"I’ve already put on makeup, who cares about male citizenship." Lin Li pointed at his own face, said indifferently.
For three seconds looking at Lin Li’s face, Wang Ze couldn’t hold back the laughter first.
"I’m the Great Qing’s number one assassin, who dares to look me in the eye for ten seconds?" Lin Li became more arrogant, began to belittle heroic figures.
No one dared to challenge, even Xue Jian who transcended student ranks, after a glance turned away awkwardly.
This, is invincibility.
The invincible Cultivator really is lonely like snow.

chapters.title: Chapter 109 - 101 I Oppose This Marriage
chapters.content:
Chapter 109: Chapter 101 I Oppose This Marriage
Wang Ze retreated with a smile.
"Thank you, Sister Lin!" Ding Sihan extended her hand.
Past grievances, wiped clean! Lin Li is still a good frog!
Lin Li high-fived her understandingly and eagerly asked, "No problem, Sister Ding, but since we’re sisters, can Sister Lin sleep in the same room as you tonight?"
"Is that so?" Wang Ze turned his head sharply like a dog spotting something unsavory, saying to Ding Sihan, "Sister Ding, I’m actually your Sister Wang! Count me in tonight!"
"Wang Ze, you’re so disgusting, go away, go away, go away——" Ding Sihan pinched her nose in disdain, waving her hand as if shooing away flies.
Wang Ze: "?"
"Isn’t there some bias here? Wasn’t it Lin Li who suggested it first? Why am I the only one called disgusting? Scold him too!"
Being scolded himself was fine, but Wang Ze was unhappy that Lin Li didn’t get scolded too; after all, it wasn’t about scarcity but about equity.
"Do you even compare to Lin Li? You’re not even fit to hold his shoes!"
Of course, this wasn’t said by Ding Sihan but by Lin Li on her behalf, and he confirmed with her, "Right?"
Ding Sihan blinked, then nodded, "Hmm... right."
Wang Ze gave a middle finger in response and turned his head back.
With makeup done, Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan started taking selfies happily, and Lin Li naturally joined in, without any objection from them.
After all, how else to highlight the flowers? Especially the makeup skills? Wouldn’t you need a pile of cow dung with makeup?
Who else but Lin Li to be that cow dung?
At this point, Lin Li’s deliberate imitation of Chen Yu Ying’s movements only appeared amusing to them, with no one minding, and the progress bar soared.
After selfies, Chen Yu Ying started watching variety shows with Lin Li again.
...
Lin Li furrowed his brow slightly.
The new variety show didn’t have many episodes, and after watching, Chen Yu Ying chose to rest in place, leaning back, as naturally, sitting on the bus for long became tiring, not even glancing at her phone.
Lin Li, naturally followed suit.
The progress rate was decent, but it suddenly slowed just before completion.
Lin Li opened his eyes; Chen Yu Ying wasn’t doing anything else.
So what’s the issue here?
Lin Li kept silently adjusting his position, searching for the problem’s cause.
He should’ve found it.
Lin Li saw Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan’s hands were now holding each other’s, swaying back and forth.
Girls doing such things aren’t unusual.
Clearly, the system judged that Chen Yu Ying was no longer resting with her eyes closed but was holding hands with Ding Sihan.
Lin Li blinked.
Even though he and Ding Sihan were nominally sisters, really walking to the aisle and grabbing her hand to sway together should earn quite a backlash.
By now, the bus was already within Pingjiang City limits; soon, they’d reach their destination. Although there was no time limit to this task, and on the return trip, it would still be judged on the same mecha, it’s ideal not to procrastinate as there was just a tiny bit left.
Looks like a detour is the only way.
Lin Li glanced at his phone, memorizing some terminology, then poked his head out, "Ding Sihan, are you bored?"
"Not really, why?" Ding Sihan asked curiously.
Hearing the conversation, Chen Yu Ying opened her eyes too.
"Want me to read your palm?" Lin Li resorted to this tactic.
Unexpectedly, Ding Sihan looked wary, "Hey, Lin Li, what are you up to, trying to take advantage of shaking my hand under the guise of palm reading?"
Really sees through one’s intentions in a heartbeat.
"What a joke, if I were to take advantage, wouldn’t it be to take advantage of the monitor?" But Lin Li retorted righteously.
Full of confidence.
"Who knows if you’re trying to bypass me and take advantage of Yu Ying, what do you know about palmistry?" Ding Sihan remained cautious.
"You dare call us sisters and trust me this little?" Lin Li feigned being hurt, "Give me your hand, and you’ll see if I know palmistry soon enough."
Ding Sihan looked at Lin Li, half skeptical, then placed her hand in front of Lin Li, letting him hold it.
It surged up! It surged up!
Though now Yu Ying and Ding Sihan weren’t holding hands, mimicking study didn’t require perfectly syncing every moment, so it didn’t impede the progress from speeding up.
And when Lin Li started swaying Ding Sihan’s hand, the speed increased even more.
Watching her hand sway back and forth, Ding Sihan: "?"
Palm reading?
"This is the Mount of Jupiter, full here, meaning your health and vitality are good," but before she could pull back and retort, Lin Li began analyzing, "The sway of the Mount of Saturn is slightly indented, showing a bit of a lack in confidence, the first and second Mounts of Mars are symmetrical, meaning..."
Really bro, you know this stuff?
Does palmistry really need swaying? Could it be a step needed by masters?
Hearing these professional terms, Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying were left stupefied.
Ding Sihan simply let Lin Li sway her hand steadily, she bought it.
"These five lines, you may have heard a little bit about them. These three are the Heaven, Earth, and Human lines, and these two are the Career and Marriage lines..."
Although Lin Li seemed to be looking at Ding Sihan’s hand, in reality, her eyes were closed the entire time — after all, that’s what Chen Yu Ying just did too.
The two thought she was observing the palm, and didn’t notice this detail.
The so-called jargon coming from her mouth was all memorized just now, now used to stall for time.
Hold on, victory is almost here!
[Task Five Completed!]
[You have received a reward: Physical Improvement: Mecha Sync Rating +10; Random Ability*1; System Currency*50]
This notification was like a heavenly melody to her ears.
Lin Li opened her eyes, her face filled with relief.
No more suffering for me.
Lin Li raised her head and said to Ding Sihan, "I’ve pretty much analyzed everything, do you have any questions?"
"Master, of course, I’m more concerned about my love life!" Ding Sihan said seriously but with anticipation.
"Your love line extending to the index finger, ending below the Saturn mount on the index finger, means you’re naive and romantic, with keen feelings and a love for beautiful things, but with unrealistic ideas," Lin Li stated.
"Mm-hmm! That’s true! That’s so accurate, Lin Li!" Ding Sihan nodded.
"Ding Sihan, do you also believe in astrology?" Hearing this familiar answer, Lin Li suddenly looked up and asked.
"Yeah, why?" Ding Sihan was puzzled; is there a connection between astrology and palm reading?
No wonder she’s so easy to fool, Lin Li shook her head, marking for the future to sell Ding Sihan health supplements in her old age.
"Too bad your palm shows broken lines." Lin Li suddenly sighed regretfully.
"What does that mean?" Ding Sihan’s heart tightened.
Meanwhile, Chen Yu Ying was drawn to the phone that had fallen to the ground from Lin Li’s pocket, the screen still lit up.
"Before you’re twenty-five, you’ll be frustrated and hurt because you can’t meet someone truly suitable for you," Lin Li sighed.
"I knew it! It’s so hard to find someone suitable!" Ding Sihan nodded heavily, then cracked her fingers, "So I can only meet someone after twenty-five. That’s okay, I can wait."
"Uh, no, actually even after twenty-five you won’t meet anyone, you’ll just get used to it and won’t be frustrated and hurt anymore," Lin Li explained bluntly.
Ding Sihan: "?"
"Good news, you’ll meet someone at sixty," seeing Ding Sihan struck by two bad news, Lin Li hurriedly comforted.
"What’s the use of meeting someone at sixty! I’ll be menopausal by then!" Ding Sihan raged.
"Oh no, oh no, what am I going to do in this life! Sixty? Yu Ying, how can I delay menopause?" After her bout of anger, Ding Sihan fell into a helpless panic, seeking ways to remedy the situation.
It’s just that her methods seemed a bit off.
"Si Han, don’t be so upset, Lin Li was lying to you, everything he just said was checked on the spot," Chen Yu Ying said, wanting to laugh but holding back, patting Ding Sihan’s shoulder, showing her the phone in her hand.
"Zhihu: Palmistry Guide, for Cheating Only."
All the terms Lin Li just used were on there.
Lin Li saw this scene and patted his pants pocket, wondering how his phone fell out.
"It was all fake?" Ding Sihan’s face stiffened, then mechanically turned her head, glaring at Lin Li, articulating each word.
"Hello, yes." Lin Li nodded with a smile.
"Lin Li, I can’t stand being in the same world as you anymore, you’re not my friend!" Ding Sihan roared.
"Then I can only return to the male roster." Lin Li sighed dramatically.
"Sorry, on behalf of the males, I refuse," Wang Ze said without turning his head.
"Then I can only return to Bai Bufan’s roster." Hearing this, Bai Bufan, who wanted to respond, was held back by Lin Li.
"I will never believe in your stupid astrology and palm reading again!" Ding Sihan gritted her teeth.
In a way, they had done a good thing, and Lin Li felt even more reassured.
This expression, however, seemed even more infuriating in Ding Sihan’s eyes, and she immediately changed her tone to threaten, "Hmph! I will definitely not let Yu Ying fall into the hands of someone like you, Lin Li. You’d better not have any designs on Yu Ying, or I will become your biggest obstacle!"
If I had known, I wouldn’t have been the wingman! Next time I need to change my position while gossiping!
Meanwhile, Chen Yu Ying felt a bit embarrassed and lightly scolded, tapping Ding Sihan’s hand, "Don’t say such things."
Having completed the task, Lin Li felt light and unbothered, instead, looking at Chen Yu Ying, he said, "Class President."
"W-what is it?" Chen Yu Ying was a bit scared, worried Lin Li might really confess.
A confession wouldn’t be a good thing; it would make her look black-hearted.
"Do you know why Snow White had a turbulent life?" Of course, Lin Li had no intention of confessing; he’d even hesitate if Chen Yu Ying confessed first, instead saying.
"Why?" Although not knowing why the topic shifted to this, Chen Yu Ying was a bit curious.
"Because she had too many little people around her; remember to take this as a cautionary tale."
Seven dwarfs surely count as little people.
Snow White Chen Yu Ying: "..."
Little person Ding Sihan: "?"
So you’ve been mocking me all along!
"Lin Li!!!!"

chapters.title: Chapter 110 - 102: Tribute to the Legendary Horse Hunter
chapters.content:
Chapter 110: Chapter 102: Tribute to the Legendary Horse Hunter
A man should kneel only for a worthy cause. Lin Li immediately apologized.
It was clear that Ding Sihan was just as magnanimous as he was, so she accepted the apology at once. Apart from occasionally giving him a venomous glare like Nanny Rong’s towards Ziwei, she didn’t have much of a reaction.
Being forgiving is a good trait, Lin Li gave her some brownie points for that.
However, he had to be more cautious when crossing the street later and make sure to stand behind her, otherwise, he might really end up tripping a big truck.
After getting Chen Yu Ying to help pacify things a bit longer, Lin Li turned his attention to the reward.
He hadn’t yet paid attention to what ability he had gained this time.
[You have acquired an active ability: Mimicry.]
[Mimicry: You can imitate a behavior pattern, skill, or ability you’ve witnessed in person within the past month for one hour after use. You will gain 50% to 150% proficiency, determined by your physical fitness and the difference between your ability and that of the person you are imitating.]
You accumulate one usage opportunity every 48 hours, with a maximum storage capacity of two.
Another active ability.
And it looks quite useful too.
For instance, Lin Li could now choose Xiaojing, whom he saw at Tianhong, and mimic her seductive dance that cost 299 in front of him.
His own body flexibility might not equal that of Tianhong Xiaojing, so maybe he could replicate 70% to 80% of the sexiness?
No, that’s not right. He almost forgot that he also knows ballet. He’s technically a dancer with "systematic training," with quite a bit of dance techniques in his memory.
With these foundations, he might even dance more seductively than Tianhong Xiaojing.
The most commendable point about this ability is that it assures at least a 50% mimicry effect.
But whether he can only mimic that 299 dance or mimic Xiaojing’s entire dance ability to dance other routines, remains to be verified later on through usage.
It takes two days to accumulate one usage opportunity, which is quite a while.
Right now, it’s only about ten minutes until they reach the hotel, and the remaining time isn’t even enough to listen to a piece for English listening practice.
Relax a bit.
Lin Li simply stood up and crawled forward to see what Wang Ze and the others were doing.
Wang Ze was playing chess with Zhang Haoyang.
The sporty jock being crushed by the smart couch potato, Wang Ze’s opponent was trying to multitask, still playing on a game console, Zhang Haoyang.
The battle was one-sided.
Wang Ze seemed to start moving Zhang Haoyang’s pieces.
"Get lost, Haoyang, playing with you is no fun, I want to play with Lin Li!" Noticing Lin Li’s gaze, the brainstorming Wang Ze immediately found someone equally matched to compete with.
"Okay." Zhang Haoyang didn’t even look up.
"Come on, Lin Li, let’s have a round."
"OK."
"I’m Red, and I go first." Lin Li accepted the challenge, committed to a cannon attack, and laughed, "Haha, Wang Ze, you’ve lost your horse."
Wang Ze: "..."
At this point, capturing the cannon with the chariot was the sure win, but his hand instinctively pressed on his cannon.
It was a matter of horse dignity.
Revenge was necessary.
But at that moment, Lin Li’s hand pressed down on Wang Ze’s hand.
Wang Ze looked up to see Lin Li shaking his head, "I concede, Wang Ze, you’re strong, though you’ve lost your horse, you won, fortunately, I’m the loser but still have my horse."
Wang Ze: "?"
"You’re saying your goal in the game was just to kill my horse, right?" Wang Ze roared.
"One more game! I’m on the red side now!" Wang Ze was determined to reclaim his honor.
"Then I concede now, Wang Ze, you’re strong, you’ve won twice, lost only a horse, now let’s start the third game, and I’m on the red side again." Lin Li excitedly rubbed his hands together.
Wang Ze: "?"
"You lost, you’re a loser!"
"Yes, I’m a loser, but your horse is gone."
"..."
"Get lost, Lin Li, Haoyang, let’s continue!"
Wang Ze decided he would never play chess with Lin Li, this legendary Horse Hunter, again in his life.
"The skill gap is huge, if you want to win, Wang Ze, use your horse well." True masters find loneliness in boredom, it seems like no more chess is to be played, Lin Li patted Wang Ze on the shoulder, advising this junior.
"What nonsense are you spewing? Show some respect to my horse." Horses matter, Wang Ze was very cautious, even covering both horses with his hand.
"No harm done, rumor says you can win quickly with a horse and a player, just wanted to share the trick." Lin Li said.
Zhang Haoyang pulled his gaze from the game console, looked at the board, moved a piece, and then addressed Lin Li, "Time Circus super topic, who’s Lin Li?"
"Couldn’t let them go either."
The chess here wasn’t thrilling, nor was there a sacrificial horse for him, so Lin Li looked over to see what Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei were doing.
They were farming.
"Such an economic disparity, better surrender, can’t play without money." Zhou Baowei frowned heavily.
He was playing with Han Xin, 2/1/3, and starting with two kills with red and blue buffs is basic for Han Xin in the early game.
"Bao Wei, aren’t you a bit too materialistic? Do you only see money in your eyes?" Bai Bufan frowned and said from hearing that, "I don’t like a materialistic man like you."
Zhou Baowei took a deep breath, Lin Li saw his fist clench for a moment.
Lin Li checked out the situation; oh, Bai Bufan was playing Diao Chan in the solo lane, 0/11/3, Bao Wei’s materialism was all because of his useless losses.
"Bao Wei, your temperament is pretty good." Lin Li gave a thumbs up.
Nothing worth watching here either.
Well, it’s better to study, ten minutes is still ten minutes, learning even a little bit counts.
...
The bus slowing down made Lin Li lean forward.
The bus stopped.
Lin Li looked around, noticing that it didn’t look like a hotel outside.
"There’s a height limit on the road ahead, our bus can’t get through, so we have to walk a bit, it’s not far, just around a hundred meters. Everyone check your belongings and take everything when you disembark. Tomorrow’s ride might not be the same bus." Xue Jian got up and explained.
"Lin Li, are you crazy! Studying right now?" Perhaps because she saw Lin Li’s phone screen while looking outside, Ding Sihan’s face turned white.
It was terrifying.
"This is how a good student is." Lin Li said proudly.
"Are you referring to watching a variety show with Yu Ying for two hours, putting on makeup with us for an hour, then sleeping for an hour, and finally studying for ten minutes as a good student, right?" Ding Sihan counted meticulously on her fingers.
Lin Li: "..."
Plans can never keep up with changes.
"Why are you so concerned about me? Ding Sihan, are you secretly in love with me?" Lin Li counterattacked immediately.
"Quack!" The girl who initially wanted to say ’Get lost’ accidentally said ’Quack’ because she spoke too quickly and immediately covered her mouth.
But the little rascal, Lin Li, wouldn’t let this opportunity pass, transforming into a toad immediately: "Quack, quack, quack!"
Ding Sihan’s face turned red with anger: "Watch out when you cross the street later!"
Bu Hao might really hit the jackpot.
Lin Li felt a chill down his back and nudged Chen Yu Ying with his elbow: "Class monitor, save me."

chapters.title: Chapter 111 - 103: The School is a Shelter, but Classmates May Not Be
chapters.content:
Chapter 111: Chapter 103: The School is a Shelter, but Classmates May Not Be
Still the same saying, Ding Sihan doesn’t hold grudges.
After checking there was nothing left behind, everyone started to get off the bus one after another.
"This time I’ll prioritize grabbing your suitcase. You’ll calm down, right?" Lin Li took Ding Sihan’s suitcase out of the storage space while asking.
"I put mine last... Of course, it’s first to come out. Show me how you’d take Yu Ying’s suitcase out first..." Ding Sihan, sounding like a vengeful spirit, said faintly.
Still has a brain, huh? Annoying.
Ding Sihan absolutely cannot leave my sight, otherwise it could be dangerous.
"Class rep, you guys go ahead, I’ll bring up the rear." After handing Chen Yu Ying’s suitcase to her, Lin Li casually cradled his head and said.
Theoretically speaking, a gentleman at this time would offer to carry a girl’s suitcase all the way. But the only thing Lin Li has in common with a gentleman is shi.
Of course, if Chen Yu Ying got really tired carrying it or actively asked for help, Lin Li wouldn’t hesitate to take over.
As for offering first? Forget it.
Suck-up lines up after Bai Bufan.
"Are we bunking together tonight?" Lin Li walked over to Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei to ask.
Given the price for this two-day, one-night autumn trip, no single rooms were possible, the school arranged four-person dorm-style rooms. From the group’s accommodation preview pics, the environment looks very excellent and luxurious—creates anticipation.
"Yeah, the four of us. And there’s Tianming. Hey, where’s Tianming?" Bai Bufan nodded in response, then looked around with some confusion.
"Tianming, what are you doing?" After finding Chen Tianming, Bai Bufan went over and gave him a hefty slap on the back.
"Qiaoqiao and the others seem to be arriving soon, might even run into them now. I’ll keep watching." Chen Tianming looked expectantly toward the direction the bus was coming from.
Lin Li and the others: "..."
"Why is his condition so severe? Seems worse than Wang Yuezhi’s as a suck-up." Bai Bufan frowned and asked.
"Wang Yuezhi is actually still quite an interesting suck-up, way better than Tianming." Lin Li threw in a good word for his good buddy (limited edition, midday).
"You two, can’t you make snide remarks behind my back? Plus, what’s with this world, why call deep affections ’suck-up’?" Chen Tianming couldn’t bear it anymore.
"Alright, Mr. True Feelings, stop waiting, let’s go, Xue Jian will get mad." Lin Li indicated that the classmates had already sorted their things and were following Xue Jian, who noticed the four and was not pleased.
"Oh crap—" Chen Tianming shivered.
Seems Xue Jian still has a way to wake Chen Tianming up.
"What did I just say on the bus and at school?! Forget your own actions, haha— cough, cough! Forget your own actions, you four haha—"
Keeping a straight face, Xue Jian was about to scold the foursome not following the group. But upon seeing Lin Li’s face, he laughed before finishing his sentence twice.
"Lin Li, lower your head, just seeing your face ticks me off!!" Xue Jian got even angrier.
Lin Li: "..."
Being the target of anger seems a tad unfair; drawing circles on the ground with his foot to curse.
After the scolding, Class Four started to move.
The words of adults simply can’t be trusted.
Their "soon" is never soon; their "in a little while" is never in a little while; their hundred meters definitely isn’t just a hundred meters.
"Teacher, are you sure the place we’re staying at is only a hundred meters away?" Having walked what felt like several hundred meters, Lin Li sincerely asked while waiting at the crosswalk.
"I said it’s the straight-line distance." Xue Jian replied lightly, "We’re not walking in a straight line now. Also, keep your head down, don’t look my way."
True to being a math teacher, precise to the point. Lin Li understood.
But appearance-based discrimination is not acceptable.
"Why is waiting for the red light called waiting for the red light, aren’t we waiting for the green light?" At this point, Bai Bufan suddenly posed a question.
Just as Xue Jian was about to explain it’s meant to wait for the red light to end, Lin Li piped up: "Raw anchovies or dead anchovies? Fighting fire or putting out fire? Alive before or dead before? Sitting in an elevator or standing in one? Cigarette tip or cigarette butt? One and a half hours or three half-hours?"
Zhou Baowei chimed in right after: "Caffeine comes from coffee fruit, then the fruit is the reason, the reason is the fruit? Why is drinking called nightclub, and staying over called hotel?"
Still occasionally watching behind, Chen Tianming joined: "Dante is Italian, Ding Zhen is Chinese. Yielding three points for pedestrians, not yielding, is also three points. The surgery succeeded, my failed life ended, does that count as success?"
Stop the noise, I’m thinking here.
Xue Jian felt his brain tremble.
The strangest things were filling his mind! Why do these kids ask such bizarre questions so fluently!!
Seeing the look of shock in Xue Jian’s pupils, and in some of those nearby, Lin Li sighed.
See, the result of not properly playing dumb phone games while young, only focusing on studying.
...
The destination actually wasn’t quite a hotel, more like a youth base or guesthouse, meant for hosting group activities like this.
Since the school had already uploaded identity info, Xue Jian’s interaction with the front desk didn’t require each person to show ID again.
After getting their room numbers and each receiving a room card, the four headed to their room.
Open it.
Damn it.
Everything’s decided by the real thing.
That phrase’s worth keeps rising.
But it’s alright, just not as luxurious as imagined, still much better regarding space and bed comfort compared to six-person dorms.
Considering the autumn outing cost, the value remains satisfactory.
"Qiaoqiao’s here; I’ll guide them around, don’t worry, I won’t leave the area." Having put his belongings down, Chen Tianming quickly told the group before leaving.
Were it not for needing to report his itinerary, Lin Li guessed he’d dart off without a word.
"Lin Li, you really shouldn’t have helped Tianming get this WeChat." Zhou Baowei shook his head, "Just one weekend, and the suck-up cells have spread all over him."
"Honestly, the cure for this disease is bringing Tianming to visit the chicken farm to see Feifei; Feifei’s a miracle worker." Bai Bufan praised Feifei’s name.
He was now a chicken farm believer, convinced it could cure any mind-related illness.
Since he himself was a living example.
"Then prioritize taking me there." Zhou Baowei said seriously, "Truth is, I’m a suck-up as well."
"Then you’re a suck-up pig." Lin Li tested the bed’s firmness, suddenly saying.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
"Who showers first?" Zhou Baowei tossed his backpack into the corner and sighed while asking.
"Baowei, the way you say ’shower’ sounds weird, use another term next time." Lin Li continued.
"Huh? What term?"
People love asking for trouble. Though Zhou Baowei knew no ivory would come from Lin Li’s dog mouth, curiosity couldn’t be resisted.
"You’re more suited to say ’get a dip’." Lin Li explained.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
So ruthless.
"Or Baowei, you can say ’I, old pig, am going to scrub away the filth’ too." Bai Bufan wouldn’t miss any chance to join a humiliate-Baowei contest.
"You guys, you guys!"
"I’m going to lose weight! I’ll slim down to a lightning bolt!" Zhou Baowei was inspired and motivated!
"Great chance, I even planned on filming a tribute movie called ’Hot Pot Roll.’ We could collaborate." Bai Bufan applauded and suggested to Zhou Baowei.
"But... is there a way to quickly burn fat without exercising or controlling diet?" Zhou Baowei’s three-second enthusiasm trial period expired, making him grin while asking.
"There actually is." Lin Li thought for a while, then nodded, "I’ll set it up for you now?"
"What’s it?" Zhou Baowei asked curiously.
"The closest crematorium is 1.2 kilometers away, you can head straight over; I’ll make the appointment now, still on time." Lin Li checked his phone, then looked up and said.
"I’m not looking for physical fat burning!!"
They say school is a safe hideaway, the last pure soil before entering society’s colorful mess.
Yet when Zhou Baowei left Freshman Year Class Four, why did he discover that society is full of good people?

chapters.title: Chapter 112 - 104: Challenge Failed, Next Challenger Please
chapters.content:
Chapter 112: Chapter 104: Challenge Failed, Next Challenger Please
Zhou Baowei couldn’t take it anymore and swung his fist at Bai Bufan.
"Damn it—it’s not Baowei, it’s Lin Li who’s supposed to cremate you! Why are you hitting me first?"
Bai Bufan, who was getting hit, dodged while protesting the injustice he felt.
"As a strong man, I only swing my fist at those who are stronger. Lin Li has been getting weaker lately and doesn’t deserve to be my opponent. Hitting you doesn’t go against my principles," Zhou Baowei said righteously.
Bai Bufan was both amused and exasperated by this grand justification.
"You just pick the softest target, don’t you! I swear I’m going to be just like Lin Li and abstain from everything! You all just wait and see!" Bai Bufan declared before getting beaten up any further.
The two ended their fight and their rivalry, while Lin Li got up and walked to the sink to wash his face.
He soon discovered that the makeup on his face was troublesome; neither warm nor cold water was ideal for removing it.
It was no wonder the expensive cosmetics from the class president remained intact even when wet.
Makeup shouldn’t stay on the face long term; it’s harmful to the skin, so Lin Li took out his phone.
"Lin Li: Madam President, did you bring any makeup remover? It’s hard to get off over here."
"Chen Yu Ying: Oh, oh, yes, I did. I forgot you have makeup on too."
"Chen Yu Ying: I have makeup remover and pads, but we’re also taking off makeup here. Why not come to our dormitory to remove it?"
"Lin Li: Is that convenient? If not, I can wait until you’re done and borrow it and return it later."
It took Chen Yu Ying half a minute to reply.
"Chen Yu Ying: I asked around; it’s convenient. We just got back to the dorm and no one’s going to sleep yet, nothing inconvenient for others to see."
"Lin Li: Okay."
"I’ll go remove my makeup." Lin Li got the dorm number from Chen Yu Ying and informed the love-struck Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei in the corner before leaving the room.
"Knock, knock, knock."
"It’s me," Lin Li said as he knocked on the door.
"Just a moment." Lin Li recognized Qu Wanqiu’s voice.
After half a minute, the door opened.
It was also a four-person room with Chen Yu Ying, Ding Sihan, Qu Wanqiu, and Yu Yu living there.
Qu Wanqiu and Yu Yu were watching a variety show via projection.
"There’s a basin of water here, be careful not to step in it," Qu Wanqiu warned as she opened the door.
"Why is there a basin of water here? Is it a trap?" Lin Li asked curiously, looking at the setup.
This spot was indeed easy to step into by mistake.
"Xiao Yu has a bit of rhinitis. The dryer the room is with the air conditioning on, the more uncomfortable she gets, so putting a basin of water under the AC makes her feel a bit better," Qu Wanqiu explained, pointing to the AC above the door.
"Got it."
There are many kinds of rhinitis, and some do have these symptoms.
Lin Li himself used to have mild rhinitis, but over the past half month, it almost seemed cured.
Lin Li casually greeted Yu Yu in the corner.
She shyly nodded in response.
I’m doing well with not looking at that challenge; I got a great score of 0.001 seconds, you should try it too.
Lin Li briefly switched his title and still felt the presence there, but it didn’t really matter. He was okay with whatever the outcome of sensing this thunder was.
Approaching the sink, it felt crowded with three people. Luckily, Ding Sihan seemed nearly done and made way.
"You can take my spot. I’m done."
"Why do you keep facing me?" Ding Sihan asked, puzzled as she prepared to leave, but Lin Li kept turning towards her.
"There’s no surveillance here, so I’m afraid I might accidentally slip in your room and hit my head on a sharp wall corner and die instantly. As a boy entering a wolf’s den, I have to protect myself," Lin Li explained sincerely.
Ding Sihan: "..."
"Who holds grudges like you! Besides, we should be the ones protecting ourselves!" she thought, feeling an urge to shove Lin Li from behind. His worry wasn’t unwarranted after all.
Ding Sihan left in a huff.
"This is the makeup remover pad, and this is the remover solution. Here’s how you use them—" Chen Yu Ying began instructing Lin Li on how to remove makeup.
With the help of tools, after about ten minutes, Lin Li’s face finally became clear and free of the haze.
"Outer beauty is still more important," Lin Li said contentedly, examining his face in the mirror, ensuring no makeup remained.
Chen Yu Ying smiled, continuing to apply stuff on her face.
It wasn’t that she was slower at removing makeup than Lin Li, but she had a big skincare routine after makeup removal.
No wonder her luggage was so heavy and full, explaining why her skin condition stood out in all of class 1-4.
Natural talent plus effort couldn’t lose; what else could others compare with her?
Except not enough grand allure to resonate with the thunder bringers.
"I’ll be leaving then, Madam President." After internally complimenting her, Lin Li had no desire to stay any longer and took his leave.
"Okay."
Lin Li left the sink and returned to the room, ready to leave when he noticed Qu Wanqiu and Ding Sihan eyeing him, whispering suspiciously.
"See you, bye-bye."
"Lin Li, have you been hitting the gym lately?" Qu Wanqiu asked directly as Lin Li was about to leave.
"Not the gym, but I have been working out. How could you tell? Because my figure has become more perfect?" Lin Li stopped, nodding with a slight pride.
His achievements were built on his own sweat—even the sweat the system dripped on Lin Li’s back counted as his own.
"Because your head’s become pointy," Ding Sihan chimed in out of nowhere.
"..."
"Damn."
Lin Li responded with a middle finger.
Then quietly patted his head. Good, nothing wrong, clearly it was just little miss Ding Sihan’s verbal retaliation.
"Have you developed abs then?" Qu Wanqiu asked with interest.
Girls often have more interest in hidden muscles like pecs or abs.
"Skinny guys naturally have abs, but they look different from gym-sculpted ones—they’re irregular and asymmetrical. Honestly, they don’t look good," Lin Li answered truthfully.
As a reed-thin guy, Lin Li’s abs were noticeable with just slight effort even before he got the system, but he never claimed he had abs.
"Can we see them?" Qu Wanqiu asked expectantly.
"?"
Qu Wanqiu seemed like a perv; Lin Li felt he needed to stay away from her. A guy must protect himself outside.
"My mom says not to let random women see my abs, she says that lacks male virtue," Lin Li naturally refused.
If it were Chen Yu Ying interested, he might hesitate but eventually show her, but Qu Wanqiu? No way.
"Tch—"
[With the wind and rain, you become a dragon—a unique male capturing attention in this world, making women curious. Conquer this world and exude your charm starting now!]
[Task Triggered!]
[Task Five: charm and earn more recognition from Ding Sihan, Qu Wanqiu, and Yu Yu.]
[Task Reward: Physical Improvement: Mecha Sync Index +10; Random Talent*1]
Another cold progress bar appeared in front of him.
Lin Li sighed.
He turned to face Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu, with a look of resolve, and lifted his shirt hem.
Then, like a seal, he patted his belly.
"See?"
Lin Li felt somewhat pleased.
Because compared to the evening task with Chen Yu Ying, this was much easier—just flashing his abs made the progress jump a bit.
The girls couldn’t resist his charm.
However, it seemed the reward was rather stingy—not an ability but a talent, and not even basic system currency.
If he could choose tasks from the system, Lin Li might not have bothered with this one.
All three covered their eyes, but only Yu Yu did it genuinely. The other two peeked through their fingers with eyes wide as saucers.
"Weren’t you supposed to restrain for male virtue?" Qu Wanqiu asked, unwilling to blink.
"You’re not just any women out there, I trust you," Lin Li replied with a gentle smile, his voice tender.
The progress bar appeared again and came to a halt with a clink.
"Lin Li, don’t say it like that. You scare me," Ding Sihan said, truly covering her eyes in fear.
Lin Li shook his head and sighed.

chapters.title: Chapter 113 - 105: Some fall in love in the wind, some watch the sea at night, some are considered a calamity
chapters.content:
Chapter 113: Chapter 105: Some fall in love in the wind, some watch the sea at night, some are considered a calamity
"You really don’t appreciate it," Lin Li resumed talking normally.
The progress bar started moving again.
So frustrating!
"It doesn’t look like fake abs to me, is it really possible to slim down like this?" After getting a closer look, Qu Wanqiu seemed skeptical and patted her own belly through her clothes, "I’m pretty slim too, how come I don’t have a six-pack?"
Because you’re actually not slim.
But the charming Lin Li would never say that, so he could only say it to himself.
Though his own abs indeed look better now.
After all, the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique is all about improving the physique, and the nourishment of Spiritual Qi is the same. After half a month, the abdomen lines will definitely look good.
"It’s because I’ve been working out, so there’s some sign of training, and an important reason is that I’m holding my breath. If I let it out, it wouldn’t be this tight — ha— ha! Ha!"
The three girls, including Yu Yu who finally dared to open her eyes a bit, all laughed.
Because Lin Li had been holding his breath and tightening his belly, but his sentence was too long, and he ran out of breath, couldn’t continue speaking, and started gasping.
"See, my abs don’t look as good as they just did," Lin Li patted his belly again.
The progress bar jumped up again.
Honesty and self-deprecating humor, it seems, are also a type of charm, and Lin Li’s little tactic worked again.
Hahaha, fifteen or sixteen-year-old girls are really easy to fool!
This task is really easy to complete, in less than two minutes it’s already halfway done, so Lin Li could understand the lackluster rewards.
Just see it as a freebie to sync Mecha indices, originally thought it was meaningless to him, but now it’s not right — he can redeem combat Mechas from the shop.
Hearing Yu Yu’s laughter, Lin Li suddenly thought of something.
He changed his title again to "Thunder Attractor."
Once again, when Lin Li looked at Yu Yu, she was looking at him as well.
More importantly, the stalled progress bar started moving forward steadily at a weak speed.
This time it can really be confirmed.
"Thunder Attractor" really treats big thunder as thunder, but the problem is it only treats big thunder as thunder, non-big thunder is instantly expelled from the thunder category, seems a bit too extreme.
Those with thunder attributes get a sense of closeness from the title with me, at this moment my ’charm’ in this task should come from this sense of closeness.
Could it be because I spoke about big thunder when discussing with Bai Bufan, so the system automatically corrected this bug within a bug?
If only I’d talked a bit more during the discussion.
Lin Li checked the "Thunder Attractor" title description again.
"...Meanwhile, any moveable related objects or people with thunder attributes around you will subconsciously approach you and have a weak sense of closeness, this effect strengthens as the duration of wearing the title increases, reaching its limit after three days."
Weak and has a limit.
Darn it! Still a bit disappointing.
Huh? My thunder technique can absorb... huh?
How does this thing absorb? Can it output after absorbing?
How exists in my body?
After achieving mastery of my thunder body technique, can I double the output? Can I produce and sell all by myself?
Can transfer it from one person to another?
As a pile of questions swarmed suddenly, Lin Li’s mind couldn’t process them all.
What is this Purity and Righteousness Thunder-Controlling Body, if it’s like I imagined, it’s basically a holy grail for gynecology, the gospel of tiptoes down!
Girls might even establish a Lin Clan!
"So how do you train? Lin Li? Lin Li? What’s keeping your mind wandering?" Qu Wanqiu’s voice grew louder and louder.
Lin Li snapped back to reality, this is all speculation, better focus on the task at hand.
Besides, these guesses are hard to verify.
"Since you’re asking so sincerely, I’ll gladly tell you," Lin Li began.
Even he was amazed at himself for early rising these past half months, why wouldn’t these gullible little girls admire him?
"..."
"Above all, unwavering self-discipline, strong determination, and relentless courage."
"That’s the fundamental reason for my drastic change in such a short time."
Lin Li finally ended the self-praise segment and then frowned, looking at Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu: "You two don’t believe me, do you?"
The rate of progress increased rapidly initially but slowed down with my explanation, now there’s only a weak increment from the "Thunder Attractor".
"No we believe you, haha," Ding Sihan clapped.
Hmm.
Don’t believe.
"I opened my heart with difficulty only to be met with doubts, truly disappointing." Lin Li felt a bit regretful.
"Aw, Lin Li what you said is too fake, waking up before 5 every day for at least an hour of boxing, including weekends, and doing it consistently, who would believe that." Qu Wanqiu had an I-want-to-believe-but-it’s-too-ridiculous expression.
"Seeing is believing, tomorrow and the day after, I’ll stick to waking up before 5 and boxing for an hour, whether it’s true or not, you can witness it yourselves, how about that?" Lin Li said with a smile.
Lin Li felt that nothing could demonstrate his charm more than letting them witness his efforts firsthand.
Because Lin Li still didn’t know how many people were watching Emiya Shirou’s high jump under that sunset.
Anyway, he definitely had to complete his training tasks in the next couple of days, so whether he let them watch or not didn’t matter much.
Being seventeen, satisfying that little vanity wasn’t a bad thing at all.
"Using challenges on me is useless; Yu Ying and I have to get up early to do our makeup, so we might really be up by five," Ding Sihan said with more confidence.
"That’s even better. Just wait and see tomorrow," Lin Li got up, walked to the window, pulled the curtain aside, and pointed to a corner of the field outside the base: "I’ll be training here tomorrow morning. It’ll be convenient for you to verify."
"What? Are you serious?" Ding Sihan was taken aback by Lin Li’s confident and assertive demeanor. "You wouldn’t just wake up early for appearances and foolishly stand there for an hour, would you? It’s unnecessary."
"I’m not that bored. You’ll see if I’m serious about training when the time comes," Lin Li chuckled.
"Alright! If you really can do it, I’ll call you ’Bro’ for a day!"
"Can you change it to ’Dad’?" Lin Li’s words escaped before he thought about it.
But it didn’t matter. Since he had the "Lightning Inducer" as a backup, he would complete the task sooner or later.
But.
Hold on.
Why did the progress bar just tick up again?
Is it a problem with the system’s logic, or did one of the three girls misjudge his charm?
"Fine by me!" Ding Sihan nodded, "But if you don’t do it, or if you’re not serious at all, you’ll have to call me ’Mom’ and be my servant for a day. If I say head east, you head east!"
"No problem."
"I want to join in, too! Count me in, count me in! I’ll be Lin Li’s second mom," Qu Wanqiu raised her hand.
"You better be ready to be my second daughter," Lin Li said calmly.
Chen Yu Ying slowly came out of the bathroom with a face mask on. Upon learning of their bet, she looked amused.
"Yu Ying, whose side are you on?"
"I don’t think Lin Li would gamble on something he’s not confident about," Chen Yu Ying said after rubbing her cheeks and pondering for a moment.
"The class president understands me," Lin Li had barely spoken when there was a knock on the door.
"Who is it?" Lin Li asked.
...
On the first night of the autumn trip, Xue Jian planned to check on every room belonging to his class, ensuring they didn’t play too late or get too wild, and to remind them once again about safety and the rules they had to follow.
His first stop was Chen Yu Ying’s room, as there were some things he needed to discuss with her.
Despite having a universal access card issued by the base, he couldn’t just enter girls’ dorms, so Xue Jian knocked on the door.
"Knock, knock, knock."
"Who is it?"
"It’s me, Teacher Xue," Xue Jian replied.
"Oh, okay, wait a minute, teacher. I’ll open the door for you right away."
"Alright," Xue Jian nodded instinctively and waited.
Wait a second.
Xue Jian paused.
He took a step back and looked at the room number. This was indeed Chen Yu Ying’s room.
Who kept answering him just now? He must have heard wrong. How could he vaguely hear Lin Li’s voice, that troublemaker?
Xue Jian cleaned his ear with his pinky, uncertainly saying, "Lin Li?"
"I’m here."
It’s really you!
Xue Jian quickly pulled out the universal access card, swiped it, and entered the room.
He looked at Lin Li, who seemed startled standing right in front of him, and loudly demanded, "How did you get in this room!"
But Lin Li’s gaze was on Xue Jian’s feet, and he stepped back a few paces.
An icy sensation spread, and as Xue Jian looked down, he realized he had accidentally kicked over a basin full of water.
Xue Jian’s feet felt cold, and so did Lin Li’s heart.
"Teacher, you’re here to wash your feet too, huh? If there’s nothing else, I’ll leave first," Lin Li tried to slip past Xue Jian.
"Halt."
Xiling’s young man, stand at attention!
Get ready to be scolded~
...
Yu Yu sat twisting her hands on the bed, not knowing what to do, Chen Yu Ying stifled laughter, Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu mopped the floor, Xue Jian scolded, and Lin Li got scolded.
The six people depicted a harmonious scene, each with a promising future.

chapters.title: Chapter 114 - 106: But This Place Is Really Nice
chapters.content:
Chapter 114: Chapter 106: But This Place Is Really Nice
