"Lin Li, oh Lin Li, you always manage to meet me in the most unexpected places!" Xue Jian said, his middle-aged face serious.
Lin Li immediately remembered their last encounter and then burst out laughing.
After laughing, Lin Li realized he’d messed up, knowing he shouldn’t have laughed at that moment.
Sure enough, Xue Jian’s face darkened instantly: "Even if you had your reasons, you can’t just use that as an opportunity to go in and out of girls’ rooms willy-nilly. Your thoughts aren’t right. After Mid-Autumn Festival, submit an 800-word reflection."
"It’s the class monitor who asked me to come over directly." Lin Li thought for a moment and decided to drag Chen Yu Ying into it.
At least he ought to share the reflection task; she should help him write 400 words. No, better have five people share, so each writes 160 words.
Xue Jian looked at Chen Yu Ying, who was initially watching the drama and felt a bit embarrassed but nodded. She handed over a tissue, letting Xue Jian wipe his shoes.
"Yu Ying must have her reasons for doing this." Xue Jian nodded, "You can go back, no need to write the reflection."
Lin Li gave a thumbs up, good students do have special privileges.
Hopefully, after the monthly exams, I could enjoy such treatments too.
...
Opening his room door, Chen Tianming hadn’t returned yet. The two who were bickering fiercely upon leaving were now lying in a bed together, appreciating one of Japan’s ’Three No-Spray’ films.
And using an IMAX projection.
"You guys are really something." Listening to the tantalizing sounds in his ears, Lin Li was truly amazed.
"Why did you take so long? We’ve already finished blanching. Not sure if there’s enough hot water left, so be aware if you want a shower. Or you could heat it up again." Zhou Baowei, leaning on a pillow, watching the subtitles on the projection, advised tactically.
The film was played at 3x speed, with frequent fast-forwarding. Clearly, they weren’t watching this film for its intended use; they were just appreciating the plot. True artists indeed.
Then Lin Li walked up to Zhou Baowei and grabbed his chest.
Zhou Baowei: "?"
Bai Bufan: "!"
The groped Zhou Baowei suddenly covered his butt: "What are you up to? Bufan! Change to a normal program, else Lin Li might unleash his beastly nature!"
"Applying lard to the hands moisturizes and protects the skin, preventing frostbite." Lin Li said flatly.
"Makes sense!" Bai Bufan immediately pressed down on the other side of Zhou Baowei.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
Lin Li, having groaned, thought he should’ve used all the hot water for himself when blanching earlier.
Lin Li headed to the bathroom, realizing he had just attempted the Qingzheng Thunder Control Technique, but it didn’t react at all.
The experiment is certainly lacking rigor, but unfortunately, Lin Li couldn’t find suitable experimental tools.
He couldn’t just ask Yu Yu if he could cooperate in his experiment.
...
After the shower, Lin Li joined the viewing segment on the bed.
They were watching a Minotaur now.
Quickly going through the film plot.
"Though I’m a pure love warrior, this film is really good, substituting into Huang Mao is truly exhilarating," Lin Li remarked.
"Though I’m a pure love warrior, this film is really good, substituting into the victim is truly exhilarating," Bai Bufan remarked.
"Though I’m a pure love warrior, this film is really good, substituting into the heroine is truly exhilarating," Zhou Baowei remarked.
Everyone truly has a bright future.
"Knock, knock, knock."
"There’s still a dog left in the film. Just perfect for Tian Ming to substitute into." Being closest to the door, Zhou Baowei got up to open it.
Then he froze.
Bai Bufan, curious, also sat up to see who it was, then he too stood straight.
Xue Jian slowly walked in.
The four of them exchanged glances, creating a silent scene.
Well, not quite silent; the tantalizing sounds hadn’t stopped yet.
"Ah~ ah~ ah~"
"Yamete~"
It was scarier than silence.
Bai Bufan, startled, rushed to stand in front of the screen, attempting to conceal the criminal evidence.
This kid was also scared witless; a projection can’t be concealed this way. Instead, it made the plot start playing on his face.
The scene wasn’t eerily terrifying anymore, but watching those things play on Bai Bufan’s face and body, the scenario became abstract.
If Lin Li hadn’t just gone through the ’don’t laugh challenge’ training, he might’ve laughed again.
Lin Li inwardly scolded Bao Wei for not asking who’s there before opening the door, then sensibly stood up and turned off the projection.
"What were you watching?" Xue Jian, returning after changing into slippers, asked, already knowing the answer.
Lin Li: "It’s a normal movie."
"If it’s a normal movie, why is everyone in it naked?" Xue Jian asked with a cold smile.
"The internet is too slow; it hasn’t loaded yet," Lin Li replied warmly.
Xue Jian: "..."
Then he sighed, holding his forehead: "Next door they’re playing Poker; you’re watching films, I don’t even dare imagine what the next dorm will surprise me with. You guys are honestly the hardest group I’ve ever handled."
There’s no spray this time; truly the toughest batch.
With vice and gambling combined, opening the next dorm won’t involve skating, right?
The three could only smile wryly.
"But when out for fun, I won’t use school rules to spoil your fun. Where’s Chen Tianming, where is the kid?" Xue Jian was, at this point, rather open-minded. He didn’t disperse the Poker game next door and was even convinced to participate earlier.
Relaxing with the students is rather nice, but knowing the relaxation content here was probably less suitable to participate in.
"Teacher, I’m here!" Chen Tianming returned timely, "I was room-hopping."
"Okay, let me remind you..." Xue Jian reiterated some rules and then prepared to leave.
"This stuff you should watch less, it’s unhealthy for the body. The younger you are, the more you should cherish your body, don’t wait to regret it at my age." Xue Jian said before leaving.
The message was quite extensive.
"Sad! Old Jian isn’t up to it anymore!" Zhou Baowei lamented on the ground.
Xue Jian returned when he opened the door.
Zhou Baowei now didn’t know whether to cry or not.
Messed up!
But Xue Jian wasn’t back for Zhou Baowei, pointing at Lin Li and Bai Bufan: "Thinking over it, you two can watch a bit more here, but just finish watching here, and don’t go to any places with dubious reputation, understood?"
Lin Li, Bai Bufan: "..."
"Understood."
Only then did Xue Jian truly leave.
Zhou Baowei couldn’t cry, so he started laughing.
"What happened? What were you watching?" Chen Tianming, who had just returned, looked utterly confused, but then he didn’t mind and instead opened his suitcase, flipping it open on the floor, rapidly taking out clothes:
"What do you think about this outfit on me, or this one? Lin Li, you’re about my height, do you have any really cool clothes? Help a brother out and match me!"
"What’s up? Are you going on a date tomorrow?" Lin Li inquired curiously.
"Yeah, yeah, I’m meeting Qiaoqiao for a date tomorrow!" Chen Tianming nodded emphatically.
"You call that a damn date? We’re all going to Pingjiang Amusement Park, isn’t meeting up normal?" Lin Li couldn’t hold back.
"Oh well anyway, I’m not hanging with you guys at the park tomorrow, does this outfit work? Never mind, you two have no sense of aesthetics, Lin Li, what do you think?" Chen Tianming turned to Lin Li.
Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei didn’t mind either; they enthusiastically left the room, planning to join the Poker game next door.
And to share the amazing experience they just had.
It would definitely leave Wang Ze and his crew astonished.
"Did you bring a suit?" Lin Li frowned and asked.
"Who wears a suit in September? It’s so hot, although a suit would look nice." Chen Tianming shook his head.
"Then let me change your hairstyle. I guarantee you’ll have Qiaoqiao wrapped around your finger." Lin Li nodded a bit regretfully, then said.
"Okay! I trust you, Lin Li!"
Three minutes later.
"This hairstyle... is it Hannibal?"
When Lin Li brought Chen Tianming in front of the mirror, he squinted skeptically.
"It’s a unisex hairstyle, suitable for both men and women, an all-purpose style, and if you had a suit, it would be even more perfect." Lin Li countered earnestly.
"Is this a Hannibal style?" Chen Tianming, squinting, questioned as Lin Li brought him to the mirror.
"Yeah, it can cut through both men and women, a universal hairstyle. With a suit, it’d be perfect." Lin Li genuinely explained.

chapters.title: Chapter 115 - 107: I Fucking Knock Knock Knock (Seeking Monthly Votes)
chapters.content:
Chapter 115: Chapter 107: I Fucking Knock Knock Knock (Seeking Monthly Votes)
Chen Tianming realized one thing, relying on his brothers is less reliable than relying on a clump of dried dog poop by the roadside.
Meanwhile, Lin Li decided to go next door to see what’s going on. Of course, just to have a look, and after that, he would return to study.
Lin Li’s diary.
9:10 AM: Playing cards.
9:30 AM: Playing cards.
9:50 AM: Playing cards.
10:10 AM: Lin Li, oh Lin Li! How could you fall so far? Have you forgotten the study plan you set earlier? Confucius said, "I reflect upon myself three times a day." You can’t go on like this.
10:30 AM: Playing cards.
...
"My life is like walking on thin ice, can I really make it into the top hundred in my grade?" Lin Li returned to his room, plunged into regret.
Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei were quite pleased, as they were playing the role of useless companions, willing to give their chips to Lin Li, rather than let him leave to study.
Bedtime.
Lin Li also realized something: over the past six months, Bai Bufan, Chen Tianming and the others have had a truly difficult time, maybe he should scold them a bit less in the future.
"Buzz---!!! Thud thud!! Buzz---!!! Thud thud!!"
He opened his eyes, confused.
It must’ve been his imagination, who would drive a tractor into the room?
Turning his head, the tractor driver Zhou Baowei was sound asleep.
But heroes always make an entrance, Galio arrived.
"Baowei, wake up." Bai Bufan skillfully flipped over onto Zhou Baowei and, without hesitation, gave him a solid wake-up slap.
"Slap!"
"What’s happening?" The tractor stopped, and the slapped-awake Zhou Baowei mumbled in confusion.
"Take a sleeping pill, prepare to sleep."
"Oh."
Seeing Zhou Baowei awake, Bai Bufan returned to his spot, turning to Lin Li, who wasn’t quite used to this scene yet.
"Lin Li, use your time wisely, in about three minutes, steady snoring will begin, in ten minutes, chaotic snoring will follow.
If I’m already asleep by then, just go slap Baowei; don’t worry, you don’t have to hold back, he’s used to it."
The fact is, irregular snoring is truly terrifying.
If the snoring is regular, you can force yourself to sleep using it as white noise, but irregular snoring, which can’t be predicted, is pure torture.
Lin Li: "..."
"Thank you for all your hard work over the years." Lin Li said with genuine sincerity.
"It’s okay, everyone is used to it, plus Baowei usually goes to sleep quite late by himself, tonight this jerk probably drank a lot next door."
It was clear they were used to it, after all, the series of moves was so smooth, it couldn’t be done like this without practice.
Fortunately, Lin Li hadn’t been getting sufficient sleep recently, and with today’s Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique focusing on odd-numbered physical Chapters, not even three minutes had passed before Lin Li fell asleep.
...
"Beep beep beep! Beep beep beep!"
The familiar magical sound of the Apple alarm clock rang out, and Lin Li opened his eyes.
"Slap!" At this moment, a clear slap landed on Zhou Baowei’s face.
Bai Bufan, full of resentment, said, "Baowei, turn off your damn Apple!"
"Huh? Oh! I didn’t set an alarm..." Zhou Baowei murmured, still dazed.
"Bullshit! You’re the only one of the four of us using Apple, hurry up! It’s annoying!" Bai Bufan slapped him again.
"I can’t turn off the alarm! It really might not be my alarm!"
"You’re the only one using Apple, and it’s not yours! Slap! Turn it off quickly!"
The three slaps you took for me were of great value.
Lin Li quietly turned off the alarm.
It was now 4:40 AM.
[Low-grade Spirit Stone*1.]
Another low-grade spirit stone was acquired, but today, spiritual qi Chapters wouldn’t be practiced; it would be kept in the [Warehouse] for now.
Lin Li quickly arrived at the designated open space from last night.
He looked for Chen Yu Ying and her room, the curtains were still closed, it seemed they hadn’t woken up yet.
Lin Li set up his phone at the side so they couldn’t deny it when he finished his practice, and then began the exercises.
...
"Lin Li, do you really exercise like this every day?" Chen Yu Ying’s pleasant voice drifted over on the morning breeze from nearby.
Lin Li turned his head and saw Chen Yu Ying, wearing a cute bear-head hairband, rubbing her cheeks to reduce the slight puffiness that comes naturally from waking up, all while looking surprised.
"Have my girls woken up yet, so they don’t deny it later." Even though Lin Li’s physical condition now allowed him to exercise for an hour straight without breaks, he took advantage of this time to rest for a few minutes, grabbing a nearby bottled water for big gulps.
"Wanqiu is still sleeping, and Si Han is at the window, afraid of disturbing others, so she has been sending you messages and calling, but you haven’t noticed." Chen Yu Ying explained as she pointed towards the room.
"No notification, that’s how it is." Lin Li turned his head to see Ding Sihan at the window, waving to her.
She responded with a middle finger.
"She asked me to come and see if you’re slacking off." Chen Yu Ying said with a smile.
"Sweat can’t lie, plus I recorded a video."
"I believe you, I’ve been standing here for two minutes already, you’re super focused." Chen Yu Ying nodded.
"How do you trust just like that? I wanted you to smell my sweat."
"You’re a real creep."
"Hey, by the way, having seen my charming side, won’t my image as class monitor in your mind upgrade from ’creep’?" Lin Li asked with a smile.
"How about ’self-disciplined creep’?" Chen Yu Ying tilted her head, exhaling with a faint smile.
"That way others might mistake ’self-disciplined’ for describing the creepiness, I prefer ’creepily disciplined’." Lin Li offered a better suggestion.
"Okay, your image is updated, from today, you’re ’creepily disciplined’." Chen Yu Ying nodded.
Finished with the water, Lin Li twisted the empty bottle into a twirl, then popped the cap off.
"Bang!"
The bottle cap flew high.
Lin Li watched it soar into the sky, then, waiting for it to land, picked it up and tossed both the cap and bottle into the trash bin.
"Then, class monitor, I’ll continue working out, I haven’t met today’s time quota yet." Lin Li said.
"Do you want me to get you a bottle of water?" Chen Yu Ying asked upon seeing Lin Li’s actions.
"My stomach is not good." Lin Li replied.
"Huh? Can’t drink too much water? Is hot water okay?" Chen Yu Ying didn’t comprehend.
"Can’t refuse a free meal." Lin Li winked.
"Wait a moment then." Chen Yu Ying laughed, then left.
Lin Li watched Chen Yu Ying’s retreating figure.
Summer sleepwear is really short, indeed so white and slender, quite attractive.
...
"Class monitor, why aren’t you going back, don’t you need to do your makeup?"
Seeing Chen Yu Ying not only return with water but also sat nearby, Lin Li curiously asked.
"I’m going to stay out for a while, letting the puffiness subside, I’ll go back soon, keep on with your practice."
"Alright."
The drowsy Ding Sihan by the window, now seemed very spirited.
Holding a camera, clicking away.
The picture gradually freezes.
The first light of dawn shines, golden sunlight filtering through treetops, falling on Chen Yu Ying, who sits quietly on the bench like a flower blossoming in the morning dew.
The girl’s long hair gently flows over her shoulders, swinging with her lightly swaying legs.
Lin Li was practicing, which Ding Sihan didn’t understand but seemed very powerful, every motion was full of strength.
Looks like I’m only balanced when consuming everything.
Ding Sihan looked at her captured photo, excitedly slapping her thigh.
The image was perfect.
Her Ying Bao, cute! Pure! Beauty!
Today’s scenery with sunlight breeze and treetops, just right!
Lin Li nearby, well, he was just a guy!
At this moment, time seemed to freeze, the girl, breeze, dawn, treetops, and that unnecessary boy nearby, all together formed a beautiful picture.
——From Ding Sihan, purely subjective, purely malicious.
--
Beginning of the month asking for votes.
Give me your votes, I’ll do anything.
"Yay" "Blushing white-eyed" "Yay"

chapters.title: Chapter 116 - 108: Is the Light Novel Really True or False
chapters.content:
Chapter 116: Chapter 108: Is the Light Novel Really True or False
[Get up before 5:00 AM continuously for one month to diligently practice the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique, accumulating at least half an hour before 7:00 AM (7/30)]
When the exercise task was completed, Chen Yu Ying had long gone back.
Letting out a long breath of turbid air, Lin Li turned his head to look out the window and saw Qu Wanqiu and Yu Yu’s faces. No wonder the progress on his task five had been steadily increasing, with just one final push needed to complete it.
Feeling how charming he was, he hoped they wouldn’t become infatuated with him.
Waving goodbye to the two, Lin Li put his hands in his pockets and swaggered away.
After making sure they couldn’t see him, Lin Li scratched his butt and pulled out the pants that were stuck in the crease due to sweat.
Luckily he checked the window just now.
He used to have no such reservations in front of Xiaozhou.
He returned to his dorm, ready for a shower.
Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei were still lying in bed, while Chen Tianming was already up and fussing over himself. As for his fussing, Lin Li’s assessment was it was like putting fecal matter on a dung beetle.
"Lin Li, where have you been?" Bai Bufan asked, barely opening one eye.
"I’m covered in sweat. You guess what I went out to do?"
"Wrestle with Wang Ze," Bai Bufan analyzed rationally, offering an answer.
"Exactly." Lin Li yawned, opened his backpack, and searched for clothes.
"Lin Li, do you think this wavy hairstyle suits me?" Chen Tianming asked Lin Li, somewhat expectantly.
Lin Li shook his head.
"Then what hairstyle do you think suits me? Let’s forget about yesterday’s rare style," Chen Tianming decided to trust Lin Li once more.
"Tombstone style."
"Get lost." Chen Tianming decided never to trust Lin Li again.
After showering and simply washing the clothes, letting them dry in the machine, it was already close to 6:30. However, the assembly time at the door is 7:20, so Bai Bufan and the others were still not up.
The departure was at 7:30, and the base was about a 20-minute drive from Pingjiang Amusement Park, catching the park’s opening time at 8:00 to be the first batch of tourists.
After working out for an hour, Lin Li was already hungry, so he left the room alone to head to the breakfast area included in the accommodation fee at the base.
Unexpectedly, they were still assigned the task of bringing breakfast for those few animals, even during an autumn outing.
Love is often feeling indebted.
Lately, Lin Li often felt indebted to Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei; it seems this is love.
Damn, am I actually gay?
Surely I can’t genuinely owe them something, right?
After photographing the types of breakfast and sending it to them for their choices, Lin Li carried big bags and headed back.
At the entrance of the breakfast area, he saw Chen Yu Ying and the other three approaching.
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu avoided Lin Li’s gaze, hiding behind Chen Yu Ying and Yu Yu.
Trying to play dead? No way.
Lin Li chuckled, blocking the door: "You two know what to do, or else don’t think about getting through this door."
Seeing this, Chen Yu Ying laughed, pulling Yu Yu aside, indicating she would not shield them.
"Oh, stop it, Dad, Dad, is that okay! Tch—" Ding Sihan initially wanted to resist, but Lin Li’s gaze made her too uncomfortable, surrendering in defeat, her voice dejected.
"Ah! My little Dingding!" Lin Li’s smile was benevolent.
Ding Sihan: "?"
"Dad..." Qu Wanqiu also called out helplessly.
"Ah! My little Tweettweet!" Lin Li’s smile was even more benevolent.
Qu Wanqiu: "?"
"Alright, you can go in now, permission granted for breakfast," Lin Li comfortably nodded, finally stepping aside.
A few girls from other classes were following the four.
When Lin Li finished reveling, ready to step aside and apologize for blocking their path, he saw several girls shaking their heads vigorously like rattles: "We don’t need to eat, we don’t need to eat, we don’t have to shout, right?!"
Then they fled, without a moment’s hesitation.
No one mentioned they need to acknowledge a dad to eat breakfast here?
How could this place be like this! No wonder it’s so cheap! Sure enough, there’s a catch.
"Hey! Buddies! No, sisters! No! Eh!" Lin Li took a second to realize their misunderstanding, but they were already gone when he tried to explain.
"Bu Hao, I have a vague feeling of being scolded again," Lin Li gave up the chase and squinted his eyes.
...
Lin Li was actually Spider-Man, that was his spider-sense reacting just now.
Class Dad Lin Li was once again disciplined by Xue Jian.
Old Jian’s scolding has become so smooth recently that Lin Li only regained his freedom after promising not to make himself anyone’s dad again.
With Bai Bufan and others boarding the bus, Lin Li sat in his usual spot, realizing afterward that Bai and Zhou also silently sat behind him.
Clearly, the seat next to him was empty.
Lin Li turned back: "Why not sit next to me?"
"Do you want to humiliate us twice before you’re satisfied?" Bai Bufan gave him the middle finger.
"Lin Li, I’ve come to understand your nature. I’d rather sit next to a stray dog by the roadside than sit next to you." Zhou Baowei cursed more vividly.
"Agreed!" Bai Bufan nodded heavily.
Lin Li sighed, looking at Bai Bufan with a ’you idiot’ gaze: "You’re still standing in support here? Care to guess which stray dog Baowei just mentioned?"
Bai Bufan: "?"
Bai Bufan mechanically turned to look at Zhou Baowei, pointing at himself sitting beside Baowei: "Could it be me?"
Zhou Baowei looked at Bai Bufan on his left and the window on his right, sincerely shaking his head: "No, look at that window, doesn’t it look just like a stray dog by the roadside? Of course, I was referring to it."
"..."
"Baowei, you %#@&* (flower talk)."
The two quickly patched things up, Lin Li smiled lightly, hiding his merits and fame.
This was indeed the strategy of driving tigers to swallow wolves.
Bless you, bless you.
Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan were loyal too. The four roommates sat in the six seats in front; they could have sat in the front, but seeing him sitting alone, they came to sit next to him, not leaving him alone.
Though Lin Li didn’t mind.
His great daughter was not a petty person, it seemed, not whispering anything bad about him at least, a decent human at best.
Unfortunately, this time, Chen Yu Ying boarding the bus didn’t trigger any task.
[Task Five Completed.]
[You have received a reward: Physical Improvement: Mecha Sync Ratio +10; Random Artistry*1]
The title quietly nourished Task Five after Yu Yu boarded the bus, and it was already just one step away; now it was complete.
[You have acquired the artistry: Singing]
Better than ballet a bit, but still just the icing on the cake because Lin Li considered himself a singing god already.
Suddenly, Lin Li had many skills in singing, such as vocal techniques, in his mind, but this ability, like ballet, didn’t appear on Lin Li’s panel.
On the way to Pingjiang Amusement Park, everyone was quiet because quite a few of them, including Lin Li, chose to take a nap in the bumpy twenty minutes.
Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying were also catching up on sleep, leaning against each other.
Light novels are deceitful.
At this time, shouldn’t Chen Yu Ying sway with the vehicle’s motion, and unknowingly lean on my shoulder, being all dreamy?
With this thought, Lin Li also closed his eyes and fell asleep.
"Alright, those who are asleep wake up, everyone, disembark in an orderly fashion, don’t scatter after disembarking, stay together..."
Awoken.
Light novels are true.
When Lin Li was woken by Xue Jian’s voice, he found they were leaning against each other.
The only flaw was that he was leaning on Chen Yu Ying’s shoulder, a bit like reversing the role of the Big Dipper.
However, a girl, even if it’s her shoulder, is really fragrant and soft.
Lin Li found his arm unusually uncomfortable.
Chen Yu Ying seemed not to be awake yet, so Lin Li immediately sat up straight and instinctively touched his mouth. Fortunately, he didn’t drool in his sleep, or else he’d be utterly embarrassed.
Chen Yu Ying then woke up, stretched elegantly yet restrainedly, with her gaze seemingly avoiding Lin Li.
Lin Li squinted: "Class president, did you wake up earlier?"
Chen Yu Ying pursed her lips, her cheeks slightly flushed at being caught, yet somewhat indignant as she said: "Lin Li, you’re too chatty."
Then she rubbed her shoulders, having one leaning on the left and another on the right. Sitting in the middle was indeed too heavy an experience.
Next time, she would rather sit... never mind, sitting in the middle it is.
"Class president, it’s not that my EQ is low; it’s just that I have thick skin and won’t feel awkward, so I simply wanted to see you embarrassed." Lin Li laughed heartily, getting his answer.
Chen Yu Ying faking sleep was indeed to avoid making Lin Li awkward.
But she overthought.
Perverts, especially disciplined good perverts, won’t be embarrassed.
"Hmph!"
Chen Yu Ying decided in her heart to put a spiked board on her right shoulder next time.
Let it pierce Lin Li to death.

chapters.title: Chapter 117 - 109: Courage Is the Funeral Song of Humanity
chapters.content:
Chapter 117: Chapter 109: Courage Is the Funeral Song of Humanity
The bus stopped at the entrance of Pingjiang Amusement Park.
Although today is Friday, perhaps because many schools are on autumn break, and amusement parks are popular autumn excursion destinations, there was already a small crowd of visitors who arrived before the park opened, mostly students.
Moreover, many schools obviously have mandatory uniforms.
As the students from Nansang arrived, the number of people increased.
"This is the homeroom teacher of Class 17, Teacher Wang Ziyan, and this is the homeroom teacher of Class 6, Teacher Zhou Pei. If you encounter any situation or difficulty in the amusement park, you can ask any of us for help via your phone..."
After entering the amusement park, it’s impossible to move as a group anymore; students will certainly be allowed to play according to their wishes. Therefore, while distributing the group tickets taken from the ticket counter, Xue Jian emphasized safety issues again and again to everyone.
The homeroom teachers of the other two classes are quite young, one male and one female, they look like they just graduated from college not long ago, yet they are already homeroom teachers, starting their career at such a young age down a path of no return.
These days, even a prince wants to become a teacher.
Lin Li and the others quickly got their tickets.
There’s some mystery on the ticket, after scanning it with a phone and entering the e-ticket, an option pops up allowing you to choose eight attractions you most want to play.
After entering the park, you only need to scan the e-ticket at the entrance of the corresponding attraction to have a chance to use the fast pass once, so even when it’s crowded, you can at least play the attractions you want once.
Fast passes that require payment elsewhere are provided for free here, which is quite thoughtful.
However, for popular attractions, using the fast pass doesn’t necessarily mean it’s quick.
But since it’s free, there’s nothing to complain about.
"What do you plan to choose?" Lin Li looked at Zhou Baowei and Bai Bufan, asking.
As an all-ages large amusement park, the attractions in Pingjiang Amusement Park are of various types, covering all sorts of attributes.
Inside the amusement park, Lin Li still plans to hang out with Bai Bufan and the others rather than with Chen Yu Ying and her group, aside from having initially agreed, it’s indeed more relaxing to play with buddies than with girls.
It’s not that Lin Li thinks the projects girls choose are childish or boring.
Don’t even mention it.
Damn it, that lunatic Ding Sihan, as soon as she got off the bus, pointed to the longest and largest roller coaster with inverted sections in the distance, immediately saying she’s going to ride it ten times today.
Qu Wanqiu even said directly that she’ll do it twenty times.
Compared to them, Lin Li seemed more like a rookie who prefers carousels and Barbie dolls.
For this ultra-long roller coaster that even requires upside-down suspension, Lin Li still feels a bit daunted.
It might be a bit overly thrilling.
Therefore, it’s better to show fear in front of the guys than in front of the girls.
And Zhou Baowei, looking at his phone, then looked excited: "Isn’t there a recommendation for the most thrilling options here, so let’s just pick these eight, after playing them all we can even get a warrior badge.
Into the Sky, Canglong Roller Coaster, Log Flume, Tianshan Hospital... too bad, bungee jumping is an additional fee item, 80 per person, so expensive, otherwise we could have jumped ten or eight times."
Lin Li: "..."
Fuck you, Zhou Baowei, when I’m getting married in the future, you need to sit with Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu.
Lin Li wore a calm expression and didn’t speak, because he knew someone would act more cowardly than him first.
"Hey, are you trying to kill me!" Bai Bufan stepped back half a step, "Bao Wei, I really can’t handle excessive weightlessness, I’m also afraid of heights, playing things like the log flume is already my limit, this spin-dive machine and roller coasters that spin in the sky, I’ll definitely die riding them."
"No, I checked, in the twelve years since Pingjiang Amusement Park opened, there hasn’t been a single death, you won’t die, at most break an arm or a leg," Zhou Baowei denied.
Bai Bufan: "..."
Too rigorous, buddy.
You’ve mastered the essence of comforting from Lin Li.
Bai Bufan looked at the ’calm and collected’ Lin Li, just like Lin Li knows his bravery, he also knows Lin Li’s courage is only a bit bigger than his, so Bai Bufan spoke again:
"Bao Wei, it’s meaningless if only the two of us decide, for the sake of democracy so all of us can have fun, we can only go with majority rule!"
"So now the crucial vote lies with you, Lin Li, who are you going to stand with?"
Receiving the signal, Lin Li gave Bai Bufan a ’you know it’, ’leave it to me’ look.
"So, what do you say, Lin Li?"
Zhou Baowei sighed, looking at the two exchanging meaningful glances, his goal has already become to strive to retain at least one or two thrilling attractions for the fast pass.
As for just playing by himself, Zhou Baowei feels it’s better to enjoy ’boring’ attractions with friends, it would be more fun.
Friends are the highest configuration.
Seeing Zhou Baowei agree, the plan was a success.
Lin Li laughed heartily.
Then stopped laughing.
"I fully support Bao Wei’s idea, let’s choose the eight most thrilling ones." He said.
"Great! Bao Wei, did you hear that, so we... huh?" Bai Bufan, realizing halfway through his chuckle, stopped chuckling.
He turned his head, pressing his forehead against Lin Li’s, staring at Lin Li like a Piggy Hero meme: "Lin Li, what did you say?"
Lin Li, like a soulless shell, smiled without warmth: "I said, if we’re going to play, let’s play the most thrilling ones."
Screw the system.
What changed Lin Li’s mind was, of course, the task just issued.
[Today’s chance to enter Pingjiang Secret Realm, naturally a series of trials before opportunity, crises arise, but a cultivator should have a determined heart to move forward, how can they be scared and weak? They must sweep through and pass the secret realm, earning the warrior’s proof!]
[Task Triggered!]
[Task 5: With a fearless and carefree stance, surpass the eight challenges of the Pingjiang Secret Realm.]
[Rewards: Physical Improvement: 100% increase in body control ability; Random Skill *1; System Currency *100.]
What else could he do?
Do it!
But Bai Bufan didn’t know, he only knew he was betrayed again, and now, trembling his lips, he couldn’t utter a word.
"A wise choice, Lin Li!" There’s always someone happy when another is sad, Zhou Baowei excitedly patted Lin Li on the shoulder, very pleased with Lin Li’s growth, then looked at Bai Bufan: "Bufan, you said it yourself, minority obeys majority, now you no longer have the right to refuse."
"I think... how about we reconsider for a bit? Come to think of it, logically speaking, the truth often lies in the hands of a minority, so the majority should follow the minority. You two should listen to me." Bai Bufan always had his own logic.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
You have way too many damn reasonings.
Lin Li and Bao Wei exchanged a glance.
"You do have a point." Lin Li looked at Bai Bufan and nodded.
Seeing there was room for discussion, Bai Bufan immediately got excited: "Right! Lin Li, think it over some more! Wouldn’t it be nice to do something relaxing? Imagine us riding a carousel, all heroic and manly, with gleaming armor! How masculine and grand that would be!"
Apologize to masculinity and grandeur on my behalf.
"Let me think about it." But Lin Li frowned and fell into contemplation.
Bai Bufan naturally started his relentless persuasion from the side, determined to win Lin Li over.
"Is it done?" Lin Li suddenly spoke.
"Finished what?" Bai Bufan was puzzled.
"All set." Zhou Baowei nodded.
"Alright, let’s get ready to enter the park." Lin Li turned around and walked away.
"Wait, what’s happening here? Before entering, we should discuss which fast track to choose!" Bai Bufan felt sidelined as he watched the two walk away.
Until he saw Zhou Baowei holding his own phone.
Bai Bufan touched his empty pocket and swallowed hard.
Bu Hao, just now was a classic misdirection! A crafty diversion! A nefarious conspiracy! Collaboration with evil!
"How is my phone in your hand!"
"Huh? How it’s in my hand, no idea. Here you go." Zhou Baowei’s acting was so poor, Bai Bufan couldn’t be bothered to comment.
Bai Bufan took a deep breath, unlocking his phone.
Good news, no extra 200,000 in it.
Bad news, eight projects already submitted.
Haha.
"Doing this, I’ll make you regret it!" Bai Bufan roared, looking at the backs of the two.
This behavior of deciding without him had touched Bai Bufan’s sore spot, he couldn’t forgive.
Acting carefree all the time doesn’t mean he had no bottom line!
"Haha."
Lin Li and Zhou Baowei didn’t even bother to turn back.
Bai Bufan took out his phone, maxed out beauty mode, and added bunny ears effect, snapping a photo, making sure to give them a piece of his mind.
Then he sulkily followed behind, now left with no choice but to hang around these lowlifes.
Scanned the tickets, followed the two to find a spot by the side to sit — the park gate wasn’t open yet, passing through the turnstile only led to a buffering queue area.
"Life is like being flipped over a skillet, either getting burned out or feeling the thrill." Zhou Baowei comforted Bai Bufan, who looked soulless.
"Society, like a forced flip, either resist or enjoy." Lin Li nodded, speaking to Bai Bufan and himself.
"Though crude, your reasoning isn’t wrong, but this is too crude!" Bai Bufan responded with a middle finger, then looking at the park’s interior which could now be seen more clearly — the heights and curves of those terrifying rides were also more visible.
So Bai Bufan sighed deeply: "Why must you seek such troubles, isn’t living peacefully better?"
"Courage is man’s ode, have you heard of Ozaki’s Eight Challenges? Ozaki Kono mentioned that once humans pass these eight challenges, they can achieve transcendence, and what we’re participating in now is the simplified Pingjiang Eight Challenges. Believe me, once you pass them, transformation awaits." Zhou Baowei patted Bai Bufan’s shoulder.
"The Ozaki Eight Challenges? I know, fire’s purification, village’s banquet, relative’s gift, dish’s packing, wife’s remarriage, child’s renaming, grass two meters, tomb’s uprooting. Once done, weight including human and box is five kilos, definitely a transformation." Bai Bufan smiled, pallid.
Bai Bufan already joined Fei Sect, convinced the only thing that causes transformation in the world is Feifei from the chicken farm.
Fei Sect’s greatness needs no words.
Aside from that, anything about Ozaki’s Eight Challenges is backward superstitious rubbish.
Zhou Baowei: "When the real banquet starts, make sure to invite me, I’ll be sitting at the kids’ table, packing the smoke and wine."
Lin Li: "If there’s a real remarriage, prioritize considering me, no need for the kids."
Passing by Wang Ze: "Did I hear about uprooting? Who’s getting uprooted? Doesn’t matter, count me in, uproot first then talk!"
Bai Bufan chose to smile.
If Liu Bang showed up, he’d have to shout a big Chu Sheng seeing these three.
Life is like Tao Zhe, everything must be solved with one’s own hands; Bai Bufan thought he must find an opportunity to deal with these three lowlifes.
"It’s about to open, let’s go." Zhou Baowei spotted staff standing by the barrier, holding its switch, so he stood up and said to the two.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan stood up quickly.
"That seems to be the entrance for the Canglong roller coaster; let’s dash there immediately, and we can ride it without needing the fast track, then once we finish the ride, surely there’ll be more people, allowing us to use the fast track again for optimal efficiency." Zhou Baowei said expectantly.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan sat back down, swiftly.
While walking, Zhou Baowei discovered there wasn’t a soul behind him: "?"
"When going out to have fun, why be so busy like a special forces soldier? Leisure is the true essence of fun." Bai Bufan poured mineral water in the bottle cap, blew on it a couple of times like drinking tea, and finished it in one go.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
"Bao Wei, be considerate of Bai Bufan. We only have one Bai Bufan; don’t play him to death." Lin Li said.
Unlike Bai Bufan, Lin Li didn’t fear the Pingjiang Eight Challenges but couldn’t enjoy them like Zhou Baowei, so one time of torment was enough, doing it more seemed redundant.
"Thank you, Lin Li, indeed you’re good to me." Bai Bufan was genuinely touched.
Lin Li was a good person; when he eventually decided to deal with him, he would make it quick, Zhou Baowei must be slowly executed.
Lin Li smiled warmly.
He still owed us thanks.

chapters.title: Chapter 118 - 110: The Wilderness, Humans Are Born of Mothers!
chapters.content:
Chapter 118: Chapter 110: The Wilderness, Humans Are Born of Mothers!
"Then we should at least go for one ride, we can’t waste the time when there are the fewest people, right?" Zhou Baowei agreed, though rationally analyzed.
"Let’s ride the roller coaster." Bai Bufan suddenly agreed.
"You can do it now?" Both Zhou Baowei and Lin Li were a bit surprised.
"Yes, let’s go on that roller coaster. That one looks the most thrilling and suitable for us." Bai Bufan pointed in a direction, eyes shining with excitement.
Lin Li looked over and then fell silent.
In a large amusement park, there’s not just one roller coaster, some even have seven or eight in a single area. The Canglong is just the most exciting one in Pingjiang Amusement Park.
The roller coaster Bai Bufan was pointing at now was another one.
This roller coaster covers about 500,000 square centimeters and can accommodate up to two people at a time. The highest point of the track is about 300 centimeters from the ground, and even Cultivator Lin Li would have to jump up to reach it.
In the middle of the roller coaster, there’s a terrifying dragon statue that glitters with multicolored lights, spinning endlessly and making noises: "Milky, milky, I am milky!"
Zhou Baowei looked at the amusement park’s electronic map on his phone, which had an introduction: "Cute Dragon Soaring, suitable for ages 3-7. Bufan, it’s smaller than your shoe size — does this thrill your currency?"
"I want to take a photo with the milky dragon, can’t I? It’s all dragons, the milky dragon is similar to the Canglong. Why don’t we skip the Canglong and focus on the milky dragon?" Bai Bufan argued righteously.
"Those who like the milky dragon really should line up and get swept by machine gun fire." Lin Li sneered.
"Don’t be like that, a lot of kids like the milky dragon." Bai Bufan defended the milky dragon.
Lin Li pondered for a while and then provided a solution:
"Just lower the muzzle."
Bai Bufan: "..."
No response came, Lin Li truly was a devil.
At eight o’clock, the barricade was opened on time, and a crowd of people rushed in.
The three finally decided to first go play a moderately thrilling castle drift, to warm up for the rapids adventure.
Experience complete.
The project wasn’t too thrilling; it was just drifting in a dark, haunted setting. Apart from occasionally getting surprised in the front seat, there was nothing else worth mentioning.
"Lin Li, did you hear that? The woman behind us kept saying she was afraid of the dark and ghosts when she was playing," Bai Bufan asked Lin Li on their way out after it was over.
"I heard, she kept screaming, so annoying, and the perfume smell was insanely strong." Lin Li nodded, full of disdain.
The smell was so pungent, the longer he smelled it, the more he missed the bus’s aroma.
"Then tell me, why when the dark and ghost combined, was she no longer scared?" Bai Bufan looked at Lin Li, indicating his gaze behind him.
Lin Li turned his head slightly, only to find that the woman behind them was holding hands with a black ghost.
Case solved, half of the perfume smell they just detected probably came from this black ghost.
Especially foreigners like black ghosts, to cover up armpit odor, they spray perfume like it’s free.
Lin Li turned back to look at Bai Bufan, his expression very serious at that moment: "Bufan, never mind about being afraid of the dark or ghosts, I’ve found a murderer, immediately call headquarters, I didn’t bring weapons, I can’t empty the magazine, I need backup, quick!"
"Report to the FBI tomorrow."
Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei were both stunned for a moment, then tacitly gave a thumbs-up.
Following their plan, the trio arrived at the Canglong roller coaster’s express entrance, lining up at the back of the line.
At that moment, the machine was already operating continuously, with screams echoing from far to near, and near to far, as if it was performing ASMR.
Bai Bufan gulped loudly.
"Didn’t the Great Qing fall? Why is the torture still here?! Haven’t they recruited yet?" Bai Bufan denounced the world’s sins.
Nobody paid him any attention.
After all, no one asked, how to recruit.
"I suddenly remembered, my dad is having my milk, I have to go see if it’s a boy or a girl, brothers, enjoy yourselves, I’m outta here." Bai Bufan suddenly recalled this matter and turned to leave.
Now someone minded him.
Four hands grabbed Bai Bufan’s collar in an instant, no matter how hard he tried, he could only march in place.
He fled, they pursued, he was trapped like a bird with clipped wings.
Bai Bufan turned his head, earnestly pleading with Lin Li: "Bro, I really can’t, I ate something that my stomach couldn’t take this morning, it feels uncomfortable now, you don’t want to see flying, do you?"
Lin Li: "..."
Zhang Wansen, going under.
To be honest, Bai Bufan dared to describe such a scene, but Lin Li didn’t dare to imagine it, and his body subconsciously was trying to stay away from the roller coaster track as much as possible.
Lin Li knew Bai Bufan was making excuses.
But Lin Li had to keep him there because, as good brothers, he must teach Bai Bufan what courage is, how to overcome fears, what it means that the rainbow comes after the storm, and when a brother is facing death, you damn sure shouldn’t be thinking about living alone.
"I really can’t do anything about you, take this, it should solve your issue."
Lin Li sighed, took out a glasses case, and handed it to Bai Bufan.
Bai Bufan took it, opened it, took out the glasses inside, put them on, took a look, felt dizzy, a bit confused: "What’s this for, to get used to dizziness in advance?"
"No, I want you to shove it up, this way, the flight won’t come out." Lin Li explained.
Bai Bufan: "..."
Bai Bufan sneered, and without the child, there’s no catching the wolf. He really made a motion to reach behind himself and said at the same time: "I’m really doing it now, don’t be unhappy."
But this time he was wrong, Lin Li was calm: "I’d be happy."
"Isn’t this expensive? You’re not going to keep it?" Bai Bufan was surprised.
"Not keeping it."
"Because damn it, that’s my glasses case!" Zhou Baowei looked back; the more he looked, the more familiar it seemed, finally confirming it was his own glasses, snatched them back abruptly.
Lin Li was really a rogue, Zhou Baowei despised such a person, and after the contempt, placed his half-drank beverage back near Lin Li’s backpack.
"Alright, my treat, I’ll go to the nursing room for you to get a diaper, this should solve your issue, can’t do anything about you." Lin Li sighed.
"You even deal with diapers?" Bai Bufan looked disgusted.
Lin Li was stunned and then laughed.
The two were in a heated battle, fiery and loud.
Due to the fast track, within a few minutes, it would be their turn.
"Ze Yu, how’s this ride, scary or not?" Bai Bufan saw a classmate coming down and immediately asked.
"Didn’t feel much, actually got quite bored." Qin Zeyu shook his head.
"Really?" Bai Bufan’s eyes lit up at the words.
Bored is great; he liked boring things the most.
"Yeah, I got bored and fell asleep shortly after getting on, and the staff woke me up later." After saying this, Qin Zeyu staggered past the three with trembling legs.
Bai Bufan’s smile froze on his face.
Can’t you stop calling passing out from fear falling asleep!
Then Bai Bufan showed concern, walked up to support Qin Zeyu, and waved back to Lin Li and Zhou Baowei, saying, "Zeyu’s not doing so well, I’ll escort him to the amusement park’s medical room, you guys go ahead and play."
Four hands grabbed Bai Bufan, while two hands pushed him away.
The three spoke in unison: "No need."
Bai Bufan’s smile turned bleak.
...
The roller coaster had four seats per row, with Lin Li on the left, Bai Bufan in the middle, Zhou Baowei on the right, and a student from another school on the far right.
At this moment, all three of their hair was being blown back, refusing to come down, and all looked ashen-faced.
The safety bar started to rise slowly after the staff’s operation.
Lin Li took a deep breath and stood up: "Oh crap——"
But in just two minutes, his voice turned a bit hoarse from yelling.
Bai Bufan, however, said nothing beside him; when Lin Li looked at him, the guy didn’t even have his eyes open.
Not everyone screams on these thrill rides; in fact, a large portion of people, like the Bai Bufan in front of him, just keep their eyes closed tightly and grip the equipment, unable to make a sound.
This is true fear.
"Get up, Bufan." Zhou Baowei urged Bai Bufan, whose lips were still trembling, though he himself wasn’t much better.
He underestimated the power of the Canglong roller coaster.
Before getting on, Zhou Baowei: "Mom, life is a vast wilderness, the world is so big, I want to see it."
After getting off, Zhou Baowei: "Wilderness, people are born of mothers. Ding Zhen was right, I want to find my mom."
Kinda like liking dragons too much but fearing them.
"Just now on the roller coaster, I think someone peed in my pants." Hearing Zhou Baowei’s urging, Bai Bufan calmly said.
Lin Li, Zhou Baowei: "..."
Lin Li took a step to the left, Zhou Baowei took a step to the right, both pinching their noses.
Crap.
Are you serious with your half-step retreat?
"What the hell, just kidding, but my legs are really weak, help me out, hurry!" Bai Bufan, wounded once more by his friends, shouted out.
Lin Li chuckled, then pulled Bai Bufan’s arm onto his shoulder.
How come boys are still smelly and hard after being scared stiff, Lin Li somewhat missed the fragrant and soft class leader.
Wait a minute.
Lin Li frowned.
[With a fearless and dashing stance, pass through the eight challenges of the Pingjiang Secret Realm (0/8)]
On the task interface, the bold 0 hadn’t turned into a fierce 1, stabbing Lin Li’s heart deeply.
Bu Hao!
Even after the three had left the Canglong roller coaster area, the number still hadn’t changed.
Lin Li laughed.
A painful laugh.
What else could it be, except that his earlier self was not fearless enough and not dashing enough.
System, damn it, some blessing from the Feng.
"Do we really have to go through such trials seven more times?" At this moment, Bai Bufan, drooping beside Zhou Baowei, spoke with a trembling voice.
"I think maybe, indeed, we shouldn’t play the other seven thrill rides for now." Zhou Baowei, at this point, also suggested sincerely.
He needed to take a breather too.
"Agreed," Bai Bufan looked at the seven speed-run rides on his phone, "If you let me play these back-to-back, I can’t handle it mentally or physically, but I’m totally onboard with playing something else."
"Okay, I already have something suitable for your needs, I’ll lead the way." Lin Li nodded at their words.
"Alright, we’ll trust you, Lin Li, you lead the way!" The three of them, in a rare moment, reached a consensus instantly; such was the power of the Canglong roller coaster.
So Lin Li led the way, and half a minute later, they started queuing.
Bai Bufan was a bit surprised: "How did we get here so quickly, what’s the ride?"
He felt they hadn’t walked for even a minute, what sort of leisure ride is this, why is it so close to the Canglong roller coaster?
Zhou Baowei squinted his eyes: "Bufan, check out the queue next to us, it looks really familiar, seems like the fast lane for the Canglong roller coaster."
"Seems like it."
"How come the destination looks the same too?"
Feeling a jolt in their hearts, Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei both looked up simultaneously.
An electronic sign:
「Canglong Roller Coaster (Normal Queue Entry) (Estimated queuing time ’15’ minutes)」
Four hands immediately grabbed Lin Li’s neck, and Lin Li could already see his great-grandmother waving at him.
"Lin Li, what the hell are you doing!" Bai Bufan was the most furious one.
"No, you said, as long as it’s not those seven rides, everything else is fine, right, didn’t I meet your requirements——" Lin Li, whose throat was being strangled by fate, struggled to speak.
"Are you seriously calling this meeting our requirements?" Bai Bufan roared.
"Just answer me, did it or didn’t it?"
"I’ll strangle you!"

chapters.title: Chapter 119 - 111 Haha! Azure Dragon, you are nothing special, watch me... today I slay the dragon!
chapters.content:
Chapter 119: Chapter 111 Haha! Azure Dragon, you are nothing special, watch me... today I slay the dragon!
Word is bond, Bai Bufan.
Luckily, Lin Li is practically an athlete now; after watching a fifteen-second ad, he revived.
"The first time is unfamiliar, the second time brings skill. Trust me, guys. With the last experience, this time, we can definitely handle it better." Lin Li encouraged his two buddies.
Mostly, Lin Li didn’t want to suffer alone.
"Isn’t it possible it’s unfamiliar the first time, deadly the second?" Bai Bufan gritted his teeth.
Zhou Baowei touched his nose on the side, but he didn’t back down. Mainly, he boasted initially about wanting to ride ten or eight times, but now admitting defeat didn’t look good, so he asked:
"Lin Li, are you addicted? But I heard you screaming just as much earlier?"
"Indeed, I found it quite interesting. But precisely because of the screaming, I’m not satisfied with my performance. What meaning is there in winning the warrior badge through the Pingjiang eight challenges without style? If I’m to get it, I want to get it with flair!"
Lin Li, who mentally cursed at the system countless times, had to make a bold explanation on the surface.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
Who the hell cares about meaning!
"Bao Wei, didn’t you plan on multiple rides? I’ll accompany you and fulfill your wish. Bufan, if you really can’t take it, want to wait for us nearby for a bit?" Lin Li asked.
"At least you have some conscience. I really need to rest. I still feel unsteady on the ground." Bai Bufan nodded.
One ride was the true limit.
Lin Li knew this, so he said so.
"Is it that serious? Let me take care of you a bit?" Hearing this, Zhou Baowei showed concern and approached to support Bai Bufan.
Two hands grabbed Zhou Baowei, and another set of hands pushed him away.
The two in front and behind spoke in unison: "No need."
Zhou Baowei wore a bitter smile.
But Bai Bufan’s smile seemed sincere.
At this moment, like that moment.
You’re having your day too.
"Just kidding, I didn’t really want to take care of you. Many want my attention, and besides, you’re really quite pretentious." Zhou Baowei, showing goodwill but getting rejected, scoffed scornfully.
Fifteen minutes later, the two were back on the Canglong roller coaster, starting the ride.
The sound of the whistling wind filled the ears.
But it wasn’t just wind noise:
"Hahaha! Ah! Damn, hahaha! Ah! Goddamn, hahaha—"
Zhou Baowei struggled in the headwind to turn his head, looking at Lin Li, who was alternately screaming, laughing, suffering, and enjoying: "?"
What’s going on?
...
"Riding twice isn’t too hard, really fun, love it." Zhou Baowei released his sweat-soaked hands and said, smiling.
Lin Li fell into a slight silence.
[With an unafraid and free spirit, pass the Pingjiang Secret Realm’s eight challenges (0/8)]
Even when howling, he wasn’t fearless or free enough?
"Since you love it, let’s ride a third time." Lin Li turned his head, sincerely inquiring.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
Buddy, are you insane?!
"Lin Li, bro, no, Lord Lin Li, I’m sorry, I won’t fake it anymore. I’m not the bravest man in class four, I’m really just another Bai Bufan, no, I’m even more Bai Bufan than Bai Bufan, please spare me."
When Zhou Baowei realized he had to choose between pride and life, he began to insult himself in the most extreme way.
Pingjiang Amusement Park is no joke; it wasn’t the excitement I imagined.
"But I really need at least one more ride. I feel I’m still not handling it with enough ease." This time it was Lin Li’s turn to feel a bit awkward.
Zhou Baowei bolted right away.
"All done? Where’s Lin Li?" Bai Bufan looked at Zhou Baowei, who seemed a bit weary, holding back laughter as he asked.
"Gone for a third round." Zhou Baowei sat down, pointing not far away, then closed his eyes.
Lin Li was queuing in the single rider line.
Some attractions have fast, single rider, and regular lines, where the so-called single rider line means queuing there, and linked groups in the line don’t sit together within the ride.
For example, on rides like the Canglong roller coaster, with four seats per row, if there’s a team of three in one row, leaving one extra seat, it’s unreasonable to let others come up one at a time, this is when single rider line participants join.
Even if the regular line is mostly groups of four or two, at each turn a group from the single rider line will get on.
Therefore, this queue moves faster than the regular line.
"He’s coming back again, is he really hooked?" Seeing this scene, Bai Bufan’s eyes widened.
"Mm."
"The change in Lin Li this term compared to last is really huge, he’s become so unfamiliar, how did he suddenly become the boldest man in class four?" Bai Bufan was shocked, then shook his head, somewhat emotional.
"You’re his desk mate, you’re the closest, did you know?" Zhou Baowei asked out of curiosity.
"Asked many times, Lin Li says he’s abstaining." Bai Bufan replied.
"Do you believe it?" Zhou Baowei frowned.
"..."
After a brief silence, Bai Bufan scratched his head, a little embarrassed: "I don’t know, I’ve never abstained, I don’t understand, what about you?"
"This... I don’t get it either."
Silence, after which the two exchanged a look, then both chuckled in sync.
Canglong roller coaster.
"Hi, I have a case of being juvenile." Being alone meant sitting next to strangers, so before starting, Lin Li introduced himself.
"Ah? Oh, you too, well... I have an ingrown toenail." The person next to him seemed puzzled by Lin Li’s words, and, out of politeness, mimicked the template of Lin Li’s response.
Lin Li nodded, stopped talking, letting the other breathe easy.
He really dreaded patient interaction.
Clang, the roller coaster restraints were released, and off we go.
Forward.
Lin Li took a deep breath.
"With hands holding the sun and moon, plucking stars! In this world, none are like me! Interesting, truly interesting! Blue Dragon, you’re no more than this! Watch me slay the dragon!"
The brother next to him with ingrown toenails was dumbfounded: "?"
Bro, are you seriously sick? I thought you were just saying that!
...
When the safety bar lifted, Lin Li ran without glancing back, afraid that everyone on this ride would remember his face.
However, while running, Lin Li’s face showed some relief, his embarrassment was worth it:
[With fearless and carefree demeanor, passed Pingjiang Secret Realm eight challenges (1/8)]
Finally being recognized as fearless and carefree.
Damn it, playing the ride normally without freaking out, and this stupid system just won’t acknowledge it, right?
System, I swear again.
When Lin Li walked over to Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei, he spoke before they could ask: "There won’t be a fourth time, I’ve had enough and conquered this ride thoroughly, I won’t play it ever again in this life."
"Phew—wise decision. Let’s move on to another ride then. But first, let’s be clear, no bungee jumping among these eight rides!" Bai Bufan sighed with relief, then emphasized.
"Agreed." Zhou Baowei nodded, the stance of attack and defense quickly changed.
"How about riding a thrilling, heart-pounding merry-go-round?" Lin Li squinted his eyes, also needing to ease down.
Bai Bufan: "Childish, a little girl’s ride, but I like it."
Zhou Baowei: "Boring, a child’s play, but I’ll participate."
Bai Bufan: "Lin Li, this is the most human-like you’ve ever been."
Zhou Baowei: "Finally can distinguish Lin Li from a dog."
Lin Li thought that bickering was actually quite relaxing.
...
It didn’t come to actually playing the merry-go-round, after finishing a less stimulating ride, the three were heading towards the big spinning wheel when they encountered Wang Ze and Zhang Haoyang, among a few others.
None of them seemed capable of walking in a straight line now, especially Wang Ze, who was covering his mouth, appearing to be on the verge of vomiting.
Upon seeing Lin Li, Wang Ze’s eyes lit up, staggering his way over: "Ugh—"
"This shirt costs eighteen hundred." Lin Li stated.
Wang Ze quickly re-covered his mouth, turning to Bai Bufan: "Bufan, could you bring your shirt over here, please. Thank you."
That’s wisdom for you.
Lin Li’s shirt actually cost thirty-two point nine, bought from a street stall.
"Get lost!" Bai Bufan refused mercilessly, then asked curiously yet fearfully: "What did you guys play to end up like this, was it this big spinning wheel? Damn, don’t scare me, I already get motion sickness, if you all turned out like this, what about me?"
"The bear tea cup." Wang Ze pointed to the spinning wheel... next to the spinning tea cup.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"You guys... resolved for victory and even life and death?" As this type of teacup spins around on the platform, one can control the teacup’s spinning speed themselves, thus Lin Li asked.
"Yes, it felt like my brain was shaken uniformly." Wang Ze nodded.
"Did you guys play the big spinning wheel?" Bai Bufan inquired.
"Who on earth would willingly play that, so ridiculous? Every round, people come down vomiting, didn’t you see, there’re puke buckets directly at the entrance and exit." Wang Ze retorted.
"So what are you planning to play next?" Bai Bufan asked squinting his eyes.
"First the bumper cars, then the indoor roller coaster, and maybe check out a show. There’re float parades at noon." Wang Ze counted on his fingers.
"You’re not going to play any of the eight most thrilling rides?" Bai Bufan’s eyes showed urgency.
"We might play a few, but that’ll be decided later, honestly, it feels like torture, doesn’t even compare to Dairy Dragon’s Adorable Dragon Flight." Zhang Haoyang shook his head disdainfully.
Found the squad.
Taking a deep breath, Bai Bufan wiped the nonexistent tears from the corner of his eyes, then happily threw his arm around them:
"Count me in!"
"Weren’t you with Lin Li and Bao Wei?" Wang Ze asked.
Only then did Bai Bufan ’surprisedly’ notice Zhou Baowei and Lin Li, patting his head: "Is this Zhou Tongxue and Lin Tongxue? Hello to you both, goodbye to you both, wishing you a wonderful day."
Lin Li, Zhou Baowei: "..."
"Lin Tongxue, good day to you, goodbye to you too, I also wish you a wonderful day." Zhou Baowei was quick to adapt, aligning with the other group.
"OKOK, you all play together then, I’ll play solo." After thinking for a while, Lin Li nodded.
"I was joking, I’ll still play with you guys, not abandoning or giving up! Even in death, I’ll die with you!" Bai Bufan immediately returned.
Lin Li felt a warmth in his heart, because he could tell, Bai Bufan assumed he was upset.
Nonetheless, he really didn’t have such thoughts, so he smiled and said: "I’m not being sarcastic, today I’m planning to square up with the eight big rides, possibly playing each one more than once. It’s not quite right to trouble you both to wait for me, splitting up’s indeed appropriate.
Also, a not so crucial reason is that I discovered the solo line goes super fast, you both feel a bit like baggage to me, just emphasizing, this is a secondary reason."
"If it’s secondary, why do you keep stressing it!"
Understanding that Lin Li was kidding, Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei felt assured since Lin Li said so.
"I wonder if Lin Li’s going to find the class monitor later, become a bootlicker like Chen Tianming? Actually, he’s been dissatisfied with you two for a while, might have regretted agreeing to play with you guys from the start." Wang Ze interjected.
Lin Li shook his head; athletes like Wang Ze who enjoy sowing discord are the worst.
Next week secretly swap out his laxative with super glue in his dorm room.
"Don’t wrongly accuse clear innocence." Lin Li denied.
"Then swear you’ll play alone the whole time." Wang Ze immediately followed up.
"...That won’t do."

chapters.title: Chapter 120 - 112: This time, we’re truly going to make a fortune
chapters.content:
Chapter 120: Chapter 112: This time, we’re truly going to make a fortune
So Lin Li experienced a wave of collective isolation.
Every person who passed by gave him a disdainful look, and spat on the ground for good measure.
Sigh, outstanding people always face exclusion, it’s just a trial one must go through.
After everyone left, Lin Li looked at the big spinning wheel next to the spinning teacups.
Taking a deep breath, Lin Li headed towards it.
"Spin! Jump! I close my eyes! The so-called wheel is just a toy underfoot!"
Besides the weightless feeling from centrifugal force, the main thing about this big wheel is the dizziness, but Lin Li found that his anti-dizziness ability seemed to have been greatly enhanced over the past half month. He could even leisurely sing a song on it.
If it weren’t for the safety bar holding him, Lin Li could even dance a piece of "Little Swan Dance" on it.
Passing it in one go was really easy.
Lin Li suspected that in terms of anti-dizziness, he had reached the level of a pilot or even an astronaut.
And the equally exciting high-altitude swiveling flying chairs were also easily conquered by Lin Li amidst his singing.
After losing confidence on the Canglong Roller Coaster, Lin Li regained it on these two rides.
The only minor flaw was that after each ride finished, he had to quickly leave the "crime scene."
Otherwise, no matter how thick-skinned, it’s easy to lose confidence under the strange looks of others.
Dear Nansang Middle School, be glad you didn’t make your students wear school uniforms during the autumn outing, otherwise you would have had a lot more trouble.
[With fearless grace, passing the Pingjiang Secret Realm’s eight challenges (3/8)]
...
The sports student did have a bit of skill and really predicted it.
When it was almost Lin Li’s turn for the rapid river adventure, he saw Chen Yu Ying and her two companions queueing in the regular lane.
Only three people, Yu Yu wasn’t there.
"Lin Li!" Over there, Chen Yu Ying also saw Lin Li and greeted him.
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu didn’t greet him, and didn’t even want to look at him.
But Lin Li could understand.
A father is just such a role. You might have many things you want to tell him, but when the father-daughter meeting finally happens, all the words get stuck.
Fatherly love, steady as a mountain!
Calculating that he was relatively at the front of this line, Lin Li let the people behind go first, and eventually successfully sat with them on the same raft.
Seeing from the queue position, it was usually Chen Yu Ying who sat in the middle, but upon seeing Lin Li, Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu automatically sat to one side.
Piety really is shown through actions.
"Why isn’t Yu Yu with you?" Lin Li asked while fastening his seatbelt.
"She can’t really handle these thrilling rides, so she’s playing with Shuyang and them," Chen Yu Ying explained.
Very understandable, normal humans would not want to ride the Canglong ten or eight times.
When I get married, Yu Yu will be at my table.
Lin Li didn’t wait for Chen Yu Ying to ask before he explained: "The reason I’m alone is similar to yours. They couldn’t keep up with my pace, so I kicked them all out."
"Why does it sound more like they kicked you out?" Qu Wanqiu poked her head out.
"You’re talking too much, Little Qiuqiu."
"You damn well change that nickname!"
"Oh, oh," Chen Yu Ying nodded, but still looked a bit puzzled, "So Lin Li, why aren’t you wearing a raincoat?"
Raincoats here don’t have additional charges, so it definitely wasn’t to save money.
"Because it’s not cool enough. Only by bathing in wind and rain, experiencing the torrents, can you grasp the true meaning of advancement." Lin Li said with a gentle smile, exuding a sage-like demeanor.
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
Ding Sihan poked her head out while fastening her raincoat and said, "A friendly reminder: the rapid river connects to a children’s pool, so, unless by accident, there’s a lot of pee in it."
Lin Li: "?"
Bu Hao!
"Raincoat! Raincoat! Miss! Give me a raincoat, please! Sorry, my voice was a bit loud when I rejected you earlier, forgive me! I’m sorry! I’m really sorry!"
Lin Li raised his hand and sincerely pleaded with the staff.
However, it was too late.
"There’s no children’s pool, don’t talk nonsense." Fortunately, Chen Yu Ying clarified.
Otherwise, Lin Li suspected he wouldn’t be able to stay calm when faced with a deluge of pee.
"Let the pee storm come even fiercer!" When the raft rushed down, Lin Li spread his arms to welcome the wind and rain.
"Don’t say such disgusting things!"
[With fearless grace, passing the Pingjiang Secret Realm’s eight challenges (4/8)]
The tasks were halfway through.
A lot of water splashed on him, but Lin Li felt okay; especially since it’s still hot in September, it was quite comfortable.
Since he was surrounded by familiar faces this time, Lin Li didn’t run away but left leisurely with the three of them.
"Lin Li, you were really middle-schooler just now." Ding Sihan laughed.
"That’s your dad for you." Lin Li nodded.
Ding Sihan: "..."
"The bet yesterday was to call you once, not for you to act as my dad all day!" Ding Sihan complained.
"Do you need a photo? With a frame, it’s only thirty yuan." On the way out, the shop assistant from a nearby shop was promoting.
The journey of the rapid river ride was an excellent place to set up photo points, and this little shop was the official place selling those souvenir photos capturing tourists in action.
Girls always can’t resist stopping when they hear about photos, so all three gathered around, but soon lost interest and dispersed.
Because they hadn’t known photos would be taken, so they hadn’t managed their expressions throughout.
This resulted in most of the photos being indescribably bad, unsuitable for their tastes.
Good-looking people still look good in photos, but the better you look, the higher your standard for photos.
So even Chen Yu Ying wasn’t satisfied.
"Wait for me, I’m going to buy two photos." But Lin Li was different; his eyes lit up.
He then spent ten yuan to buy two without frames.
"Why did you buy these? They seem to make you look ugly too, wouldn’t it be better to ride again with poses and buy those?" Chen Yu Ying asked, curious after Lin Li finished buying.
"Because they could make money; riding again wouldn’t have the same effect." Lin Li shook his head.
"Make money? How will this make money?" Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu leaned in upon hearing.
If it could earn money, they’d be interested.
"See the photos, then you’ll understand." Lin Li handed the photos to the three.
The three of them bent down to scrutinize.
Soon, Lin Li’s two unofficial daughters looked up with serious expressions, smiling with voices squeezing through their teeth:
"Mr. Lin Li, care to explain why you bought two of our ugly photos?"
"Each of you transfer me five hundred, or I’ll post these in the class group chat. Right now, immediately." Lin Li held out both hands.
Ding Sihan, Qu Wanqiu: "?"
You damn well are making money this way!

chapters.title: Chapter 121 - 113: Growth Always Takes Away Things We Want to Keep
chapters.content:
Chapter 121: Chapter 113: Growth Always Takes Away Things We Want to Keep
Lin Li really has a knack for making money.
He could have actually made money from it; Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu would have a hard time accepting these two photos being circulated around the class.
The only problem was that Lin Li made a fatal mistake.
— When using photos to extort someone, he shouldn’t have handed the photos to the victim first, at least he should’ve kept a backup.
Great, now.
The ten bucks are gone, the two photos were snatched away, he almost got kicked in the butt twice, and he was exiled by Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu.
Don’t even think about being their father; now they don’t even see him as a man.
In the eyes of his brothers, he was already a beast, and in the eyes of the girls, he’s still a beast, then wouldn’t he really become a beast?
Such a failure.
Luckily, Chen Yu Ying treated him to an ice cream, soothing his wounded soul.
The class president is nice, Qu Wanqiu is bad, and Ding Sihan is even worse, like a festering wound.
"It’s already ten-thirty, let’s queue for one more ride and then go eat, if we go early there won’t be a crowd." Chen Yu Ying was nibbling her ice cream cone in small bites, looking at the time on her phone, then raised her head and said.
"Class president, what are you going to play next? Let me see if it’s on my way." Lin Li ate much more aggressively, and was almost finished in just a few bites, and asked upon hearing this.
"What do you want to play?" Chen Yu Ying countered.
"I want to get the Warrior badge, there are four more I haven’t tried yet, and the closest one from here is the Skydive, I’m planning to try this one." Lin Li glanced at the electronic map on his phone and showed it to Chen Yu Ying.
Chen Yu Ying looked at Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu, the three exchanged a glance and nodded.
"We haven’t tried this one either, let’s go for it."
...
As they approached the Skydive, Lin Li silently sighed in his heart.
This thing looks pretty terrifying up close, seems to be at least over thirty meters high.
In the amusement park, it definitely stands out.
Riding this is pretty much like jumping off a building, no, there is still a difference; jumping off a building kills you instantly, but with this, you linger between life and death.
Lin Li circled the drop tower a bit and then breathed a sigh of relief.
There were no Red Bull logos in sight, which means this facility is still human-friendly, there’s hope.
If he saw a Red Bull logo, he’d just run, forget any missions.
Red Bull, your death form, beyond imagination!
"Lin Li, are you scared?" Ding Sihan noticed Lin Li’s expression and teased him.
"Yes."
Just as Ding Sihan was about to continue teasing.
"But some things outweigh others."
Plainly narrated, Lin Li gave Ding Sihan a deep smile and then walked towards the queue.
Ding Sihan: "?"
Why do you act like you are sacrificing yourself for something very meaningful!?
What value are you upholding exactly?
You’re being proud now, right? What are you even proud of?
At this moment, Ding Sihan wanted to stick the ice cream cone she was holding onto Lin Li’s head.
"But it is indeed quite scary, didn’t expect it to be so high, and the descent speed is so fast, I am a bit scared too."
Unlike the two crazies, Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu, clearly, Chen Yu Ying, such a fragrant and soft girl, is still quite normal.
Having a proper concept of fear—anything bolder than Lin Li is abnormal.
"Ying Bao, don’t be afraid, passion!" Ding Sihan consoled.
"Yu Ying, don’t be afraid, it’s actually going to be fun." Qu Wanqiu reassured.
"Class president, don’t be afraid, the brave enjoy paradise first." Lin Li comforted.
"Thank you... Wait? Is it enjoy paradise?" Chen Yu Ying was taken aback.
"It’s enjoy the world! Lin Li, stop talking nonsense!" Ding Sihan glared with hands on her hips at Lin Li for scaring Chen Yu Ying.
"OK, the brave first enjoy the afterworld." As the queue got closer, standing under the drop tower, Lin Li found he could even feel the wind stirred up by the fall, and gave a thumbs up.
...
The queue reached its end.
The four of them then sat in their respective execution seats.
Start.
The scariest part of the drop tower isn’t actually the moment when the machine falls; that’s too quick, no time to be scared, it’s over. It’s the slow lift of the machine.
When Lin Li saw the other tourists below him grow smaller and smaller, he realized this saying was spot on.
Better to shift focus a bit.
For example, Chen Yu Ying beside him, looking even a bit shy from fear.
With lightly glossed lips tightly pressed, her little face slightly red.
Isn’t this much better than the view from the ground?
"Class president, if you’re scared, you can hold my hand, I’ll give you strength!" Lin Li said to Chen Yu Ying, who was gripping the safety bar for dear life on his left.
"No, no, it’s alright, still bearable." Chen Yu Ying was already a bit afraid to look at the ground, responding with closed eyes, her pretty eyelashes slightly trembling.
"Bearable huh." Lin Li smacked his lips, somewhat disappointed.
"Then if I’m scared, can I hold your hand?" Lin Li pondered and realized there’s always a way.
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
"Your voice doesn’t sound scared at all, no way!"
"Then I, I’m scared now... can I, can I hold your hand?" Lin Li repeated, this time in a shaky, stammering version.
Chen Yu Ying trusted even less, giving a slight hum.
Even with eyes closed, she turned her head away, clearly not wanting to look at Lin Li.
"Lin Li, if you’re scared, you can hold my hand!" The crazy Ding Sihan was even more excited as the drop tower climbed, extending her hand to Lin Li at this moment.

chapters.title: Chapter 122 - 113: Growth Always Takes Away Things We Want to Keep_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 122: Chapter 113: Growth Always Takes Away Things We Want to Keep_2
"Oh, divine doctor Ding Sihan, thank you. I’m not afraid anymore," Lin Li’s voice returned to normal instantly, "If I survive this field trip, I’ll definitely give you a banner!"
Ding Sihan: "..."
That stinky dog, Lin Li.
"Click!"
With the sound of a machine vibrating, it stopped ascending, having reached the highest point.
The wind up high was really cold. Lin Li thought of calling Xue Jian to tell him this, and then hang up immediately.
He looked down at the ground again, then quickly looked up, chastising himself for his curiosity.
One more look, and he’d explode.
Taking a deep breath, Lin Li opened his mouth and said, "Class president, do you have any cool and dashing lines to recommend for later? Something like seizing the moon and stars, unparalleled in the world?"
He still didn’t know how he’d embarrass himself this time.
"What you’re referring to might be adapted from a poem by Lu Jiuyuan, right? The original one is: ’Head high, climb the southern dipper, turn and lean on the northern star. Looking beyond the heavens, none like me exists,’" Chen Yu Ying responded slowly upon hearing this.
"You’re so cultured, class president. I’ll say that this time!" Lin Li acknowledged.
"Three."
The countdown had started on the loudspeaker at the top, which made Chen Yu Ying, who was about to speak, shut her mouth and shrink, ready to face the judgment.
"Two."
Lin Li took a deep breath; he still had something important to do.
"Ding Sihan!" Lin Li shouted for his divine doctor.
"What’s up?"
"One."
"I just saw two screws fall from under your foot, and besides, your seatbelt seems to be buckled wrong."
Ding Sihan: "?"
"Wha—"
"Whoosh—"
The machine plummeted at light speed.
The four had different reactions.
Lin Li: "Head high, climb the southern dipper, turn and lean on the northern star!"
Chen Yu Ying: ~(>_<~)
Qu Wanqiu: "Oh ho! Hahahahaha!!"
Ding Sihan: "Ahhh the screws ahhhh my screws!!!"
The whole drop took just about a second, but Lin Li felt his ears ringing.
Not just ringing, it was severe enough to hallucinate too.
"Lin Li, you dog! Damn you, ’beep—’! It wasn’t wrong at all! You were scaring me!"
Otherwise, why would he hear things about his mom while in an amusement park?
...
There was a shoe print on his butt, but Lin Li was magnanimous and didn’t hold the culprit accountable.
It was worth it!
As planned, after finishing this ride, the four headed to one of the restaurants inside the amusement park.
The price was a bit high, but still within an acceptable range.
After ordering and getting a number, they found a spot to sit.
Everyone was looking at their phones individually.
Lin Li wasn’t planning on studying right now. That would be too impressive, so he checked WeChat.
The neighborhood group Zhang Fang had added him to had an all-group message, and out of curiosity, Lin Li clicked on it.
Why was it silenced for everyone?
Lin Li found the @ message.
"4-501 Zhang Zhengzhi: @everyone. Friends, September 13th, 10:50:32. Seven pounds, six ounces."
"2-202AAA Egg Wholesale King (Looking for Fishing Friends): Bro, that’s amazing, where did you catch this?"
"Zhang Zhengzhi: Haha, no, it’s my son ’covering mouth and laughing’."
"Egg King: Wow, young man, that’s awesome. Could you help me ask where your son caught it?"
"Zhang Zhengzhi: My wife just had a son ’sweating bean’."
"Egg King: Congrats, double the joy! ’thumbs up’ ’thumbs up’ ’rose’ ’rose’."
"Egg King: So could you tell me where the fish was caught? It’s okay if it’s inconvenient ’smile’."
"Zhang Zhengzhi: I f*ck you."
Then an argument started, so the group chat was silenced. Grandma Zhang probably went to mediate again.
You fishing folks are really (pointing fingers).
He shared the chat record with Chen Yu Ying, and she laughed too.
"Look at this... wow, such a touching secret crush... I don’t even dare to finish reading..." At this moment, Ding Sihan, sitting opposite, rubbed her eyes and handed over her phone, wanting to share too.
