Even turning into a dual-sculpted Yang Guo wouldn’t get Chen Yu Ying to help wipe sweat for him, Lin Li had no choice but to get up and wave: "Coming."
"Give me a hand." Bai Bufan extended his hand from behind.
Lin Li returned and kicked him again.
...
[Task 2 Completed]
[You have been rewarded: Physical Improvement: Spiritual Qi absorption speed increased by 100%; Ling Beast affability increased by 50%; system currency *50.]
The task was completed more easily than Lin Li had expected.
He had thought the system would be pedantic and require him to reach the absolute summit of Cloud Peak Mountain, but as they continued upward, the task showed as completed.
However, upon seeing the nearby cables, Lin Li roughly understood that the task probably just required him to surpass the height that the cable car could reach.
The physical improvements didn’t bring about too much tangible sensation. Would small animals like him more now?
There weren’t any animals around, so Lin Li wasn’t in a hurry to verify.
"The teacher said they still have about twenty minutes before finishing the tour, so we should go to the base to wait for everyone. He’s already informed the base owner, and they’ll let us in," Chen Yu Ying called back.
It was only just eleven o’clock now. They had climbed for less than three hours, and this was considering the four of them weren’t focusing solely on climbing, so the main group hadn’t finished their original plan yet.
"Alright, let’s head over." Without the task, Lin Li was full of leisure.
So, under Chen Yu Ying’s guidance, the four of them successfully entered the outdoor base.
The base actually had many projects, not just barbecues. There were kites, inflatable balls, frisbees... There was even real-person CS, but the only activity included in the autumn trip fee was the barbecue; the other activities required extra payment to participate.
With less than twenty minutes to spare, the four of them just looked over the project introductions without any interest in purchasing the services.
Upon reaching the artificial turf, still green and soft in September, they selected a spot under a tree with shade and sat down.

chapters.title: Chapter 152 - 134: Crispy, Sweet, and Flirty - Part 2
chapters.content:
Chapter 152: Chapter 134: Crispy, Sweet, and Flirty - Part 2
Lin Li and Bai Bufan were not particular, sitting right on the ground, while Lin Li lay down directly, using his hands as a pillow behind his head. Meanwhile, Chen Yu Ying took out a picnic mat from her bag, spread it open, and sat down.
Ding Sihan sat in a standard posture, her legs bent in front of her, resting her chin on her knees, browsing her phone swiftly.
Chen Yu Ying, perhaps because she was wearing a skirt, had her legs stretched out flat like in yoga practice, straight and long, accentuating her good body proportions.
"There are still small bugs in the grass. You guys should come sit on this," Chen Yu Ying said, moving a bit to the left and patting the empty spot on her right, particularly addressing Lin Li, who was lying on the grass.
"Well, in that case, I won’t be polite," Bai Bufan was about to decline, but Lin Li had already shamelessly moved his head over.
Now, the best pillows in the world, or perhaps just one, were right beside Lin Li, less than ten centimeters away, covered by a blue skirt. Lin Li could even smell the faint fragrance emanating from the pillow, reminding him of spring.
Unfortunately, he could only rest his head on the ground.
Painful, so painful.
Directly above Lin Li’s line of sight was the tree shade in September, showing traces of yellow amidst the green, and a bit of sunlight through the gaps forming a visible beam due to the weak Tyndall effect.
To the right, Yu Guang could catch Bai Bufan’s dogshit figure that had followed over, but thankfully to the left, there was the sight of Chen Yu Ying sitting upright without any back support. This maintained a lovely visual balance worthy of remembering.
Speaking of which, could the dogshit move aside?
The dogshit not only didn’t move aside, but Bai Bufan’s upper body leaned closer to Lin Li, meeting his gaze.
Great, the only view of Chen Yu Ying left to Yu Guang is ruined. Lin Li frustratedly closed his eyes, then said leisurely:
"Bai Bufan, I was supposed to spend these twenty minutes studying. It’s all your fault, now I have nothing to do."
"Are you sick?"
"Are you sick?"
Ding Sihan and Bai Bufan both cursed Lin Li at once.
It seemed he had stirred up public anger, making Lin Li smirk without daring to say anything, feeling sullen, but it was alright, he could secretly review in his mind.
Random checks, tore it up with his brother, what does that mean?
Tadpole, heritage, inheritance.
Very good.
If I work this hard, there’s no reason not to be in the top hundred of the grade.
"Lin Li, come on, twenty minutes is just enough for us to farm some land." Feeling a few taps on his waist, Bai Bufan’s voice quickly followed.
Zhou Baowei’s painful experience was still fresh in memory, so Lin Li refused to have any death wish, not even bothering to open his eyes, and said, "Actually, I’m a herding dog, a spiritual American. As Americans, we absolutely wouldn’t play such unfair games like Honor of Kings."
"You’d get killed with ten attack power? No farming alliance, no progress today, no alliance, no end to the years, raise the farming small, farm the big, don’t discriminate against games anymore." Bai Bufan earnestly preached.
"No, what I mean is, starting with two fewer towers, how can we play?"
Bai Bufan: "..."
Deadpan, can’t laugh, or else the merits from helping an old lady across the street with Lin Li last night wouldn’t even warm up before they’re used up.
"Then let’s play CF, you’re better at shooting games, right?"
Looks like there was no way to refuse.
...
to 60, a bittersweet loss after a close chase, yet exhilarating, feeling defeated yet honored.
The raucous noise from the entrance of the base could be heard from afar, and Wang Ze’s barking was recognizable from a distance, indicating that Xue Jian and the others had arrived.
"Class president, should we pack up the picnic mat, or can I just leave my stuff here?" Lin Li asked Chen Yu Ying, who was sitting beside him as he got up.
"Sure, you guys can leave it here," Chen Yu Ying nodded.
The four of them returned to their class queue, waiting for Xue Jian to negotiate with the base manager.
The manager must have been prepared in advance, as the six barbecue racks were quickly moved out one by one by staff, placed on the concrete next to the grass, and someone had already started putting small pieces of charcoal into them.
Great, it’s charcoal grilling, Lin Li thought charcoal grilling tastes far better than electric grilling or other methods.
"These six racks belong to our class. Everyone should distribute themselves accordingly, don’t let a few people hog one, nor a bunch of people squeeze on one," Xue Jian explained beside them.
Although there were only six barbecue racks, each one was quite large, easily accommodating seven or eight people’s barbecue needs.
"The box next to the barbecue racks contains ingredients and seasonings, and those are limited," Xue Jian pointed to the unsealed cardboard box next to each barbecue rack.
"Bao Wei, we’re breaking up," Lin Li and Bai Bufan turned away.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
"But don’t worry about not having enough to eat. If you walk inside, you’ll find the service freezer of the base, where all the vegetarian items and some meat are unlimited self-service. They also provide free plain water and soups. Just go inside to get them if needed."
"Bao Wei, we’ll make up in half an hour," Lin Li and Bai Bufan turned away again.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
"But remember, no wastage is allowed. There will be someone checking here, and if the self-service items exceed a certain weight in waste, the excess will be charged at a high price. I won’t bother to monitor who’s responsible. If it happens, the cost will be evenly split, so you should all be cautious," Xue Jian reiterated.
"Bao Wei, let’s make up right now, we can’t do without you," Lin Li and Bai Bufan turned away again.

chapters.title: Chapter 153 - 134: Crispy, Sweet, and Flirty - Part 3
chapters.content:
Chapter 153: Chapter 134: Crispy, Sweet, and Flirty - Part 3
"...Are you guys treating me like a garbage can? Throwing stuff at me instead of wasting it, right?"
If you don’t explode in silence, you’ll perish in it; third time’s the charm, Zhou Baowei strikes fiercely.
"Classmates with great cooking skills, now’s the time not to hide them. Show us your barbecue skills," Xue Jian said to everyone with a smile after the introduction.
"Teacher, I think the best barbecue skills in the world belong to you," Lin Li loudly flattered, "you never burn anything."
Xue Jian was about to tell Lin Li not to flatter him, but seeing everyone laughing, he realized he misunderstood; that kid wasn’t flattering him at all!
"What hasn’t the teacher taught you? Every knowledge point has been broken down and fed to you, yet you don’t know how to adapt. The same figure, change a letter, and you don’t recognize it, just like the semester’s opening exam..."
As Xue Jian began his endless rant, people stopped laughing and gazed at Lin Li with both resentment and hate, making Lin Li feel like he was on pins and needles.
Oh no, he’s the sinner now.
Will he be the first to end up on the grill later?
Lin Li coughed frantically, almost going into an asthma attack, finally restoring Xue Jian’s sense.
Xue Jian cleared his throat and waved his hand, "The charcoal isn’t hot yet, so everyone should separate the ingredients. They might not all be defrosted. You can check and sort them first."
Lin Li, with Zhou Baowei and Bai Bufan, quickly occupied a grill, opened a box, and said, "Attention candidates, this test site contains a lot of scallions and cilantro."
Though you can’t easily add cilantro to skewers, it’s perfect for foil grilling.
Zhang Haoyang stopped, adjusted his glasses, scoffed at Lin Li, and chose another grill.
Lin Li sneered and shook his head; one day, everyone in the world will control cilantro, and by then, those who don’t eat cilantro will be banished to Siberia to grow it.
Taking out the ingredients from the box one by one, some still had unfrozen ice chunks. With the plastic bags, they simply set them on the ground to defrost.
"Holy cow, this vinegar’s gone sour, expired, right?" Lin Li shouted upon opening a tiny vinegar bottle and sniffing it.
Bai Bufan cooperatively held up an imaginary item and shouted, "Whoa, this durian smells rotten, gone bad, right?"
"Neither expired nor spoiled, actually I just let out a sour, rancid fart," Zhou Baowei raised his hand and said.
Sometimes, when playing tricks, the cost varies.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan were fine, but Zhou Baowei was already figuratively beaten to death and left by the roadside.
The ingredients and spices were sorted, but the charcoal wasn’t completely hot, leaving the group rather idle as they waited.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan exchanged a look and nodded.
Something can happen.
The two sneaked away, not realizing the vigilant group followed them.
Lin Li pulled out a bag from his pack to share with Bai Bufan.
"Where did those persimmons come from! Let me see!" The trailing group was furious when they saw Lin Li and Bai Bufan intending to sneakily eat persimmons, and they tried to snatch them.
"Bought on the hike, this bag costs 20 bucks, no way!"
Lin Li held the bag high, and seeing the group attempting to snatch it, he tossed it to Bai Bufan.
"Don’t you dare snatch! Leave us some! There are only a few left!" But Bai Bufan was too weak, and the bag got intercepted by Wang Ze, leaving Bai Bufan crying in anguish.
"Thank you for the persimmons, they’re ours now."
Ultra-athletic Wang Ze laughed triumphantly, ready to enjoy his prize.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan finally let themselves chuckle.
...
Also waiting for the charcoal to fully heat up, Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan were sharing the photos they took along the way with their roommates.
Noises came from behind them.
The two turned their heads, only to see Lin Li and Bai Bufan having done something and seemingly angered everyone, now sprinting across the lawn.
And behind them was a throng of angry boys led by Wang Ze, they saw Wang Ze shouting:
"Lin Li! Bai Bufan! Stop right there! Have the guts not to run!"
If Lin Li and Bai Bufan had proactively shared, they would have been on guard, but seeing them treasure it, why would Wang Ze and the others suspect a trick was involved?
"Feign submission only to seize later! Using tactics on us! You guys are beasts!" The angrier Wang Ze got, the more he thought.
Oh, seeing the persimmon juice not yet wiped off the corners of people’s mouths and their painful faces, Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan understood.

chapters.title: Chapter 154 - 135 Bai Family’s Generational Loyalty
chapters.content:
Chapter 154: Chapter 135 Bai Family’s Generational Loyalty
If I get caught this time, there’ll really be a memorial service.
But Lin Li’s condition improves every day compared to yesterday, so he’s quite relaxed and even has time to make a face.
Wang Ze wants to chase him this time, but the difficulty is even higher than last time.
And Bai Bufan, whose condition is only a bit better than Lin Li’s before, is about to run out of steam and fall behind.
So Lin Li reached out his hand to Bai Bufan.
"Thanks." Bai Bufan grabbed Lin Li’s hand, gaining a point of leverage to speed up a little.
Bai Bufan’s expression was struggling, but before he could think it through, he found himself hugged by Lin Li.
"Restrain yourself, don’t—" Bai Bufan’s shy words weren’t finished before he felt the world spinning, losing his sense of balance—he was pushed onto the grass by a huge force.
Sitting on the ground, Bai Bufan stared blankly at Lin Li who was laughing wildly as he ran far away, turning to see Wang Ze and others, who now looked like zombies, pouncing towards him.
"Damn."
His last words...
He shouldn’t have hesitated when he wanted to trap Lin Li just now.
No hesitation.
...
Bai Bufan’s sacrifice was worthwhile, looking at the silhouettes pressing down on Bai Bufan, Lin Li kept a safe distance and nodded with satisfaction.
Running all the time is pointless, better them than me.
Lin Li ran over to Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying, gasping and asking, "Do you have any water, can I have some?"
"No water that hasn’t been drunk, there’s a big tomato, if you don’t mind, just eat it." Chen Yu Ying was still searching, but Ding Sihan already handed over the fruit.
Lin Li took it without hesitation and bit into it.
Then he fell silent.
This familiar inedible taste.
Looking down.
Damn it, this isn’t a tomato, it’s a wild persimmon.
Lin Li had picked it for Qu Wanqiu, and it looked like the worst one.
"Don’t take things from strangers casually, got it? It’s the last lesson your mom taught you!" Ding Sihan laughed, not at all ladylike, rubbing her belly as she pointed at Lin Li and mocked.
Seeing this, Chen Yu Ying also changed her approach and handed tissues from her shoulder bag to Lin Li.
Lin Li very much wanted to teach Ding Sihan a lesson, but he didn’t have much time—the group wasn’t far and was chasing again.
Actually, most of the people had run out of breath, but the problem was that the sacrificed Bai Bufan was now assimilated and running faster than a physical test, appearing like he’s the one who hates him most.
Taking the tissue and wiping his mouth, Lin Li continued his escape.
...
The net of heaven and earth is large but not loose, Lin Li couldn’t escape death.
After watching the ads for resurrection, the charcoal was already hot, water droplets would sizzle intensely inside, they could start the barbecue.
"Who’s going to barbecue?" Lin Li looked at Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei.
The three of them basically had no experience in this area, nor anyone passionate about barbecuing.
So there was silence.
"Bao Wei, you do the barbecue, consider it an exercise for losing weight."
Lin Li and Bai Bufan mentally agreed to make Zhou Baowei do the tough work.
"Whose lose weight through barbecuing? I have my own weight loss plan, barbecuing is a part I must evaluate, so you guys do it." Zhou Baowei clasped his hands behind his back and shook his head.
"What weight loss plan requires evaluating barbecue?" Bai Bufan frowned.
"Military style body management, can only eat military hot pot, veteran barbecue, handgun drumstick, colonel nugget, battleship sushi." Zhou Baowei said loudly.
"Picking up chopsticks makes a soldier; is the aim to develop a general’s belly?" Lin Li agreed, whether process or result, it all seemed quite military.
"Exactly, Lin Li, I, Grand General Zhou, appoint you as the tea serving soldier, now go to the self-service area and serve tea to your general." Zhou Baowei nodded heavily.
"What kind of general are you, are you pretending to be the sun?" Bai Bufan scoffed.
"I see you want to eat seaweed soup without ingredients, flowers, nor more soup, Bai Bufan, I now order you to split troops and attack the enemy food store by yourself." Zhou Baowei ordered arrogantly.
Then General Zhou got beaten.
Finally, the three decided to settle this by rock-paper-scissors to determine who would barbecue.
"Rock-paper-scissors!"
Zhou Baowei put out paper, Bai Bufan and Lin Li both put out rock.
"Congratulations winner, you’ve won the privilege of barbecuing!" Before Zhou Baowei could laugh, Lin Li and Bai Bufan spoke in unison.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
"Who wins, who barbecues?" he questioned.
"Otherwise?"
"Scram! Let’s get the rules straight this time." Zhou Baowei couldn’t accept it.
"Then still, whoever wins barbeques."
"Fine."
Agreed, the second round started.
"Rock-paper-scissors."
Second round, Zhou Baowei put out paper, Bai Bufan did a vertical gesture of six, Lin Li raised his foot.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
Damn it.
These two are even worse this time.
"What the hell are you two doing this time? Huh?" Zhou Baowei questioned.
"Haven’t you watched ’Ultraman R/B’? This is the joy gesture, I’m a peace-loving person who dislikes disputes, I hope rock-paper-scissors can coexist peacefully, so among us, it’s a draw, I can’t win, so one of you definitely has to barbecue." Bai Bufan said kindly with hands together, looking like he’s been petted like a pure kid by Nangong Wen Ya.
"You avoid the sandstorm?" Zhou Baowei waved his hand, full of resentment, then looked at Lin Li, who raised his foot, sneering and questioning, "What’s this foot of yours, joy foot?"
"I lost, to both of you, you two work it out, call me when the barbecue is ready." Lin Li dealt with it calmly.
"You lost and where’s your currency for passwords?" Zhou Baowei’s eyes widened.
Lin Li sighed, looking at the ignorant Zhou Baowei: "Bao Wei, if hands and feet fought, who would win?"
"How do we even compare? Who says that feet have to lose? The power of a flying kick is way stronger than a flying punch, so I probably lost!" Zhou Baowei analyzed for a while.
"No, when hands and feet fight, you’ll definitely want hands to win and end up hitting feet," Lin Li calmly said.
Zhou Baowei: "?"
Damn.
Had no choice but to support hands winning.
No denying it, the feet really lost.
...
But since no one could convince the others, the three of them decided to take turns grilling.
"Come and see, come and see, authentic Xinjiang lamb skewers~~" Lin Li was the first, smearing oil on the meat skewers and rolling them on the grill, loudly shouting with an accent.
Grilling skewers is quite fun—at least at first, it is.
"Lin Li!"
"Eh! What’s up? Ding Sihan, do you want to be my first customer?" Hearing Ding Sihan’s voice, Lin Li turned his head to look at her as she approached and asked.
He saw Ding Sihan holding a skewer, handing it to Lin Li: "This is Ying Bao’s skewer, she’s too shy to give it to you herself, so she asked me to bring it for you to taste."
Lin Li snickered.
Recently got fooled by Nakano Kaki’s trick due to being thirsty and not expecting Ding Sihan to have evolved so quickly. Such an obvious trap this time, how could he fall for it?
"Monitor, did you grill this?" Lin Li directly shouted over to Chen Yu Ying to confirm.
As expected, Chen Yu Ying shook her head.
"Damn it." Caught in Lin Li’s provocative gaze, Ding Sihan stomped her foot angrily.
"Here to find someone to test for poison, huh?" Lin Li snickered.
"Without someone testing it, I’m too scared to eat it myself, I don’t even know if it’s cooked, blah blah blah." Ding Sihan stuck her tongue out at Lin Li.
"For poison testing, you should ask Bai Bufan, he’s professional." Lin Li continued his actions, nodding towards Bai Bufan, who was cutting aluminum foil on the side.
"Huh?" Ding Sihan didn’t understand.
"Bufan once said that his family is a eunuch family, with ancestors frequently serving as eunuchs, always aligning themselves with Wei Zhongxian, so poison testing should be their inherent family skill; if he’s not professional, who is?" Lin Li shrugged and explained.
"Really... a eunuch family?" Ding Sihan exclaimed, amazed.
Can a eunuch have a family? In the dramas she watched, didn’t all those major eunuchs only have adopted sons?
So impressive.
"Really, I saved the chat records. Ah Ding, if I’m lying to you, I’ll lose my Xiaodingding." Lin Li nodded.
Ding Sihan: "..."
But now she had to believe it.
Seeing Ding Sihan’s sneaky glances towards him, Bai Bufan gritted his teeth and said with some embarrassment and anger:
"Lin Li, how long are you going to keep reminding me of a slip of the tongue? I meant to say my family is an official family! The Bai family tree often had people become officials! Accidentally typed it as ’eunuch’ instead!
And it’s generational loyalty, not mother**king generations of Wei Zhongxian!"
Who knew there was such a big difference between an official family and a eunuch family?
The most disgusting thing is, Lin Li clearly realized my slip of the tongue instantly but chose to save and forward the chat record before notifying me about it, he’s not human at all.
It was then that Ding Sihan finally understood the situation and could barely hold back her laughter.
"Try it, Lin Li." After laughing, she still felt more familiar with Lin Li and pleaded.
"I don’t want to die." Lin Li refused, keeping his mouth tightly shut.
"Just a bite, just a bite." Ding Sihan tugged at Lin Li’s sleeve, acting cute.
The gap between Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying is as ridiculously big as the gap between Bai Bufan and others.
"Stop acting cute, I’ll eat it right away." Sighing, Lin Li took the skewer with a resolve to face death.
Just as he was about to put it in his mouth, he saw Zhou Baowei coming back from the bathroom, so Lin Li handed the skewer over: "Here, it’s cooked, give it a try."
"Thanks." Zhou Baowei nodded, took a bite, and frowned, "Seems like it’s not cooked."
"You heard him, it’s not cooked, go back and increase the grilling time," Lin Li said to Ding Sihan.
"Thank you!" Ding Sihan nodded and ran back.
Lin Li resumed grilling.
Having come to his senses, Zhou Baowei glared darkly at Lin Li.
"It’s one thing to have me test for poison, but why did she thank you, Lin Li...?"
Lin Li laughed, and Zhou Baowei sensed something was wrong, but before he could stop him, he heard Lin Li shout: "Ding Sihan, come over for a moment!"
"What?" Ding Sihan jogged over again.
"Say thanks to Baowei, he tried the skewer for you, but you thanked me, he’s not happy," Lin Li said earnestly.
"Oh, okay, thank you, Zhou Baowei!" Ding Sihan thanked Zhou Baowei.
Zhou Baowei felt no joy, only a lifeless awkwardness: "I was joking..."
"Oh, it’s no big deal." Ding Sihan nodded and ran back again.
After Ding Sihan went back, Zhou Baowei’s lifelessness transformed into tangible murderous intent.
Lin Li’s health bar started flashing.
"Our skewers are cooked, really cooked, let’s eat first." Lin Li turned and said, trying to salvage his own life.
Zhou Baowei nodded.
Let’s eat first.
Kill later.
"Hold on, I’ll plate it up." But Lin Li stopped the two from taking the skewers, then used tongs to take a piece of meat the size of a fingernail, placed it on foil, and poured a splash of vinegar, gracefully stirring with a spoon before placing two cilantro leaves beside it.
"This dish is called—Dragon Flying Phoenix Dancing!" Lin Li finished with a sprinkle of salt, concluding perfectly.
Bai Bufan approvingly nodded: "Gets the Michelin three-star vibe, this dish feels like it’s at least worth 198."
"Didn’t see any dragon, didn’t see any phoenix, only saw a single dance." Zhou Baowei disliked Michelin, especially French cuisine.
Those portions, even if he ate them for a month, wouldn’t yield two Maltesers.
Thinking of that, Zhou Baowei turned to see Wang Ze eating Maltesers nearby and shook his head in disgust.
Wang Ze, popping two Maltesers into his mouth: "?"
What’s going on?

chapters.title: Chapter 155 - 136: Lin Li’s Unfamiliarity and Disgust
chapters.content:
Chapter 155: Chapter 136: Lin Li’s Unfamiliarity and Disgust
"Do you want some?" Wang Ze generously offered, thinking that Bao Wei was criticizing him for not sharing, so he handed over the Maltesers.
Zhou Baowei immediately shook his head like a rattle drum: "Disgusting, get away from me."
Wang Ze: "?"
If you don’t want to eat, fine, but calling it disgusting—this guy is really something.
Lin Li continued to expertly prepare his Michelin-level meal, then turned around and found that his whole batch of skewers had been taken by Zhou Baowei.
"You’re not going to leave a single skewer for us?" Lin Li had expected Bao Wei to pull a fast one, but not to this extent?
Is it too late to end this friendship now?
"No, I’m worried you guys might play tricks on me, let me divide them," Zhou Baowei said cautiously, giving Lin Li and Bai Bufan a wary look.
"How could we? You’re slandering your brothers here." The two acted hurt, somewhat regretfully, "You do it, you do it."
So Zhou Baowei began distributing: "One for Lin Li, one for me, one for Bufan, one for me, one for me again, one for me, another one for Lin Li, another for me..."
Lin Li, Bai Bufan: "..."
Pretty fair, but just a tad unfair.
"Bufan, quick, call Xiaoxi, tell it we’ve found endless energy, get the Star Ship back—Bao Wei’s turned into lard, energy crisis solved instantly." Lin Li turned to Bai Bufan.
Bai Bufan covered his eyes: "I can’t, Lin Li, I can’t do it, I’m a Muslim’s son-in-law, I can’t witness this lucky symbol, get Bao Wei out of my sight!"
The two were smoothly keeping up their banter.
But this time, Bao Wei was keeping up with his banter as well.
Let them curse, let them curse.
I’ll just eat eat eat eat eat!
I’ll just munch munch munch munch munch!
However, Lin Li and Bai Bufan didn’t really mind; since Bao Wei was eating fast, they just let him eat more. If the kid wants to eat, let him eat. If it’s not enough, they’ll just grab something else to eat.
Tasting his own barbecue, to be honest, barbecue is something that tastes better with great skill, but as long as you’re not completely hopeless, it won’t taste bad.
It was alright, passable.
The so-called feeling that one’s own labor is the sweetest, Lin Li didn’t quite notice.
When it was Bai Bufan’s turn to grill, he spread foil over the barbecue rack, applied oil, and started grilling enoki mushrooms, eggplants...
Lin Li had drunk half of his water while climbing, and now it was finished. He looked at the water the two had brought; there was some left, but the bottle mouths were probably greasy, not something he could drink.
After mentioning it to them, he was appointed as the team’s tea soldier, and headed to the base’s self-service area.
As Xue Jian had said, there was a self-service water dispenser, along with two large containers. Upon opening one was filled with sour plum juice, and the other with a pale pink mush that resembled iced jelly, likely lotus root starch soup.
Since it was summer, except for the room-temperature white water from the dispenser, everything else was chilled.
The sour plum soup seemed to be made from a sour plum concentrate, probably could be made for a yuan per bucket, taste was a bit odd, but the lotus root soup was unexpectedly delicious and refreshing.
Might as well bring back a cup for Bufan and Bao Wei too.
"Lin Li, you’re here for water too?"
"Yeah, class president." Lin Li didn’t turn around, Chen Yu Ying’s crisp voice was really distinctive, like a 10K Blu-ray panoramic surround of 192kHz beauty.
"Which one tastes good here?" The light blue figure stood beside Lin Li, elegant and poised, she asked.
"This grave ash soup is not bad, do you want some, class president? I’ll get you a cup too?" Lin Li said, swinging the long-handled ladle in his hand.
Chen Yu Ying was stunned for a moment, then took a step back, half hiding behind Lin Li, with hands clasped over her lips, a hint of surprise and panic in her voice: "Grave, grave ash soup?"
Is this base trying to scare people?
"Yeah, this lotus root soup, lotus root is just Nezha’s ashes, isn’t it?" Lin Li nodded sincerely.
The air went silent for a moment, so quiet that you could imagine hearing the sound of the young girl’s long eyelashes trembling.
Chen Yu Ying stared at the lotus root soup for a while, then put her clasped hands on Lin Li’s back and gave two light punches, a bit annoyed, she said:
"How can you call lotus root powder grave ash? Why don’t you say the ground beneath us is mixed with Sun Wukong’s ashes?"
"Not surprising, class president, your capability for learning is impressive, indeed. That is the truth, and besides, if the Great Saint got pregnant and wanted an abortion, he’d probably choose laser lithotripsy." Lin Li nodded in agreement.
"Is this the best tasting?" Annoyed but then couldn’t help laughing, Chen Yu Ying stepped forward again to stand parallel to Lin Li, and asked for confirmation.
"Yes, I haven’t drunk this cup yet, try it. There are disposable spoons and straws here."
Lin Li handed the cup to Chen Yu Ying, but when her hand reached over, he suddenly raised the cup of lotus root powder.
Caught off guard, Chen Yu Ying raised her hand, but missed again. With the height difference present, after missing a few times, Chen Yu Ying chose to stare into Lin Li’s eyes.
Ghost Cultivator from Nansang Sect +1.
Lin Li held back his laughter and handed the lotus root soup to a place where Chen Yu Ying could reach it again.
Chen Yu Ying had just moved her hand when Lin Li’s hand moved too.
This is the power of a Cultivator.
Why did Lin Li cultivate?
Apart from helping acquaintances and Bai Bufan fly, curing Yangliang’s stubborn illness, and making at least three thousand a month, isn’t it for moments like these?
"Hmph." The mortal got angry, ignoring Lin Li, deciding to pour herself a cup.
"Really, here you go, really here you go." Lin Li laughed and handed it over again.
Chen Yu Ying refused to accept it.
"Ahem ahem." Lin Li thought he needed to come up with an excuse, "Class president, I’m not teasing you, I was just thinking, do you have any sanitary pads in your bag, are you on your period, this lotus root soup is cold, I’m worried you might not be able to drink it."
Little red cherry tomatoes appeared once again, looking nice, fun.
Love to see it, love to play.
"I’m not on my period, we all carry a spare, and it’s chilly here, just standing here you know it’s cold, I already reached out, doesn’t that mean I can drink it! Besides, you didn’t ask earlier, you were just teasing, no excuses!"
Newbies who poke your stomach all the time, Chen Yu Ying saw through Lin Li’s pathetic lie at once.
"I was afraid asking would make you awkward."
But just like Lin Li said, the world is for the thick-skinned, even after being exposed, his face was not red, and his heart was still beating fine.
"Are you saying I’m not awkward now!?" Chen Yu Ying looked down, seeing that Lin Li’s shoes were white, snorted, and put her slightly raised foot back on the ground.
He should have worn black shoes.
Lin Li handed over the lotus root flour cup again, and this time Chen Yu Ying didn’t refuse. She took it and had a spoonful, nodding with satisfaction: "Hmm, pretty good."
"Class rep, are you drinking it yourself, or do you need a few more cups?" Lin Li asked again.
"Make four more cups, I’ll bring one for each of them. I’m going to get a cup of room temperature water, Shuyang is on her period." Chen Yu Ying said.
"What period? It’s just a period, sweeping away hunger and being yourself."
Chen Yu Ying shivered: "So cold."
"I got the hint! Class rep, wait, I’m going to take off my clothes and drape them over you." Lin Li had read a hundred high EQ posts from marketing accounts, and the warmth tips he learned could definitely keep Chen Yu Ying warm for a hundred years.
"Pervert!"
The only problem was that Lin Li was only wearing a T-shirt, so when he put down his spoon and crossed his arms to grab his shirt hem, Chen Yu Ying covered her eyes.
Unlike Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu who weren’t really covering their eyes, Chen Yu Ying was covering her eyes tightly.
Lin Li, of course, wasn’t really going to take off his shirt—why bother if she wasn’t looking.
Made six cups in total.
"I’ll help you carry them back."
"Alright, thanks."
They were long cups like the ones used for bubble tea, so Lin Li could hold two with one hand, and Chen Yu Ying could hold the remaining three with both hands just right.
Before they reached the girls’ barbecue side, Lin Li heard Ding Sihan’s exclamation, and the girls who had gathered spread out to some distance.
Lin Li walked over to see what was happening and found out the charcoal had caught fire, and Ding Sihan was about to pour the water she brought over it.
Lin Li quickly placed his cups on the ground temporarily, went over and stopped Ding Sihan by pressing down on her cup.
Then he picked up the tongs, moved the grill aside, and stirred the burning charcoal a bit until the flames gradually died down.
"When you’re grilling, switch spots more often, don’t just roast in one place." After putting the grill back, Lin Li calmly said.
"Oh." Ding Sihan nodded blankly.
Lin Li he...
"How was it?" Lin Li’s face instantly turned playful as he eagerly asked: "Wasn’t my silent, calm, cool, problem-solving behavior followed by a lofty speech super handsome?"
Ding Sihan: "..."
Damn it.
Although it was a bit unfamiliar just now, his actions were indeed quite cool.
Almost wanted to praise him.
But now, seeing Lin Li’s playful face, that familiar feeling came rushing back.
But—
"You think you’re still handsome after saying that? You just seem so insufferable!" Ding Sihan exclaimed loudly.
"Alright, I’ll keep a straight face longer next time." Humility leads to progress, Lin Li realized his shortcoming and nodded.
"Lin Li, try this skewer, don’t worry, it’s not a test poison this time; if humans can eat it, so can you." After her disdain, Ding Sihan handed over a mushroom skewer.
Being kicked out of humanity is something Lin Li has gotten used to, he finished eating in a few bites and nodded: "Not bad."
"Then eat this green pepper skewer too, and this mutton skewer which has a nice brownish scorch, and this... ouch!" Ding Sihan’s head was knocked.
Looking up, the culprit sneered at him: "Am I a trash bin to you?"
Never thought he’d one day share the same fate as Bao Wei, utterly pathetic.
"Daddy, I’m begging you." Ding Sihan clasped her hands pleadingly.
"I’ll eat it."
Lin Li sighed, resigned to the fatherly duty he couldn’t escape.
...
"Class rep, is there any of yours here? I want to eat something fit for human consumption."
After fulfilling his trash bin duty, and throwing the skewers into the actual trash bin, Lin Li looked up and asked.
"There’s none here, but I can make one for you now." Chen Yu Ying replied upon hearing.
"I won’t be polite, then. Thanks." Lin Li nodded.
"Wait a minute, I’ll first put on an apron." Chen Yu Ying picked up a clear plastic apron from the grass nearby, put it on, and tied her loose hair with the hair tie around her wrist.
The snow-white neck hidden by her black hair was revealed and shone even more under the sunlight.
The pure and innocent girl, at this moment, seemed to have gained a hint of a homely wife vibe.
The apron was indeed necessary; Lin Li didn’t want this awesome dress to get stained with oil or dirt.
His thoughts wandering, Lin Li quickly turned to look at Yu Yu, then nodded.
As someone who, if a stain were to fall from her mouth, was the most likely to get it on herself, she had indeed worn the same kind of disposable apron, protecting herself well.
And as expected, there were already some stains in that huge risk area on her apron. No way around it, high-risk area.
Lin Li then looked at Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu, Ding Sihan had a bit, Qu Wanqiu had none at all.
—Lin Li wasn’t talking about stains this time.
"Lin Li, what the heck are you smiling about? It’s so creepy!" Qu Wanqiu recoiled in horror upon noticing Lin Li smiling at her.
What he was going to say next was not suitable for unfamiliar ears, so Lin Li jogged over next to Qu Wanqiu and asked seriously, but softly, "I have a very serious question I want to ask you, Little Qiuqiu, if you didn’t have legs, would you still wear shoes?"
Ding Sihan leaned over, hearing this with a face full of confusion.
"What do you plan to do to my legs?" Qu Wanqiu, hearing this, defensively pressed her legs.
"Nothing."
Qu Wanqiu: "?"
What on earth.
"Whether I want to or not is irrelevant. Just answer me, if you didn’t have legs, would you wear shoes?" Qu Wanqiu’s legs had no allure to him, Lin Li continued in a low voice.
"No, I wouldn’t." Qu Wanqiu frowned and shook her head.
"Then why do you wear a bra?" Lin Li earnestly asked.
Qu Wanqiu: "..."

chapters.title: Chapter 156 - 137: My Laughter Passes Through Your Black Hair in Youth
chapters.content:
Chapter 156: Chapter 137: My Laughter Passes Through Your Black Hair in Youth
"Here’s the skewer for you, Wanqiu, I fully support you stabbing him!" Being the only one besides Lin Li and Qu Wanqiu who heard the conversation, Ding Sihan handed the skewer to Qu Wanqiu while stifling a laugh, deliberately picking a metal one to ensure Lin Li had no chance of survival.
"You... Second Sister, let’s not tease Big Sister." Upon hearing this, Lin Li glanced up and down before letting out a snort.
Ding Sihan didn’t laugh and immediately launched into cooperative hunting mode.
...
This time, Lin Li’s 1800 yuan clothes really got two punctures, but in making jokes like these, as long as his head didn’t actually fall off, it was a huge victory!
Win!
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu weren’t actually angry. Firstly, everyone knew each other quite well, and secondly, Lin Li’s teasing was done privately.
"Yes, yes, you both are young and promising, and here I am, an old-timer, who doesn’t get it."
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu brought up the Chen Tianming’s Hope Theory, leaving the soon-to-be eighteen-year-old "old-timer" Lin Li no choice but to agree.
By the time they got back, Chen Yu Ying had finished her work and handed a steaming skewer to Lin Li.
"Your hands are greasy, and there’s sweat on your forehead! Do you need me to wipe your sweat, Captain?" Lin Li said with a smile as he took it.
"No need." For Lin Li, who was persistent about wiping sweat, Chen Yu Ying only found it amusing.
"Lin Li, if you want a girl to wipe your sweat so much, I can do it for you," said Ding Sihan.
Lin Li turned his head ready to say that people are different, only to notice Ding Sihan holding a steel wool ball.
People and anthropomorphized objects are indeed different.
"Thanks, but no thanks." Still not ready for that kind of self-torture, Lin Li calmly declined.
He put the barbecue into his mouth.
Who says that food you labor over with your own hands doesn’t taste particularly good? Lin Li wanted to refute this notion.
"Delicious!" With a hopeful look in Chen Yu Ying’s eyes, Lin Li gave a thumbs up.
"Tch—insincere!" Emperor Chen wasn’t anxious, but Eunuch Ding, holding the steel wool, was.
"I swear in my next life, when I become a monkey in a zoo, if I have the chance, even if it means getting a hundred big smacks from the keeper, I would snatch it from the tourists and eat heartily." So Lin Li rephrased.
Ding Sihan: "..."
The scene was vivid, and indeed more sincere now.
After eating, Lin Li returned to his barbecue grill.
It was now Zhou Baowei’s turn to grill; whatever Bai Bufan had cooked earlier had probably been divided between the two of them.
Sighing at their disloyalty and unfaithfulness, Lin Li stood to the side sipping bone soup through a straw.
"Damn!" Zhou Baowei suddenly roared.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan both laughed.
How was Zhou Baowei always standing downwind of the barbecue smoke?
If he stood on the left, the wind blew left; if he moved to the right, the wind blew right.
"Oh right, where’s ours, Bao Wei and me?"
After Bai Bufan finished laughing, seeing Lin Li drinking lotus powder, he extended his hand.
Oh, it seemed they had wanted him to bring some for them too?
As Lin Li was persistently sipping, making intermittent sounds of air through the straw, it took a while before he turned to Bai Bufan with a gentle and sincere smile:
"I swear on my lucky charm, at the start, I was really planning to bring a cup for both of you, I even prepared one for you."
Bai Bufan: "..."
"That was the plan at the start, what about the middle and the end?" He smiled and asked.
"Forgot in the middle, forgot at the end."
...
With barbecue, it’s quite hard to determine if you’re full while grilling, but with drinks, it’s easier to feel satiated from the drinks.
Over an hour passed, and everyone gradually left the barbecue area.
Until only Zhou Baowei was left battling alone at the barbecue area, with him there, Class Four truly didn’t need to worry about food being wasted.
Some people chose to pay for activities at the base, while others opted to sit on the lawn sharing snacks and chatting.
After all, it was summer, with the midday sun blazing, and Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan weren’t particularly interested in outdoor activities. After taking group and individual photos, they reapplied a layer of sunscreen and returned to the mats under the shade.
"Shall I play some music?" Qu Wanqiu asked.
No one objected.
Qu Wanqiu took out a palm-sized mini speaker, and after a bit of fiddling with her phone, music that couldn’t be called high-quality flowed out of the speaker.
But quality wasn’t the point; it was about the atmosphere it brought.
In the distance, noise louder than the music could be heard.
It was Lin Li’s group.
They weren’t engaging in any paid activities, nor were they resting.
Now, a bunch of them were chasing Lin Li and Bai Bufan—not over persimmons this time, but eyeing the sticks in their hands.
Lin Li hadn’t lied to them; these sticks truly held such terrifying allure for these boys that they would drop everything to chase after them—excluding the barbecue-eating Zhou Baowei.
But it seemed they made some agreement soon after, and they began playing "Rooster Fighting" on the lawn—hopping on one leg while using the knee of the other leg to bump each other.
It looked fun, and if they were closer, cheering them on wouldn’t be out of the question.
The boys seemed to be using this method to determine the ownership of the sticks, with Lin Li and Wang Ze appearing to be the leaders of these roosters, each arrogantly holding a stick.
None of the others seemed dissatisfied—excluding Bai Bufan.
Lin Li walked to the shade, picked up his bag, opened a newly refilled water bottle, and drank large gulps, his Adam’s apple moving up and down clearly with each swallow.

chapters.title: Chapter 157 - 137: My Laughter Passes Through Your Black Hair in Youth_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 157: Chapter 137: My Laughter Passes Through Your Black Hair in Youth_2
"Whose playlist is this, so tasteful." Lin Li nodded approvingly as he listened to the music playing beside him.
"Of course!" Qu Wanqiu responded.
Lin Li took a sip of water to moisten his throat, then began to sing loudly along with the song.
Chen Yu Ying found it unexpectedly pleasant.
"Could we turn off the original singer? He’s so annoying." After singing a line, Lin Li complained disdainfully.
Chen Yu Ying found his shamelessness rather expected.
"You want to sing? I’ll play the accompaniment for you." Qu Wanqiu was quite interested after hearing this and nodded immediately.
"Might as well include mine," Lin Li said bluntly, becoming greedy.
Noticing Lin Li was about to sing, Bai Bufan, Wang Ze, and others hurried over, spontaneously sitting or standing around Lin Li.
"Oh oh! Brother Lin Li! Ohni-chan! I’m crazy about you! Crazy for you! Banging my head against the wall for you!" Bai Bufan instantly became a fan, albeit a slightly dim-witted one.
Wang Ze and the others joined in the clamoring, each making sounds reminiscent of gorillas.
Keeping the beat, Lin Li swayed gently, and as the notes fell, he began to sing:
"Now, the orioles fly and the grass grows~ My beloved is on the road~"
"I know he perseveres through storms~ Passing twilight without pausing~"
Bai Bufan gradually became somber and serious.
As comrades who had sung together in numerous morning read-alongs, Bai Bufan was well aware of Lin Li’s singing skills: good, but definitely not this good.
Had he practiced secretly? Attended other morning read-along sessions in secret?
You sneaky little thing.
Noticing Bai Bufan’s gaze and his fly-eating-like expression, Lin Li felt secretly delighted.
The system had never been more useful.
Bai Bufan seemed to be the biggest victim of his acquisition of the system.
After finishing "The World’s Beauty Is Inextricably Linked With You," all the boys and girls applauded Lin Li.
But as Lin Li operated his phone, the accompaniment music continued almost without stopping; this time, more people instantly recognized the song as "Old Boy."
"My day-night yearning deeply loving person——"
Lin Li first sang half of it himself, then at the start of the second half, he suddenly swung his wooden stick, pointing at Bai Bufan.
"Me? What should I do to express it, will she accept me~"
Bai Bufan didn’t react immediately, but he quickly got into the rhythm, singing the second line.
Bai Bufan’s singing was also quite good.
The two took turns singing, the surrounding young boys and girls swaying gently to the rhythm.
"Dreams are always out of reach——" Lin Li swung the wooden stick in a circle, pointing at Wang Ze and the others.
"Should I!! Give up!" Wang Ze and the others shouted loudly.
With so many people, the voices varied in pitch, and with Wang Ze’s being the loudest, a line went all over the place, sounding very chaotic and unpleasant.
You could tell they hadn’t put much effort into morning reads.
But Lin Li gave Wang Ze and the others a thumbs-up.
"Flowers bloom and fall, yet another season——" This time, Lin Li’s wooden stick, like a conductor’s baton, swung sharply toward the girls under the shade.
Chen Yu Ying didn’t remember "Old Boy" very clearly, slightly opening her mouth hesitantly, but beside her, Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu had already started singing.
"Spring, where are you!"
"Awesome! Much better than me!" During a short interlude, Wang Ze stood up applauding.
"If you praise them like that, they won’t be happy..." Lin Li said disdainfully, "Just like me saying you’re more handsome than Bai Bufan, would you be happy, Wang Ze?"
"Heck! Indeed not! What a dirty example you’ve set." Wang Ze’s most understanding moment.
"Lin Li, your mom——"
"Zhou Baowei!" Lin Li suddenly shouted loudly toward the BBQ area.
"Huh?" Zhou Baowei, still grilling skewers, turned his head.
Lin Li took a deep breath, waiting for the music’s rhythm, then——
"Youth is like a rushing river! Catch it!"
Forcing the effort, this line cracked a bit.
"Gone! Forever! Not! Coming! Back! Too! Late! To! Say! Goodbye!" But even with Lin Li’s cracked voice, compared to the power of Zhou Baowei’s was still too weak.
Other than for defecating, what Zhou Baowei ate did have some other uses after all.
But though it had power, it was explosively unpleasant, and he didn’t seem to have finished chewing what was in his mouth.
"Good!" But the crowd still burst into enthusiastic applause after he roared, and Zhou Baowei waved the barbecue skewer to acknowledge his fans.
Everyone laughed.
"Let’s do it together next!" Conductor Lin Li ordered again.
"Look at the fluttering blossoms in the sky, withering in their most beautiful moment..."
Finding the lyrics on her phone, Chen Yu Ying swayed with the surrounding voices, singing softly along.
...
Xue Jian listened to his class’s students singing from afar, with a gentle smile on his face that Lin Li had never seen before.
A song lamenting the passing of youth, yet they sang it with such vibrant enthusiasm.
Well, that’s just it.
They are indeed living their youth.
...
After "Old Boy," Lin Li switched to another song, this time to the even more familiar Phoenix Legend.
He straightforwardly divided the interested attendees into male and female voice sections, standing in the center pointing around (literally).
Perhaps knowing some without the original vocals would be embarrassed to sing, Lin Li would always pitch in at the right times to guide.
The atmosphere on the lawn was gradually heating up.
Even the shyest Yu Yu, Chen Yu Ying could hear her singing along with everyone else.
And the dorm member who loved singing the most, Wen Shuyang, even volunteered to let Lin Li play a few songs for her to lead.
Occasionally glancing at the lyrics on her phone, sometimes looking at Lin Li shining under the sun, Chen Yu Ying occasionally spotted a few drops of youthful vigor in his sweat falling.
Lin Li, bathed in the breeze, with a carefree demeanor, kept waving the baton in his hand, full of youthful spirit.
...
A new intro started playing.
A slightly dazed Chen Yu Ying snapped back to reality, suddenly realizing it was the intro to Su Yunying’s "Wild Child."
And the first line of the song is...
Chen Yu Ying raised her head, and Lin Li also turned to look at her, the baton connecting their gazes.
"The stronger the wind, the more at ease my heart——"
The heaven and earth seemed to respond to Lin Li’s will, the baton in his hand transformed into Harry Potter’s wand.
It became windy.
A sudden gust of wind blew across everyone present, lifting the edges of picnic mats, blowing away someone’s hat, bringing someone’s exclamation.
Chen Yu Ying pressed down her skirt with both hands, to keep it from flying up.
As a result, her waterfall-like hair was untethered, swaying freely in the wind.
Many strands of hair covered her face.
But Chen Yu Ying, through the gaps in them, could still catch glimpses of Lin Li’s radiant smile.
Could Lin Li see her smile through them as well?
The wind kept picking up.
"The stronger the wind, the more at ease my heart——"
...
The stronger the wind, the more at ease my heart?

chapters.title: Chapter 158 - 138: The Eastern Land Does Not Allow Sleeping Naked
chapters.content:
Chapter 158: Chapter 138: The Eastern Land Does Not Allow Sleeping Naked
"Summer," "Sunrise," "Cicada Chirping," "Orange-flavored Soda," "Youth," how do you make a sentence with these words?
Lin Li would probably answer, "In summer, Bai Bufan used orange-flavored soda to make the youth sunrise with cicada chirping."
Of course, it’s also possible that Bai Bufan was sunrised with cicada chirping, there is no standard answer to this question.
As for Chen Yu Ying, facing this question, no matter how she forms a sentence, she would probably think of the scene in front of her.
Using her soft thighs to hold down her skirt, she freed a hand to brush her hair aside, and the scene became clear, showing Lin Li raising his other free hand high to catch the sun hat that was being blown away.
Perhaps he didn’t expect to catch it, Lin Li’s smile was filled with surprise, followed by a bit of flaunting, just seeing this expression, Chen Yu Ying felt she could hear his ’how about it, am I cool?’ voice.
So even though Lin Li didn’t really ask this, Chen Yu Ying still gave him a thumbs-up.
Afterwards, Lin Li, who was singing a duet with Wen Shuyang to ’Wild Child,’ noticed it and smiled even more brightly, pressing the sun hat onto his head and transformed into Michael Jackson, doing a moonwalk that didn’t look like a moonwalk at all.
The laughter on the lawn became even more melodious as a result.
...
Time slips away hidden in the singing.
"Low battery, please charge."
The music suddenly lowered, and a mechanical prompt sounded from the speaker.
"Time to take a break, time to take a break." Hearing this sound after another song ended, Lin Li, waving his wand slightly, said to everyone.
Although there were surely power banks available, indeed a bit tired of singing.
"Boo——" The love was deep, the resentment was stronger, this group that had just been his fervent fans began to jeer, "Can’t go on like this?"
"How can a man say no..." Bai Bufan was about to stir things up further when he suddenly realized that Lin Li hadn’t said he couldn’t go on, he said he needed a break.
Bai Bufan blinked.
The person who invented the term ’time to take a break’ was truly a genius.
Men can indeed say they need a break.
"Just enjoy it while you can, a few years from now when I hold a concert, the spot you’re in now will cost tens of thousands to get front-row seats, living in bliss without realizing it, you know, Jay is known as little Lin Li." Lin Li gave them the middle finger, then laughed and scolded:
"And none of you are tired, I’ve added 2000 steps to my WeChat fitness count!"
Although Lin Li didn’t move more than five meters, jumping around and pointing fingers was quite exhausting, not to mention he was the one singing the most.
Thirsty to death, Lin Li returned to his bag under the tree, sat down heavily, and started gulping from a plastic bottle.
The plastic bottle made a crackling sound and gradually flattened.
"Ah—I’m alive again." With half a bottle finished in one go, Lin Li let out a long breath.
Feeling the cool water flowing into his body, Lin Li comfortably leaned against the tree trunk.
As for whether it was dirty, a shirt costing thirty-two nine with two extra holes didn’t need much consideration.
The fate of such clothes is either pajamas or rags for mopping the floor at home.
"Aren’t you going to wipe some sweat?" Chen Yu Ying, next to him, handed a tissue to Lin Li.
Upon hearing this, Lin Li’s arms hung limp, and he leaned his head towards Chen Yu Ying: "Class president, you probably don’t know, my Holy Sword is like the Golden Cudgel, it looks light, but it’s actually one kilogram and a half, I have no strength in my hands now..."
Before he could finish speaking, his vision was blocked halfway by a snow-white hand, and the tissue moved left and right across his forehead, absorbing the sweat.
Mild coolness, light fragrance.
"Really wiping?" After a brief pause, Lin Li spoke.
"Hmm?" Chen Yu Ying slightly tilted her head, allowing their gazes to meet again.
"The heat has flown away." Lin Li gave a thumbs-up.
Chen Yu Ying chuckled.
"The rest, wait until your hands recover and wipe it yourself." Chen Yu Ying just lightly wiped his forehead, then placed the tissue next to Lin Li.
To avoid Ding Sihan serving him with a scouring pad, Lin Li quickly finished wiping his sweat.
"Lin Li, when we go down the mountain later, do you want to walk down yourself?" Chen Yu Ying asked, "If you still think so, you’ll have to tell the teacher soon, and set off now, we can’t make everyone wait for us at the bottom."
"Do I want to or not... I don’t know now." Lin Li responded, pressing the back of his hand against his nose, slightly embarrassed, "I’m quite a procrastinator, can’t decide right now."
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
Is that really what procrastination looks like?
"Just kidding, let’s take the cable car down the mountain." Thinking about it, the system probably wouldn’t issue a task like that, seeing Chen Yu Ying’s strange expression, Lin Li changed his words.
If a task was really issued, he’d just buy tickets and come back later.
"Okay." Chen Yu Ying nodded.
The bark was rough, leaning against it was uncomfortable, so after the conversation ended, Lin Li lay on the ground and played with his phone vigorously.
—By vigorously, it meant physically, Lin Li didn’t want to be smacked in the face by his phone.
After the hustle and bustle, the lawn quieted down again, leaving only some people’s whispers.
Chen Yu Ying looked at her phone, enjoying this moment of tranquility.
"Hey, Lin Li, look..." When she came across a fun video, Chen Yu Ying turned her head, just about to share it with Lin Li, and then immediately stopped herself.

chapters.title: Chapter 159 - 138: The Eastern Land Does Not Permit Sleeping Naked_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 159: Chapter 138: The Eastern Land Does Not Permit Sleeping Naked_2
Lin Li originally had his legs curled up but let them down, using one hand to block his eyes, and the other resting on his chest, with the phone casually hanging around his neck.
Asleep.
Chen Yu Ying smiled, trying her best to avoid making any noise.
After looking at her phone for a few more seconds, Chen Yu Ying felt something was odd, turned around, and stared at Lin Li for a few moments, then picked up a leaf from the ground and placed it on Lin Li’s stomach.
Chen Yu Ying nodded in satisfaction.
The ancestral tradition cannot be changed; one must cover themselves with something while sleeping.
Chen Yu Ying glanced at her phone again, then turned her head.
Hmm... maybe another leaf?
...
"Lin Li, Lin Li."
The surrounding noise became louder. Hearing someone calling his name, Lin Li opened his eyes.
Upon opening his eyes, he saw Bai Bufan’s overly large, human-like face, congratulating him with a smile: "The surgery was successful, now you’re a girl, quickly go and try some wormwood."
"So disgusting," Lin Li murmured softly, and closed his eyes again.
Bai Bufan: "..."
Your mother.
Lin Li didn’t think that kind of talk was disgusting; clearly, he was commenting on his face with that statement.
When a person just wakes up, their brain finds it hard to lie, especially when Lin Li murmurs softly, causing Bai Bufan to suffer real damage, bypassing all his defenses.
"Just die here, the balls cut off from the surgery I’ll feed to Bao Wei," Bai Bufan stood up, giving Lin Li’s calf a gentle kick.
Lin Li kicked back at the air.
"Lin Li, get up, time to group up and head down the mountain," Chen Yu Ying’s voice came from a distance on one side.
This time, he had to get up.
Lin Li sat up, rubbed his eyes, then lifted his head in mild surprise, is this tree shedding so badly?
I shouldn’t have slept long, how come my belly is full of fallen leaves, even with little white flowers?
Brushing off the leaves, stretching lazily, Chen Yu Ying and the others seemed to have just returned from the restroom, their hands still a bit damp.
At the moment of eye contact with Lin Li, Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying started laughing first.
"What is it?" Lin Li looked puzzled.
"It’s nothing," Ding Sihan shook her head, stepped forward, and covered Chen Yu Ying’s mouth as she was about to speak.
There’s a prankster.
Lin Li sighed, "Class president, lend me your mirror for a moment."
Just below that, there’s another nonsensical arrow pointing to Lin Li’s mouth.
Others emit righteousness, Lin Li emits the character ’正.’
As for the suspect, the girls could probably be ruled out; Lin Li smiled towards the group of boys, "Who did it?"
"It was probably Sun Xiaochuan," Wang Ze said with a laugh.
"Anyway, that guy’s bound to get hemorrhoids and a perianal abscess tomorrow," Lin Li added with a cold smile.
Upon hearing this, Bai Bufan frowned and advised, "Lin Li, I think whether it was Sun Xiaochuan or not, he might just be joking around, no need to curse him so viciously."
Only criminals empathize with criminals.
Lin Li turned and chased, Bai Bufan turned and ran, but after just a few steps, he tripped over the lawn.
"Run, why aren’t you running now?"
"Sorry, sorry, sorry..." Bai Bufan apologized with a smile to Lin Li, who was close behind pinning him down.
"Sorry? Does sorry work? Kneel, lift your head, let me see your tongue coating!" Lin Li stroked the ’正’ character on his face, revealing a vengeful smile.
"Then can I see Bufan’s perianal abscess? There’s an urgent matter, it’s you," Wang Ze asked as he came over.
"Can you guys watch something normal?" Bai Bufan was genuinely scared this time, covering his mouth and butt, curling up in fear, weak and helpless.
...
"Alright everyone, check to see if everyone’s here, if we’re all here, we’ll take the cable car down the mountain and go back," Xue Jian said loudly, clapping his hands for attention as he reached the entrance.
"Hey, where’s Bao Wei?"
With Xue Jian’s reminder, Lin Li and Bai Bufan only then noticed that Zhou Baowei hadn’t caught up.
The two exchanged a glance, and then turned back in unison.
At the barbecue area, they saw a wisp of white smoke rising, and beside it, Zhou Baowei gazing devoutly at the skewers.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan finally understood why most self-service places strictly limit to two hours.
Zhou Baowei was really selfish, not considering the toilet’s feelings at all.
Lin Li didn’t even dare imagine what kind of challenge his home toilet would face tonight.
"Let’s go! Bao Wei! Stop eating, damn it!" they shouted.
"Huh? Hmm? Oh!" Zhou Baowei finally looked up, got up to follow, but hesitated after a few steps. Staring at the skewers that seemed undercooked, he gritted his teeth, grabbed them in one go, and stuffed them into his mouth swiftly chewing them clean, then mumbled to the two of them, "Coming."
Lin Li, Bai Bufan: "..."
Toilet, you’re safe for now, at least you shouldn’t get clogged.
After all, it’s probably going to be diarrhea.
"Were you guys playing a game? Why is there ’SB’ written on your face?" Zhou Baowei asked curiously, pointing at the clear letters on Bai Bufan’s face as he ran over.
"It’s ’handsome bastard,’ don’t mind it," Bai Bufan waved it off, indicating it’s not important.
Before returning to base, he’s not allowed to wipe it off, that’s the price of stupidity.
...
Heading to the cable car entrance.
The system did not issue any more tasks to add new troubles for Lin Li. It finally matured, understanding things a bit better.
"Lin Li, check your phone," Ding Sihan shouted to Lin Li from behind.
Lin Li opened it, finding a new photo in the group chat.
What appeared was a group photo of the three of them, but they only occupied the edges of the picture; none had their full upper body visible.

chapters.title: Chapter 160 - 138: The Eastern Land Does Not Permit Sleeping Naked_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 160: Chapter 138: The Eastern Land Does Not Permit Sleeping Naked_3
Because in the middle of the picture, I’m lying there, the color adjusted to just black and white, with leaves all over my stomach and a white flower on my chest.
Above is a somber message in four black characters—Forever Remembered.
Lin Li: "..."
"Ding Sihan, I’m really going to post on my Moments because of you. The photo-editing beast inside me is about to awaken." Lin Li turned to stare at Ding Sihan.
"Don’t be angry, I’ll send you a nice one." Ding Sihan immediately said.
Upon hearing this, Lin Li immediately turned down the brightness of his phone, but then suddenly remembered that what Ding Sihan considered nice might not be what he thought.
There’s nothing else to do. The so-called ’good stuff’ that bros talk about isn’t something you can openly appreciate in public. I’ve gotten a bit of PTSD and reflex from it, so Lin Li turned the brightness back up.
A message popped up in the group chat.
This time, Ding Sihan sent a video.
Lin Li clicked it open.
In the video, it’s Chen Yu Ying kneeling beside him, carefully placing leaf after leaf on him, trying to build a leaf tower on his stomach.
She pursed her lips, very serious, her eyes sparkling.
Turns out, it wasn’t a big tree shedding its leaves.
Every time Chen Yu Ying placed a leaf, she’d cautiously glance at Lin Li, and once confirmed he hadn’t woken up, she’d smirk a little, then continue.
In the middle, for some unknown reason, she picked up a stone but hesitated and didn’t place it.
That was close, almost got smashed to death.
「Lin Li: Quote 「Picture」, @Ding Sihan, if you’re not satisfied with this photo, just tell me how you’d like me to die, it’s totally doable.」
Lin Li forgave Ding Sihan. Let the kid photoshop however she likes, what’s wrong with a father indulging his child a bit?
The video wasn’t even fully watched before he heard sounds of commotion behind him.
"When did you record this!"
"When Ying Bao pouted because her leaf tower got blown down by the wind, it was adorable."
Lin Li didn’t want to forgive Ding Sihan anymore, this scene wasn’t even captured, useless thing, I don’t have such a daughter.
"Ahhh!!! Si Han, give me the phone." Lin Li turned his head, only to see Chen Yu Ying, who had turned red in the face, trying to grab Ding Sihan’s phone.
Lin Li figured Chen Yu Ying wouldn’t borrow Ding Sihan’s phone to ask for 200,000, so he immediately became alert.
Saved the video, forwarded the video to his small account, main account, and the group chat he uses as a memo.
A wily rabbit has many burrows.
As expected, before long, the group chat of four people was left with only 「Ding Sihan retracted a message」.
Chen Yu Ying breathed a sigh of relief.
"Ahhh Ying Bao, why’d you delete my original too! Can’t I at least see it myself?" Ding Sihan looked pained as she checked the recently deleted items on her phone, finding that Chen Yu Ying had checked even there.
"Lin Li, did you save it? Quick, send it to me!" Ding Sihan hopefully looked at Lin Li, she had fought for so much time for him.
"No, didn’t get the chance." Upon hearing this bad news, Lin Li shook his head regretfully.
"Useless! You’re useless!"
"Sorry!!" Lin Li apologized hoarsely.
Chen Yu Ying let out a big sigh of relief.
Saved.
Next time doing something this childish and embarrassing, definitely gotta be more cautious.
She opened her phone.
A group chat that had been buried by other messages popped up, it was the one from last night with only her and Lin Li left, the group chat named Memo 3.
Clicked it open.
The familiar video.
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
「Chen Yu Ying: ?」
「Lin Li retracted a message.」
「Lin Li: Sorry, this group is also in my memo category, so I forwarded it by hand, class monitor just pretend you didn’t see it, thanks for cooperating.」

chapters.title: Chapter 161 - 139: Super Judge, Super Case Handling
chapters.content:
Chapter 161: Chapter 139: Super Judge, Super Case Handling
Chen Yu Ying stopped sending messages in the group, Lin Li turned his head, and when they made eye contact, she was the first to look away.
Nice.
Seems like it’s acquiesced.
As for Chen Yu Ying’s indifferent hum earlier, it didn’t even matter at all.
Haha, now Ding Sihan will have to beg me to watch this video.
Heh heh heh.
Taking the cable car down the mountain, Lin Li wanted to spend an extra twenty to sit in the transparent bottom cable car, but unfortunately Bai Bufan and others didn’t want to spend the money.
So, they had to take the regular cable car.
Scenery-wise, although it was pretty breathtaking at first glance, after the initial few minutes of excitement passed, it was just like that.
Looks like not taking the transparent cabin was the right decision, neither Lin Li nor Bai Bufan who hadn’t taken the cable car earlier were now sitting down looking at their phones.
As today’s activities concluded, photos began popping up one by one in the group chat.
Most of them were combinations of just the three of them, probably to differentiate from the ones in the dormitory group.
There were also some photos with Lin Li and Bai Bufan, apart from group photos, when Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan were hitting persimmons, they took quite a few of them together.
"Bufan, do you want the photos from this morning?" Lin Li asked.
"Ah? Whatever." Bai Bufan, who was looking at his phone, casually raised his head and said.
"It’s too much hassle to pull you into the small group, I’ll just pick them out and send them to you one by one, that’s simpler." Lin Li nodded.
Bai Bufan, who had just lowered his head, raised it again: "..."
What Lin Li said didn’t sound like human language.
But Bai Bufan wore a teasing smile and pointed at Lin Li like Zhen Zidan did, pointing for half a day and only managed to say one word: "~~Fine."
He and Zhou Baowei often peeked at Lin Li’s phone screen, he knew about that group.
"Pulling you into the group won’t show historical messages anyway, it’s more hassle to resend them, what’s the point?" Lin Li said confidently in the face of Bai Bufan’s speech-within-a-speech gaze, "Don’t think I have ulterior motives, how could I possibly, I’m just too bored right now."
"You’re still fond of confessing your guilt." Bai Bufan sneered.
He didn’t care about this at all.
The only woman in this world who could tug at his heartstrings was Feifei, who now has a stable job, thoughts flying! Thoughts for Feifei! Fei Sect!
There were just over ten photos, and after forwarding them, Lin Li had nothing else to do and instinctively peeked at Bai Bufan’s phone, only to find he had the brightness set really low.
"What are you looking at?"
"Something nice." Bai Bufan laughed cheekily and voluntarily showed it.
Turned out it was a novel.
"My Fertile Greek Myth Adventure"
The following is the table of contents.
1. Travels through the Greek world, gaining the fertile system.
2. Ecstasy! Encountering the matriarchal big sis!
3. It’s Zeus.
5. Don’t talk about why I can get pregnant, why does this satisfy system conditions?
6. System kicks in, fleeing fast.
7. Meet youthful little girl.
12. Still Zeus transformed.
18. Meeting a fragrant soft pretty boy.
20. How is it still Zeus.
49. Losing faith in humans, why not try a bull?
50. Zeus!
Sometimes my reading speed is too fast, by the time I realized what I had just seen, it was too late.
"Unbelievable."
Bai Bufan indeed had to lower the brightness, this content even Lin Li, a pervert, thought was perverse.
Afterwards, Lin Li covered his eyes ——this system had quite a déjà vu feel to it, dear, system, we don’t watch, we don’t learn.
"Not unbelievable, you don’t understand, Greek mythology is indeed like that, Zeus and his children, once he fell in love with a princess and transformed into a bull... then again fell for a princess and turned into lightning to impregnate her..."
Bai Bufan had some knowledge about Greek mythology, so he wanted to explain a bit, but Lin Li didn’t want to hear it, covered his ears and turned away.
On the other side, Zhou Baowei was browsing videos.
Lin Li got up to see what others were doing.
Zhang Haoyang was still playing his gaming console, clattering away.
"Keep it down, you don’t care when it’s someone else’s wife you’re playing with huh." Lin Li said.
"Mm." Zhang Haoyang nodded.
The scoundrel, condemned.
Wang Ze was watching a ball game, repeatedly dragging the timeline to watch the cheerleader segment during halftime.
True sports fan, condemned.
"Dude, why are you still a simp?" Lin Li said with an exasperated face when he sat down next to Chen Tianming and saw this.
All over were green chat records, Chen Tianming was sharing bits and pieces from today’s events.
"Where am I being a simp, Qiaoqiao and I are mutually invested, we chatted way more these days than last weekend, do I look like a simp?" Chen Tianming tried to argue.
Lin Li retreated in horror.
"Crap, encountered a person skin asking for affirmation."
Before the nation’s founding, when goblins were still allowed to attain enlightenment, the weasel, almost ascending, would ask humans if it looked human, if told it looked like a human, it would ascend.
This is called weasel asking for affirmation.
Now, Chen Tianming asking if he looked like a simp, isn’t he asking for affirmation in person skin?
No good, I must think carefully, because affirming and saying he doesn’t look like it might cause resentment, saying he does could result in being haunted.
Person skin also isn’t to be messed with.
"Get lost, you don’t understand anything. When Qiaoqiao and I become official, Lin Li you’ll be stuck standing outside looking after the door." Chen Tianming rudely pushed Lin Li away.
Going against convention it seems.
"She won’t even reply to you."
"Firstly, she may be busy right now, secondly, if she’s not busy and doesn’t reply, it proves she’s shy, shyness means..." Chen Tianming revealed a warm smile.
Lin Li: "..."
Seeing Chen Tianming reveling in it, not knowing what kind of person Yao Qiaoqiao actually is, Lin Li didn’t say much more, better to respect and wish:
"Tianming, maybe one day you’ll evolve from simp to alpha wolf, truly having the chance to have Yao Qiaoqiao under your thumb."
"Firstly I’m not a simp, secondly I would never have Qiaoqiao under my thumb." Chen Tianming said seriously.
"Lin Li, what’s more likely is that only toilet paper can be under Tianming’s thumb." Bai Bufan raised his head to mock upon hearing.
"Apologize to the term under thumb." Lin Li was stunned for a moment, then couldn’t help but laugh.
After a round, he returned to his seat, then frowned and looked at Zhou Baowei: "Baowei, why are you still watching this video?"
He was watching it just now, still watching, and it was a short video less than ten seconds long.
He’s seen it several times already, and it’s not even a beauty video.
Bai Bufan suddenly raised his head: "Quick look at Baowei’s back-end, don’t be sneaky studying like Lin Li you beast!"
Lin Li: "..."
In this competitive world, Bai Bufan trusts no one.
Seeing Lin Li not moving to act, he immediately went forward and snatched Zhou Baowei’s phone, yet Zhou Baowei had no response to this action.
"Clean, nothing on the back-end, he’s not studying." Bai Bufan breathed a sigh of relief, then in the next moment his face showed fear: "Baowei, your complexion is so bad, are you sick?"
Lin Li heard this, looked closely, and only then noticed Zhou Baowei’s pale face, his whole body trembling slightly, now using one hand to press the base of the other hand.
His phone had been snatched, and he hadn’t even raised his head.
"Baowei, are you okay?" Everyone present noticed, quickly stepping forward to show concern.
"Humans... shouldn’t... eat... raw... food..."
"I... want... to... poo..."
"bu——"
As Zhou Baowei struggled to say these words, and an overwhelming offensive odor began to permeate the cable car, the terrified pale face spread from Zhou Baowei’s face to everyone inside the cable car.
The cable car was silent for a moment.
Then.
"Oh crap!!!"
"Your mom!!!"
"No way!!!"

chapters.title: Chapter 162 - 140: Fired Up, Surpassing the Limits of the Sphincter!
chapters.content:
Chapter 162: Chapter 140: Fired Up, Surpassing the Limits of the Sphincter!
What’s the hardest escape room in the world?
Lin Li has experienced it. Ranked first is lying in bed with a fully charged phone, and not wanting to use the bathroom at all, yet needing to escape to the outdoors where the temperature is below 0 degrees Celsius.
And ranked second is right now.
Lin Li is furious.
He’s angry at himself and Bai Bufan for not stopping this guy from stuffing everything into his mouth just now.
It turns out it’s not Baowei’s toilet that’s going to suffer, but themselves!
Digests way too fast!
Lin Li regrets using [Healing] yesterday; otherwise, maybe touching Baowei’s butt now could alleviate his symptoms.
Unfortunately, some things are lost once missed.
"Let me out, let me out!" Wang Ze screams from the depths of his soul.
Lin Li opens the cable car window to let the smell disperse as much as possible and points to the window saying to Wang Ze, "The space is enough for you to crawl out, go ahead."
Wang Ze: "..."
You son of a bitch.
He wants to get out, but not in that way.
"At a time like this, you’re still joking around! Is this really the time for jokes?" Wang Ze shouts loudly.
"Why are you shouting so loudly? What if you scare the shit out of Baowei!" Lin Li is not overwhelmed at all and shouts even louder.
Wang Ze promptly shuts up and carefully glances at Zhou Baowei, who is still pale.
Everyone is actually quite rational. Despite the shouting, no one is moving around recklessly, knowing that such behavior on a cable car is dangerous.
"Cable car, damn cable car, hurry up! Speed up!" Bai Bufan, face pale, clutches the leather seat tightly, with a hint of plea in his voice.
Cable car: "..."
In reality, there is an emergency button inside the cable car to call staff, but everyone knows, even though the situation may seem urgent now, it’s not truly urgent.
Besides, pressing it might not solve the problem and could easily send Baowei completely off to another planet.
The calmest person in the cable car is Chen Tianming, who hasn’t been shouting the whole time.
A role model for us all.
Lin Li was about to consider him as the backbone but upon checking, saw his phone screen glowing green, the conversation naturally with Yao Qiaoqiao, and the content:
"Chen Tianming: I’m doomed, I’m doomed, I’m doomed!"
"Chen Tianming: I might die!!!"
"Chen Tianming: ..."
So far, Yao Qiaoqiao hasn’t replied.
Humans can’t have a dog as a backbone, so Lin Li dismissively waves his hand. This kid Chen Tianming stinks worse than Baowei’s fart.
Lin Li returned to his original position, sliding towards Bai Bufan, then earnestly asked, "Baowei, can you hold on? There’s about twenty minutes left."
The cable car hasn’t been on its way long.
"I, don’t, know." Zhou Baowei mutters with difficulty, pressing his hands on his stomach, "But I feel like I’m on the brink of shitting."
"Your butt isn’t pointy now, is it? Don’t let it flow, we don’t need that!" Bai Bufan says with a tearful face.
"Hold on! You have to hold on! I’m praying for you right now, you can do it." Zhang Haoyang, slightly religious, folds his hands and starts praying.
But what Lin Li hears sounds more like a chant of passing than praying.
"Yes, yes, Baowei, hang in there! Just twenty minutes, and you can finally let it all out!" Wang Ze quickly chimes in, then adds, "And remember, never believe any fart at this time. It’s all temptation, all traps! Be cautious about a potential explosion!"
"Don’t, say, such words, don’t, don’t say, pull, that word!!" Zhou Baowei screams like a suppressed beast.
The compartment falls silent for a moment.
"Slap!" Wang Ze slaps his own face, desperately remorseful, saying, "Sorry, sorry, sorry, please forgive me!!"
I really deserve to die.
"I declare the cabin has officially entered emergency lockdown! All of you, must speak carefully! Give Baowei the best environment to hold it in!"
Grand Commander Lin has to step up now, and strictly commands.
Everyone immediately goes silent, hardly daring to breathe.
Everyone is extremely tense, feeling like every second is dragging.
"bu——"
At this time, a fart sounds remarkably clear.
Everyone nervously looks at Zhou Baowei, but he shakes his head: "Just, a fart."
Everyone breathes a sigh of relief.
"But, but next time, I, can’t, guarantee." Zhou Baowei grits his teeth.
Everyone’s hearts are up in their throats again.
People try to look for solutions online, but realize it’s all useless fluff with no practicality.
Looking at Zhou Baowei again, his expression has turned somewhat blank, his pupils gradually losing focus.
Feeling that the carousel of life is flashing before his eyes, maybe he’s already been dead for a while.
"Hold on, just ten more minutes, and we’ll reach the shore." Lin Li says with a twisted, fearful face, as Baowei only lets out another fart.
"Ten minutes, I possibly... possibly..." Zhou Baowei’s voice is extremely weak and doesn’t finish the sentence.
