"A moment’s boldness traded for a lifetime’s introversion, the boss probably won’t waive the small amount for any customers again, you two are just..." On the way to the nearby supermarket, Ding Sihan complained.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan high-fived, the shameless duo, unbeatable in the world.
"Impressive, right?" Lin Li still didn’t forget to ask Ding Sihan.
"Impressive."
No need for system verification, just looking at Ding Sihan’s expression, you could tell she was reluctantly giving praise.
They arrived at the supermarket.
On the supermarket’s sign at the entrance it read—[Supermarket—Your Best Friend]
The girls went straight into the supermarket without a hitch, while Lin Li and Bai Bufan looked at each other.
"Now?"
"Not suitable, right?"
"Another day then."
"Okay."
After making an unusual agreement, the two caught up with the three in front.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan each pushed a small shopping cart.
For some reason, one of the wheels on the supermarket cart always feels awkward to use, rolling along it lags behind the other three wheels.
"Why are there dumbbells in the snack section?" While buying snacks, seeing a pair of dumbbells on the shelf, Ding Sihan said in surprise.
"That means someone made an important decision here. They put down the suffering and picked up happiness." Lin Li commented, somewhat missing Bao Wei, wondering if he was dead or not.
Ding Sihan: "..."
Indeed.
There were many things to purchase, luckily before there was only one mule, but now there are two, carrying things back wouldn’t be too difficult.
"Hello, do you have a membership?" At checkout, the cashier instinctively asked.
"No." Lin Li naturally wouldn’t have a membership for this local supermarket.
"So, would you like to get one, recharge and get..." The cashier immediately tried to sell the membership.
"No need, thank you."
Membership systems aren’t really a good thing.
Damn it, two girls one cup and membership systems, the people pushing these onto others really deserve a beating.
...
Although preparing dinner right after lunch seems a bit too early, for a group of beginners, it’s just right.
Considering this is a good opportunity to earn heartfelt praise from everyone, Lin Li was extremely focused.
However, Lin Li didn’t plan to cook dishes. For someone with no experience, even with a guide, wanting to make a satisfactory dish on the first try is quite difficult.
He set his sights on sweets, which are more likely to bring satisfaction and happiness.
Plus, they’re relatively simpler to make.
"You guys cook, I’ll make a rock candy fruit as everyone’s dessert." When it came time to assign tasks, Lin Li said.
"Didn’t we buy a lot of candies and cakes with the snacks? Here, Lin Li, do you want a lollipop, if you do I’ll get one for you." Already with the apron tied, fully armed but only for washing vegetables, Ding Sihan, with a lollipop stick in her mouth, mumbled.
"How can a lollipop compare to my rock candy fruit? Besides, Ding Sihan, don’t you find lollipops weird? Eating a lollipop is like flavoring your own saliva before drinking it." Lin Li retorted.
Ding Sihan: "?"
Swallowing a mouthful of sweet saliva, Ding Sihan remained silent.
She seemed to want to say something, then stopped, hesitated to speak, then stopped again.
"Lin Li! Today was supposed to be a beautiful day! Because of what you said, my day is ruined! What do you mean by drinking flavored saliva!" Ding Sihan said through gritted teeth.
She seemed truly agitated since she was now chewing the lollipop rather than letting it slowly dissolve.
Lin Li responded with a funny face.
With the tasks assigned, Bai Bufan was responsible for deveining the shrimp. The kitchen quickly became busy, though Qu Wanqiu was clearly the backbone.
Lin Li went next to Ding Sihan, who was washing vegetables, and began to clean his own fruits and skewers.
After a while, Lin Li stared at Ding Sihan.
"What’s up? Why are you staring at me?" Ding Sihan was suddenly on high alert.
"Ding Sihan, do you know what uncomfortable means," Lin Li said with an evil smile, walked up, and grabbed Ding Sihan’s hair, using it to wipe her face, and then said word by word:
"When you’re wearing wet and dirty gloves, and your nose itches."
After her hair was used to scratch her face, Ding Sihan’s nose itched: "..."
Bastard.
"Lin Li, do you know what uncomfortable means?" Ding Sihan, who tried to itch her nose with her arm but couldn’t stop the itch, finally took a deep breath and smiled, staring at Lin Li.
"Go ahead." Lin Li was very curious.
"Watching yourself get minced." Ding Sihan took off her gloves, rubbed her nose comfortably, and reached for a kitchen knife.
Lin Li: "?"
"Sorry, Xiaodingding, I sincerely apologize to you." Lin Li quickly slid to his knees, then added, "And by the way, play safely with knives, as Uncle always says, safety first."
"You better mean it when you say safety is important."
"Of course."
"Take your syrup and fruits and get out of the kitchen!" Ding Sihan ordered.
"Alrighty."
...
Half an hour later.
"Why do I smell something odd?" Chen Yu Ying wrinkled her nose and asked, puzzled.
"It really seems like it." Qu Wanqiu nodded.
Everyone turned to find Lin Li back at some point, looking serious.
"What’s up?" Chen Yu Ying asked with concern.
Lin Li slowly took out a black ball from behind his back.
The source of the smell was that.
"What is that?"
"Candied tangerine." Lin Li explained.
The kitchen fell silent for a moment, then everyone put down their tasks and gathered around.
"You call this lump of coal a candied tangerine?" Ding Sihan couldn’t believe it.
"Show some respect, it’s not coal, it really is candied tangerine." Lin Li, seeing no one believed him, pressed a fruit knife against it, revealing the black surface beneath was still black.
Darn.
Lin Li: "..."
"Sorry, it might not be tangerine."
Lin Li couldn’t even convince himself.
Scratching his head awkwardly, Lin Li looked at the most experienced in the kitchen, Qu Wanqiu: "Little Qiuqiu, take a look, my candied fruit turned out like this—is it the syrup’s problem, the tangerine’s problem, or the pot’s problem?"
Afraid Qu Wanqiu couldn’t analyze it well, Lin Li also brought over the non-stick pan covered in black.
Qu Wanqiu: "..."
"You’re not going to mention anything about yourself?" Qu Wanqiu bit her lip, the sound of her voice trembling with laughter.
"Oh oh, Little Qiuqiu, is it my syrup’s problem, my tangerine’s problem, or my pot’s problem?" Lin Li then asked again.
"That’s not how you should address yourself!! I’m saying it’s a personal problem!" Qu Wanqiu scolded with a laugh.
"That can’t be, absolutely not." Lin Li firmly denied.
How could a Cultivator not handle such a minor thing?
It must be the things’ problem.
Finding the candied tangerine not hot, Qu Wanqiu just picked it up regardless of cleanliness, squeezing it and hearing a crunchy sound.
Ding Sihan, seeing this, was the first to laugh.
"Hahahahaha—" And laughter is infectious, Qu Wanqiu couldn’t hold back either, squatting on the ground laughing.
She didn’t forget to squeeze the candied tangerine.
Crunch crunch.
Squeezable toy.
"Stop laughing, Qu Wanqiu, it’s one thing for them to laugh, but you—I’m discussing how to save it with you." Lin Li was very serious.
"Lin Li haha, how on earth did you do it? To make candied fruit look like this haha—" But Lin Li’s seriousness only made Qu Wanqiu laugh harder, "You, you—"
"Though making perfect candied fruit is hard, making it like this is even harder, right?"
"Lin Li, I must say, you, you, hahaha—you’re really something, I truly admire you."
[During this small team training, received heartfelt recognition and praise from other team members (1/4)]
Lin Li: "..."
Such things don’t require medicine.

chapters.title: Chapter 227 - 190: Sadness Flows Upstream
chapters.content:
Chapter 227: Chapter 190: Sadness Flows Upstream
Actually, making it like this is part of Lin Li’s plan, everything that’s happening is what Lin Li had calculated.
Yeah.
Damn it, bullshit, even Lin Li can’t believe this himself.
Aren’t we bros?
Mind taking back that message?
Looking at the system’s notification, Lin Li had mixed feelings—kinda happy, but also thinking happiness is unlikely.
This system task shouldn’t be completed in such a way...
"Sigh, Little Qiuqiu, I can see you seem to genuinely recognize me," Lin Li said coolly, looking down at Qu Wanqiu who was laughing while sprawled on the table.
His voice was flat, showing a semblance of hopelessness.
"Of course, I truly admire you, Lin Li, haha. You might not understand if you’ve never been in a kitchen, but to manage to make fruit look like this takes quite some skill, haha—is this carbonized? Hahaha—"
Qu Wanqiu didn’t stop laughing.
After giving Lin Li a thumbs-up, she turned to explain to Ding Sihan and the others.
Lin Li sighed, figuring if the face has already lost, it’s best to use it to its fullest. So he took back his carbonized orange, squeezed it in front of the other three, and said proudly, "How about it? Impressive, right?"
"Impressive." The other three were also laughing.
But this task seemed to be against him. When he wanted to grow flowers, they refused to bloom; when he took initiative, the task showed no response.
Maybe if he pees on these flowers another day, they’d behave.
The grudge today, Lin Li must have held it yesterday.
But since the praise failed, he had used his lost face to its fullest, it was time to pick it up. There was no such thing as giving up in Lin Li’s Oxford Dictionary—
"Heh, you’ll regret laughing at me now." So when faced with ridicule, he simply glared back defiantly, "I will definitely make a perfect candied fruit!"
Qu Wanqiu reached out worriedly, seeming like she wanted to stop him but then relaxed a bit and said with relief, "The B&B’s emergency facilities are well-equipped, so go ahead."
Bu Hao! That’s a boomerang!
That’s what he just attacked her with!
Damn Little Qiuqiu.
"How about you devein the shrimp, and I’ll make the candied fruit?" Bai Bufan, who was shelling and deveining the bought shrimp, said seriously, "I think I can do better than you."
Lin Li walked over, plucked a hair, and silently used it to scratch Bai Bufan’s face.
Bai Bufan: "..."
"You shrimp-head guy, indeed very suited to handle shrimp heads." Bai Bufan wasn’t Ding Sihan, so Lin Li’s intent needed no explanation as he rubbed his nose with his shoulder while commenting.
"Precisely because I’m a shrimp-head guy, I can’t harm my kind. Good luck, poop-playing kid," Lin Li said lightly.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"What the hell is a poop-playing kid?"
Lin Li snickered to himself and walked away.
Wait, Bai Bufan looked down; his deveining actions did seem like playing with poop.
"You son of a—!"
...
"Never thought that not only can’t you use Baidu for medical questions, but you also can’t use it for recipes?"
Lin Li’s creation required no kitchen equipment, indeed didn’t need to be in a kitchen; a power source would suffice, as he whispered outside.
Slight physical discomfort + Baidu = Prepared for cremation.
Lin Li + Baidu = Candied carbon.
So darn dangerous, this Baidu.
"Seems like it’s better to stick with basic operations honestly, no more trying fancy stuff." Lin Li sighed, putting down the supposedly best strategy to make delicious candied fruit, and started following the most basic guide step by step.
Before learning to walk, better not run.
Stirring the syrup with a spatula, Lin Li awaited it to reach the right state.
The system buzzed to life.
[Venturing abroad to study, improving mecha piloting skills on the arduous path, leaving homeland, the three accompanying girls’ sorrow finally explodes, starting to cry silently.
You are at a loss, but as the world’s only male, perhaps the only way to help them temporarily forget their worries and regain joy is through your robust physique!]
[Task Triggered!]
[Task Six: Use physical contact and union to let the girls experience joy.]
[Task Reward: Physical Improvement: Mecha Synchronization Index +10; Random Talent; System Currency * 50]
Lin Li: "?"
Not until the syrup bubbled did Lin Li snap back to reality.
Aren’t we bros?
Why is there another one?
This task also involves that familiar progress bar.
But the main point isn’t that; it’s why are they crying?
A bit concerned, Lin Li immediately unplugged and returned to the kitchen.
Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan’s eyes were red. Though their eyes were shimmering with tears, they resolutely refused to let them fall. Their trembling eyelashes seemed ready to sweep away their sorrows.
Although they were facing the doorway, they turned their heads slightly.
It seemed they didn’t want Lin Li to see them crying.
Lin Li ought to ask what was wrong.
But he damn well saw the onions the two were cutting.
Turning their heads wasn’t about avoiding Lin Li seeing them, but about trying to avoid contact with the onion vapors.
"What’s up? Did you finish the coal again?" Chen Yu Ying asked curiously, wiping her tears with her arm upon seeing Lin Li return.
Lin Li: "..."
System, why don’t you open your damn eyes and take a look?
Where did this sudden sadness come from? Onion sadness?
But Lin Li had to admit one thing; at this moment, he did feel a bit of that sadness.
What bullshit task is this, bringing joy through physical contact and integration?
The rewards are so stingy, and it’s just a talent reward. If there were an option to abandon the task, Lin Li would likely give it up.
"It’s fine. I came back to see if I could find an opportunity to make you happy with my body." Lin Li replied coolly to Chen Yu Ying’s inquiry.
Chen Yu Ying, Ding Sihan: "?"
But since it’s Lin Li, saying something perverted like this isn’t that unusual.
It’s unrealistic for the system to expect him to use that, that. But if it’s just about physical contact and integration, can tickling complete this task?
Lin Li approached the three girls, taking a glance.
No one had exposed their waist, and if he tickled them through clothes, the system definitely wouldn’t count it as physical contact.
Looking down, Chen Yu Ying and Qu Wanqiu were wearing small sandals, so their feet were bare.
Ding Sihan was wearing pristine white socks. Lin Li suspected she might be gay, liking boys.
"Aren’t you going to make your candied fruit?" Chen Yu Ying asked, squeezing her eyes shut tightly to regain clarity in her blurred vision, when Lin Li approached.
"I can’t stand seeing girls cry. Class President and Ding Sihan, leave cutting the onions to me." Having found a convenient excuse, Lin Li simply said.
At the moment neither Chen Yu Ying nor Qu Wanqiu was barefoot, making them lift their feet for him to tickle wasn’t realistic; he’d have to find an opportunity later on.
Better not let crying trigger any other tasks.
"Okay, I’ve cried enough, too." Ding Sihan cautiously set the small knife on the table and handed over the onion without hesitation.
"Alright, just be careful." Chen Yu Ying was a bit more polite.
...
"Bufan, do you think looking up at a 45-degree angle can stop tears?" Lin Li, with reddened eyes, mournfully said, "Life is so fleeting."
"I, ha, don’t, ha, know."
Maybe it was empathy, or maybe it was Lin Li who perversely moved the cutting board and onions over to Bai Bufan, almost using his face as the cutting board. Whatever it was, Bai Bufan cried even harder than Lin Li, sniffling through his words.
"Can you hum, move somewhere else to cut onions, Lin Li?" Finally, Bai Bufan, who’d cried enough, couldn’t take it anymore.
In choosing his onion-cutting method, Lin Li picked the one with the most barrage comments between the simplest and most laborious options.
"No way, if everyone cries and you don’t, you’ll look out of place." Lin Li feared the onion juice wouldn’t reach Bai Bufan’s face, slicing the onions with such intensity that the pinging and slicing echoed like bursts of water, making Bai Bufan’s head buzz.
"My nose is itchy, my eyes itch, but my gloves are full of crap. Do you know what I’m thinking now?" Bai Bufan was itching all over, gritting his teeth.
"You’re obviously thinking about us four leaving the kitchen so you can wolf down these shrimp shells like noodles, slurp them down, and then happily pat your stomach saying, ’Wow, this crap tastes great.’" Lin Li rapidly replied.
A long and complex sentence, but not a confession, an accusation.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"You son of a—"
Their words were colorful.
And so, in the kitchen, Bai Bufan cursed while crying, and Lin Li cried while being cursed.
The moving dialogue between the two made the eyes of the other three girls in the kitchen redden—Lin Li was slicing with such vigor that the effect spread everywhere, even Qu Wanqiu couldn’t escape it.
But the corners of the three girls’ mouths remained uplifted.
Bringing Bai Bufan along was indeed the right decision.
The two could truly achieve a miraculous effect of one plus one being more than zero.
Scattered farts all over the place, gathered into one pile of dung.

chapters.title: Chapter 228 - 191 Let’s Toast to Ourselves
chapters.content:
Chapter 228: Chapter 191 Let’s Toast to Ourselves
Qu Wanqiu’s cooking skills are actually pretty good. With four newbies, she really managed to serve bowl after bowl of steaming hot dishes right at mealtime. They even looked presentable, and she even plated them.
Actually, among the apprentices, Ding Sihan is the most impressive. With a zero base, under Qu Wanqiu’s guidance, she managed to make four dishes and two soups all by herself.
They are scrambled eggs with tomatoes, scrambled tomatoes with eggs, tomato and egg stir-fried, egg and tomato stir-fried, tomato egg soup, and egg tomato soup.
"Lin Li, the drinks have arrived, go grab them, and you’ll get more snacks later." After the five sat down at the tatami-style ’table,’ Ding Sihan’s phone rang, and she bossed Lin Li around.
"Bufan, the drinks have arrived, go grab them, and you’ll get half more snacks later." Lin Li turned to Bai Bufan and said.
Bai Bufan: "..."
Outsourcing, huh? Even acting as a broker right in front of me?
But Lin Li did it just reflexively; as she said this, she was already getting up and heading outside.
Lin Li brought the drinks back and distributed them to five people.
"This milk tea’s milk and tea flavors are so weak. Indeed, ordering milk tea from a shop you’ve never heard of is just a gamble." Ding Sihan remarked with furrowed brows after taking a sip with a straw.
The other two relatively professional girls nodded along.
"Maybe the shopkeeper likes cleanliness more," Lin Li said upon hearing.
"Huh? Why would loving cleanliness make the taste weak?" Ding Sihan was puzzled.
"Before selling the milk tea, they washed it with water to ensure it’s not dirty when we get it," Lin Li explained.
Ding Sihan: "..."
"If it’s watered down, just say it’s watered down!!"
"Can we start eating?" Bai Bufan said as he reached out, only to have Lin Li’s chopstick tail tap his hand.
"Do you think you deserve to eat first?" Lin Li sneered, then pointed forward before Bai Bufan could fight back: "People don’t eat first; phones eat first."
Bai Bufan watched the three girls about to capture the fruits of their labor and settled down.
Wait, why did Lin Li say ’people don’t,’ why add an extra ’don’t’?
Damn it.
"Alright, you can eat now." After phones were full, the girls finally issued the order.
"Let’s toast first." Lin Li raised the fruit tea in his glass.
"Cheers!" The other four immediately understood and lifted their glasses to clink together.
Sometimes, effort is just for this moment of toasting.
"Today, we gather here to celebrate Lin Li’s seventeenth year and 340th day anniversary. On this special and important day, I’m deeply honored to deliver some speech..." After the toast, leader Lin Li relievedly said.
Unfortunately, no one paid him any attention.
Bai Bufan even started eating directly, deliberately knocking the bowl’s edge with his chopsticks while scooping rice.
"Ahem, let’s not celebrate this one, skip me; let’s thank the Ancient Greek god of wealth— Chen Yu Ying!" Lin Li had to change the topic.
"Oh, oh!"
Except for Chen Yu Ying, the three immediately chimed in and raised their drinks, clinking them together.
"Let’s also thank the Ancient Greek ruler of culinary arts— Qu Wanqiu!" Lin Li spoke again.
Clear glass clinks came together.
"Why not call her the god of cooking?" Ding Sihan subconsciously asked next.
Lin Li stared at Ding Sihan without speaking.
"Sorry." Ding Sihan realized and sincerely apologized.
"Alright, next, let’s thank the Ancient Greek god of... tomatoes and eggs— Ding Sihan!" Under Ding Sihan’s threatening gaze, Lin Li could only change his statement.
Everyone toasted again, and Ding Sihan reluctantly accepted it.
Bai Bufan eagerly rubbed his hands together.
It’s my turn, it’s my turn.
"Lastly, thanks to Bai Bufan who’s worked hard playing all afternoon... Alright, let’s eat." Lin Li said disinterestedly, then pouted: "Tsk—"
Started scooping rice, chopsticks knocking clank clank.
"Damn! How come it became like this for me? The format’s all wrong! Isn’t it supposed to be a god? Toast! Why aren’t we toasting! What do you mean by directly starting to eat, Lin Li! Show me some respect!"
Bai Bufan punched Lin Li a few times angrily and roared.
Isn’t this also a kind of boomerang?
The three girls across, who planned to complain about starting to eat, were completely amused by the two’s banter.
Officially starting to eat, Qu Wanqiu’s main dish flavors weren’t bad, and what Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan led wasn’t hard to swallow either.
"Let’s try this once; otherwise, with this efficiency of preparing dinner taking an entire afternoon, we’ll spend the whole National Day cooking."
After acknowledging the taste, Chen Yu Ying sought everyone’s opinion.
Naturally, no one objected.
It was just for novelty, and for Qu Wanqiu, it didn’t even count as new.
At this point, Lin Li slightly bent down.
The five wasn’t eating on chairs, but sat on a ground covered with mats, with Lin Li’s target under the table being the feet.
Ding Sihan wore socks, Qu Wanqiu sat cross-legged, only Chen Yu Ying straightened her legs still under the table.
Fair and slender, her toes round and healthy, without any nail polish, the nails were a faint pink, her skin delicate and white, you could see the blue veins within.
Perhaps due to the owner’s joy, they slightly swayed left and right during the meal, revealing youthful vitality.
Bai Bufan was actually right; her tender feet had no calluses.

chapters.title: Chapter 229 - 191 Let’s Toast to Ourselves_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 229: Chapter 191 Let’s Toast to Ourselves_2
Lin Li took a deep breath and quietly reached out with both hands.
Three, two, one, half a second, four-tenths...
After counting down three seconds in ten seconds, at the moment when Chen Yu Ying wasn’t eating and wasn’t holding any bowls or chopsticks, Lin Li pressed down hard with his left hand, grabbed the girl’s ankle, and his right hand formed into a claw, starting a frenzy of tickling.
"Ah—" The startled girl first screamed in surprise and then instinctively hugged her thigh, trying to pull back, but found herself caught, and then that ticklish sensation began to spread from the soles of her feet throughout her body.
She couldn’t help but start laughing uncontrollably.
"What’s going on?" Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu beside her were both startled.
"Lin Li haha, what are you doing haha—" After confirming that the mischievous hand came from Lin Li, the initial panic and fright disappeared. Chen Yu Ying leaned back and lay on the mat, struggling and helplessly said.
The progress bar moved; although it didn’t rise quickly, it did move. Seeing this, Lin Li didn’t know how to evaluate the system’s grooves.
——Grooves don’t count as evaluations; they’re fixed expressions.
"Class leader, these days those who are barefoot aren’t afraid of the shod, but are afraid of ones like Bai Bufan who have a mouth and ones like me who have hands." Lin Li continued with his right hand without stopping, explaining as he went.
"No way, what do you mean by ’ones like Bai Bufan who have a mouth’? You’re insulting me like this, you’d better wait for a lawyer’s warning!" Bai Bufan, who didn’t expect to be involved in this, retorted, eyes wide.
"You foot fetishists are really dishonest." Lin Li shook his head disdainfully.
"Don’t speak so loudly about preferences!
Also, I only like 2D feet. In reality, I only like those that Sister Yu has after finishing a day’s farm work, sitting on the kang and taking off the black sweaty socks, revealing size 45 stinky sweaty feet. You know, family, women, as they get older, have more charm, just like fine aged wine, that captivating fragrance." Bai Bufan whispered in Lin Li’s ear.
Lin Li: "..."
Damn you.
Even Bai Bufan knew these words were inappropriate for girls, so he only whispered to disgust himself.
"You’d be niche on a small website." Lin Li also commented back.
"Lin Li, stop tickling." Chen Yu Ying gasped, chiding.
Lin Li ceased his actions, letting go.
If tickled for too long, it becomes a punishment. The task is best completed with three people simultaneously, in small amounts, and multiple times.
Finally pulling back her leg, Chen Yu Ying took several deep breaths, sat up, rubbed the tears from laughing at the corner of her eyes, and then tilted her head, glaring straight and fiercely at Lin Li.
Not happy!
Lin Li and Bai Bufan knocked their heads three times in apology.
——Of course, this had nothing to do with Bai Bufan; he was purely forced by the hand at the back of his head to knock.
"Class leader, sorry, couldn’t help myself, animal instincts kicked in." Lin Li’s face was full of remorse and guilt, his voice even carried a sob.
"Bad pervert..." She muttered softly, seemingly aware that her glaring wasn’t really intimidating, Chen Yu Ying snorted and said, "Go wash your hands and eat properly."
Her legs resolutely crossed.
The scene seemed a bit silent.
"Do we really have to wash hands before eating?" Lin Li’s murmur suddenly seemed distinct.
The room burst into laughter, Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu started urging Lin Li to eat with his hands, while Chen Yu Ying, blushing, crumpled a milk tea straw wrapper and threw it at Lin Li.
After washing his hands and returning, the first thing Lin Li did was look under the table.
All crossed.
So Lin Li’s undisguised disappointment was discovered and mocked again.
"My feet aren’t ticklish, Lin Li, why don’t you try?" Only Bai Bufan wasn’t dismissive of Lin Li.
"I’m eating, don’t talk about disgusting topics." Lin Li looked disdainful.
"Can you be any more blatant in your favoritism?"
...
The food on the table was mostly finished — due to concerns about wasting if it tasted bad and having lots of snacks as backup, the portions were small, planned to barely fill everyone.
"Alright, the main course is over, now it’s the dessert everyone has been waiting for, right?" Lin Li stood up, full of anticipation.
Of course, he was the only one who looked forward to it.
Lin Li briefly left and then brought back a porcelain bowl filled with fruits coated in syrup.
Lin Li placed it on the table, everyone glanced at it, and the syrup had the dark brown hue beloved by Michelin three-star chefs.
Though not charcoal, it didn’t stop everyone from showing a cautious expression.
"It’s really edible, there’s no problem, Qu Wanqiu, at tonight’s dinner I ate the most, I returned kindness for yours — you at least have to show some face?" Lin Li attempted to prove himself, first looking at Qu Wanqiu.
"Lin Li, you eating my dinner is enough, and now you want my life? Do all good things go to you? No way!" Having learned her lesson from the charcoal, Qu Wanqiu firmly refused.
Charcoal can be played with, but not eaten.
Lin Li sighed, his right hand pressed on Bai Bufan, who was slowly trying to sneak out.
"Bufan."
Bai Bufan sighed, picked up a candied strawberry, bit off a piece with his molars, and began chewing.
Before swallowing, he convulsed and fell to the floor, extending a trembling finger at Lin Li: "Help... call... ambulance..."
Then his neck crooked, eyes rolled back, and he died.
"Ambulance! Ambulance! Ambulance!" Lin Li immediately shouted loudly.
Bai Bufan: "?"
Is that how you call it?
Revived by anger, Bai Bufan again raised a trembling hand at Lin Li, "Quick, call 120..."
"Got it! Right! Bufan! What’s the number for 120?" Lin Li pulled out his phone and asked.
The dead Bai Bufan gave the middle finger.
Finally, Ding Sihan showed kindness.
Truth be told, her tomato scrambled eggs were a bit too salty, and she admitted it herself.
But just now Lin Li managed to complain while eating all the tomato scrambled eggs.
The dish led by Chen Yu Ying was the same, except Lin Li complained two sentences less than hers.
Though after eating, the jerk pretended to gag and repeatedly expressed disdain, Ding Sihan was still quite moved.
So with a resolve to face certain death, Ding Sihan reached out and took one.
"It’s not really bad," under Lin Li’s expectant gaze, after taking a bite, chewing, swallowing, Ding Sihan shook her head and commented.
Lin Li was already satisfied, cheering as if he’d won the bid for the Olympics.
"Winwinwin!"
"But it’s not good either, probably somewhere between good and awful, it’s really hard to eat." Ding Sihan finished her sentence.
Unlike Lin Li and Bai Bufan, who when eating something bad immediately thought to share, Ding Sihan didn’t plan to lie.
The cheering abruptly stopped.
Lin Li: "..."
It turns out it’s really hard to eat?
Lin Li picked one up and put it in his mouth; the syrup indeed wasn’t cooked well.
Mmm.
Slightly bitter.
A whole lot of slightly.

chapters.title: Chapter 230 - 192: Can it be stolen? Lin Li got a famous blade, Si Ming!
chapters.content:
Chapter 230: Chapter 192: Can it be stolen? Lin Li got a famous blade, Si Ming!
Although in Tokyo University, the best compliment for a good dessert is that it’s not sweet, but it shouldn’t be bitter either.
Lin Li kind of misses Bao Wei.
Without Bao Wei, he could only throw it in the trash can.
Fortunately, he didn’t make much.
He stepped on the trash can pedal, the lid opened, and Lin Li threw the garbage inside.
After a brief silence by the trash can, Lin Li jogged back to the table, saying to Bai Bufan, "Bufan, put your foot out."
"I’m really not afraid of tickling." Bai Bufan bravely extended his foot.
Lin Li stretched out a leg and stepped on it.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"What are you doing? Rewarding me?"
Chen, Ding, Qu: "?"
Lin Li started to use force.
"Holy crap! What are you doing?!" Bai Bufan, feeling some pain, retracted his foot and demanded an answer.
"The more I think about it, the scarier it is. I’ve discovered that if you step hard on a human’s foot, they’ll open their mouth, and how wide depends on how hard you step. I might have found a secret: humans possibly evolved from trash cans."
Lin Li covered his mouth, his voice both horrified and frantic.
The three girls seemed to be pondering.
Bai Bufan: "..."
You damn...
"Lin Li, that time when you had a fever during the heavy rain as a kid, when your mom took you to the hospital, did she go to the wrong place? Did she end up at the pet hospital?" Bai Bufan sincerely asked.
Lin Li: "..."
Such aggression, to think this incident left a notable mark in Lin Li’s elementary school essay history.
He actually wanted to use it again in high school, but it wouldn’t score well.
"You’ve hurt my insecure, sensitive, and fragile self." Lin Li said with his head down, "Thankfully, I have toenail fungus."
"What’s the advantage of toenail fungus... Huh? Damn you!!" Bai Bufan looked at the feet rubbing against each other and shouted before huddling toward the bathroom, clutching his foot.
"Just kidding, my feet are fair and tender with no disease. I even trimmed my nails specially yesterday." Lin Li explained to the girls after Bai Bufan rolled away with relief.
"Who calls their own feet ’fair feet’?" Ding Sihan found it inexplicably amusing.
Lin Li was about to respond when he saw the system notification.
[Task three complete]
[Do you want to use "Random Reward Double Card (3/3)"?]
[You have chosen to use it.]
[You have received the reward: Physical Improvement: Insight increase by 20%; Divine Sense enhancement by 200%; Random Artifact*1.]
A refreshing sensation deep inside, like skating on clouds.
The reward doubled for Divine Sense, from 100% to 200%.
Not too bad a doubling; using the "Duck Blood Bottle" from the [Warehouse] definitely won’t be so strenuous now, emotions won’t deplete before finishing oneself.
"The monthly exam rankings are out, by the way." Qu Wanqiu, looking at her phone, said, "Xue Jian posted them in the class group."
"Ding Sihan, don’t look at your phone just yet. Want to make a bet with me?" Lin Li looked at Ding Sihan, who was reaching for her phone, stopping and enticing her.
"Huh? Bet on what?" Ding Sihan asked, a bit puzzled.
"Bet whether I made it into the top hundred of the grade! The stake is..." Lin Li was ready to make this sure-win bet.
"No bet." But before Lin Li could finish, Ding Sihan declined uninterestedly, "Every subject teacher praised you for your great improvement. You definitely made it."
Darn it, dumb Ding Sihan got smarter.
Lin Li sat cross-legged and took out his phone too.
Perhaps to protect students’ self-esteem, the list Xue Jian posted only had rankings without specific subject scores. Lin Li not only made it into the top hundred—he wasn’t even on the edge—with a total score of 1052 across ten subjects, ranking fourth in the class and 51st in the grade.
Almost made it into the top fifty.
Thankfully, it’s only freshman year; the difficulty for a comeback is indeed not high.
Chen Yu Ying ranked sixth in the grade, and ahead of her were those little geniuses from the first, second, and third competition classes.
Lin Li advanced nearly 400 places—a breakthrough star surely, and he wasn’t the only one in class four who made it on that list. This time, Bai Bufan, ranked 272 in the grade and also advanced over 150 places, was included as well.
Lin Li checked the artifact.
[You have acquired the artifact "Substitute Jade-faced Buddha"]
[Substitute Jade-faced Buddha: After refining, automatically triggers upon the owner’s death-inducing injury, swallowing the damage and protecting the owner for 3-60 seconds, and returns the previously input Qi Blood and spirit to the owner.
Once triggered, it is completely destroyed and disappears.]
Lin Li widened his eyes.
Whoa, a Blade of Divine Fate!
In his life, Han Xin had two benefactors, one named Xiao He, the other Meng Lei.
The value of this artifact is almost absurdly high.
If in the Cultivation Realm, Lin Li’s "Duck Blood Bottle" in his hand was exposed, cultivators might scoff at it, even see it as a toy—after all, there are many things to resist such artifacts, many cultivators are not affected at all.
But this "Substitute Jade-faced Buddha" is definitely considered a BUG-level artifact, surely capable of inciting chaos.
Lin Li really needs such a backup artifact now.
Though it’s rarely needed in modern times, the problem is that Lin Li has a beautiful lady waiting for him to take her hand.
The artifact can provide at least ’three seconds’ of protection at ’death’, which is enough time for Lin Li to click ’return’.
It’s like getting an extra life.
Upon seeing this artifact, he instantly felt that the hard study in September was worthwhile.
Lin Li was in a great mood, even humming a familiar tune, though he himself didn’t know exactly what it was.
"Lin Li: How invincible—how lonely—@Wang Yuezhi"
Lin Li hadn’t forgotten his agreement with Wang Yuezhi.

chapters.title: Chapter 231 - 192: Can It Be Stolen? Lin Li Released a Famous Knife Called Siming!_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 231: Chapter 192: Can It Be Stolen? Lin Li Released a Famous Knife Called Siming!_2
However, after a while, Wang Yuezhi still didn’t reply in the group chat, perhaps busy with romance. Lin Li put himself in Wang Yuezhi’s shoes and was willing to understand the cold shoulder.
"You’re such a bad guy." Ding Sihan, knowing the inside story, pointed at Lin Li.
"Bai Bufan: How invincible—how lonely—@Zhou Baowei"
Bai Bufan was already back sitting next to him, and he wasn’t a good character either.
"Zhou Baowei: ?"
If it weren’t the class group chat with a teacher, Bao Wei might have replied with a few rude words.
"Lin Li, I also lost the bet." Chen Yu Ying hadn’t forgotten the lunchtime playful agreement she made with Lin Li, with the stake being a reasonable request the other would accept.
"I want to tickle your feet, class president." Lin Li answered without a hint of hesitation.
Heartfelt intention.
No choice, the current task seemed to be either a massage or tickling.
Lin Li didn’t know how to massage, and it didn’t count as contact through clothes, so it was unlikely, at most a backup plan.
The first choice was tickling.
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
"Ah?" Chen Yu Ying tilted her phone left, but her head tilted right, looking at Lin Li, filled with confusion.
Lin Li met Chen Yu Ying’s gaze with sincere eyes and confirmed again: "Class president, please let me fully tickle your feet!"
Xiaoding and Xiaoqu were also slightly puzzled.
Did Lin Li have such a fetish?
Why wasn’t it noticeable before?
"Why?" Chen Yu Ying asked.
"Because class president, I want to see you laugh. When you laugh, my world brightens up." Lin Li suddenly spoke sincerely, his voice emotional, "Your smile is the sun."
Loyalty! Earnestness!
Lin Li came from Dandong, craving light-axis dishes.
"Oh oh—" Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu cheered immediately.
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
She was supposed to be shy.
But now she really couldn’t be.
Why could Lin Li, that naughty weirdo, transform affectionate words into cheeky banter? Cheeky banter is cheeky banter!
Who taught you that the way to make a girl laugh is to tickle her feet! You deserve a beating!
"No way, too much, I don’t want to laugh, let your world stay dark." Chen Yu Ying hugged her knees and curled up, her head shaking like a rattle, weak, pitiful, and helpless.
"Is it too much?" Lin Li looked at Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu.
A father knows his daughters well, and the devoted two daughters firmly shook their heads: "Not too much! Support! We also want to see Ying Bao laugh!"
So Lin Li turned back to Chen Yu Ying, his gaze not honest but indeed very enthusiastic.
"Not fully, who knows when you’d stop, you naughty weirdo." Chen Yu Ying still refused but had already given in.
"This can be discussed! We can negotiate the tickling time." Lin Li said immediately, "How about ten minutes?"
"No, at most five minutes." Chen Yu Ying shook her head.
"Deal!" Lin Li answered immediately.
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
Boo hoo! She spoke too hastily!
"Three minutes!" She quickly said.
Lin Li turned his head and whistled, pretending not to hear.
"Class president, extend your leg!" Lin Li rubbed his ten fingers, grinning wickedly.
Chen Yu Ying’s lips pressed tightly against her teeth shining brightly, she hummed, then sighed, and slowly moved one leg towards Lin Li.
"Lin Li, let me find a feather for you!" Ding Sihan got up excitedly.
"No need, if I don’t use my hands but a feather, wouldn’t I waste this opportunity?" Lin Li waved his hand, honestly speaking.
"Oh oh, accidentally forgot you’re an all-out weirdo, sorry." Ding Sihan nodded and sat back down.
"Class president, it’s going to start."
Lin Li’s hand again clasped Chen Yu Ying’s ankle, smiling evilly.
Perhaps the last time was too sudden, so there was no immediate reaction to the ankle being grabbed, but this time she voluntarily extended her leg. Besides, the ankle is quite a private part, and Chen Yu Ying felt a burning sensation at the spot being touched.
Feeling a bit regretful.
"Hmm." Chen Yu Ying’s voice seemed a bit clingy and she didn’t look at Lin Li.
"Here we go~"
Lin Li started tickling Chen Yu Ying’s sole.
Since she was mentally prepared, Chen Yu Ying initially managed to cover her mouth, preventing sounds from escaping, but those who are ticklish know that’s almost impossible. Soon she "hahed" out loud.
Time gradually passed.
"Lin Li, I can’t stand it, I can’t stand it~"
"Class president, not even a minute has passed, can’t stand it but will stand it!"
"No, too ticklish, be gentle~"
"Being gentle makes it more ticklish, like now?"
"Haha~ then focus more on it..."
"..."
On the side, Bai Bufan, having a heated online argument with Zhou Baowei, listened to this kind of sounds, lifted his head in shock:
"This is damn obscene, right?"
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu exchanged glances, their expressions equally strange, especially when Chen Yu Ying couldn’t laugh anymore and couldn’t speak, her voice was extremely tender and bashful.
Ding Sihan suddenly closed her eyes, then aunt-smiled and remarked softly: "Now the sound and image are synchronized."
Now it’s—imagination! time!
Qu Wanqiu blinked, suspecting Ding Sihan was thinking unapproved thoughts.
"But this sound is truly... Overall... Imaginative." Qu Wanqiu shook her head with a smile, undeniable.
Bai Bufan glanced up at Qu Wanqiu again, realizing it wasn’t his Feifei, he lowered his head and continued arguing.
"Thankfully Ying Bao turned off the monitor, I can’t imagine what her uncle would think hearing these sounds." Ding Sihan opened her eyes, saying amusingly.
"Boom—!!"
"What are you doing?"
The sudden loud sound startled all five present.
The five looked towards the sound origin at the door, where the slightly red-faced Chen Zhongping stood, eyes wide open.
"Just a bet’s penalty."
In the quiet atmosphere, only Lin Li quickly recovered, answering honestly.
Chen Zhongping glanced at the five properly dressed individuals, the boys on one side, the girls on the other, except for the foot part, the distance seemed safe, he relaxed a little and nodded.
Reason told Chen Zhongping, who heard the sounds just now, that it must not be what he feared, after all, there was the low talking and laughter of others, and he had basic trust in his daughter.
But the problem is, fathers don’t need reason at this time.
Not confirming with a glance is impossible for peace of mind.
"Oh, it was the bet’s penalty, haha, I thought it was the bet’s penalty.
No problem, keep playing, but for penalties requiring physical contact, girls should do it to girls, boys to boys, keep some distance. Of course, since you’re good friends, it’s just a suggestion."
Chen Zhongping’s speech sped up, especially when Chen Yu Ying got up with a stern Xiaohai face.
"I’ve placed the things on the entrance’s umbrella rack, I’m leaving now."
He turned and departed.

chapters.title: Chapter 232 - 193: You’re Next!
chapters.content:
Chapter 232: Chapter 193: You’re Next!
There were only four people in the room, Lin, Bai, Ding, and Qu, while outside the room someone was giving a lecture.
But it wasn’t Chen Zhongping lecturing Chen Yu Ying; from the tone of the voice, it seemed like Chen Yu Ying was lecturing Chen Zhongping.
Looks like Chen Zhongping doesn’t have a high status at home.
Sure enough, a few minutes passed, and only Chen Yu Ying returned, still a bit miffed.
"My dad saw the weather forecast and said it might rain, so he came to bring us umbrellas. He has a spare key for the guesthouse, so he just let himself in.
Actually, he sent me a message saying he was at the door, but I didn’t notice. Plus, he really wanted to sneak a peek at what we were doing, so he just came in. Now he’s gone back, and he won’t do it again next time. He’ll definitely let us know first. Sorry for scaring everyone."
Chen Yu Ying stuck out her tongue and apologized.
"No big deal, I understand completely. I feel like I’ve dodged a bullet." Lin Li nodded in deep understanding.
Lin Li almost felt like he needed to apologize again; luckily, Chen Zhongping only glanced at him a few times and didn’t corner him for a ’private chat’.
No one really said anything about it.
Chen Yu Ying let out a long sigh of relief.
"There’s more." Chen Yu Ying continued with a mischievous glint in her eye, "The five minutes are up."
Lin Li: "?"
"I can’t understand this! Shouldn’t it have been paused?"
"There was no pause. You just didn’t scratch, but the five minutes are definitely over, so you can’t scratch anymore."
"Huh? Class Leader, do you hear yourself? How could I scratch? Was I supposed to squat on the ground and scratch your feet while you were talking with your dad?
If Uncle had seen that, I’d admire him if he could hold back from kicking me!" Lin Li said with wide eyes.
Wouldn’t I be kicked like a ball?
If I became a football, Chen Zhongping might really surpass the national team.
Perhaps Lin Li’s description was so vivid, everyone burst into laughter.
"So cool, I want to kick too." Especially Bai Bufan, who, after imagining the scene, couldn’t wait to join in.
"Doesn’t matter, over is over." Chen Yu Ying crossed her arms in front of her resolutely.
"Damn, you actually cheated." Lin Li shook his head in distress but didn’t insist further.
He had scratched for a few minutes just now, but the task bar still had at least 60 to 70% remaining, so even using all the remaining time, it would be impossible to complete.
Moreover, with the recent interruptions, Chen Yu Ying probably didn’t want to be scratched any longer.
He would figure out the rest later.
Lin Li got up and looked at the chaos on the dining table and in the kitchen. It was time to clean up.
They still didn’t know how many days they’d stay, and with no maid to clean daily, they had to rely on themselves.
"What are we doing tomorrow? Since we’re in Shanting... Oh right, Ding Sihan, do you like playing in the water?" Lin Li asked Ding Sihan.
"Playing in the water? Sure."
Although Shanting’s beach wasn’t the typical hotel beachfront, walking around and collecting some small shells was still fun, so Ding Sihan nodded.
"OK, then you’re assigned to wash the dishes." Lin Li snapped his fingers.
Ding Sihan: "..."
Seriously?
This was Lin Li hiding the dagger in the Yan Kingdom map. He wasn’t interested in tomorrow’s plans; he was after these vinegar-flavored dumplings!
"That’s not the water I want to play with..." Ding Sihan said forlornly.
"Alright, let’s all clean up together." Chen Yu Ying said with a smile, standing up.
The girls washed the dishes, while Lin Li and Bai Bufan took charge of cleaning the cookware, especially Lin Li’s pot, which had turned black.
"What did you use to scrub it? How is it so clean?" Bai Bufan asked in confusion, comparing his and Lin Li’s results.
"I used elbow grease." Lin Li looked at Bai Bufan with an expression indicating he was stating the obvious.
Bai Bufan: "..."
No comeback for that, indeed.
...
After everything was cleaned up, the five reconvened at the dining table to discuss plans for the next day.
No one felt the need to get up early in the morning; sleep in if they wanted to, and breakfast was optional.
Just need to be awake before heading out for lunch.
Chen Yu Ying probably wouldn’t sleep in too late, so Lin Li planned to teach her how to ride a bike in the morning. As for where to get a bicycle, Lin Li saw a functioning one in the basement storage room, which could be used after a morning cleaning.
As for the afternoon, perhaps Lin Li’s earlier suggestion had some influence; they all agreed to check out the seaside at Shanting.
"Start the board game session?" After roughly planning the next day, Lin Li suggested.
Despite having a slow dinner, it was still only seven in the evening, too early for everyone to part ways and sleep.
"Sure." Everyone was fine with the idea.
The guesthouse had many board games, but in the end, they opted for the universally fun Monopoly.
Apologies to Three Kingdoms Kill; the environment just doesn’t allow me to choose you. Lin Li sincerely apologized to Three Kingdoms Kill in front of the board game shelf.
Can’t steam it.
"OK, first let’s decide what the punishment for losing will be?" As he spread the Monopoly board across the dining table, Lin Li spoke up.
"I’ll start. If I become the Monopoly magnate, I want to tickle the three of you!" Lin Li pointed to the three girls opposite him.
Chen Yu Ying didn’t react much, but Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu were surprised and pointed at themselves: "Us too?"
"Why do we have to be tickled too?" They genuinely wondered.
"Because of Xiaodingding and Little Qiuqiu, I want to see you laugh. When you laugh, my world lights up." Lin Li suddenly spoke earnestly, his voice filled with emotion, "Your laughter is like a 60-watt light bulb."
Chen Yu Ying closed her eyes helplessly, as if she couldn’t bear to watch.
Ding Sihan, Qu Wanqiu: "..."
Grass.
"Why is it that when it’s our turn, it’s just a 60-watt lightbulb instead of the sun?" Ding Sihan took a deep breath, apparently focusing on the wrong point.
Lin Li was very reasonable: "Hou Yi would get angry, Kua Fu would lose his way, you guys shouldn’t be so selfish."
Ding Sihan: "..."
It made some sense, but not much.
"Why are you only tickling their feet? What about me?" Bai Bufan asked.
"I’ll order you to do a hundred squats." Lin Li replied.
Bai Bufan: "?"
Now when it’s my turn, it changes, huh?
"Don’t you want to see me smile? I don’t need to be the sun, nor a 30-watt to use so much electricity; six watts is enough for me." Bai Bufan was disappointed, but tried to persuade Lin Li to change his mind.
"When you smile, my world becomes a mini world, so I don’t want to see you smile at all, I just want to see you dead." Lin Li just sneered.
Bai Bufan could only shake his head and sigh.
However, to Lin Li’s surprise, his proposal was actually approved.
...
"I’m sorry, sir, I don’t know what to do, I really can’t pay this rent."
"Oh, beautiful lady, have you considered another way to pay?"
"But I...still have a husband."
"I won’t let him know."
"Then...alright." Lin Li trembled as he reached out to unbutton his shirt, his face full of resigned determination.
"Yes, just like that." Bai Bufan grinned as he unbuckled his belt.
It was about to turn into a hilarious scene.
"You two are so sick, haha—who told you guys to play Monopoly like this, haha—"
On the other side, the three girls were already laughing hysterically.
Ding Sihan was pounding the table, Qu Wanqiu was hitting the floor, while Chen Yu Ying tapped Lin Li’s hand that was sneakily reaching for the bank to steal money amidst the chaos.
"No stealing money." Chen Yu Ying protected the bank, glancing at Lin Li with a smile.
"Ah, damn it! Stealing money! Borrowing money! I’m borrowing money, I’m borrowing one million more from the bank!" As his scheme failed, Lin Li said dejectedly.
"Lin Li, you’ve already borrowed seven million, one more million and you’ll be bankrupt," Ding Sihan said with a cheeky grin.
"Damn it, no wonder you agreed so readily, you were planning to trap me." Lin Li took a million from the bank, then paid the passage fee for this turn to Bai Bufan.
Among the five people present, he was the only one with negative assets.
Everyone was targeting him.
It’s one thing for the three girls to target him, but Bai Bufan had also joined their ranks, using all the chance cards against him.
He just wanted Bai Bufan to lose, but Bai Bufan wanted him to lose the game!
Lin Li looked down at his own feet, feeling utterly pitiful.
Sorry, bro, you might suffer tonight.
Blame Wu Min, if she’d helped me with three hundred thousand, maybe I could hold on a few more rounds.
It was Bai Bufan’s turn again, and only two pieces of land belonged to Lin Li, so this turn had nothing to do with him.
Bai Bufan paid Qu Wanqiu.
"Bu——"
Lin Li, who was drinking water, almost choked on that fart noise and then started laughing openly.
And the one Lin Li would laugh at without consideration was, naturally, only Bai Bufan.
The three girls across apparently respected Bai Bufan, just twitching their lips without laughing.
Fortunately, when you’re not eating something bad, a loud fart generally doesn’t smell bad.
With already thin skin in front of the girls, Bai Bufan blushed deeply, and after hurriedly paying the money, he looked at Lin Li: "It’s your turn."
Lin Li didn’t pick up the dice; he took a deep breath, brewing for a long time.
Then he apologized to Bai Bufan:
"Sorry, I can’t let it out."
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Pfft——" This challenge not to laugh was too hard, and the other side couldn’t hold it in any longer.
Lin Li is just too mischievous.
"Grass! Lin Li! Damn you!" Bai Bufan was slow to react, then angrily jumped up and started hitting and kicking Lin Li, bang bang bang, making Lin Li scamper away, covering his head.
"Everyone agreed to let it go, and you bring it up like this?"
"Hahahaha——" The three girls, already on the verge of laughter, couldn’t hold back anymore.
Bai Bufan was hitting with a sense of satisfaction.
The three girls laughed until they swayed like flowers.
Only Lin Li felt wronged: "But I really can’t let it out..."
Oh dear, when the time comes, farts are sorely missed, how sad.

chapters.title: Chapter 233 - 194: Bai Bufan at first glance is clearly an old ladybug
chapters.content:
Chapter 233: Chapter 194: Bai Bufan at first glance is clearly an old ladybug
The night was deep outside the hostel, and occasionally a frog croaked from the back mountain.
Inside the hostel.
"Bai! Bufan! Do you know why spiders only have eight legs? Because nine is too many! If you dare to offend me again, I’ll exterminate your entire clan! Get off me!"
Lin Li pounded on Bai Bufan who was sitting on his back, laughing, but his laughter was tragically pitiful.
"Stop tickling me, sis! I have paronychia! And nail fungus! Foot acne! I even have athlete’s foot!"
Bai Bufan suddenly turned his head to meet Lin Li’s eyes.
The glint in his eyes was mischievous, but he didn’t speak, especially with the girls around.
Lin Li: "?"
Wait a minute.
"Dammit." Lin Li realized and jokingly cursed, but because girls were present, he softly responded, "Just kidding, I don’t want to."
Satisfied, Bai Bufan turned back to continue his task.
"Stop, stop!! I was wrong! Uncle Chen, where are you? Save me! Shout for me! I love my life!" Lin Li continued with his ’task’.
"Which Uncle Chen are you talking about?" Bai Bufan chuckled scoldingly.
At this moment.
Bai Bufan was sitting on Lin Li, pinning down his legs, while Chen, Ding, and Qu each held a feather, tickling the soles of Lin Li’s feet.
"If you bet, you have to accept the loss. You made this rule yourself, don’t think of escaping!" Bai Bufan was the happiest.
Rules were rigid, and so was Lin Li.
"Ah haha—" Lin Li laughed weakly and intermittently, "It’s so itchy, my feet are killing me..."
"Stop talking weird," Chen Yu Ying’s amused voice chimed in.
"Oh."
Even a Cultivator cannot take on four people, Lin Li learned this lesson through blood and tears.
Monopoly is a capitalist’s game, not suitable for him. If he’d known, he would have played Three Kingdoms. Lin Li wanted to protect Dabaos’s smile.
A whole night, a whole night of being hunted and blocked by this group, he didn’t win a single round.
But in the punishment round, he excelled with a grand name.
No wonder they agreed to it so readily; they planned to watch him suffer from his own traps.
Yet, as a Cultivator, it was impossible for Bai Bufan to truly restrain Lin Li, and Lin Li was also cautious about accidentally kicking the girls, so his lower body didn’t make any movements beyond reflexively retracting from the tickles.
"Beep beep beep, beep beep beep."
The three-minute timer went off, and only then did everyone stop, slightly unsatisfied.
Lin Li collapsed on the floor, clothes in disarray, hair a mess, like an innocent young man who had been mistreated.
Even though he had been mistreated, Lin Li felt he had entered a Wise One mode.
"The world kissed me with pain, but I didn’t consent, isn’t this sexual harassment?" He asked.
No one paid attention to Lin Li’s self-reflection.
In fact, when they began to punish him, Lin Li had thought if their pleasure from tickling his feet could accelerate their task progress.
But they consistently used feathers as an intermediary, quite disdainful of Lin Li’s precious feet, even though Lin Li said it was fine and even invited them, they only thought it was Lin Li acting irrationally.
Bai Bufan got up from Lin Li’s body, took a one-yuan note from his pocket, tossed it onto Lin Li, pretending to smoke a cigarette with two fingers by his mouth, and said blandly, "Clean yourself up."
Lin Li: "?"
What?
You little...
That was pretty ruthless humiliation.
"Alright, thanks, bro." Lin Li first wiped the one-yuan note on his clothes, blew on it, and then put it in his pocket, struggling to get up and sit back in his seat.
"Up for more, Lin Li?" Ding Sihan knocked on the table and said with a smile.
"No more, no more," Lin Li shook his hand with a relieved smile, "If you guys continue, go ahead; I have to get up early tomorrow for exercise. It’s almost eleven now, I should wash up and prepare for sleep."
"Huh? Even during holidays, you work out and go to bed this early?" Ding Sihan asked in surprise, then shrugged, "If you’re not in, then let’s not play, it’s no fun without anyone to torment."
Lin Li: "..."
Ding Sihan, you’re really going overboard with your words.
"Let’s call it a night then," Chen Yu Ying clapped her hands lightly and said, "We still have makeup removal and skincare to do, and our room luggage is still not sorted."
Agreed, the five of them stood up, tidied the board games away, and stored them back in place. The girls headed up to the third floor.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan also returned to the second floor.
"I’m going to the gaming room for a while; you’re not coming, Lin Li?" Bai Bufan asked.
It didn’t make sense for Bai Bufan to go to bed so early.
"Yeah, I’m not going," Lin Li nodded.
"Alright, if you’re going to bed early, you take a shower first." Bai Bufan said.
"Okay."
The shower didn’t take long, and to avoid any possible indecent exposure, Lin Li came out of the bathroom fully dressed.
"We could hear your laughter from the stairwell, what were you laughing about?" Back on the second floor, Lin Li looked at Bai Bufan, who was rolling around on the floor, curious.
"I saw a brand-new Hell joke!"
"Tell me," Lin Li immediately switched to study mode.
No hard work, no abstraction.
"Didn’t a wildfire recently break out in Los Angeles? I saw a comment—
’Lao Mei lives up to its name, a grand gesture, burning Los Angeles at 4 a.m. to urge Lao Da to practice his game. We should also reflect on burning paper money. Tokyo University, slow down, wait for your people!’"
And so there was one more person rolling on the floor.
That’s hellishly good, it’s a relief Lin Li has no morals.
"You can go wash up," Lin Li suggested to Bai Bufan after laughing.
"OK."
"Why did you bring your own shower gel? There’s some in the bathroom," Lin Li asked curiously after seeing Bai Bufan pull out not only a change of clothes but also a small packet of shower gel from his suitcase.
"It’s not shower gel, it’s shampoo. I’m used to this brand. Last time during the autumn trip, I used the hotel’s shampoo, and it felt super itchy after. I couldn’t get used to it," Bai Bufan explained.
Some people do experience a sudden increase in dandruff or itchiness when they switch shampoos.
"What brand?" Lin Li inquired.
"霸王 (Bawang)."
Lin Li: "..."
"Pretty niche," Lin Li remarked.
"Niche? Jackie Chan won’t lie to me. After using this, my hair will be so silky and bouncy," Bai Bufan retorted.
"I have research on this. I once researched what shampoo men use in the shower by observing 100 men with random interviews. 98 of them responded with, ’How the hell did you get in here?’ Your Bawang, I’ve never heard of even once," Lin Li shook his index finger, presenting his supporting evidence.
Bai Bufan: "..."
"And what did the other two guys say?" But now, he was more curious about this.
"’Bro, I dropped my soap, can you pick it up for me?’"
Bai Bufan: "Damn."
"So did you pick it up?"
"Of course not. By the way, Bufan, do you use soap when bathing? I’ve got too much at home and can’t finish it. You could help me use some."
"No thanks, I’m good," Bai Bufan left satisfied.
"Remember to knock when you get back. I just started a new game and I’m about to make my first purchase six times," Lin Li said to Bai Bufan’s back.
Bai Bufan didn’t look back and responded with a middle finger.
A real man never looks back at incompetence.
As the sound of footsteps faded downstairs, Lin Li opened his backpack again and took out the "Spiritual Spring" wrapped in cling film.
Just like unfinished Spirit Stones can be returned to the [Warehouse], the "Spiritual Spring" that hasn’t been exhausted can also be retrieved by Lin Li at any time. But while in the [Warehouse], it’s effectively frozen, not generating any Spiritual Qi or Spiritual Liquid.
Leaving it at home is uncontrollable, and it might be wasted. Lin Li definitely decided to bring it along.
As for the "Duck Blood Bottle," it’s been restored and is already in the [Warehouse]. Lin Li calculated that the cooldown with the duck blood situation is about a week or so.
Upon arriving at the rental, the first thing was to materialize the "Spiritual Spring," toss in a few empty Spirit Stone shells, wrap them with cling film, and put them into the backpack.
Carrying the empty Spirit Stone shells is also quite simple.
The system doesn’t accept Spirit Stones without Spiritual Qi but as long as each shell stays at the "Spiritual Spring" bottom for two or three minutes and absorbs a bit of Spiritual Qi, transforming from ’empty shell’ to having a 0 to 0.01 change, it will be judged by the system as still useful, allowing it to return to the [Warehouse].
Lin Li’s [Warehouse] doesn’t have a slot limit.
After completing this replacement, Lin Li materialized the "Substitute Jade-faced Buddha."
A thumb-sized jade Buddha statue placard.
Refinement was unimaginably simple, unlike the "Duck Blood Bottle," which required several lower-tier Spirit Stones to complete refinement. "Substitute Jade-faced Buddha" was refined almost instantly when Lin Li attempted it.
The link was established, and more information about this magical artifact entered his mind.
The protection triggered is indeed invincible, with a 3-60 second judgment time, naturally depending on the strength of the attack encountered during the protection—stronger ones will be shorter.
After refining it, he can continue to ’refine,’ allowing it to devour his physical and mental energy. The purpose of this is that when the artifact breaks, it will fully feedback on him at that time, healing injuries and restoring energy.
This isn’t the Sword of Fate; it’s a Guardian Angel’s Plate!
It even restores health!
Several minutes later, Lin Li’s expression looked a bit fatigued.
The devour process isn’t 1 to 1; absorbing even one-tenth effectively would be nice. The devour process requires Spirit Stones to assist, which seems to be the main Spirit Stone consumption for this artifact.
But it’s not a major issue. The Spirit Stone scarcity has been barely resolved, and he has extra physical and mental energy daily, so he can take it slow.
Being tired even helps him sleep better.
After ensuring nothing was missed, Lin Li lay down.
[Team training, demons coveting, attempting a night assault. As the person with the most experience in demon-slaying, you should step forward to annihilate them!]
[Task Triggered!]
[Task Three: Eliminate the demons attempting to harm fellow disciples right now, three in total.]
[Rewards: Physical Improvement: Spiritual Qi absorption speed increases by 100%; System currency *50.]
Lin Li stood upright.

chapters.title: Chapter 234 - 195: Skincare Isn’t as Effective as Talking Nonsense
chapters.content:
Chapter 234: Chapter 195: Skincare Isn’t as Effective as Talking Nonsense
The reward is paltry, but the task is simple.
Lin Li looked up toward the building.
It probably has nothing to do with Bai Bufan.
Fellow disciples aren’t limited to Bai Bufan; both men and women can be called fellow disciples.
Besides, those monsters encountering Bai Bufan would likely be devoured by him with one bite; no need for me to solve it.
Lin Li walked toward the stairs, paused between the second and third floors, and said, "Moshi moshi."
"What’s up?" It seemed that the first to shower, Ding Sihan, already washed, with white skincare product on her face, peeked out a few seconds later, asking upon seeing Lin Li.
"What are you putting on? It’s pretty creepy late at night," Lin Li commented.
"Just a mud mask, for skincare. If you don’t take good care when you’re young, you’ll age quickly later. Girls work hard, you know?" Ding Sihan flipped him off.
"Well, my mom’s amazing. She hardly uses skincare products, yet she stays young," Lin Li shrugged.
"Does Auntie have any secrets? Can you tell me?" Ding Sihan gazed at Lin Li with sparkling eyes full of hope.
"Lying about her age," Lin Li replied.
Ding Sihan: "?"
Your mom.
No, wait.
Your damn mom.
"She always claims to be 28. I’m almost 18 now; if she’s telling the truth, my dad, if alive, would be about to face execution by now," Lin Li added.
Ding Sihan: "..."
Ding Sihan was speechless.
"Is there anything I shouldn’t see on the third floor right now? Can I go up?" Lin Li returned to the matter at hand, asking.
Not directly going up is basic respect.
Ding Sihan patted the white mud on her face, scanned the area, and shook her head, "No, come on up."
After receiving permission, Lin Li went upstairs.
Chen Yu Ying was using a curling iron to style her hair ends. Seeing Lin Li, she waved curiously yet sweetly.
Sounds came from the bathroom; Qu Wanqiu must be showering.
Lin Li first went to the bathroom door: "Little Qiuqiu, I’m outside the door now. If you’re coming out later, let me know in advance to scram because I don’t want to be held accountable."
"What’s wrong with you? Who needs you to be accountable!" The showerhead noise inside temporarily paused, and Qu Wanqiu scolded with a laugh after hearing Lin’s words.
"No accountability needed? Then open the door. I’ve prepared my lewd eyes already. Just listening to you shower is enough for me to eat three bowls of rice." Lin Li spoke unabashedly.
"Hahahahahahaha get lost!!"
Not only Qu Wanqiu, but also Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan burst out laughing upon hearing this description.
"I’ve got goosebumps, Lin Li. How do you say things like this? It doesn’t sound like acting," Ding Sihan raised her head to prevent her mud mask from cracking due to facial tremors, struggling to hold back laughter.
This was Azusawa Maita’s classic line; Lin Li wouldn’t dare claim the credit.
After solving the potential threat of Qu Wanqiu, Lin Li began exploring the third floor.
"So, what are you doing up here, Lin Li? It can’t be just... for entertainment, right?" Chen Yu Ying paused what she was doing, asking with playful curiosity.
Lin Li said seriously, "I’m hunting down a mosquito that flew up here. I have to kill it with my own hands."
Lin Li actually didn’t know if it was a mosquito; the system said it was a monster, cockroaches or flies probably count too, but mosquito is the most reasonable excuse.
Chen Yu Ying, Ding Sihan: "..."
"Well... good luck?" Chen Yu Ying responded with a strange expression.
Searching cluelessly would be difficult, but Lin Li is a Cultivator, with [Ear Divine Power], source’s ear, activate!
Everything around became clear instantly.
Lin Li heard it!
He suddenly looked up in surprise, "Ding Sihan, you said I was stably losing it!"
Ding Sihan: "?"
"You can hear that too?"
Ding Sihan looked at Lin Li in amazement; she had just sighed in resignation, speaking very softly.
"Haha, I can hear eight directions now. Qu Wanqiu is still singing ’I love bathing, I feel so good, ow ow ow ow’." Lin Li replied smugly with a laugh.
Then he slapped himself lightly, almost forgetting the task again.
Once more, he quieted down to start listening.
"Buzz——"
The mosquito dodged Lin Li’s hand.
But it couldn’t escape the electric arc now reaching nearly ten centimeters.
[Eliminate the demon currently attempting to harm fellow disciples three times (1/3)].
"Did you hit it?" Ding Sihan curiously leaned over to look.
"Didn’t hit it, got away," Lin Li shook his head. There are two more to deal with, more time needed.
"Useless thing."
Lin Li: "..."
Lin Li was preparing to continue searching around the third floor using eight-directional hearing when suddenly pulled over by Ding Sihan.
Ding Sihan hid behind Lin Li, pointed ahead, and said with some disgust, "Lin Li, there’s a bug, solve it. The window needs to be closed; too many bugs in this kind of place."
Lin Li followed her gaze, seeing in the corner two slender antennae gently swaying.
"How can you presume it’s a bug, it might be Lu Bu or a twin-tailed loli," Lin Li frowned.
"You’re really stably losing it." Ding Sihan spoke loudly this time, not needing [Ear Divine Power].
"Ding Sihan, do you have a newspaper?" Lin Li asked.
"Why do you need a newspaper? Who reads newspapers these days? Use a phone." Ding Sihan wondered and handed over her unlocked phone; newspapers are practically obsolete, who even reads them.
"That’s fine. But using a phone to swat bugs for the first time makes me a bit nervous." Lin Li took the phone, beginning to breathe deeply.
Ding Sihan: "?"
Just got interrupted, almost forgetting what Lin Li was doing!
"Wait! Wait! Don’t! I’ll find you something!" Ding Sihan quickly snatched her phone back from Lin Li, finally grabbing a takeaway hard shell packet, rolled into a stick, handing it to Lin Li: "Use this to smack it."
Lin Li moved the clutter away; it wasn’t a cockroach but a centipede.
Kind of cute, these kinds of bugs eat and leave, nothing to fear.
Though centipedes eat cockroaches, Lin Li didn’t hesitate at all.
Moreover, moving the clutter, Lin Li sharply noticed a small spider too.
"Smack!!"
[Eliminate the demon currently attempting to harm fellow disciples three times (2/3)]
[Exterminate the three demons currently attempting to harm fellow disciples (3/3).]
Thanks, and there’s even a buy one get one free. Your bugs aren’t half bad.
[Task three completed.]
[Would you like to use the "Random Reward Multiplier Card (3/3)"?]
[You have chosen to decline.]
[You have received rewards: Physical Improvement: Spiritual Qi absorption rate increased by 100%; System currency*50.]
This task’s rewards aren’t really worth doubling.
[Swift actions and skillful methods! In just a moment, the attacking demons were all slain, and fellow disciples look at you with admiration!
Unexpectedly realizing, the surroundings are a den of demons, teeming with demons, attacking incessantly.
The path of slaying demons and exterminating evil does not end here!]
[Timed task triggered!]
[Task three: Within twelve hours, slay thirty demons attempting to harm fellow disciples.]
[Reward: Title: Breath of the Demons; Physical Improvement: Spiritual Qi absorption rate increased by 100%; System currency*50.]
[Breath of the Demons: When equipped, greatly enhances perception of surrounding demons and reduces demons’ hostility towards you, even seeing you as a companion.]
Just like the mosquito-swatting task before, a simple task followed by a slightly more troublesome one, with the quantity multiplied by ten.
However, Lin Li roamed the third floor several times but neither saw nor heard any more.
Qu Wanqiu had also finished bathing, knowing Lin Li was outside; she dressed neatly, avoiding any mishaps when coming out.
Lin Li, whose extra energy was already absorbed by the "Substitute Jade-faced Buddha," was about to collapse from exhaustion due to the [Divine Power of Hearing].
Perhaps the previous task said three because there were indeed three on the third floor, and the task description did mention "currently."
Now, Ding Sihan had deliberately closed doors and windows, and turned on the bug repellents, making it impossible for new demons to invade and consequently, hard to find any more.
Unless you open the doors and windows yourself.
Wait a minute.
Thinking of this, Lin Li laughed.
He knew how to complete this task.
Bait and trap enforcement, that’s it.
But oh those girls went too far, lucky he brought Bai Bufan along.
Bai Bufan, it’s really nice having you.
"All cleared, you can all sleep peacefully now, I’m heading downstairs." With the solution in mind, Lin Li said, "Class rep, go to bed early; we have bike lessons tomorrow morning. Xiaoding, Xiaoqu, you two should hit the sack early too."
"I’ll try." Chen Yu Ying waved with a smile.
Ding Sihan, Qu Wanqiu: "?"
Something seemed off.
Back to the second floor, Bai Bufan had already finished showering and was drying his hair.
Once the hair dryer was put down, Bai Bufan admired himself in the mirror, holding the comb from the guesthouse, constantly brushing his hair.
"Come here, handsome guy, a kiss."
"Bai Bufan, you are so charming."
"Wow, so handsome~"
Lin Li: "..."
The footsteps were drowned by the sound of the hair dryer, unnoticed by him.
But understandable.
Girls before removing makeup, boys after showering, both consider those moments their peak in looks.
"Ahem." Lin Li spoke up.
"What the hell Lin Li, when did you come, sneaky like a fucking ghost, are you human?" Bai Bufan turned, visibly startled.
Lin Li smiled: "When you were French kissing yourself."
Upon hearing this, Bai Bufan also smiled, took out the hair dryer cord and wrapped it around his neck, then began to pull it to the sides.
Lin Li quickly moved forward to stop him, concerned: "Don’t do that, it’s bad for the hair dryer."
Bai Bufan: "..."
"Come on, dude, there’s nothing to be embarrassed about, it’s not like a girl saw it. Don’t worry, although I just recorded a video, I won’t post it in the group," Lin Li said, putting an arm around Bai Bufan’s shoulder, pulling him along.
Bai Bufan widened his eyes, seized Lin Li’s phone, checked it all over before finally breathing a sigh of relief.
"So why are we on the balcony?" Bai Bufan asked upon handing the phone back, realizing Lin Li had already dragged him out onto the balcony, where he changed into balcony slippers and listened to the external air conditioning unit’s humming with confusion.
"Suddenly not so sleepy, wanted to chat with my best bud," Lin Li said warmly, leaning against the balcony railing.
Bai Bufan turned to leave right away.
Luckily, Lin Li was quick-eyed and quick-handed, grabbing Bai Bufan back.
"Going where?"
"Lin Li, you insane or what?"
"Is chatting insane now? Bai Bufan, our relationship really has faded!" Lin Li was upset.
"Chatting is fine sure, but let’s chat inside? At this time, in this weather on the balcony, isn’t it nuts?" Bai Bufan responded, face full of bewilderment.
"Don’t you think a summer evening breeze, cicada chirping, starry sky scene is beautiful? Maybe tonight’s memory will be what you think of many years later, when you’re poor and cold lighting matches for warmth, selling them on the street in winter?"
Lin Li argued, reasonably.
"Never mind why years later I end up selling matches on the street poor as dirt, let’s first analyze the scenic elements you mentioned."
Bai Bufan laughed in disbelief, pointing to the sky: "Starry sky? It’s cloudy, you can’t even see the moon let alone stars."
Pointing at the air conditioner: "Evening breeze? All I feel is the artificial warm air."
Finally pointing to the hill outside the balcony: "Cicada chirping? Dude, it’s October, the cicadas are all dead, all I hear are mosquitoes buzzing!"
"What’s beautiful in your mother- "beep"?" Bai Bufan concluded.
Lin Li scratched his head.
He was indeed a bit speechless.
"Wait a minute, you mentioned mosquitoes buzzing?"
"Yeah, see, right here——"
"Smack!"
Lin Li moved swiftly, swiftly dealing with a mosquito flying beside Bai Bufan.
[Within twelve hours, slay thirty demons attempting to harm fellow disciples (1/30)]
"See that? See that!" Although Bai Bufan didn’t understand why Lin Li was so excited, he was more assertive: "This is the result of us staying outside, feeding mosquitoes, is this what you wanted to see! Huh? Tell me loudly, Lin Li!"
"Oh, it sure is, buddy, oh, it sure is." Lin Li smiled with satisfaction.
Bai Bufan: "?"

chapters.title: Chapter 235 - 196 Now that I’ve watched this, what do I watch during the Spring Festival Gala?
chapters.content:
Chapter 235: Chapter 196 Now that I’ve watched this, what do I watch during the Spring Festival Gala?
"Lin Li, when you usually help everybody pick up their packages and go into the courier station, does the owner look happy? After all, you’re the perfect kind of delivery guy."
Bai Bufan stared straight at Lin Li, his words harsh.
"Ah, right, right~"
Lin Li draped an arm over Bai Bufan’s shoulder, pulling him away from the balcony door and leaning against the railing, while he slapped the second mosquito dead with a smack.
Curse all you want, as long as you’re willing to keep feeding the mosquitoes, curse however you like.
After all, the mission requires an attempt to attack fellow sect members by demons, and excluding himself, wasn’t he left with only Bufan?
Remember, human rights are forever greater than animal rights. Bufan is man’s best friend, but just a friend!
Turn the balcony lights up high so that in addition to mosquitoes, other demons attracted by the light might just want to violate Bai Bufan, helping to speed up the mission’s completion.
"I want to go back and use the air conditioner! Not bro, we just showered, if we sweat, wouldn’t that be pointless? Let’s go home, bro, let’s go home." Bai Bufan was still struggling in Lin Li’s arms, insisting on going back.
"It’s already October, and the weather is gradually cooling down. It’s everyone’s responsibility to protect the environment; for every minute we don’t use the air conditioner, a polar bear gets more habitat, and more underwear can be sold by people at the South Pole! Could you be any less selfish?"
Lin Li decided to persuade Bai Bufan with positive energy.
"Polar bears have been using AC for tens of thousands of years; isn’t it finally my turn?" Bai Bufan retorted, confidently defending himself.
Lin Li: "..."
Indeed.
"Moreover, why are they preaching environmental protection to us commoners? Since childhood, I’ve heard ’no trade means no killing,’ but I’ve never even seen shark fins. Tell that to the big shots; if they fly private jets one less time, how much less emissions would there be?"
"Old folks won’t like hearing such talk."
"And Lin Li, do you know the most absurd thing?" Bai Bufan added.
"What?"
Bai Bufan laughed, but it looked more like he was angry, pointing at the air conditioning unit humming loudly:
"You just said that our purpose of not using air conditioning is to protect the environment, but for heaven’s sake, could you turn off the air conditioner first before talking about protecting the environment?
Our behavior of running the AC inside while standing outside is utter wastefulness, and should the polar bears drown because of people like you, they wouldn’t rest in peace."
"..."
Lin Li scratched his head.
Wow, quite true indeed.
"You’re right." Lin Li nodded, being a sensible person.
"Then hurry up and go back, this place is remote, and there are way too many bugs." Seeing that Lin Li was listening to reason, Bai Bufan nodded and shooed away the mosquitoes in front of them.
"Don’t move!" Lin Li’s sudden shout startled Bai Bufan.
"What? Is there something on me?"
"I’ll deal with all the bugs; just don’t move." Lin Li concentrated on exterminating the mosquitoes, having come prepared with tissues so as not to dirty his hands too much.
Luckily the place was remote, and it seemed this mission could be completed soon.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Why do I feel like... you brought me out here... just to watch me feed mosquitoes?" Bai Bufan questioned.
"How could that be? Why would I do something so silly?" Lin Li immediately waved his hand and extended his own: "I got bitten too."
