Lin Li naturally couldn’t wear the [Blood Crow Assassin] now, lest it include Bai Bufan in its range. So indeed, mosquitoes considered him a target too, and Lin Li had tried killing these mosquitoes, confirming they didn’t count towards the mission.
"Then why aren’t we going back?" Bai Bufan was more confused.
"We can’t go back." After finishing, Lin Li turned his head, eyes filled with wistfulness and a smile on his lips.
Bai Bufan looked back, surprised.
Inside the room was Ding Sihan, who first found the remote to turn off the air conditioner, then walked to the balcony door, gave them a "you fools" look, sighed, shook her head, locked the balcony door from the outside, nodded to Lin Li, and left.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"No! No!"
It was too late by the time Bai Bufan went to knock on the door.
"You called her?" Bai Bufan looked at Lin Li in disbelief.
"Yeah, you made a good point earlier; it’s wasteful to have the AC on while we’re outside, so I asked Ding Sihan to turn off our room’s AC." Lin Li nodded.
"Then why did she lock the door?"
"It’s tiring to keep holding onto you; this way, I can let you go and set you free." Lin Li released his grip, feeling relieved, "Great, now the door can’t be opened from this side."
"Haha, hahaha." When people reach the ultimate limit of speechlessness, they burst into laughter. Without a phone on him, Bai Bufan couldn’t even call Ding Sihan to come back.
Bai Bufan gave Lin Li a thumbs-up.
Then, not struggling, he leisurely leaned on the railing: "Let’s chat then, it’s true we haven’t really had a deep conversation, Lin Li, so where should we start?"
Resigned.
With the AC unit off, the balcony wasn’t as hot and noisy, as long as they didn’t sweat.
And indeed, they hadn’t really had a night chat with Lin Li.
"I don’t want to chat, I want to play on my phone, do whatever you like, nothing to chat about with you." Lin Li leaned against the short side of the balcony, began scrolling on his phone.
"?"
Bai Bufan, upon hearing this, turned his head, glaring at Lin Li.
— he didn’t bring his phone.
Bai Bufan said, word by word:

chapters.title: Chapter 236 - 196 Now that I’ve watched this, what do I watch during the Spring Festival Gala?_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 236: Chapter 196 Now that I’ve watched this, what do I watch during the Spring Festival Gala?_2
"Friendly reminder, Lin Li, my blood pressure is skyrocketing, consider yourself warned. I don’t know what overly extreme thing I might do next."
"So the blood pressure is currently in junior high? What school? How’s its grades? I have some connections in Xiling, I can help it get into a good high school." Lin Li immediately took on the demeanor of an elder, prying into every detail.
Bai Bufan: "?"
You motherfucker.
Sensing that his phone might take flight within three seconds, Lin Li smiled, tucked it back into his pocket, walked to Bai Bufan’s side, swatted away a few mosquitoes, and looked at the back mountain outside the balcony:
"Chat! Let’s chat! What else can we talk about? Life, dreams, love."
Bai Bufan cracked his knuckles: "My life is eating, sleeping, and jerking off. My love is jerking off. My dream is that I could also jerk off during the time for eating and sleeping. Alright, I’m done, now it’s your turn, Lin Li."
Lin Li: "..."
What a speedy version.
"You truly have an insightful mind." Lin Li gave a thumbs up and casually squashed a moth.
Animals that can think with their lower body all have insightful minds.
"Since you came over yourself, Lin Li, let me ask you, what’s the deal between you and the class monitor? Don’t give me that money-for-breakfast business you mentioned before, I don’t buy it."
Bai Bufan looked up at the third floor, then lowered his voice a bit as he teased with his eyes.
Lin Li chuckled, looked up at the sky, and under Bai Bufan’s expectant gaze, spoke: "Wow, Bufan, look at that cloud, it looks like cotton candy."
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Your topic shifts are still at an elementary level, aren’t they? How did your language skills improve this time? Did you cheat or something?"
"Forget it, if you don’t want to talk, let’s just leave it. I get it, I never tell anyone about my ex either." Bai Bufan laughed, leaned over the railing, his flip-flop tip tapping the ground, looking a bit nostalgic.
Lin Li: "?"
When did this kid already betray his class?
"What the hell? You had an ex? Why didn’t you ever say anything, what happened?" Lin Li asked, shocked and curious.
"Because she doesn’t exist, I can’t say anything."
Lin Li: "..."
You motherfucker.
"If I had one, I would have said so already, I wouldn’t be like some people." Bai Bufan sneered, pointing at the sky, imitating someone’s tone just now:
"Wow, Lin Li, look at that cloud, it looks like a Lin Li who’s repeatedly executed with castration for not sincerely exchanging true feelings with his brother."
"You’re fucked."
"How am I repeatedly castrated, am I not the immortal bird or what?"
Amused by Bai Bufan’s backhanded comment, Lin Li waved his hand:
"For the past month, the relationship between the class monitor and me went from classmates to friends, and maybe just friends if I could brag more. Other than that, there’s nothing else. Most of our private contact involves me asking her questions, and she helps me out. So what you’re asking doesn’t exist, I have nothing to say."
"Really?"
Bai Bufan reached for Lin Li’s phone, and seeing Lin Li didn’t stop him, he swiftly scrolled through the chat logs between Lin Li and Chen Yu Ying, finding nothing indecent, he widened his eyes:
"So you’re using the class monitor as a study aid?"
"Indeed, I’m pretty utilitarian." Lin Li smiled and nodded.
Most of my behavior that seemed to ’forcefully get close’ in other boys’ eyes was actually tasks from the system.
The master really put me through a tough spot.
"Only utilitarian? I don’t believe you." Handing the phone back to Lin Li, Bai Bufan expressed his doubt, lowering his voice again: "No way, you’ve been moving so deliberately today, and you say it’s just utilitarian? The class monitor didn’t even get mad, I even feel like you two are a thing."
"Just being a jerk, after all, I’m a pervert, not thinking as far as you do." Lin Li tapped the railing with his fingertips.
"But habits should be verbal habits... Yet the class monitor didn’t scold you after, nor was she particularly upset."
Lin Li frowned slightly.
"Forget it, I don’t get it either, but I think when you say it’s just utilitarian, you’re fooling yourself." Bai Bufan shook his head, as a complete outsider, better not to instruct Lin Li, an amateur.
"No kidding, who wouldn’t like a good-looking, cute, and rich girl with a great personality? But liking someone and liking someone is different. I think I’m still the former, plus, even if it’s the kind that leads to something more, it has to be mutual. I’m not confident that the class monitor has the same feelings, she’s nice to everyone, just the other boys in the class aren’t as shameless as I am to try and play with her.
So no matter what, it’s best to keep things as they are, why seek discomfort. But now that you mention it, I realize I’m a bit too comfortable."
Looking towards the back mountain while swatting insects, Lin Li spoke slowly.
Bai Bufan looked at Lin Li, shook his head bewildered:
"Lin Li, what’s this inferiority complex of yours? I don’t know what you’ve been up to this past month, but the change is truly unbeatable. It’s incredible you managed to hold on. If I looked like you do now, I’d have caught an STD and died by now."
[During this team training session, you’ve earned the genuine recognition and praise from other team members (2/4).]
Lin Li: "..."
This compliment is quite something.
Even if personal image charm increased by 20%, accounting for changes brought by exercise, it shouldn’t be to the extent Bai Bufan described.
Yet is this really genuine recognition?
Bufan’s rose-colored glasses for his brother seem a bit too strong, but this progress on the small task was a pleasant surprise.
Wait a sec.
"I’m a light sleeper, if you come back from gaming to do something to me, you’re dead." Lin Li took a half step back, said cautiously.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Dumbass."
"But being cautious is good too, after all, besides me, you have no rivals in the class, there’s plenty of time." Bai Bufan nodded.
Lin Li: "Ugh—"
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Sorry, I just remembered your fart from last night and felt a bit nauseous, carry on, don’t mind me." Lin Li waved his hand to indicate he was fine.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"You’re hideously ugly, Lin Li."
"Hmm, see."
"You’re disgustingly gross, Lin Li."
"Hmm, again."
"May your confession end up like my friend’s last one."
"Hmm? Details please."
"I said I liked you. She said thank you."
"I said I really like you. She said I really thank you."
"I said I really, really like you. She said sorry, the recipient is no longer your friend, message failed to send."
"This friend of yours..."
"It’s not me, I’m telling you, it’s truly a friend."
"Alright."
"But, Bufan."
"Hmm?"
"Had I known your life was this entertaining, I’d have saved it for New Year’s Gala."
"I told you, it’s not me, it’s my friend."
"Hmm."
"Say ’hmm’ one more time and see what happens? I’m getting mad."
"Oh."
"No."
...
Once the conversation started, it flowed naturally, they chatted from the gossip Bai Bufan heard from fellow boarders to global affairs, ending up worrying about the nation and its people.
[Task three is complete.]
[Whether to...]
[You have chosen to forfeit.]
Completing this task was never difficult, it was finished halfway through the chat.
Continuing on was simply because they had more to talk about.
[You have received a reward: Title: Demon Breath; Physical Improvement: Spiritual Qi absorption speed increased by 100%; System Currency *50.]
Honestly, Lin Li was quite curious how things would turn out if the title were doubled, but he didn’t gamble on it.
Lin Li also tried out the title, it indeed allowed him to perceive these creatures like [Lightning Attractor], but perhaps being considered the same kind, wearing it made him feel these insects were approaching him, so Lin Li immediately took it off after testing, switching back to [Blood Crow Assassin].
"Damn, it’s almost midnight." Chatting until his throat was dry, Lin Li checked his phone and exclaimed in surprise.
Time to sleep.
"I’ll ask Ding Sihan to open the door, let’s head back."
"Alright." Bai Bufan nodded.
The night talk was pleasant, later it seemed all the mosquitoes disappeared for some reason, staying there felt really comfortable.
Lin Li typed on his phone.
Then he laughed.
"Bufan, Ding Sihan won’t come, she told us to sleep on the balcony."
Bai Bufan: "?"

chapters.title: Chapter 237 - 197: The Belated Love is More Trivial than Grass, But I Owe...
chapters.content:
Chapter 237: Chapter 197: The Belated Love is More Trivial than Grass, But I Owe...
Bai Bufan retracted his idea, staying outside was quite comfortable, but staying too long would become uncomfortable.
"Not too harsh, she said it’s okay, just kowtow three times, and she’d be willing to get out of bed." Lin Li said.
"Kneel then, I’ll record it for you, there’s gold under a man’s knees, now’s the time for it to pay off." Bai Bufan was immediately excited.
"She wants us to kowtow together." Lin Li added.
"Haha, a warrior may be slain but never humiliated! Once we kneel today, we’d be unable to stand for life, as men, we never kneel!" Bai Bufan said firmly.
"Shouldn’t have asked this unreliable guy, thankfully we still have the class monitor." Lin Li sighed, continuing to operate his phone.
"Indeed, thank goodness it’s the class monitor, we’re saved."
"Lin Li: Class monitor, could you come to the second floor and open the balcony door for me? Ding Sihan is really being bad."
"Chen Yu Ying: Asleep."
"Lin Li: Naughty, you replied to my message even while asleep."
"Chen Yu Ying: I meant your class monitor is asleep, sleeping soundly next to me."
Bu Hao! That’s impressive!
Bai Bufan, who was watching Lin Li chat from the side, had a mournful expression, gathered a few leaves from the balcony, and handed them to Lin Li: "Sad, Lin Li, eat more leafy greens, they’re good for your hair."
"Lin Li: ?"
"Lin Li: You can’t be—"
"Chen Yu Ying: Yes, it’s me, the really bad Ding Sihan."
Lin Li looked up and exchanged glances with Bai Bufan.
"No worries, I have a plan." Idea king Bai Bufan leaned over the railing again, took a look, and shook his head: "Damn, the second floor is so high, well, my plan’s off."
Lin Li: "?"
"You mean your plan is utterly useless."
Bai Bufan: "? Even this could work?"
Bai Bufan then sighed, looked downstairs, and felt somewhat nostalgic:
"Lin Li, did you ever jump off the podium during elementary school PE? It was less than two meters high, but for me, who was just one meter twenty-three back then, it was quite high, but I couldn’t resist jumping up and down, even if my feet went numb.
Back then, little me had big courage, but now I’m scared."
"Watch me."
A dark shadow fell with the words, as Lin Li leapt up from beside Bai Bufan, grabbing the railing and hanging outside the balcony backwards, he raised a brow at the stunned Bai Bufan.
"Huh?" Bai Bufan was stunned.
Lin Li laughed smugly: "Luckily, big me still has big courage."
He relaxed his body, kept vertical, then let go, falling, Lin Li hit the ground with a dull thud.
However, the ground was a lawn, as long as he didn’t sprain his ankle, even landing on his butt would only hurt for a few days at most.
And Lin Li landed safely, his feet only numb for a little while.
"Awesome." Bai Bufan gave a thumbs-up to Lin Li on the first floor, "I admit you’re a warrior."
Lin Li looked towards the task panel.
[...（2/4）]
To be honest, Bai Bufan praised him right after he jumped, which did serve the purpose of receiving praise.
The number didn’t change, but judging by Bufan’s expression, it seemed genuine.
So does this "4" mean that everyone must recognize it once, and you can’t gather points from the same person?
Let’s assume that for now, then there’s still Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying to go.
"Ding Sihan: What was that noise just now, did something happen." A message came in on the phone.
"Lin Li: Nothing much, my clothes just fell down."
"Ding Sihan: Why was the sound so loud just because your clothes fell?"
"Lin Li: Oh, because I was still in them."
"Ding Sihan: ??????"
"Ding Sihan: No?"
"Ding Sihan: Huh?"
"Ding Sihan: You jumped off the building? I was just joking! I’m already coming downstairs to open the door for you!"
"Lin Li: Haha, love that comes too late is as worthless as grass, I don’t need you anymore."
"Bufan, keep strong!" Lin Li shook his fist at Bai Bufan above.
"Unyielding!" Bai Bufan responded, then watched Lin Li leave.
Lin Li came back.
"There’s a problem." Lin Li started.
"What’s up?"
"I didn’t bring the inn’s key, I can’t get in through the front door." Lin Li smiled resignedly, resigned for real too.
Jumping like an idiot.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Could you think more when suggesting a plan?" Lin Li questioned.
"Well, Ding Sihan is coming to open the door for me, you work hard and stay strong, I’m off to play games, bye~" Hearing a sound behind him, Bai Bufan turned to look then waved to Lin Li.
"No, you stand right there, damn it!"
"Bye-bye!"
"You have withdrawn a message."
"Lin Li: Sister Ding, you’ve come down to the second floor, could you come down one more floor and open the front door, it’s urgent."
"But love that comes late is cheaper than grass," Ding Sihan leaned out from the second-floor balcony with a smile.
"Yet wealth does not bend, poverty does not change."
"Three kowtows on the second floor; six on the first, fair to all." Ding Sihan shook her head.
Lin Li: "..."
Grass.
"Did you just jump down from here?" Ding Sihan glanced at the height difference, curiously asked.
"Impressive, right? Not a scratch." Lin Li immediately ’reacted’.
"Oh, impressive," Ding Sihan nodded, though her expression said ’hard to judge’.
The system did not respond.
Looks like this kind of praise doesn’t count.
Fortunately, the elder Ding has a kind heart and didn’t make Lin Li kowtow, he went downstairs to open the door for him instead.
Since he hadn’t really sweated much, Lin Li went straight to his room, while Bai Bufan still went to the gaming room to play games.
After completing two tasks, the system currency was already at 190, enough to buy another set of "Lucky Charm" + "Random Quality Spirit Stone", but after thinking it over, since the accumulated system currency was already 1450, and the third product slot was about to be unlocked, Lin Li decided to save it for now, since he wasn’t really lacking Spirit Stone at the moment.
Lying on the big bed, Lin Li closed his eyes.
And the conversation with Bai Bufan began to replay.
...
"Beep beep beep — beep beep beep —"
"Bao Wei, turn off your annoying alarm clock!" Bai Bufan irritably covered his head with the blanket.
"Wait, no."
"Bao Wei isn’t here."
Bai Bufan sat up sharply: "Then whose Apple alarm is it?"
Bai Bufan and the newly-awakened Lin Li exchanged a look. Lin Li, while turning off his own alarm, spread his hands: "I dunno, maybe you miss Bao Wei so much you’re imagining things."
...
"Lin Li, wake up, why are you sleeping here?"
Feeling his arm being shaken, Lin Li opened his eyes.
Chen Yu Ying held a steaming cup of tea in her hands, the steam softly swirling around her face, making it seem a bit dreamlike and lovely.
Isn’t this much more pleasant than waking up to Bai Bufan’s face earlier this morning?
But Lin Li, being Lin Li, even though it was hard, still managed to step over Bai Bufan’s body to leave the room.
——By ’leave’ it means stepping over him to exit the room.
"Good morning, class rep, what time is it?" Lin Li shook his head to wake himself up.
"Eight thirty."
"I slept pretty late last night, and after exercising this morning, there wasn’t much to do, so I took a nap here." Lin Li finally answered Chen Yu Ying’s initial question.
"What happened last night, why did Sihan use my phone to send you those messages?" Placing the hot tea on the table, Chen Yu Ying was a bit curious and indeed a bit puzzled to see those when she woke up.
The puzzled look was also cute.
"What happened—oh? Class rep, want me to show you my jump from the building?" Lin Li suddenly suggested enthusiastically.
Maybe he could get complimented for it.
"Hmm?"
"..."
After learning what ’jump from the building’ meant from Lin Li, Chen Yu Ying not only shook her head firmly but also gave him a slightly reproachful look:
"That’s too dangerous, you know Sihan was joking, if you jump like that, no matter how skilled you are, you might get hurt, don’t jump like that."
Looks like no luck.
Instead of being praised, he should just be grateful for not being scolded.
"Next time for sure."
"Let it be this time for sure," Chen Yu Ying stared at Lin Li.
"This time for sure then." Lin Li had no stance, smiled and nodded, then got up and stretched before asking, "Class rep, do you want to have breakfast?"
Yawning and stretching are contagious too. Seeing Lin Li’s actions, Chen Yu Ying also raised her arms, her fine curves showed.
So comfortable.
The only one who could outshine today’s Chen Yu Ying would be tomorrow’s Chen Yu Ying.
"I just placed an order for delivery, it’s almost here, and I was asking if you wanted any, but you didn’t reply," she said.
"What a shame."
"Not a shame, you haven’t had breakfast yet? I’ll just order another one." Chen Yu Ying said, taking out her phone again.
"No need, no need, I’ve eaten, it’s not me who’s regretting, it’s you, class rep." Lin Li spoke a bit quickly.
"Hmm? Regret what?"
"Come with me and you’ll see."
Chen Yu Ying followed Lin Li to the door, and it wasn’t without reason Chen Zhongping came to deliver an umbrella, it must have rained for a bit last night, the ground was wet, but the weather was only cloudy now.
But this wasn’t what Lin Li wanted Chen Yu Ying to see, she found a scooter parked at the door compared to last night.
Lin Li took out a key from his pocket, with a dramatic gesture above his head, derder, the scooter was unlocked.
Lin Li looked at Chen Yu Ying and raised an eyebrow: "Class rep, now do you see what you should regret?"
"Lin Li, stealing a scooter is wrong." Chen Yu Ying said earnestly.
Lin Li: "?"
Class rep, you’re the one who’s wrong here?

chapters.title: Chapter 238 - 198: Wonderful, Lin Li Is Going to Become a Pillar
chapters.content:
Chapter 238: Chapter 198: Wonderful, Lin Li Is Going to Become a Pillar
Prejudice is a mountain impossible to transverse.
But Lin Li quickly noticed that Chen Yu Ying’s expression while saying this was teasing.
Turns out, it was intentional.
Then it’s okay. In that case, any mountain is just a piece of cake for Lin Li.
Rat poison can kill rats, so just feed the mountain some yam, and the mountain will behave.
If Yu Gong had had Lin Li’s intelligence back then, he wouldn’t have needed generations to move mountains. He was like an Old Deng with heirs, who didn’t need to worry about marrying and having kids, but what about future generations?
Yu Gong’s grandson, after hearing his grandfather’s vow, probably started apologizing to his younger brother, saying, "Sorry, bro, you’re probably gonna be stuck for life."
"It’s a pity that you obviously had the chance to have freshly made breakfast on-site, but now you can only have takeout. That’s not stealing a bike." But you still have to go through the motions, Lin Li shrugged helplessly.
"Is this bike rented, or did you buy it?" Chen Yu Ying leaned in closer, looked at the electric bike for a while, and curiously asked.
Today’s electric bike was much smaller and looked fresher compared to the delivery bike Lin Li used before, without the big thermal box at the back.
Riding it was much more comfortable, naturally a choice Lin Li made.
"I’m not Chen Yu Ying, of course it’s rented." Lin Li responded as if it were obvious.
Hearing her name from Lin Li instead of "class monitor" was still a novelty for Chen Yu Ying, causing her to blush inexplicably and give Lin Li a playful glare.
"Why rent an electric bike?" she asked.
"Aren’t we going out today? We can’t really ask uncle to take us, right? It wouldn’t feel right. Having an adult around means we can’t have as much fun, and even if we kept him waiting, it would be time-restricted. So, it’s not as good as taking a cab. But with five people, we’d need two cabs, isn’t that wasteful?
So after my morning workout, I went to a nearby electric bike shop and rented this electric bike. That way, we only need one cab, and with an extra transportation option, any small issue can be resolved differently."
Lin Li explained.
The core reason, actually, is that no matter how fluently Chen Yu Ying learns to ride a bicycle, the task won’t progress at all. Lin Li’s ultimate goal in teaching her is to have her learn the electric bike.
The electric bike is the real mecha.
But what he said was indeed a secondary reason.
"Seems like that,"
Although it didn’t feel particularly necessary, Lin Li had already rented it; what’s done is done. It’s meant to have fun when going out, and it’s a harmless matter. So, with a smile, Chen Yu Ying nodded her approval to Lin Li.
Lin Li felt very satisfied, his lips curving up.
They chatted at the doorway for a while, and in just a few minutes, the delivery person arrived with the breakfast Chen Yu Ying ordered.
After Lin Li took it, the two returned to the first floor of the homestay.
Chen Yu Ying leisurely ate her breakfast on the sofa, while Lin Li brought the bicycle, which he had already washed and tested in the morning, outside the homestay.
"Class monitor, did you bring socks that cover your ankles?" Lin Li asked upon returning, looking at Chen Yu Ying.
"I did, why?" Chen Yu Ying had brought both sandals near the entrance and a pair of sneakers.
"Give them to me for a moment." Lin Li snapped his fingers and held out his hand.
Three seconds later, Lin Li stared widened eyes, feeling hurt as he questioned Chen Yu Ying, "Why are you looking at me like that, class monitor? It’s hurting my feelings. I’ll modify them a bit and return them right away."
"Oh." She replied weakly, going up and down the stairs.
Soon, Lin Li wrapped an ’armband’ around the sock cuffs, taped them together simply, and handed them back.
"What’s this for?" she asked.
"I’m worried about your feet getting tangled in the bike pedals if you panic, and since the ankle and knee are the most vulnerable spots during a fall, having this double protection will save us some trouble," Lin Li explained.
Many people have scars on their ankles, mostly from getting caught while riding a bike.
"Oh, I see." Chen Yu Ying nodded.
Occasionally, Lin Li’s attentiveness is unfamiliar.
"Too bad neither of us brought stockings; otherwise, we could cover both your ankles and knees—two birds with one stone. It’s a pity." Lin Li sighed.
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
Familiar now.
"What could thin stockings possibly protect, and covering ankles and knees is only two wishes, right?" she questioned.
Lin Li gave her a condescending look and replied instantly, "Because the third wish is to see you wearing them, class monitor."
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
Now it’s unmistakably familiar.
"By the way, class monitor, even though I prefer black stockings, I’d accept white, yellow, green, pink, or purple as well." Lin Li continued his cheeky banter.
"I only have white ones; black ones are too embarrassing. Plus, I’m not wearing them for you. No color will change that." Lin Li was looking up at the ceiling, so despite the conversation topic, Chen Yu Ying didn’t feel uncomfortable.
When Lin Li’s words go too far, his behavior becomes unusually restrained.
That’s a ’good’ way to be cheeky.
Managing his cheeky remarks so as not to be genuinely disliked.
Taking a bite of toast, she threw the remaining slices to Lin Li, saying, "I’m full. There are two more slices; you can have them."
Lin Li caught them steadily, "I had a hearty breakfast, too, but since you insist, I’ll keep them for the dog."

chapters.title: Chapter 239 - 198: Wonderful, Lin Li Is Going to Become a Pillar - 2
chapters.content:
Chapter 239: Chapter 198: Wonderful, Lin Li Is Going to Become a Pillar - 2
"Is it for Bai Bufan?" Chen Yu Ying asked instinctively.
"Hahaha—" Lin Li couldn’t help but burst out laughing, "Class monitor, that’s what you said, not me. I was referring to feeding the stray dog at the door."
Lin Li’s laughter made Chen Yu Ying’s face blush slightly. She turned her head and scoffed, "I don’t believe it."
Chen Yu Ying swapped to Lin Li’s custom-made socks, put on her sneakers, and went outside. Without needing Lin Li’s guidance, she got on the bike and adjusted it to her most comfortable height.
The guesthouse was quite remote, and due to the holiday morning, there weren’t many people around. Even the roads were empty. For safety’s sake, Lin Li still chose a non-road section suitable for practice.
"Class monitor, first practice your sense of balance. Don’t pedal yet. Start by pushing off the ground continuously and then try to stabilize the bike. Don’t worry, I’ll be right behind you. If you can’t hold it, I can keep it steady." Lin Li followed closely next to Chen Yu Ying’s rear wheel and instructed.
Chen Yu Ying wasn’t heavy, and after a quick start, it wasn’t difficult for Lin Li to stabilize the bike.
"Okay."
Chen Yu Ying nodded, pushing off the ground with her legs to start.
The bike moved steadily forward until the force from pushing off couldn’t sustain the bike’s balance.
She did this two or three times.
"Learned it, what’s the next step?" Chen Yu Ying looked back at Lin Li, then asked with some confusion, "What’s wrong?"
Because Lin Li’s eyes were wide open.
"Did you really grasp balance so easily?" Lin Li exclaimed, "Class monitor, did you learn any dance or something before?"
"I did, learned quite a variety of dances, but I’m not proficient in any. It’s like being a jack of all trades but master of none." Chen Yu Ying replied.
"Class monitor, I suspect you’re being modest." Lin Li clicked his tongue, then suddenly thought of something and asked with interest, "Class monitor, do you know ballet?"
"Learned a little." Chen Yu Ying nodded.
"Then we can exchange ideas someday." Lin Li gave a thumbs up.
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
Facing Chen Yu Ying’s skeptical and slightly disturbed look, Lin Li chuckled softly, looked around sneakily to ensure there was no Bai Bufan before showing off a ballet pose and a large leap in front of Chen Yu Ying.
Action breaks doubt!
Now it was Chen Yu Ying’s turn to be wide-eyed.
The movements were very standard, there were indeed traces of training.
But do you really know how?
"Why did your family send you to learn this?" Chen Yu Ying was shocked.
"I taught myself." Lin Li never relied on any system; all his achievements today are self-taught.
"Why did you want to self-learn this?" Chen Yu Ying still didn’t understand.
"To see white socks."
"Cough, cough, cough—" Lin Li’s answer almost choked Chen Yu Ying to death.
Watching Chen Yu Ying cover her chest and cough lightly, Lin Li smiled and stepped forward to pat her back.
After soothing her, Chen Yu Ying looked up, glared resentfully at Lin Li, and then rubbed her temples, "Lin Li, I really can’t with you."
Such a reason.
Luckily, it’s Lin Li.
"Alright, class monitor, let’s continue learning to bike. We’ll talk about the socks later.
Later, you’ll start on your own, and when the bike is almost out of power, I’ll push you from behind. You just need to maintain balance and if you feel comfortable, try pedaling."
"Okay, but don’t mention the socks later either."
"That’s really annoying."
Honestly, the hardest part of learning to bike is the sense of balance.
Once you grasp the balance between yourself and the bike, the rest of the learning is pretty straightforward.
Having long legs is great; when the bike wobbles, it won’t fall over. A quick push with the calf acts as a stand, not requiring support from Lin Li at all.
Little Lin Li was really useless when he was a kid, how could his legs be that short, useless garbage.
Chen Yu Ying only encountered a bit of difficulty when starting from a standstill and during bike turns; otherwise, she adapted very quickly.
In just over an hour, she was already able to ride the bike in circles in the open space, although the handlebars occasionally wobbled a bit, and whenever Lin Li tried to block her path, Chen Yu Ying would still hesitate and instinctively hit the brakes instead of turning.
But that’s just a matter of time; once you build confidence, it will be fine.
"Alas, it seems I won’t be able to see the scene where when you were learning to bike, you accidentally fell and started crying like a pear blossom in the rain while I stood on the side laughing mockingly and calling you a super-duper big dummy."
No longer needing to wait behind the bike, when Chen Yu Ying slowly circled back to him again, Lin Li sighed.
Chen Yu Ying remembered that Lin Li said this to her last time, so she proudly crossed her arms and tilted her head slightly to look at Lin Li, "What should you say now?"
"Class monitor! You’re amazing!" Lin Li exclaimed with a face full of shock, admiration, and overly dramatic praise.
This was what he said when they were bantering before, "At that time, you can only look shocked and say I’m awesome."
He actually remembered.
But it was too exaggerated, and instead, Chen Yu Ying couldn’t bear it.
Taking her phone from the pocket of the pants she wore for biking, she handed it to Lin Li, "Lin Li, record a video for me. I want to show my family that I can ride a bike now."
"Sure."
Lin Li naturally wouldn’t refuse.
Since it was for her family, Lin Li followed behind Chen Yu Ying, recording without making any sound, otherwise, he might add some weird commentary.
"Ding Sihan and the others have woken up and are asking where we are."
After Chen Yu Ying indicated she was done biking, the video stopped recording, and a WeChat message popped up on her phone. After glancing at it, Lin Li said.
"Let’s head back then. We’ve practiced enough for today; my butt is getting sore."
Chen Yu Ying got off the bike, did a chest expansion exercise, then crossed her hands upwards to stretch her body.
The beauty of the movements was compelling; somehow, obligatory viewing became a given, but because it was Chen Yu Ying, Lin Li averted his gaze instinctively after one look to avoid making anyone uncomfortable.
"Alright, let’s go back."
...
"Yingying: ’Video’"
"Yingying: Learned to ride a bike in one morning, you two still can’t, right? ’Proud’"
Seeing the message in the family group chat, Chen Zhongping carefully watched the video and immediately complimented her.
"Chen Zhongping: Impressive."
"Wife: Still not very skilled, right? Don’t go on the road, be safe."
"Yingying: Uh-huh, I know, just learning."
"Chen Zhongping: Yingying, what’s wrapped around your ankle, did you get hurt?"
"Yingying: Said it’s a wristband for learning to bike to avoid getting caught in the wheels, but it wasn’t needed at all; there was no chance to get hurt, don’t worry."
"Chen Zhongping: That’s good, I thought you only wrapped it after getting injured."
Teaching a daughter to ride a bike seems to be a common phase fathers experience.
Unfortunately, I can’t even do it.
Primarily, there’s nowhere for me to use it, so Chen Zhongping never felt the need to learn.
Chen Zhongping watched the video again.
Someone has to teach biking; looking at the shadow, this person doesn’t have long hair.
Who might it be? It’s so hard to guess.
Every time in the video when Chen Yu Ying started to wobble, the camera quickly moved closer, handling it pretty well,
The unnecessarily wrapped thing on the ankle was probably this guy’s doing too.
Indeed, he has a bit of a human touch.
But.
He should have been the one to teach his daughter to bike, and this guy replaced him, that’s one crime.
Unaware of the one crime, that’s a second crime.
Unaware of the two crimes, that’s a third crime.
...
Can’t be written off! Can’t be written off!
Chen Zhongping terrifyingly discovered that Lin Li’s list of crimes was endless!
Still need to find a way to encase this kid in a concrete pillar and make him a pillar of the country.

chapters.title: Chapter 240 - 199: Oh no, Lin Li is about to be defeated
chapters.content:
Chapter 240: Chapter 199: Oh no, Lin Li is about to be defeated
"Yo, Bufan, you’re awake too. Have you had breakfast?"
Back at the homestay, Lin Li greeted the disheveled Bai Bufan.
"Just woke up, not hungry yet. Besides, lunch will be soon, might as well snack a bit." Bai Bufan yawned as he said.
"There’s toast on the table you can eat, I left it just for you." Lin Li said.
Chen Yu Ying secretly glared at Lin Li, and said it wasn’t for Bai Bufan.
Meh meh meh.
That was Lin Li’s response with his eyes.
"Not eating." Bai Bufan rejected at light speed.
"Then don’t." Lin Li was indifferent.
"Then I’ll eat." Bai Bufan quickly grabbed a slice and stuffed it into his mouth, hmm, definitely not poisoned.
Lin Li charged forward with a hand chop, shouting: "Before Bao Wei died, he left me a pouch saying he observed Bufan has a rebellious streak at the back of his head, will surely rebel, must be dealt with first to cut the root of trouble, seems he was right."
"He didn’t even invite me to the feast when he died, true inhumanity." Bai Bufan ran around the homestay with toast in his mouth.
"How’s my outfit? Press 1 if it’s good, gouge your eyes out if it’s not." Ding Sihan stomped down the stairs, asking Lin Li in the middle of the chase.
Black cropped pants paired with a white chiffon top, tucked into the pants, the high-waisted design highlighting leg proportions, seems Ding Sihan knows how to show her strengths.
Yet Lin Li stopped the chase, sat on the floor, took a deep breath, gritted his teeth: "Eyes, I’m sorry!!"
"No need, dude! No need! Just press 1!" Bai Bufan came up to block Lin Li at this moment, eyes tearing up.
"No, it’s got to be the eyes!"
Ding Sihan: "..."
Hehe.
These two guys really deserve it.
"Lin Li, you’re really something." Ding Sihan praised.
Lin Li ceased his act, cautiously watching Ding Sihan.
"Even though you have a mental illness, most of the time you can behave like a normal person, you’ve done well." Ding Sihan continued.
Lin Li was no longer cautious, nodding appreciatively: "It’s all thanks to Bufan’s good teaching."
Bai Bufan: "?"
The few people who just woke up, considering the time wasn’t exactly early, all made the same choice as Bai Bufan earlier, none planning to have breakfast, opting instead for some snacks, planning to have brunch later.
"Just teaching cycling? So dull and boring to teach this." After Chen Yu Ying went upstairs, Ding Sihan transformed into a gossiper and asked Lin Li what they were doing outside. After getting an answer, she replied uninterestedly.
"What do you think I went out to do?" Lin Li sneered.
Before Ding Sihan could answer, Bai Bufan inexplicably blurted out: "When I grow up, I will become a gardener, working hard to nurture."
This was a bit too suggestive, so Bai Bufan didn’t get the jelly he wanted, instead, Lin Li gave him a big slap as a reminder.
Chen Yu Ying came down the stairs again, having changed back into a dress, although now it was a medium-length white dress with gray polka dots, not the same as yesterday’s.
Lin Li: "1111."
"What’s going on? What are you 1-ing about?" Chen Yu Ying asked in confusion after hearing Lin Li.
Ding Sihan glared at Lin Li with a black line across her face: "Now you know how to press 1?"
Using the sword of the previous dynasty to praise the officials of the current one, huh?
Lin Li heard, looked at Ding Sihan, said nothing, and started gouging his own eyes out.
Ding Sihan: "?"
Silence speaks louder than words.
This time it was Lin Li’s turn to be chased by Ding Sihan.
Anyway, they planned to visit the beach at Shanting, so ultimately they decided to have lunch a bit further away.
After leaving the homestay, the three noticed the electric scooter at the door.
"This is my ride, so you just need to call a car, send me the address, I’ll ride there directly. Bufan, if you want to sit behind me, that’s fine too, I’ve checked, Shanting allows passengers as long as everyone has helmets."
Lin Li said coolly.
"Where’d you get this?" Bai Bufan asked in surprise, touching the scooter, then sincerely asked Lin Li: "I’m planning to get an electric scooter soon too, so can I ask where you usually keep it and the keys?"
"Are you buying it? You’re just stealing, and you think you qualify to buy a scooter? You’re a bottom-tier scum in society, go spend a buck to ride a kiddie ride and ask what daddy’s daddy’s name is."
Lin Li sneered.
As for Lin Li, usually he preferred driving Rolls Royces and Bentleys, when going out with friends it was Porsche, and when taking girls it was Ferrari, but, well, he loved joking now.
"I’ll remember this sneer, Lin Li, when my true identity is revealed, you’ll bow and apologize to me."
Having been insulted, Bai Bufan did the classic crooked-mouth Dragon King covering his cheek after a slap gesture, speaking word by word.
Lin Li suddenly laughed:
"Identity reveal? Outside 10,000 people shout in unison: ’Let the God of War come forth!’, mother-in-law shocked: ’Who is the God of War?’, and at this time, you, the good-for-nothing son-in-law in their eyes, Bai Bufan, stood up, walked out under the astonished gazes of everyone."
"Yes, yes, exactly that feeling." Bai Bufan agreed, giving a thumbs up.
"Not done yet, just as you walk outside, at that moment, the 10,001 people shout in unison: ’Let the God of War come forth!’"
"Crap! So I’m just the dog under the master’s command after all?" Bai Bufan burst into laughter first.
"I’ll ride your backseat, even if I take the co-driver’s seat, it’ll still be awkward with just them left." Bai Bufan whispered.
"Alright, here are the keys for you, I’ll go ride with them." Lin Li immediately patted Bai Bufan’s shoulder, gratified.
Bai Bufan: "..."
"Can you act like a human being?"
"Better to ride." Lin Li knew what mattered.
"Screw you."
However, although Lin Li had a sharp tongue, he was honest at heart, but Bruce would be breaking the law by driving, so it ended up with Lin Li taking Bai Bufan to the lunch spot.
"Lin Li, do you think our lives are like grilled sausages, lying around long-term, flipping occasionally, high in fat, prone to bursting under pressure, not very healthy, cheap, complex in composition?" Passing a sausage stand, Bai Bufan asked.
"Wrong." Lin Li, riding the electric scooter, shook his head.
"Explain what’s wrong?"
"It’s only you, not me. My life is shiningly bright right now, so don’t ask me, a Warrior of Light, such dark questions." Lin Li smiled brightly.
There’s even a pretty lady asking me to watch the sunrise.
So bright.
Bai Bufan: "..."
"Crap."
"But, speaking of Warrior of Light makes me mad, there was this guy named Dagu, darn it, he borrowed my light, I didn’t know better as a kid, too naive, lent it out, and led to a life of darkness later on."
Bai Bufan sighed at this, the more he thought, the angrier he got:
"And that’s not all, another guy named Kakarot, took my energy too, great, adding insult to injury, my life utterly ruined.
These villains tricking kids are really horrible, rotten to the core."
Lin Li slightly decelerated, leaned closer to Bai Bufan for a sniff, then nodded:
"Indeed, you have the scent of discounted rolled egg fried rice with free trendy Chinese packaging material, black disposable liquid spoons, an unnamed boxed drink, plus a 0.01 yuan grilled sausage from following a shop."
"Damn, your words are so hurtful, especially since they’re all true, I want to jump off."
"Let me speed up, ensure your jump leads to death." Lin Li twisted the handle, the scooter picking up speed instantly.
Bai Bufan immediately clutched Lin Li’s waist, face full of fear.
"Slow down, damn it."
"When really letting you die, you’re unwilling." Lin Li laughed.
Despite low driving experience, high Mecha index resulted in great skills, Lin Li slowed right away.
Safety first, it’s the skilled swimmers who drown.
Facing Lin Li’s sneer, Bai Bufan stayed silent, suddenly reaching forward to hold Lin Li tightly.
Dumbfounded, Lin Li: "..."
"Hmm~~ Big brother, if your girlfriend knew how close we were, wouldn’t she be angry, brother?" Bai Bufan pressed his cheek against Lin Li’s back.
This final "mua" was the straw that broke the camel’s back.
Fear transferred to Lin Li’s face.

chapters.title: Chapter 241 - 200: You Simply Don’t Understand the Joy
chapters.content:
Chapter 241: Chapter 200: You Simply Don’t Understand the Joy
In order to prevent further panic and confusion, the two signed the "Lin Bai Mutual Non-Aggression Pact" on the electric scooter. The signing of this treaty marked the formal establishment of a good diplomatic relationship between Lin and Bai.
This demonstrated the harmonious coexistence between humans and nature.
This was not only a small step for Lin Li, but a giant leap backward for humanity.
After arriving at the restaurant they had agreed upon that afternoon at the inn, the girls had already arrived and secured a table.
...
A predictable meal.
The girls already had their fill, leaving Lin Li and Bai Bufan to clean up the leftovers.
Typically at a group meal, at the start: "I want this, I want that," and everyone happily orders their food.
By the end: "You ordered this, you finish it," and everyone frantically passes the buck.
But these three girls skipped the latter part altogether, only concerned with the killing but not the burial, treating Lin Li and Bai Bufan like Zhou Baowei.
However, since the day’s schedule was leisurely, they weren’t in a hurry and could eat slowly.
"Bufan, eat more cucumber; cucumber can improve memory."
After eating a bite of tasteless salad, Lin Li couldn’t understand why anyone would like such a thing. He picked out the cucumber and placed it on Bai Bufan’s plate, saying so.
Lin Li likes only one type of salad:
As everyone knows, salad means vegetables plus fruits.
Potatoes are vegetables, and tomatoes are fruits.
Therefore, fries + ketchup = salad.
This formula Lin Li learned from Zhou Baowei.
"You can’t fool me just because I didn’t study much. Who told you that cucumber can improve memory?"
Bai Bufan, also full, tossed the cucumber back and questioned.
"It’s true, ten years ago I stuffed a cucumber into my deskmate’s butt, and now ten years later, he forgot everything from first grade except this incident, which he remembers vividly without forgetting a single detail.
He even told me he’d never forget this for the rest of his life.
See the effect? His memory improved dramatically."
Lin Li leaned in and whispered, providing an example to support his theory.
Bai Bufan: "?"
You damn...
"This way of enhancing memory is a bit off, wouldn’t you say! The way you put it makes it even harder for me to eat a cucumber... damn, I’ve come to realize, ’Lin Li’s deskmate’ is truly a hazardous occupation, a consumable, really."
Bai Bufan angrily flipped Lin Li the bird, then sighed sorrowfully:
"But you mentioning this reminds me of Baowei’s illness, I wonder when it will be cured."
"Oh, what illness, please tell?" Lin Li inquired.
In fact, Lin Li knew better than anyone that whatever Bai Bufan uttered next would definitely not be humane, but at this moment, it took a saint not to ask. Playing along, Lin Li was willing to cater.
"He has a fear of bulls, every time I enter his rectum, he screams in fear, too embarrassed to see a doctor, I’m truly worried for him, not knowing what to do, alas." Bai Bufan sighed mournfully.
Lin Li: "?"
He was mentally prepared, but still not enough.
"The role of ’Bufan’s roommate’ might be a bit more dangerous than being ’Lin Li’s desk mate’, right?" Lin Li heartfeltly reflected.
The two exchanged a look, realizing the similarly hazardous nature of their respective roles, and both grinned with relief.
"What are you two laughing at? Such perversion?" Across the table, Ding Sihan put down her phone, looked at the two exchanging flirtatious glances and grinning lewdly, shivered, and said.
"Naturally, it’s the kind of content unsuited for children that sleazy men talk about from below."
Lin Li aimed to be honest.
"Sir, I noticed your cup is empty. Would you like another drink?" The waitress, patrolling the store, noticed Lin Li’s glass was empty and approached to ask.
"Why would I want two empty cups?" Lin Li asked puzzledly.
Waitress: "Eh?"
The waitress.exe failed to respond.
"Eh... So, so, if you don’t need another drink, is there anything else I can help with?" The waitress forcibly rebooted and politely inquired again.
"Can you help me pay the bill then?" Lin Li sincerely asked.
The waitress.exe gave up running and logged out.
Bai Bufan felt that the waitress’s tray might hit Lin Li’s face at any moment, while trying to steer clear, yet eagerly anticipating the scene to unfold.
Do it, do it, I want to see a river of blood.
"Alright, stop acting crazy in a public place, let’s settle the bill after we’re done."
Chen Yu Ying, her lips adorned with enticingly shiny gloss, cast an amused yet helpless glare at Lin Li, most certainly on purpose, and stood up.
The two had indeed eaten to their limits.
After all, not everyone is Zhou Baowei.
At the counter.
"Our store is currently hosting a lottery event in collaboration with the zoo. Just by spending, you can enter for free, and your spending amount qualifies you for five entries. Why not give it a try?"
After scanning to pay, the staff pointed at the draw drum on the counter and said.
If it’s free, might as well give it a shot.
Lin Li was the first to step up, turned the drum, and after a while, a bead rolled out. When the staff saw the bead’s color, they congratulated, "Congratulations, you’ve won the first prize."
"Oh?"
Lin Li was slightly surprised.
Do I really have such fortune?
Could it be that I’ve exhausted my luck in such odd instances, which is why I keep failing infinitely when drawing "random quality spirit stones"?
This is not something that can be compensated for.
"What’s the first prize?" But for now, Lin Li decided to enjoy his good fortune and asked.

chapters.title: Chapter 242 - 200: You Simply Don’t Understand Joy - 2
chapters.content:
Chapter 242: Chapter 200: You Simply Don’t Understand Joy - 2
"This is a half-price coupon, with which you can purchase a ticket to Shanting Zoo at half price." The receptionist took a paper coupon out of the drawer and handed it to Lin Li.
Instantly lost interest.
No wonder it was a freebie event; it’s more like a promotion than an event.
Even the first prize is this trashy.
"Congratulations, you’ve also won the first prize." The receptionist congratulated Bai Bufan, who was right behind.
"Congratulations, you’ve also won the first prize." The receptionist congratulated Ding Sihan, who followed immediately after.
Lin, Ding, and Bai exchanged puzzled glances.
Isn’t this event advertised by Brother Jackie Chan? Wow, the winning rate is indeed high.
Something’s not right.
Lin Li squinted at the receptionist, "Hey, can I ask what kind of prizes are in the pool?"
The receptionist laughed heartily, "From high to low, there are super grand prizes, special prizes, and other prizes in the pool."
Lin Li: "What exactly are the other prizes?"
The receptionist chuckled, "First prize."
Lin Li: "What about the second and third prizes?"
The receptionist giggled softly, "There aren’t any."
Lin Li: "..."
Felt relieved.
Turns out the luck wasn’t misused, it was just consistently effective.
The person running this store’s event is also a genius.
Lin Li suddenly thought of NASA.
Rumor has it that NASA initially labeled astronauts’ urination tubes as small, medium, and large. Whenever asked, astronauts would always choose large, often resulting in leaks and causing NASA headaches.
So NASA changed the labels to large, extra-large, and gigantic.
The problem was then resolved.
Is the store owner from NASA? They certainly know how to comfort customers.
No wonder the first prize was just a half-price opportunity; it’s totally understandable now.
"Congratulations, you’ve won a special prize, a free ticket. You can exchange this coupon for a ticket at the zoo’s box office. However, during holidays like now, you’d need to call ahead to inquire if it can be used, but there shouldn’t be any issues,"
The three first-prize winners turned their heads to look at Chen Yu Ying, who had won the special prize.
It was Qu Wanqiu’s turn.
When that golden little ball rolled out of the drum, Lin Li, Bai Bufan, and Ding Sihan realized that people’s joys and sorrows are not connected.
The king of luck had been found.
However, the receptionist explained, the so-called super grand prize was also free tickets, but just two of them, under the same conditions.
"So now we have three free tickets and three half-price tickets? Just get one full-price adult ticket for 30 yuan, and we can all go in? What’s the verdict, should we go?"
As the five of them walked out with the coupons, Qu Wanqiu, the king of luck, asked.
She was already searching for videos of this zoo on her phone.
"We should call and check if we can use them first. We can ask when we get home tonight.
If they’re usable, we can check it out, but don’t expect too much from this zoo. It’s still having promotions during National Day, and we haven’t heard of it before, so it’s probably a small-town zoo. The chances of seeing rare animals are slim, but playing around wouldn’t hurt,"
Lin Li analyzed after hearing the suggestion.
The group thought it made sense and decided to hold onto the coupons and decide later.
Leaving the store, as per tradition, they all went to buy beverages.
Girls are like this, they say they’re full, but they have a separate stomach for milk tea and coffee.
Remembering the diluted coffee from the previous night, the five headed towards the nearest Luckin Coffee.
It wasn’t far, so Lin Li’s electric bike was left parked in front of the original store.
"Bufan, if you see an empty water bottle on the street, are you going to be an unsung hero or become a legendary soccer player?"
Seeing an empty bottle not far away, Lin Li turned to ask Bai Bufan.
Bai Bufan waved his hand dismissively.
— Let’s revise the knowledge point: Bai Bufan waving his hand isn’t a refusal, it’s more like ’no further words needed’.
Those who watched the children’s channel’s ’Public Morality Contest, starting today’ series public service ads as kids are probably seventy or eighty by now.
Bai Bufan and Lin Li had never seen it, and they didn’t care much for public morals or deeds, so kicking was thoroughly enjoyable.
"I’m a legend!" Bai Bufan exclaimed in shock after a kick actually sent the bottle into the trash can.
"Dumb luck," Lin Li scoffed.
"This was all calculated by me."
"Pft, just a fluke."
"Why don’t you try a fluke?"
"Night City has no living legends!" Lin Li, feeling a bit bitter and anxious, was ready to ’kill’.
"What do you all want to drink? Let’s order together?" Ding Sihan turned around, interrupting the impending carnage.
"I don’t drink soy milk," Lin Li shook his head.
"Lin Li, the place in front of you is Luckin Coffee, not Yonghe King. I asked what kind of coffee you want," Ding Sihan replied with an eye roll.
"Coffee is like soy milk too," Lin Li innocently said and asked back, "Isn’t that right?"
Ding Sihan: "..."
"Cof—"
Ding Sihan wanted to refute, but as soon as she opened her mouth, she found she couldn’t counter it.
"You’re something else."
"I’m not a big fan, I’ll stop by Mixue Bingcheng to get a fruit tea," Lin Li pointed towards the nearby shop.
"Alright, we have some time to wait here anyway," Ding Sihan nodded.
"I’m craving freshly squeezed orange juice; I’ll join you," Chen Yu Ying checked the drink menu and made her decision.
Bai Bufan, being Lin Li’s sidekick, required no words.
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu stayed to wait for the coffee, while Lin Li headed across with Bai Bufan and Chen Yu Ying.
"Wow, Renaissance! Lin Li, look, someone’s started selling the hottest item from the 18th century again, and it’s so affordable," Bai Bufan suddenly pointed at a small shop across the street.

chapters.title: Chapter 243 - 200: You Simply Don’t Understand Joy - 3
chapters.content:
Chapter 243: Chapter 200: You Simply Don’t Understand Joy - 3
Lin Li and Chen Yu Ying looked over.
On the glass door of the small shop, there were promotional signs: "3 yuan for Dabao", "3 yuan for hair mask", "3 yuan for soap", "3 yuan for Black Man".
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
This must mean Black toothpaste.
These two guys get especially excited at times like this, seriously.
"It’s racial discrimination, I’m going to report it." Lin Li said with displeasure on his face.
Bai Bufan looked at Lin Li with a surprised expression.
Speak something sensible.
"Why should oily people cost the same as Black people? Soap must sell for 5 yuan!" Lin Li declared righteously.
Now that made sense.
Bai Bufan laughed it off.
Chen Yu Ying smiled helplessly.
It’s everyone’s duty to protect good deeds.
"Watch out, you two." Lin Li suddenly reached out and grabbed Bai Bufan and Chen Yu Ying’s forearms.
A car with no manners drove by quickly, splashing a puddle accumulated around the three of them, sending dirty water everywhere.
"This driver should really lose a mom."
Lin Li’s mouth was never clean, it’s a pity he hadn’t mastered many cultivation spells yet, otherwise he would definitely make the driver fly.
He then turned to look at Chen Yu Ying, who was protected behind him. Only then did he let go and asked, "Class leader, did your little white dress get splashed?"
"Nope." Chen Yu Ying looked down and checked, smiling as she shook her head.
"That’s good then."
Then Lin Li turned to Bai Bufan, who was protected in front of him, and asked, "Bufan, were your little black legs splashed?"
"Haha."
"Hahaha."
"Hahahaha."
Looking at the spots of mud on his calves, Bai Bufan laughed happily and sincerely.
"You even protected me to the front, what do you think?" he said, word by word.
"So even you know I protected you, and still got hit, such bad luck." Lin Li sighed, taking a coin Bai Bufan had given him yesterday from his pocket and tossing it lightly onto Bai Bufan: "Clean yourself up."
Bai Bufan: "?"
Could this even bounce back like a boomerang?
In the realm of rascals, Bai Bufan was considered experienced and knowledgeable.
Previously, in the path of unruliness, he and Lin Li were at most like frogs at the bottom of a well looking at the moon, but today upon hearing this, he should now see Lin Li as a mayfly gazing at the vast sky.
"Whew——"
Bai Bufan took a deep breath.
"Honestly, Sanqiao really should send me a banner on an official level, after all, I just prevented a murder." He said.
Lin Li laughed.
Who’s killing who in this murder case?
So hard to guess.
"Alright now, we both got shorts on, easy to clean. I got splashed too, let’s just consider it a sacrifice for others." Lin Li took the tissue that Chen Yu Ying fetched from her bag and handed some to Bai Bufan, then started wiping his own dirty leg while saying:
"As for the comment about that idiot driver we just saw, the only one breathing in his family is probably the grave robbers under his old grave."
Bai Bufan nodded in agreement: "Still, I’m a bit envious of him, at least when he takes a selfie, it’s a family photo. Convenient for New Year’s."
The two were already quite unruly and dirty, and after being splashed, the unnamed driver’s family would be in for some serious trouble.
Chen Yu Ying, standing at the side, was taken aback by what she heard. This was what they said with her around, she couldn’t imagine the crude language if she weren’t there.
Still, looking at her little white dress, her steps became a bit lighter without knowing why.
In a corner where Lin Li didn’t notice at all.
Task Six.
[By physical contact and combination, let the girls feel pleasure]
Its progress bar increased by quite a bit.

chapters.title: Chapter 244 - 201: Humans Have a Third Hand
chapters.content:
Chapter 244: Chapter 201: Humans Have a Third Hand
After buying drinks, the five of them decided on a specific location by the sea, and the girls took a taxi there, while Lin Li rode his electric scooter to carry Bai Bufan there.
Upon arrival, the five met at the destination.
Sunshine, beaches, waves, cacti, and the old captain, like things in Grandma’s Penghu Bay.
——Not much here.
The kind of blue sky, clear light blue seawater, fine white sandy beaches, are mostly offshore beaches, and it’s best with organized regular garbage cleanup management.
But because they were not planning to go into the water at all, no one prepared any seaside play equipment, so they didn’t go to a commercial beach.
The destination here had more of pitch-black rugged black rocks, under which slightly gray-blue seawater repeatedly splashed against the rocks, creating sprays of water.
The sound was quite soothing.
That was also the reason for choosing this place.
Although no one regularly cleaned it, there was no fishy sea smell.
In the distance, one could still see a mud flat, where many people were walking and exploring it, and some were casting lines at a distance on the mud flat, probably catching mudskippers, also known as jumping fish, which are deliciously fragrant when cooked wild.
"Should we watch the sunset here?"
The gentle breeze by the sea lightly blew, a few strands of hair floated gracefully, after taking a few breaths, Chen Yu Ying asked everyone.
Even though Bai, Chen, and Ding did nothing today but have lunch, due to the excessive leisure and slow pace, it was indeed already past three o’clock.
Even though they did nothing, today was also a tiring day, rewarding themselves by watching the sunset was not excessive.
"Sure, I’ve never seen a sunset on the beach during a cloudy day." Lin Li nodded.
Coming out to play, he didn’t like to spoil the mood.
Although the sky during cloudy days is covered by clouds, it doesn’t mean the sunset isn’t visible.
On the contrary, the sunset on a cloudy day is often softer and more hazy, with layers of color changes in the clouds under the sunset, just as worth looking forward to.
"Sure."
——soon reached a unanimous conclusion.
"Then let’s find a better spot to watch, we can’t just stand here dumbly." Ding Sihan suggested.
"No problem, shall I be the scout? You guys walk slowly this way, once I find a good spot, I’ll come back and report to you?" Lin Li, hearing this, pointed at his electric scooter, and gestured to everyone.
"Sure." The girls had no objections.
They originally wanted to take photos, let alone push the scooter aside, this was most suitable.
Bringing Bai Bufan along, Lin Li began to drive along the coastal highway.
"This is pretty awesome!"
Lin Li shouted.
Unlike driving an electric scooter in the city, due to safety reasons, Lin Li’s driving speed in the city was never fast.
But now, because the highway was like a straight line, with little curvature and slope, one could see far, especially going downhill, it was an unrestrained view, no worry of a car popping out from anywhere, the speed could be completely maximized.
"Bufan, hold tight, I’m going to speed up." Lin Li took off his helmet and hung it at the front of the scooter, letting the wind blow his hair back, licked his lips, and turned his head to shout.
"OK!" Bai Bufan responded loudly, immediately took out his phone, "Hello, is this 110? There’s someone speeding here!"
"You son of a—" Lin Li laughed and cursed.
With Bai Bufan, you always have to be careful of ricochets every moment.
Lin Li began to accelerate.
The sound of the wind was already audible by his ear.
"Oh! Awesome!" Bai Bufan grabbed Lin Li with one hand and raised his other hand high, feeling excited too.
Sometimes happiness is that simple.
It’s just sitting and driving.
But it’s also sincerely feeling happy.
"Lin Li, do you know what word can fly when read forwards and eat when read backwards?" Bai Bufan suddenly asked.
"Bee of course." Lin Li answered instantly.
"That’s such a clichéd answer, wrong! The correct answer is a level eight gale!" Bai Bufan gave the right answer.
"?"
"You son of a—" Lin Li was taken aback.
"But that’s really good stuff!" Then he laughed heartily.
The gale swallowed into the stomach.
"We’re not going fast enough now, at most level seven, keep going, I want a level eight gale!" Bai Bufan urged.
"Got it!"
At this moment, what limited their speed wasn’t themselves, but the limits of the electric scooter.
"Bufan, you should comb your hair back in the future!" Lin Li saw Bai Bufan’s face in the side mirror and laughed, praising, "You look so much better with your hair back than down, you look a bit like that Yan fellow now."
"Peng Yuyan, right, how could you forget that," Bai Bufan was not keeping it together from the praise, sniffling from a cold would even bubble up snot, returning the compliment: "You’re not bad either, I’ve heard Daniel Wu is called Xiaolin Li."
"No, no, how could I forget Peng Yuyan, you’re that, that—" Lin Li honked, as if he suddenly remembered looked delighted: "Oh, I just remembered, it’s Pi Yan! Yeah, your face now looks like Pi Yan!"
Bai Bufan: "?"
"You’re such a—" Bai Bufan couldn’t hold back.
Really shouldn’t believe Lin Li.
"Didn’t we sign a ’Mutual Non-aggression Pact’? Don’t touch my butt with your filthy hands!" Sensing Bai Bufan’s revenge methods afterwards, Lin Li laughed and cursed.
Wait.
In the rearview mirror, Lin Li saw and sensed a hand on each of his shoulders from Bai Bufan.
Bu Hao!
"Are those your two hands on my shoulder?" Lin Li swallowed a mouthful of saliva, lowering the speed of the scooter, asked in a trembling voice.
"You are asking the obvious, naughty." Bai Bufan patted Lin Li’s shoulder and smiled, nodding.
"Then what’s bumping at my butt?"
"It’s my corn sausage." Bai Bufan smiled, "Lin Li, don’t know if you’re afraid of cows? Let me test it—"
"You son of a—" Lin Li braked hard, turning around.
Damn, it really was "Bai Bufan’s corn sausage."
"Could you not steal things out of other people’s pockets, I’m really grossed out by people like you with sticky fingers."
Lin Li angrily took back the "Bai Bufan’s corn sausage" that Bai Bufan took from his pocket, said resentfully yet disdainfully.
Bai Bufan, immune to oil and salt, apparently didn’t listen.
With such high-speed patrol, they quickly found a great viewing spot.
"Bufan, get off first, walk over and claim that spot, don’t come back later finding it occupied." Lin Li said.
"Alright."
Bai Bufan nodded, got off, and began to press down his wind-blown hair.
"I’m going back to get the girls."
"No problem."
"Bufan, don’t talk to strangers, don’t take things from strangers, if someone asks about your family, just say your dad Lin Li is nearby..."
Because he was leaving Bai Bufan here alone, Lin Li began advising on safety issues.
Bai Bufan: "..."
Your damn.
Bai Bufan laughed with anger.
Is this talent? Thinking hard, but not matching his casual words.
Lin Li really ought to work in a morgue.

chapters.title: Chapter 245 - 202: Inviting Others to Eat Exhaust Fumes Turns Out to Be Such an Interesting Thing
chapters.content:
Chapter 245: Chapter 202: Inviting Others to Eat Exhaust Fumes Turns Out to Be Such an Interesting Thing
Lin Li began to return the way he came.
The original pursuit problem had turned into a meeting problem. If you put it in an elementary school math textbook, it could become a small torturous puzzle.
The Team A and B, pool maintenance guy, and chicken-rabbit farmer are all things every kid who has attended elementary math class has to appreciate.
Lin Li cursed them plenty as a child.
Especially the pool janitor who was filling and draining the pool at the same time.
Thinking about this, Lin Li started inexplicably speeding up and slowing down, imagining someone observing him to solve math problems, now looking all puzzled, enjoying it.
From afar, he saw three people walking hand in hand along the pedestrian path next to the road railing.
"Here’s a fun fact: If everyone in the world held hands around the equator, a lot of people would fall into the ocean and drown, so damn, holding hands is really dangerous." Seeing the three greet him, Lin Li waved back with a smile.
The three girls chose to ignore him.
"Ding Sihan, could you move out a bit, I can’t bump into you properly there." Lin Li scratched his head and got straight to the point.
"Get lost."
"Lin Li, your hair is flying up!"
As Lin Li got closer, Chen Yu Ying pointed at his hair and laughed.
"I just spent 2800 on this custom hairstyle. Does it look cool? Stylish?" Lin Li stopped his electric scooter and brushed his hands back across his head.
Then he heard laughter.
"Your laughter is really hurtful."
"Our laughter is like the sun and two sixty-watt bulbs. You said it yourself, how can it be hurtful?" Ding Sihan retorted.
"If you look straight at a sixty-watt bulb up close, you’d get hurt too." Lin Li was good at arguing.
Qu Wanqiu stopped laughing and seriously nodded: "Stylish, your hubby-stylish."
Lin Li: "What is this?"
Then he turned to look at Ding Sihan, loudly whispering while pointing at Lin Li: "Sihan, your hubby."
"Bullshit, that’s your hubby!"
"Your hubby!"
"Your hubby!"
Lin Li: "..."
Dammit.
"Two good friends, fighting over me, completely tearing each other apart, all because of my damn charm." But it’s okay, Lin Li could always find a way to solve these problems.
Qu Wanqiu and Ding Sihan immediately made up and seamlessly raised their middle fingers at Lin Li.
See, in matters of resolving conflicts, Lin Li was a master.
"Doesn’t look bad, just rare to see you completely showing your forehead, very novel." Chen Yu Ying laughed and said.
"As long as it’s not bad, it’s fine." Lin Li was indifferent.
"Did you find a good spot to watch the sunset?" Chen Yu Ying asked.
"I’ve already found a great spot, it’s got seating, directly overlooking the sea, with an unobstructed view, I’ve marked it already." Lin Li replied.
"Where’s Bai Bufan?"
At this moment, Qu Wanqiu noticed no one was following Lin Li, and asked.
"Oh, right, where did Bai Bufan go?" Ding Sihan exclaimed.
"Hahaha—" Lin Li suddenly started laughing.
After laughing, Lin Li pointed at Ding Sihan: "Ding Sihan, your slow reaction of ’Oh right’ was too funny, it shows how much you miss home. I bet if Bai Bufan were to die, it’d take you three years to realize."
"He’d be stinking after three years, I’d still be able to smell it." Ding Sihan chuckled embarrassedly.
"I must tell him what you said; it’ll be a gift for him." Lin Li felt pleased.
Then he looked at Qu Wanqiu and explained: "He’s just my marker at the spot, like my marking territory."
Qu Wanqiu: "..."
What kind of analogy is this.
"If marking territory is like peeing, then Lin Li, what creature are you?" she asked.
"Bai Bufan." Lin Li replied instantly.
Qu Wanqiu: "..."
Damn this Lin Li, his mental health is too good, even such attacks mean nothing to him.
"How far away is it?" Ding Sihan asked.
"Walking, it’s about twenty minutes? I didn’t calculate the distance precisely, but with an electric scooter at full speed, it takes less than four minutes for a one-way trip." Lin Li calculated and then patted the scooter’s head, eagerly saying, "Is there any dumb bird that wants to get on the car for a ride first?
I’m telling you, riding a fast electric scooter here with the wind in your face feels amazing. Not experiencing it would be a shame. Bai Bufan and I just thoroughly enjoyed ourselves."
"Not that kind of enjoyment! Look at me normally! Damn you fujoshi!" Lin Li squinted at Ding Sihan whose expression seemed off.
"Really? Then I want to try." Retracting her playful gaze, Ding Sihan eagerly said, "But don’t drop me at the destination, you’ll have to bring me back."
"Why?"
"Otherwise if you take someone else on the next trip, Wanqiu would be left all alone having to walk for several minutes, wouldn’t she?" Ding Sihan asked back, "That’d be pitiful, as if she’d been abandoned."
Qu Wanqiu scratched her head: "Why am I automatically assumed to be the lonely one left behind?"
After speaking, Qu Wanqiu looked over at Chen Yu Ying beside her, nodded: "Oh, it’s me."
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
Chen Yu Ying suspected that Qu Wanqiu was talking to herself on purpose.
"Ding Sihan, when you get on the scooter, keep your distance from my back. It’s the middle of summer, and you’re like a little furnace," Lin Li said with a playful smile.
Unfortunately, Lin Li wasn’t the third brother; in the third brother’s cavalcade motorcycle performance, one bike could easily carry ten people to their destination.
Because Lin Li rented an electric scooter that wasn’t for delivery, it didn’t have a rear box, so the seat space was quite large. Plus, Lin Li intentionally moved forward a bit, so Ding Sihan could easily maintain a comfortable distance.
In fact, being a bit closer didn’t matter. They were just riding an electric scooter, and with their personalities, they wouldn’t care at all.
"Ding Sihan, we’re about to take off. You can grab the tail fin behind you or my clothes. But let me warn you, my clothes are worth three thousand six. Don’t pull too hard. Lastly, if you need to hug me, that’s an extra charge."
After sensing Ding Sihan settled in, Lin Li turned his head to remind her.
"Just drive your scooter. I remember hugging you once as a kid in the haunted house," Ding Sihan scoffed.
Lin Li: "..."
"Horrifying memories are attacking me."
The taillight lit up, and the electric scooter zoomed forward, accompanied by Lin Li’s wild laughter and Ding Sihan’s screams.
...
At the destination, seeing the two of them coming from the road behind, Bai Bufan waved to greet them.
The two rode past him.
Bai Bufan: "?"
The tires kicked up dust, swaggering and bold.
...
"One more lap!" Ding Sihan quickly felt the pure joy of it. When Lin Li stopped, she patted his back heavily while holding her phone recording the sea and commanded.
"Roger that."
They returned.
"The breeze indeed feels pleasant, and the videos of the sea are much more fun. You guys should try it."
After Lin Li, with Ding Sihan, reunited with Chen Yu Ying and Qu Wanqiu, who had been walking, she recommended:
"It’s a pity it’s illegal to sit sideways on the back like on a bicycle. Otherwise, selfies could have been fun too."
"I can see that, your hair is all ruffled from the fun," Chen Yu Ying laughed as she stepped forward to straighten Ding Sihan’s hair.
"Thanks, Ying Bao."
"Why don’t you straighten mine?" Lin Li turned his head to ask.
"Because yours is a custom look worth two thousand eight, I wouldn’t dare to touch it," Chen Yu Ying chuckled.
Lin Li laughed and gave a thumbs up.
The class president, under his influence, was becoming more like a normal person.
"Then I want to try it too," feeling intrigued by Ding Sihan’s description, Qu Wanqiu raised her hand, intending to get on the scooter.
"Twenty yuan per lap, additional services are extra," Lin Li immediately announced.
Qu Wanqiu removed her hairpin, crouched down to examine Lin Li’s wheels, and looked up to ask, "Lin Li, how much is one tire?"
Lin Li: "..."
Under Bai Bufan’s influence, Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu were also becoming more like Bai Bufan.
"Do you still charge now?"
"No charge, no charge, get on."
Another five minutes later, Lin Li returned with Qu Wanqiu.
"Did you see Bai Bufan’s expression just now? He called us, and we didn’t even acknowledge him. He was completely stunned."
"Is there a possibility that he’s already cursing at you in the group chat?"
Qu Wanqiu dismounted with a smile, waving her phone, "There’s a sixty-second voice message."
"He wouldn’t send that kind of message in the girls’ group," Lin Li, well aware of Bai Bufan’s habits, exposed the lie and then turned to Chen Yu Ying:
"Class monitor, aren’t you going to try?"
"Sure." Chen Yu Ying, without much thought, sat on Lin Li’s back seat, "Do I put my feet here? It won’t bother you, right?"
"Wrong spot, Ying Bao; you should put it in his mouth," Qu Wanqiu, while brushing her hair with a small hairbrush she always carried, corrected.
Lin Li: "?"
"Ah—" Lin Li opened his mouth wide in the next second, even making a sound on purpose.
The four of them fell silent for a while.
Chen Yu Ying, with a headache and in despair, covered her face with both hands on the back seat, as if she was the one embarrassed.
"I can’t stand Lin Li, he’s so gross! Hahaha—" Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu, overwhelmed by Lin Li’s outrageous ’ah,’ clutched their stomachs laughing and squatted on the ground.
So, you want to mess with me?
"Hehe, we all know who the gross one is, so stop lying to yourself," Lin Li sneered, looking at Qu Wanqiu.
"..."
Wait.
Why are the three of them all looking at me?

chapters.title: Chapter 246 - 203: "Joy, Joy.
chapters.content:
Chapter 246: Chapter 203: "Joy, Joy.
"Am I the one fooling myself, unaware?" Lin Li scratched his head.
The three people’s gazes seemed to be there to tell him the answer.
Well, not seemed, they outright nodded, affirming that it’s the truth.
So that’s how it is.
Lin Li chuckled.
"Exactly, class rep, these protrusions on the sides are where you place your feet." A good man doesn’t argue with women, Lin Li said with a smile, bending over to point out the footrests on the scooter, then realized something, eagerly: "Class rep, have you never ridden on an electric scooter before?"
"Indeed." Chen Yu Ying nodded.
Her family owns many vehicles, both petrol and electric cars, but no electric scooters.
She normally wouldn’t have the opportunity to ride one.
"Then I got the first ride!" Lin Li laughed wickedly.
Chen Yu Ying made a fist with her right hand and gently punched Lin Li’s back: "Don’t talk nonsense."
"Let’s go."
"Okay." Chen Yu Ying grabbed both sides of Lin Li’s clothes with two fingers and nodded.
The scooter started up and began accelerating.
The top-tier electric scooter speeds up to ten kilometers in just two seconds.
"You can tell me if you’d like to go faster or slower." Lin Li straightened his back to give Chen Yu Ying more space behind him, slightly turning his head to add.
Then he looked ahead and continued driving, clearly in a good mood, with his body slightly swaying.
Feeling the wind is, after all, a pleasurable thing.
"Alright." Chen Yu Ying replied softly.
Against the gentle sea breeze, her hair flew freely in the wind, as scattered rays of sunlight peeked through the clouds, embracing them without summer’s heat, just the right temperature.
The sound of the wheels rustling over the ground, combined with the waves crashing and the wind’s whimper, composed a unique symphony.
Watching the vast ocean while feeling the breeze’s gentle caress, the mood was exceedingly joyful.
Chen Yu Ying had always been in a good mood, but now it was even better.
Murakami Haruki said looking at the sea for long makes you want to see people, and seeing people too much makes you want to see the sea.
What if you see both a beautiful sea and interesting people?
Perhaps you’d want to laugh.
So Chen Yu Ying laughed.
"Even faster, Lin Li." Maybe it could be even more fun, so she said, the laughter rich enough that the roaring wind couldn’t blow it away.
"Alright! Vroom vroom vroom!" Clearly an electric scooter, yet Lin Li insisted on imitating the roar of a motorcycle and transformed into a Le Di: "All systems activated activated activated activated! And—this!"
Quite amusing.
So the wind increased, and the laughter deepened.
Passing by Bai Bufan three times without entering, this time Bai Bufan habitually raised a middle finger, without shouting or waving.
Lin Li couldn’t believe what kind of mess his private messages would be.
There might indeed be a sixty-second voice message.
"I want to go even faster." said Chen Yu Ying from behind.
"We’re already at the limit, class rep." Lin Li said, making eye contact with Chen Yu Ying through the rearview mirror, smiling as he patted the electric scooter.
The ’Poop Suppression Talisman’ electric scooter wouldn’t allow it; otherwise, I would push it to break the limit, maybe even rename the ’Poop Suppression Talisman.’
"Oh, oh, then just stay like this." Chen Yu Ying nodded, not too disappointed.
"Class rep, but I have another plan, care to try driving it yourself?" Lin Li slightly slowed down, intrigued, "Driving from the front is different from sitting in the back."
"But I don’t know how." Chen Yu Ying hesitated, then responded.
"Electric scooters are even simpler than bicycles because starting only requires you to twist the handlebar." Lin Li ensured there were no cars around, then slowed to a stop, stepped off, held the electric scooter, and pointed at the handlebar, explaining.
Driving an electric scooter is no different from riding a bicycle; if you manage a bicycle, ’learning’ the scooter shouldn’t take more than a minute.
This kind of introduction accelerated the task’s progress.
"You can try twisting it a little." Lin Li enticed.
Hearing this, Chen Yu Ying curiously reached out, experimented with twisting a little, then immediately released as soon as she felt a forward motion, causing almost no movement.
A bit novel, but Chen Yu Ying still shook her head: "This, I’m a little scared."
"What’s there to be afraid of? If anything, I and the others on the road should be scared." Lin Li reassured.
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
She stared at Lin Li.
That statement seemed both right and very wrong.
"Class rep, don’t worry, I’ll be right beside you, let’s just avoid the main roads." Lin Li encouraged.
Just now, Chen Yu Ying’s twisting caused a noticeable fluctuation on the task progress bar.
Speaking of which, when did this delightful task six increase so much?
No recollection, strange.
