"Forget it, forget it." Bai Bufan didn’t want to end up limping.

chapters.title: Chapter 256 - 210 Civil Affairs Bureau Mingguang_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 256: Chapter 210 Civil Affairs Bureau Mingguang_2
Bai Bufan sighed: "Oh dear! I’ve never been abroad either, what’s wrong with the world having one more rich person like me? Can’t someone just randomly give me some money?"
Chen Yu Ying, who was originally just listening to the conversation with a smile, suddenly noticed Lin Li’s intense gaze.
At first, she didn’t understand, but seeing him wink and gesture, after being confused for a moment, she finally got Lin Li’s meaning.
Though slightly hesitant, she still walked up to Bai Bufan and threw a dollar onto him.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Line, class monitor, say the line." Lin Li urged from the side.
"Clean it yourself." Chen Yu Ying said unskillfully.
Bai Bufan: "???"
What?
He bent over, picked up the dollar, put it in his pocket, scratched his head and murmured: "Strange, isn’t this the money Ding Sihan took from me yesterday? Wasn’t it meant to be thrown at Lin Li, how did it end up with you, class monitor?"
As they passed the Deer District, which housed the tigers, a group of tourists was queueing up.
After looking at the introduction, it turned out you could take photos with the tigers, and kids could even sit on them.
"Come on, let’s take a look." Seeing a few people intrigued, Lin Li spoke up for everyone.
Lin Li’s family had photos of him as a child sitting on a tiger, but he couldn’t remember when it was taken.
"What if the tiger suddenly turns around and eats a person?" Bai Bufan, having nothing to do, asked.
"Throw a dollar on it and let it clean itself up, no blood or pieces left, so the next person can take pictures without issue." Lin Li replied instantly with the standard answer.
"This dollar’s wasting its talents with me, it’s better with you."
Bai Bufan threw the money onto Lin Li’s face again, and Lin Li caught it steadily.
"For the sake of this dollar, I’ll tell you a way to survive, kneel and call it dad, because a tiger doesn’t eat its cubs." Lin Li said.
"That actually makes sense." Bai Bufan realized suddenly.
"Unfortunately, this method doesn’t work for you." Lin Li added.
"Why?"
"Because a tiger father doesn’t have dogs as offspring, you’re naturally at a species disadvantage." Lin Li finally finished flipping his Yan Kingdom map and smiled as he took out a dagger.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"You son of a [BEEP]!"
In front of the five was a family of three, their young child being held and looking back, while three girls were teasing the child, and the parents didn’t mind and even greeted them.
Soon it was the family’s turn to queue up.
"Such a well-behaved child is really nice, it makes me feel marriage isn’t such a bad thing." Ding Sihan seemed nostalgic about the feeling of pinching the child’s cheeks earlier and sighed, "What a pity most kids aren’t like that."
Most children only bring despair.
Though maybe even here there were kids who made people despair, people are always double standards.
Lin Li just thinking about having a kid like Bai Bufan makes him want to die.
If the kid was like him, well, it’s just not wanting to live.
Thinking this way, Sister Min is great, no need to elaborate.
But still.
"Putting kids aside, marriage is not a bad thing at all, there are too many benefits.
For example, then you’d definitely live together, and when food is ready, there’s no need to wait, successfully splitting the bill immediately, wow, just thinking about it makes me feel exhilarating."
Lin Li closed his eyes; it’s fantasy time now.
Even at three or four in the morning, you can split the bill directly!
No need to watch anyone’s face!
Exhilarating!
Bai Bufan hearing this also closed his eyes; he felt exhilarating too.
Ding Sihan: "..."
You damn.
"Lin Li, with what you said, actually there’s no need to put kids aside, because if you have a child, you can register a new user too." Bai Bufan was good at finding connections.
"Oh, that’s quite sensible too, new users do have great gold potential." Lin Li learned.
"Exhilarating!"
"Exhilarating!"
"What’s so exhilarating?! Even if you are getting rural credit cooperatives instead of Switzerland, you can’t go to this extent!! Poor people aren’t allowed to write exhilarating tales! I’ve had enough! Shut up!" Qu Wanqiu couldn’t take it anymore with these two.
Even Bai Bufan, the coward, stopped when Qu Wanqiu mentioned credit cooperatives.
"Thanks a lot; you all suddenly made me feel marriage is all bad, just hearing your description makes life seem too bitter." Ding Sihan held her forehead; these two are truly living life.
After the family of three finished taking photos, it was their turn.
"Excuse me, could I ask why that tiger is locked up alone over there?" During the photo session, Lin Li noticed the tiger being isolated in the enclosure, sometimes whimpering, so he asked curiously.
"Oh, that tiger is in heat, but its condition isn’t suitable for breeding right now, so it’s isolated, it’s not abuse." Hearing this, the staff immediately explained.
Without an explanation, a short video later might bring the zoo a lot of backlash.
"I see." Lin Li nodded.
During the photo shoot, Lin Li advised Bai Bufan to put his neck by the tiger’s mouth, saying it would make the photo more artistic, but unfortunately, it was rejected ruthlessly.
Then Lin Li himself proved through action that you can touch a tiger’s behind.
But you indeed cannot touch its balls.
Lin Li asked himself; actually, the tiger didn’t refuse, but the keeper refused for it.
Tigers are good, but keepers are bad.
...
"This zoo is really trashy." Lin Li shook his head helplessly.
Chen Yu Ying glared amusedly at Lin Li: "You need to look for ticket scalpers outside the zoo."
Lin Li, this guy, had been asking the scalper for "front row tickets to Lin Li’s concert", only for the scalper to just look at Lin Li and lazily munch on grass, leading him to draw this conclusion.
The zoo was really wronged.
Following the zoo’s designed route, they arrived at a shop selling zoo souvenirs, as well as some food and drinks.
The zoo was indeed not big; this shop being at the center meant an hour’s time, only half of it was explored, even considering the group walked slowly, bantering all the way.
No wonder there weren’t many people during the National Day holidays.
They walked into the shop, but damn, even the air conditioning wasn’t on.
The girls picked some keychains as souvenirs and went to the counter to pay.
"Bro, is that for sale? So cool." When at the counter, Lin Li and Bai Bufan’s eyes lit up because there were mecha-shaped animals in the display cabinet, seemingly able to transform.
It reminded Lin Li of Poisonous Snake Green Pepper, the most overpowering existence in "Steel Frame Dragon"; while others were still preparing their skills, it would turn its head for a super transformation, kneel, for an ultimate zodiac transformation, not even stealth could handle it, the most skilled existence.
Turning its head, Poisonous Snake Green Pepper wasn’t scared but was upgrading; kneeling wasn’t wrong, but was starting the ultimate zodiac transformation.
"It’s for sale, this one’s 400." The salesperson glanced and nodded.
"What the heck? How much?" Lin Li and Bai Bufan’s accents were startled out.
Bai Bufan gasped before pointing at another, inquiring: "How about this one?"
"Two heck."
Bai, Lin: "..."

chapters.title: Chapter 258 - 212: Wow! Oh no! You vile beast!
chapters.content:
Chapter 258: Chapter 212: Wow! Oh no! You vile beast!
"Wow, Mom, the peacock is displaying its feathers!"
"Such good luck to see a peacock spreading its tail in October, come quickly and see."
"Come on, come on, come on!"
The magnificent and giant tail fan immediately captivated all the nearby tourists, drawing everyone to gather around, phones out, capturing the moment.
The peacock was originally standing right in front of Lin Li and Chen Yu Ying, making their position the center of attention.
It was a bit crowded, and perhaps someone accidentally bumped her from behind, causing Chen Yu Ying to lean against Lin Li’s body.
Lin Li steadied Chen Yu Ying with both hands, then slightly turned sideways, letting her lean against the railing in front of them, while he stood behind, creating a comfortable space and blocking all the push from behind.
The power of the earth! As solid as a rock!
"Lin Li, how did you do that?" Chen Yu Ying didn’t care about any of this; she just turned around, her eyes filled with obvious admiration and curiosity, eagerly asking Lin Li.
Lin Li now understood Wang Ziyi.
The gaze of an adoring girl is truly a life’s stimulant.
Hey? I wonder if this excuse would work if I got arrested at the Olympics?
"It’s a long story," Lin Li, his thoughts wandering too far, pulled back and began to reminisce about his past:
"A few years ago, when I went to London, I accidentally found Platform nine and three-quarters and got into Hogwarts. The Sorting Hat sorted me into civil engineering, and thus began my eventful life.
Those Gryffindor and Slytherin students all mocked me, saying civil engineering wasn’t good, but I think civil engineering is quite good. It’s easier to find a job after graduation, unlike many professions where it’s hard to find work. I’ve seen many senior brothers complaining about how tough the work site is, and I thought if you can’t endure this hardship, you surely can’t do anything else either..."
"Lin Li!"
Although it wasn’t grounded from the start, veering into civil engineering was too outrageous. Seeing Lin Li still intending to continue this story without stopping anytime soon, Chen Yu Ying called his name with amusement and a hint of displeasure.
"In summary, it’s magic! Magic! Equivalent to the little spell «Avada Eat Big Melon»." Lin Li concluded with a laugh.
"I don’t believe it, there’s no such thing as magic. How did you actually do it, tell me."
Chen Yu Ying tried hard to widen her eyes, staring straight at Lin Li with a soft voice.
Bu Hao!
She’s acting cute!
Class monitor, you doing this—
Lin Li: "The password to my bank card is 129836."
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
Why suddenly tell me the bank card password?
Lin Li sighed again: "Although it’s a bit embarrassing, since the class monitor wants to know, I can only tell you.
I earned it by sacrificing my dignity."
"Huh?"
"Actually, I didn’t go to the bathroom just now, I went inside the Peacock Garden, and knelt before the peacock. I said, Brother Kong, there were many people outside just now, so I’ll kneel for you now, please do me a favor and display your tail later?
The peacock didn’t agree at first, but after hearing that I’m an adherent of Confucianism, a disciple of Confucius, part of the Kong family, it reluctantly agreed to my request.
Class monitor, just hear it and don’t spread it; I need to save face."
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
Does Confucius really have this kind of face?
"...Lin Li."
"It was actually done by another staff member; he said he had a way, I don’t know exactly." Seeing the gradual disappointment in Chen Yu Ying’s eyes, Lin Li said with a smile.
Of course, it was the ’Duck Blood Bottle’ that played its role at this moment.
At this moment, Lin Li’s ’Duck Blood Bottle’ still stored the lust from the tiger.
The ’Duck Blood Bottle’ has never been limited to absorbing human cultivators’ lust; high-intelligence spiritual beasts are also within its range of influence. However, the emotions absorbed have reproductive isolation— for instance, the emotions in the bottle right now can’t be transferred to humans.
And since peacocks display their tails when they are courting or defending against threats, why not make it court or feel threatened?
So Lin Li originally had two plans, one of lust and the other of fear.
Both were easy to gather; the isolated tiger in the Lust Tiger Garden brimmed with it, and fear could be collected by scaring a timid animal in the zoo.
After collecting the tiger’s lust, to avoid losing face if the peacock didn’t display its tail during the actual operation, Lin Li went to the Peacock Garden alone to experiment and succeeded; the inexplicable tail display the staff witnessed earlier was caused by Lin Li.
Although he simply wanted to look cool, it was nice to complete [Task Five] along the way.
The rewards for Task Five were decent, but it was the last chance to double it, more suited for a month’s physical training or spending on a beautiful lady, so Lin Li didn’t choose to double it.
[You have received a reward: Physical Improvement: Insight increase by 50%, Spiritual Qi absorption rate increase by 100%; System currency *100.]
"Is there really such a thing?" Hearing this, Chen Yu Ying skeptically and surprisingly tilted her head, searching for the staff’s figures around, somewhat doubtful.
But didn’t pursue further.
It didn’t matter if it was magic or not.
What mattered was that moment’s joy and excitement, a thousand times better, a million times more unforgettable than the peacock’s display.
Recalling that moment, Chen Yu Ying’s lips could not suppress a smile.
The sorrows and joys of people and beasts aren’t connected, and now after displaying its tail, the peacock was full of question marks: "?"
Who am I? Where am I? What am I doing?
Never mind it! First mate! Then mate again! Finally mate!
Was I born to mate! Mating forever!
I’m going to the dock to mate!
"Ah! Ah! Ah!" The peacock let out a call to attract a mate and was now all about escaping.
With no response, it twisted its body sharply, focusing on a few alluring female peacocks in the district.
Panic panic panic panic panic.
Mate! Mate!
"Why is the peacock leaving?" Seeing the peacock hastily departing, the tourists regrettably lamented.
Lin Li poured the remaining lust from the bottle toward the female peacocks it rushed to.
Brother Kong, thank you. This is the last thing I can do for you.
"Class monitor, there’s no regret now, right?" As the crowd dispersed, Lin Li said to Chen Yu Ying with a smile.
"Mm!" Chen Yu Ying nodded heavily, then smiled sweetly, "Thank you."
"Let’s thank the Sorting Hat and civil engineering."
After giving a quick glance, Chen Yu Ying saw a message on her phone and said, "Let’s go back to where the foxes are, Si Han and Wanqiu are back, asking where I am."
"Okay."
Lin Li nodded, "It’s a pity they missed my magic."
"Yes, what a pity." Chen Yu Ying walked ahead, her light steps hiding tiny mischief in her eyes facing away.
A few minutes passed.
Peacock Garden District.
The staff, who had been pacing back and forth, confirmed that the two had indeed left, and after checking that no one was watching him.
He took a deep breath, drew a semicircle with his hand, pointing at the peacock, and lowered his voice: "Display for me."
Nothing·happened.
The peacock glanced at him, where did this fool come from.
Staff: "..."
"Oi! Peacock, display for me! Display for me, display for me, display for me!"
"Ah ah ah ah! Ah! You beast! Dis! Play! For! Me!"
The staff exerted all his means, yet there was no reaction.
Truly strange, where exactly did it go wrong, didn’t I replicate that young couple’s actions perfectly?
Is it a language issue?
"Open you tail for me!!"
"私のために画面を開けて!"
"Cluck cluck cluck display cluck cluck cluck!"

chapters.title: Chapter 259 - 213: I Said, I Never Left
chapters.content:
Chapter 259: Chapter 213: I Said, I Never Left
With Chen Yu Ying, Lin Li and Ding Sihan met up with Qu Wanqiu.
Experience shows that Lin Li has a hard head.
"Where’s Bai Bufan?" Rubbing their sore heads from the collision, both Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu asked the same question.
"How should I know?" Lin Li, who had quietly left Bai Bufan at the restroom entrance and ran off without a care, said.
Without a mental burden, if such a big person with a phone and electricity can get lost in a zoo, then Bai Bufan has made his mark in this life.
It could be considered early record removal for the Bai Family.
"Didn’t he send you a private message?" Ding Sihan checked the group chat, Bai Bufan indeed didn’t speak in the group, so she asked.
"He did, I pretended not to see it." Lin Li nodded.
"..."
"Leaving someone on read is the worst, a form of cold violence, tsk tsk." Ding Sihan laughed first, then said disdainfully.
"I didn’t intend to click on it; I didn’t even mean to see it." Lin Li argued logically.
Ding Sihan: "..."
Well, that makes sense in a way.
"Lin Li, little friend, Lin Li, little friend! If you hear this broadcast, please find the nearest staff member and have them take you to the zoo’s broadcast station, your family is looking for you, and they are very worried."
"Lin Li, little friend, Lin Li, little friend! If you hear this broadcast..."
At this moment, the broadcast resounded throughout the zoo, causing visitors to pause, and after hearing that it wasn’t related to them, they returned to their own activities.
But Lin Li: "?"
He opened his mouth wide, dumbfounded.
Don’t disturb, I’m barbequing.
As for the other three girls, they were also stunned at first, but then looked at Lin Li’s dumbfounded expression, and uncontrollable laughter leaked from their tightly closed mouths.
Lin Li took a deep breath, smiled, and said: "Lin Li is quite a common name, it might just be a kid with the same name who’s lost, no need to worry."
He took out his phone.
Ignored Bai Bufan’s heap of messages.
「Lin Li: Haha, you sent me so many messages, I just passed out from gluing and just woke up, where are you now?」
「Bai Bufan: At the broadcast station, looking for a kid.」
"Damn!"
It really is this bastard!
Wasting public resources, Bai Bufan is such a beast, damn it!
This level of birth behavior is comparable to calling him a monkey when entering the zoo.
Heavenly Dao is cyclical, heaven spares no one.
"Let’s go! Pick him up!" Lin Li said through gritted teeth with a darkened face.
The girls laughed as they followed behind.
At the broadcast station, Bai Bufan watched Lin Li’s arrival with a cold smile.
"Are you? Do you need our help?" Seeing Lin Li and his group’s arrival, the staff at the broadcast station inquired.
"Hello, I’m the little friend, Lin Li." Lin Li smiled.
The staff looked up, seeing Lin Li who was at least a head taller: "?"
"Sister, actually, I’m only eight years old." Lin Li continued to smile.
Wu Min dares to say she’s twenty-eight to the outside, why can’t I say I’m eight.
Staff: "..."
Let the bullets fly into reality.
However, afterward, both Bai Bufan and Lin Li, the little friend, were scolded by the staff at the broadcast station.
Both solemnly apologized and promised not to do it again next time.
After all, they indeed caused trouble for the zoo officials.
Fortunately, Bai Bufan was sensible, he mentioned that it wasn’t urgent, so the broadcast station didn’t notify all staff to help find them, so while Lin Li and Bai Bufan annoyed the zoo, it wasn’t too troublesome.
As for why Lin Li also got scolded, it’s naturally because Bai Bufan wouldn’t let him leave.
"Just playing a hide-and-seek game to relive childhood, you’re really impatient." After the scolding, as the group left the broadcast station, Lin Li said disdainfully.
"And you have the nerve to bark? You seem like the type who’d play hide-and-seek with friends, but no matter if you’re the seeker or the one hiding, you’d go straight home." Bai Bufan said with a face full of resentment.
Lin Li was shocked by these words: "Have you seen me when I was little? How do you know so clearly? Turns out we are childhood sweethearts?"
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Sweetheart, your horse! Did you really do that? Your family must have forgotten to hire a sage when you were born."
"They did, and the next day he died by accident."
"Fair enough."
Once everyone was gathered, the five of them continued to see the remaining animals in the zoo they hadn’t visited yet.
The zoo’s area isn’t large to begin with, even walking very slowly, it takes at most three hours to see everything.
After watching an animal performance, the girls decided to leave.
As for Lin Li and Bai Bufan.
"How about we watch another one?" Lin Li was still interested.
"I agree." Bai Bufan nodded, "This performance was quite white and long."
Ding Sihan was speechless: "What on earth do you two want to watch, I don’t even want to expose you."
The staff assisting with the animal performances were a few very good-looking young ladies.
No wonder there are so many fathers here at the animal performances.
Indeed, it was quite a sight.
"Behind the animal performances is cruel training, I’m boycotting animal performances, hence I resolutely didn’t look at the animals at all, how is that wrong, I’m helping the animals!" Lin Li felt wronged and righteously said.
Then he got one approving look and three disdainful ones.
Qu Wanqiu suddenly wanted to laugh: "What is Lin Li’s help equivalent to?
When someone falls into a well, Lin Li would first come to help, and with Lin Li’s help, that person adapted to life at the bottom of the well."
Bai Bufan heard this and touched his chin, nodded: "Indeed, that’s a spot-on summary, something Lin Li would do."
Lin Li: "?"

chapters.title: Chapter 260 - 213: I Told You, I Never Left_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 260: Chapter 213: I Told You, I Never Left_2
Awkward silence.
I suddenly crave for ice-cold watermelon and begin tossing watermelons into the well. Oh, but only the ones that aren’t heavy.
Zoo exit.
Lin Li’s advanced notice seems to have worked. Bai Bufan wasn’t asked for ID while leaving the zoo, and there was no property dispute.
"Hello, could you give us your feedback on Shanting Zoo? Whether it’s shortcomings or strengths, or any suggestions, we’d love to hear them." Several staff members, holding tablets, were questioning each leaving visitor.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan exchanged glances and immediately approached the nearest staff member: "We do, mate, yes we do."
Staff member: "?"
"Could you please elaborate?" he asked.
"We have both shortcomings and suggestions."
"Alright, I’m all ears." The staff member, hearing this, quickly went into listening mode.
"Shanting Zoo is actually nice, not as bad as online folks say. But I have a suggestion: you could launch an ’All-you-can-eat with cows’ event to attract visitors." Lin Li said enthusiastically.
Staff member: "... But we’re a zoo, not a restaurant."
"No, you misunderstood. I mean, since your cows are quite docile, why not let visitors pay a small fee to enter the cow area and eat grass together with them? Grass is limitless, and there’s little cost but lots of buzz, don’t you think?"
Staff member: "?"
Is ’with cows’ not a noun, but a compound of a conjunction and an object?
"This buzz might really work... In this era of flow-driven businesses, it could indeed draw some attention. I’ll summarize it and report." The staff member considered seriously upon hearing this.
You can teach a child, after all.
"Me, me, I also have a suggestion: why don’t you find a dragon, I’m sure visitors will flood in." Bai Bufan, not willing to lag behind, quickly said.
"Dragons? They’re nonexistent; we can’t possibly manage that..." The staff member replied awkwardly.
"There are dragons in this world. When I stay at home for ten minutes in my room, my mom asks if I’m a dragon because I can’t hear her asking me to hang clothes. Turns out if you stay home for ten minutes, you might evolve into a dragon. You guys should train one and keep it according to my thought,"
Bai Bufan gestured with his finger and then told the staff member about his impressive discovery that might shake the biology world.
Staff member: "..."
"Thank you for your suggestions, the exit is this way, have a nice day." The staff member maintained a friendly smile, pointing towards the exit, polite and sincere.
However, the two forced a camaraderie on him, clearly having much more to say:
"Suggestions are done, now about shortcomings that you should improve."
"The exit is this way, please have a nice day."
"Your ticket resale isn’t available, I can’t purchase any second-hand tickets from your retriever either."
"The exit is this way, please quickly leave."
"Your keeper didn’t let me touch the tiger’s balls, I really want to, could you relay this suggestion?"
"Please, I beg you, just leave."
The staff member sighed.
Apparently, today is not a good day to be out without checking the lunar calendar.
...
After tormenting the staff, the five of them grabbed dinner nearby.
Later, they went to Shanting District to buy some things that could count as local specialties, rare to find in Xiling.
"Today’s ending, going home tomorrow, school the day after, life is so fleeting, why did my National Day holiday fly by so fast?" Ding Sihan lamented.
"Indeed, I still want to hang out with everyone," Qu Wanqiu nodded.
Today is already the fifth; they need to be at school by the night of the seventh for evening self-study. Sending everyone home again on the seventh isn’t realistic, especially when Bai Bufan hasn’t started his holiday homework at all. Even copying wouldn’t be possible in one evening.
As everyone knows, English is a subject with incomprehensible copied answers, while Chinese is a subject where one doesn’t want to copy after seeing the answers.
So playing for four days is truly the limit.
"There’s no banquet that doesn’t break up, but if you’re treating, I can stay longer." Lin Li said after hearing that.
"Lin Li, ’I still want to play with everyone’, the focus is ’play’, not ’everyone’, especially you, Lin Li, you go away." Qu Wanqiu smiled and turned back.
"Nice, the aggression level is rising, you can teach a child." Lin Li nodded with satisfaction, not feeling offended at all.
"Next long holiday that allows going far won’t be until the winter holidays for New Year, that’s so far," Qu Wanqiu expressed her sentiment after speaking against her will.
Going out with this group of people was really fun.
Especially since there are now these two jokers added.
"Not bad, there’s less than four months left until Liu Dehua thaws, it’s quite soon. Come New Year’s Eve, I’ll find you all to set off fireworks together." Lin Li said lightly, without much of the melancholy feeling
"You three are Xiling People, it’s convenient to hang out then. Bai Bufan and I are too far from you all," Qu Wanqiu said with emotion, "We can’t always rely on Ying Bao to send a car to pick us up, can we? That would be too troublesome."
"No problem at all, just taking a car," Chen Yu Ying, who intended to say this at the beginning of the sentence, added.
"Leave it to me then," Lin Li patted his chest and said loudly, "If all goes well, by then, I should have passed and got my driver’s license. During the holidays when my mom is at home, I’ll steal her car, perfect."
"Really?" Bai Bufan’s eyes lit up when he heard this. He had no qualms about exploiting Lin Li.
Even if it’s past midnight, he would dare ask Lin Li to drop him home first, and then make his own way back to Xiling.
"Can you really pass?" Bai Bufan asked doubtfully again.
"For someone who’s in the bracket of 272, best show some basic respect to the rank of 51. Speaking at least requires respectful language, not everyone is like you, a slacker whose effort shows little progress."
Lin Li straightened his collar, speaking with arrogant tone.
Bai Bufan: "..."
"You’ll be doomed if you fail." Bai Bufan cursed.
"Agreed." Qu Wanqiu nodded along with Ding Sihan.
"It’s best to only have age mates in the car, I’d prefer sitting in one driven by you. Keep it up, you must pass by then." Chen Yu Ying also encouraged Lin Li.
"I won’t let you down." Lin Li nodded confidently.
With something worth looking forward to, everyone’s steps became a bit lighter.
...
The girls accidentally shopped for another two hours before they carried large shopping bags back to the inn.
They were all tired from walking, after all, they’d already spent an afternoon in the zoo, and continued wandering in the evening.
Even Cultivators get a bit worn out, let alone them?
Bai Bufan went to the bathroom first.
Came out.
Lin Li: "Clap clap clap clap! Bufan! Awesome!! Baby is amazing!"
Ding Sihan: "Bai Bufan! Congrats!"
Qu Wanqiu: "To actually go to the bathroom on schedule! How impressive."
Chen Yu Ying: "So good! Very impressive."
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Wait, what are you all doing?" Bai Bufan’s Adam’s apple moved, standing at the bathroom door, afraid to step out.
The girls shifted their gaze to Lin Li.
Immediately spotting the culprit.
Facing Bai Bufan’s doubting look, Lin Li shrugged: "I fulfilled your little wish."
"What little wis—wait a moment." Bai Bufan squinted, he seemed to remember.
Setting aside the nature of insult, being a dog isn’t bad at all, carefree, going to the bathroom to poop on schedule and being praised as ’baby is great’, I envy
This was the original sentence he said to Lin Li earlier in the zoo.
Bai Bufan: "..."
Grass.
Bai Bufan gradually comprehended everything.
Did this guy just tell the girls while he was in the bathroom, and they cooperated with him?
Bai Bufan found it hard to respond, not knowing what to say.
Lin Li keenly remembered such a sentence, it’s heartwarming but the method of fulfilling the wish seemed a bit off.
I envy getting simple praise! Pooping was just an example!
"Thanks, but no need to do this next time." Lin Li had good intentions but next time, better not start, Bai Bufan had to swallow all those foul words.
Wait a second.
Didn’t Lin Li say something about not leaving the insult nature behind?
Bai Bufan raised his head, squinted: "Hold on, I’d like to withdraw my thanks first."
"Lin Li, I need confirmation, did you mean to insult me just now?"
"What else?" Lin Li looked puzzled, wondering why Bai Bufan would ask such a question.
Then rolled away from the incoming slipper.
"So the starting point was bad too!"
"Grass!"

chapters.title: Chapter 261 - 214: Food Safety Cannot Be Delayed
chapters.content:
Chapter 261: Chapter 214: Food Safety Cannot Be Delayed
Bai Bufan wielded the extinguisher, chasing Lin Li around the room— the fire extinguisher sign in the inn was a bit outdated, and with a couple of letters missing, "fire" became "people".
But hey, at least it’s serving its purpose.
"Bad dog! Bai Bufan, you bad dog! Stop chasing, sit! Sit!"
Lin Li’s insults sounded more like whining but were highly insulting nonetheless.
Their chase was uproariously loud, and the three girls present had no empathy whatsoever for this vile pet attack incident; they were laughing more cheerfully than anyone.
Who the hell said women are naturally capable of love?
Show some love already!
...
"Whew—" Lin Li came down the stairs and sat back on the mat, letting out a long breath.
Only Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu were left on the first floor; Chen Yu Ying was probably upstairs taking a bath.
"Where’s Bai Bufan?" Ding Sihan inquired.
Lin Li sighed, "This guy caught me off guard just now, and he gave me two choices: death or let him touch my butt."
Qu Wanqiu was already laughing, "What did you choose, Lin Li?"
"Of course, death," Lin Li said matter-of-factly.
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu’s laughter was boisterous.
"Anyway, he’s off playing games. Aren’t you going upstairs to rest? Or are you planning to watch me naked?"
Everyone was tired from the day, and although it was just nine o’clock, which wasn’t too late, no one wanted to do anything else together. Lin Li had come downstairs intending to take a bath, adding that he waved the clothing in his hand.
"Yu Ying is already in the bath. Sigh, I haven’t washed my hair in days; I have to wash it tonight. I’m somewhat envious of Tang Monk," Ding Sihan sighed and remarked upon hearing this.
"Why envy Tang Monk?" Qu Wanqiu, who was next to them, didn’t understand.
"Because Tang Monk never had to bathe himself. Every time he got captured, the little ones had to obey their king and clean him up. How many baths did he take through the eighty-one tribulations?" Lin Li speculated upon hearing this.
Who knows if any demons were curious enough to pinch Tang Monk.
In any case, Bai Bufan definitely couldn’t resist.
"Exactly, during the stage where I found bathing troublesome, I used to be terribly envious," Ding Sihan snapped her fingers, acknowledging Lin Li.
Qu Wanqiu: "..."
Can that be considered a bath, or is it a food safety issue?
"Now that you mention it, no wonder Tang Monk had such smooth skin, and the Queen of the Kingdom of Women liked him. While others trudged through dust and grime, he bathed daily, making him stand out," Qu Wanqiu commented after her thoughts wandered.
"If the Queen of the Kingdom of Women could love anyone in the traveling party at first sight, she truly would be something," Lin Li frowned, looking at Qu Wanqiu’s sharp critique.
Qu Wanqiu: "..."
Seems plausible.
"Tang Monk was a heartbreaker; I feel he clearly had feelings but wasn’t brave enough. Why couldn’t he just take the Queen away?"
Qu Wanqiu commented again, as girls tend to think differently when watching this sort of thing than boys do.
If Lin Li were Tang Monk, he would have had a clear conscience and five kids by now.
Upon hearing Qu Wanqiu say this, Lin Li furrowed his brows deeply, incredulous that she would propose such an idea:
"Little Qiuqiu, they were going to India, to where even a White Dragon Horse would get pinched. You want Tang Monk to take the Queen of the Kingdom of Women there? Are you serious? As a pure love warrior, I can’t stand cuckolds."
Qu Wanqiu: "?"
Qu Wanqiu lowered her head and began to laugh suppressedly, "...Sorry."
Lin Li’s "even the White Dragon Horse would get pinched" utterly broke her.
The funniest thing is, indeed, it’s something India could pull off; it’s not slander.
"Sihan, I’m done with my shower," Chen Yu Ying’s voice came from the third floor at this point.
Skincare doesn’t need to be done in the bathroom, so when it comes to not including hair-washing, girls aren’t particularly slow at bathing.
"Class rep, is the bathwater still there?" At those words, Lin Li quickly asked.
There was no response.
Lin Li surmised the class rep must have whispered "pervert," just too quietly for him to hear.
He didn’t know if the prefix was good or bad.
"What are you two looking at me like that for? What? Haven’t you learned about water resource utilization in elementary school? Rice rinse water can be used for plants, laundry water can flush toilets, and bathwater can quench thirst; aren’t these basics?"
Two gazes from nearby made Lin Li uncomfortable, and he retorted.
Ding Sihan, Qu Wanqiu: "..."
Has some strange common sense slipped in; where is this common sense anyway?
This guy, still performing consistently.
Qu Wanqiu: "Which elementary school? Tell me so I can dodge it."
Lin Li felt misunderstood; as a kid, any boy who didn’t guzzle shower water from the showerhead had great self-control.
Besides, what’s wrong with a little homage to Durant?
"Sigh, I’m going to take a shower." Ding Sihan got up and stretched.
Then she glanced at Lin Li, who let out a pitiful sigh, hit right on the head by a pillow.
Ding Sihan hugged her chest, looking at Lin Li with extreme disdain: "Lin Li, I’m a bit hungry. Make me a snack, and I’ll skip brushing teeth and eat after my bath."
Such demanding attitude, Uncle Ding is indeed overbearing.
"I want some too!" Qu Wanqiu, who had only heard but not witnessed this hidden culinary god, was also very interested.
"What a shame, although I really want to serve you, I used up all the fridge ingredients this morning for breakfast, can’t make it." You could tell Lin Li truly regretted, his mouth formed a sad Nike swoosh.
After all, although Lin Li mastered cooking, he didn’t find cooking terribly enjoyable yet.
After trying to make breakfast for himself that morning, he found ordering takeout still more convenient.
"Then I’ll have to order takeout." After checking the fridge and realizing Lin Li wasn’t lying, Ding Sihan said regretfully.
"Ugh, what a pity."
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu went upstairs, while Lin Li also started taking a shower.
"Lin Li, the takeout has arrived, can you grab it?" Ding Sihan called from the third floor as Lin Li finished showering.
They’ve mastered the lazy dog technique too.
Check what’s been ordered, and sneak a bite if it’s tasty.
Three minutes later.
Lin Li, with a stern expression, thudded up to the third floor, holding the takeout in his hand, looking grim, questioning Ding Sihan, "Ding Sihan, come on, tell your dad, what takeout did you order?"
"Ingredients, probably for three or four people. The leftovers, you can have it for breakfast tomorrow."
Sitting in front of the dressing mirror with Chen Yu Ying, both holding hair dryers to dry their wet hair, Ding Sihan replied just like a rich lady commanding her pretty maid, sounding righteous and confident.
Lin Li: "..."
You damn well call ordering takeout this kind of takeout?
"Why don’t you just order ready-made snacks?" Lin Li questioned.
"You’re too eager to serve us, I can’t let you down." Ding Sihan replied.
Lin Li: "..."
"Xiaodingding, do you know what you have to do before winning a woman’s heart through her stomach?" After a moment of silence, Lin Li asked.
"What?"
"First, you have to clamp the proximal and distal ends of the arteries, or the blood will spill out." Lin Li smiled.
Ding Sihan: "..."
So it’s literally grabbing the stomach?
"Ying Bao can also eat, you’re not allowed to poison it." Feeling a hint of danger, Ding Sihan pulled out her lifeline.
Only a middle finger could express Lin Li’s feelings.
But it didn’t really matter much.
Already preparing to go downstairs, Lin Li thudded back to the bathroom door, pretended to peek inside, then turned back and asked, "Class rep, you didn’t leave a drop, huh?"
Chen Yu Ying picked up the hairdryer to cover her face and blew in Lin Li’s direction.
"... Pervert, ugh."
This time it was heard.
Ding Sihan: "I left mine, do you want it?"
Ding Sihan: "Lin Li, turn around and respond to this before going downstairs!"
Ding Sihan: "Why are you running away!"
...
Cooking, honestly, preparing for one or five people isn’t much different, so Lin Li and the group enjoyed another late-night snack.
Transferred one dollar of heritage onto Qu Wanqiu’s face, so the "clean it yourself" person turned out to be her.
Lin Li returned to the second floor.
After burping, Bai Bufan looked at Lin Li: "Lin Li, it’s still early tonight, let’s play some games."
"Not playing." Lin Li refused.
"Not just me, Wang Ze and Haoyang are here too. The four of us together are quite formidable." Bai Bufan continued to persuade.
"It’s not them you’re supposed to support."
"Then you support me."
"That’s more hopeless than seeing a giant head appear on the city wall."
Bai Bufan: "..."
"Lin Li, we’re going home tomorrow, and we’ve never teamed up to play during our outing. Don’t you think that’s unreasonable? Plus, it’s just after ten; even if you have a good routine, playing until twelve then sleeping isn’t late." Bai Bufan reasoned sincerely, with heartfelt words.
Lin Li sighed and started to chant:
"Bufan, remember, it’s not about not playing, it’s about playing at a slower and more measured pace. Play in order, play with moderation, transition from high quantity play to high quality play, strive to achieve playing first to lead to playing later, achieving collective playing.
However, you’re currently just high quantity playing. You need high quality playing for me to follow along later."
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Did the midterm exams really knock you silly? You’re saying such things," Bai Bufan had a face full of black lines.
"What do you mean? What do you mean by ’saying such things’? What are you trying to express? Who let you into my room? I don’t know you! Get out!" Lin Li retreated cautiously on the rug, pointing at Bai Bufan.
Bai Bufan: "..."
If you want to trump up charges, you won’t lack excuses.
Seeing Bai Bufan still wanting to persuade, Lin Li suddenly squinted, puzzled, and asked, "Did something burn?"
Upon hearing this, Bai Bufan tried sniffing hard.
Lin Li quickly realized: "Oh, turns out I farted."
With his nose still sniffing and the scent already in it, Bai Bufan: "?"
"You bastard!" Bai Bufan widened his eyes.
Saying something burned after farting, is this a true sword burial?
"Just consider it fulfilling your request to me during that Monopoly game." Lin Li spoke innocently, "Now it’s your turn."
"How is it my turn now! How can I release one now!" Bai Bufan roared while covering his nose, "And mine wasn’t smelly, you ridiculous guy, what did you eat, why so stinky!"
"It’s already generous letting you smell it, and now you want the recipe? You greedy little cat." Seeing Bai Bufan eyeing his trade secrets, Lin Li immediately became alert.
Bai Bufan: "?"
Bai Bufan swiftly fled the scene, leaving only his angry shouts in the air:
"I’m craving your ’beep’ cat! That’s a ’beep’ recipe!"

chapters.title: Chapter 262 - 215: Lin Li Doesn’t Want Evolutionary Advantages
chapters.content:
Chapter 262: Chapter 215: Lin Li Doesn’t Want Evolutionary Advantages
[For one consecutive month, rise and diligently practice the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique before 5:00 AM, cumulate at least half an hour before 7:00 AM (30/30).]
[Task One completed]
[Do you want to use the "Random Reward Doubler Card (1/3)"?]
[You have used it.]
[You have received the reward: Physical Improvement: Comprehensive Recovery Ability increased by 100%; Qi Blood increased by 50%; Lower-grade Spirit Stone*20; System Currency*150.]
The increase in Qi Blood made Lin Li briefly feel warm, although each increase is 50% and the base is growing. However, because the previous BUFF effect is also in effect, the increase compared to the overall is decreasing, so Lin Li adapted faster than the previous two times.
This time, the time left for Tyson is really not much.
Youth is fleeting, and strength changes.
As for the reward doubling, it hit the comprehensive recovery ability in the Physical Improvement category.
This ability can recover various recoverable values in the human body, covering aspects like Mana, physical strength, and Spiritual Power, making it quite useful.
However, Lin Li most wanted the system currency to be doubled.
Had I known, I would have saved it to use on the Beauty task, but Lin Li only expresses this regret verbally and doesn’t actually worry about it. He turned his gaze towards the system.
[A month flew by swiftly, the Cultivation Technique has initially formed, the path to ascension lies beneath your feet, but do not become prideful, the foundation remains unstable, you must work hard to fully master it, understand it thoroughly!]
[Time-Limited Task triggered!]
[Task One: Master the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique within two months.]
[Reward: Title: Fruit of Persistence; Physical Improvement: Qi Blood increased by 100% and physical strength increased by 100%; Medium-grade Spirit Stone*5; System Currency*200.]
[Fruit of Persistence: Upon equipping it, your efficiency in focusing on a task will slowly increase; the longer you cumulatively focus on this task, the greater the increase, with no upper limit.
When the title is removed, cumulative time is not reset.]
[The path of the body, forging has shown its initial effects, but has never been practical; there are still shortcomings. Seek sparring or actual combat to fill the gaps!]
[Task triggered!]
[Task Two: Seek out accomplished Body Cultivators for related sparring and gain victory or recognition (0/10)]
[Task Reward: Martial Arts related random ability*1.]
Triggered two tasks at once.
Not bad.
Just on the third, Lin Li’s task bar was still filled with six tasks, but just now, it almost only had the Beauty task left.
Almost lost the goal.
Now with two more tasks, it looks much better.
Lin Li originally thought the next Task One would require him to persist in the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique for a year, but now it seems that’s not the case.
To master the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique within two months.
This Cultivation Technique, over the course of a month, Lin Li has practiced the physical Chapters all once, and due to a shortage of Spirit Stones at one point, he’s practiced approximately three and a half Spiritual Qi Chapters.
However, Lin Li doesn’t think this task will be completed just by finishing the remaining half Chapter of Spiritual Qi, otherwise, it wouldn’t specifically mention mastery.
I fear it requires considerable mastery.
Since that’s the case, although the task doesn’t require it, Lin Li will continue to maintain the habit of rising early to practice every day.
This habit is quite nice.
Benefits of getting up early: More time, able to have breakfast, clear thinking conducive to reflection, good complexion, boost immunity...
Benefits of staying in bed: Joy, Joy, Joy, Joy...
One must admit, both have lots of benefits.
However, Lin Li worries that after enjoying himself again, he’ll be infatuated with this feeling once more.
Lin Li hasn’t forgotten his early days when he got the system and needed to rise early every day, groaning right on schedule; at that time, without his boss’s protection and encouragement, he would have long given up.
Once I succeed in cultivation, I’ll torch all helicopters around the world for him.
Now, it’s barely a habit, so better not abandon it.
Perhaps the best time to practice the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique is morning before seven.
The rewards for this task are also extravagantly rich.
Spirit Stones, system currency, Physical Improvement all are great, and there’s one title in Lin Li’s opinion that’s heaven-defying — [Fruit of Persistence].
Though it mentions the increase is "slow," the phrase "no upper limit" is too eye-catching.
And changing the title doesn’t affect this accumulation, unlike [Thunder Attractor] whereby removing it resets progress.
If I had gotten this title on the first day I received the system, perhaps my efficiency in practicing the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique now would be overwhelmingly high.
Of course, it might not surpass the 50% from [Light of Xiling].
But [Light of Xiling] is restricted to orthodox cultivation techniques, whereas [Fruit of Persistence] has no such limits.
Take sleeping as an example, theoretically, deep sleep could also be considered focused sleeping, so wouldn’t equipping this title during sleep mean that my sleep efficiency gradually increases, sleeping five minutes equates to being awake for two hours?
Focused learning, focused exercise, anything can increase efficiency.
Focus isn’t difficult for Lin Li, just thinking about it makes the future look promising, itching to get this title now.
Wait a minute, Lin Li’s expression froze.
——How does focused masturbation count?
When masturbating, I’m quite serious, my mind filled with lust, highly concentrated.
Theoretically, the efficiency of masturbation might also increase, but the problem is how this improvement gets reflected on me?
Does it make you faster, or make it more pleasurable?
If it makes you faster, those situations could be treated with medication...
If you’re neither weak nor premature, isn’t that incredibly wretched?
Although Lin Li has studied, given early humans were more susceptible to predator attacks during mating, at a point in human evolution, premature ejaculation must have been an evolutionary advantage.
But this advantage isn’t needed now.
System! Answer me! Speak!
The damned system remains silent today.
Anyway, never mind, in the future when I get the title, I’ll just remove it during lewd moments.
Moreover, considering this now is premature, I can’t obtain it anytime soon.
As for the second sparring task, it might not be as easy to complete as before with "accomplished" being some sort of filter criteria.
It also requires me to win, which means I can’t pretend like I did with Xiaozhou and throw the match early.
Could I beat Xiaozhou now?
Does this task require sparring with ten people, or can I spar ten times with one person?
If I smash Xiaozhou ten times, will I complete the task?
Let’s try it tomorrow.
For now, let’s try something else.
"Looks like you’re not quite an accomplished Body Cultivator," Lin Li shook his head in disappointment.
Bai Bufan, whose brain was still offline: "?"
He was sleeping soundly when suddenly Lin Li dragged him into an exhilarating body confrontation, leaving him begging for mercy. Afterward, Lin Li tossed him aside, looking at him with disdain.
Not a buddy.
Are you crazy?
College seniors should be quite afraid of Lin Li, after all, not everyone can pass this kind of preliminary test.
"What time is it now?" Bai Bufan’s muddled brain could only muster this question.
"It’s 6:30 in the morning."
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Lin Li, damn it!" Bai Bufan struggled to get up, trying to grab Lin Li.
Lin Li tried to rush out the door.
He didn’t succeed, the lodging’s quality was decent.
...
Continuing to study driving test knowledge with "Enhanced Learning," I’ve boasted in front of them, so I can’t let everyone down, I must surely get that license.
If I really can’t get it, I’ll look for those certificate engraving services on utility poles and walls I’ve seen since childhood; Lin Li has always been curious about the process behind them.
After Chen Yu Ying woke up and practiced riding the electric scooter with her in the morning, Lin Li returned the scooter to the store.
The crooked merchant claimed it had some wear from his riding and deducted five bucks from the deposit.
The tire tread was gone, couldn’t you just draw it back with a marker?
A problem that could be solved with a marker; why replace the tire?
When Lin Li walked back to the lodge, the other three were already up and had mostly packed their stuff.
Since they were heading home in the afternoon, no one went out for lunch, and they didn’t treat Lin Li like a workhorse to keep making meals; instead, they ordered takeout together.
This time it was actual takeout, after Lin Li watched everyone order, leaving Ding Sihan quite frustrated.
Lunch ended.
The table was a mess.
This time, before Lin Li could speak, everyone instinctively looked towards Qu Wanqiu, who also pulled out that one yuan with a mischievous smile.
Although it was quite baffling, that one yuan had become an unspoken rule among them.
Toss it at someone, and that person has to "clean up by themselves," Bai Bufan’s most significant action.
Lin Li pointed at Bai Bufan, and Bai Bufan pointed at Lin Li.
Qu Wanqiu stood up and started to walk around the dining table.
"Throwing in a handkerchief now?" Lin Li said with a laugh.
Stopped laughing.
If I hadn’t said that, would the note have landed on Bai Bufan’s head?
Alas, there were no ’ifs’.
"Yeah! Yeah!" Surviving Bai Bufan cheered happily.
"Serves you right for tossing it to me yesterday, self-inflicted!" Qu Wanqiu said proudly.
"Oh man, how was I supposed to know we’d order takeout at the lodge for lunch, I thought last night’s supper was the last meal. If I knew there was lunch, I would’ve saved it to toss to Ding Sihan at noon." Lin Li said regretfully.
Ding Sihan: "?"
"Lin Li, you deserve it!"
The four cold-hearted people just watched pitiful Lin Li clean up the mess all by himself, small, pitiful, and helpless.
Actually, they could’ve just left without cleaning anything, and the lodge should have someone come clean it, but since it was a ’freebie’, doing that wouldn’t leave a good impression.
For their last activity in the afternoon, everyone took the remaining snacks and drinks and headed to the lodge’s family KTV.
With five people singing with no problem, no one needed to go easy on anyone; if someone went off-tune or cracked, they’d immediately become the target of everyone’s ridicule, the people around were just that mean.
——The people around included Lin Li, Lin Li, Lin Li, and Lin Li.
Every time someone sang poorly, Lin Li would immediately mock them, imitating them with sarcastic and ironic tones.
Not even sparing Chen Yu Ying, it was truly an unbridled attack.
So when it was Lin Li’s turn to sing, everyone would immediately focus intently, listening closely, nitpicking, just waiting for Lin Li to make a tiny mistake so they could mock him back.
Unfortunately, Deep Blue gave Lin Li some points this round.
Hehe.
"Thunk——"
Lin Li was pinned against the wall, as a teary-eyed Bai Bufan grabbed his collar and with a voice choked with emotion demanded:
"I’ve been wanting to ask since the autumn outing! Lin Li! Tell me! Have you been attending other morning classes behind my back?"
We clearly agreed to go together, obviously...
However, faced with the tearful Bai Bufan, Lin Li, the cold and heartless man, looked calm:
"So what if I did, so what if I didn’t."
"Between us, it’s already over."
Bai Bufan covered his eyes with his arm, his voice hoarse: "You betrayed me! We clearly agreed! What does this mean for the promises we made back then!"
Lin Li instantly switched to a broadcaster’s tone:
"It’s a saying, ’sea vow and mountain alliance’, when lovers swear to love each other, metaphorically indicating that love should be as everlasting as the mountains and the sea, from Xin Qiji’s ’To the Prostitute by the Southern River’——’Parting tears are few, but pledges are always distant’."
Bai Bufan: "?"

chapters.title: Chapter 263 - 216: In Business, Lin Li Has a Gift
chapters.content:
Chapter 263: Chapter 216: In Business, Lin Li Has a Gift
"What prostitute? What’s the price?" Bai Bufan’s ears automatically filtered out the most important thing.
Lin Li: "?"
"Are you sick?" The two said in unison.
"No, how do you even remember these things? Are you preparing for a trivia competition?" Bai Bufan looked at Lin Li in surprise.
"It’s just something you can remember with one glance."
Lin Li shook off Bai Bufan’s hand, straightened his collar, and started showing off again.
Joining a trivia competition is not impossible; after all, I heard there’s a question bank for that. I didn’t know before and was amazed when I watched it, thinking everyone was so smart, all-knowing.
Bai Bufan was silent for a moment, then suddenly spoke: "Alliance of mountains and seas."
"Fishing for the moon in the sea." Lin Li immediately responded.
"Flowers before the moon."
Ding, Qu, Chen: "?"
Why did these two start playing idiom solitaire from zero frames? They only realized it now.
"Boundless prospects."
"Do what you can."
When Bai Bufan said this idiom, both of them laughed.
"Do whatever you want." Lin Li smiled.
"A nice idiom," Bai Bufan jojo-ed up, covering his face and laughed, "Then I’ll respond—with do whatever you want."
"Did you really give an answer without thinking? What a formidable opponent, I’ve got it! Do whatever you want!"
"You’re not bad either, but my idiom repertoire is stronger! Do! Whatever! You! Want!"
Watching the two who just started shouting one idiom, the three girls with microphones were silent.
What on earth are you two so excited about!
These two seemed like they had started idiom solitaire just for this moment.
"This is a KTV, not a place for idiom solitaire. Can we do things that are actually meant for KTV!" Ding Sihan shook the microphone in her hand and complained helplessly.
"Fair enough."
Lin Li nodded, then said to Bai Bufan, "Dude, stop messing around, let’s sing a bit, your fingers are turning white from soaking."
"I’m messing with your dam, I’m just warning you not to steal my fruit platter." Bai Bufan immediately got into the groove, tapped Lin Li’s hand, and gave him a disdainful glance, "Wang Gang can stay, the rest of you can take your sisters out hurry and change a batch for me..."
Ding Sihan: "?"
"What kind of KTV is this! Isn’t this a bit too unorthodox!!"
"It’s a business KTV, the quickest way to success." Lin Li said as if it was obvious.
A princess doesn’t just appear in Disney; she can be in KTV too.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan received a scolding (microphone amplified version).
Then, the five continued singing. To prevent Lin Li from continuing his wicked mouth, Bai Bufan was ordered to sit next to him and keep watch.
After all, no move is as effective as just reporting you.
If there’s a sign, it’s going to be attacked, so Lin Li can only helplessly behave.
The afternoon passed with song after song.
There were duets, solo performances, and group singing.
Whenever Lin Li and Bai Bufan sang, they brought flair to the performance, swaying as they sang, calling it ’Double Swaying Dance.’
Although it was silly, the atmosphere was high, so even when Qu Wanqiu and Ding Sihan sang, they would stand and sway a bit, not feeling shy at all.
When it’s time to tease, tease; at this time, Lin Li would only cheer and encourage energetically.
...
Chen Yu Ying’s phone rang, and Lin Li, holding the microphone, paused, leaving only the accompaniment in the room.
Chen Yu Ying answered the phone, stepped outside, exchanged a few words, then came back and nodded to everyone, explaining: "My dad’s driving this way, should be here in about ten minutes."
"That’s really close, who is he preparing for?" Lin Li sharply commented.
Chen Yu Ying blinked.
It’s really hard to guess.
Lin Li snapped his fingers: "Since it’s about to end, ’An Unforgettable Evening’, let’s start!"
"Okay~" The other three slumped on the KTV sofa, though tired, all supported this decision.
"You guys are really delicate." Lin Li looked at them and laughed.
It’s already four in the afternoon, and they’ve been singing intensely for three or four hours; singing seriously, sometimes even getting up and swaying, so now everyone is pretty tired except for Lin Li.
Lin Li indeed was more hyped than them, but his Qi Blood was strong, and he recovered quickly. Even if he’s tired, a one-song break could let him sing three or four songs.
"Can still sing two songs, ’An Unforgettable Evening,’ one more..." Chen Yu Ying put the phone on the sofa, headed to the song selection station, hesitated for a moment, then looked at Lin Li: "Lin Li, have you heard ’The Summer Blown By the Wind’?"
"Never heard of it, whose song is it?" Lin Li shook his head and curiously asked.
"Guo Donglin and Jin Sha sang it, it’s an old song, pretty nice." Bai Bufan seemed to know, helping to explain to Lin Li.
"Guo Donglin can sing?" Qu Wanqiu sat up straight, a little confused.
"Guo Donglin is Lin Junjie, Lin Junjie is Guo Donglin, isn’t that common sense?" Lin Li glanced at Qu Wanqiu when he heard it, finding her naïve.
Qu Wanqiu: "..."
This, is this common sense?
Whose common sense is this?
"Alright then, never mind." Hearing that Lin Li couldn’t sing it, Chen Yu Ying looked down with some regret and continued operating the song selection screen.
"Don’t give up just yet, didn’t you remember? This song is just like cheating, I can’t sing it now, but I can learn, give me a minute to listen to half of it." Lin Li snapped his fingers and grabbed his phone, immediately heading outside.
Three seconds later, the KTV door opened, Lin Li poked his head in and added: "Turns out it’ll take longer, NetEase Cloud wants me to watch a 30-second ad first, so one and a half minutes."
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
This change of plan isn’t Lin Li’s fault for sure.
Soon, Lin Li returned triumphantly, came to Chen Yu Ying’s side, confidently hit play, and reached for the microphone on the table, clinking it as if toasting with Chen Yu Ying’s.
"I’ve got it now."
"Mm." Chen Yu Ying nodded, she believed him.
"[Remember yesterday_ that summer_the moment the breeze blew_ seem to overturn everything_ only loneliness willing to settle]" Even though he only listened to it once, Lin Li replaced Guo Donglin, looked at the lyrics on the big screen, and sang beautifully.
"[Now the wind still blows_ autumn rain follows_ the heat in the heart doesn’t fade]" Chen Yu Ying’s voice was very ethereal, giving a new feel compared to Jin Sha’s.
He looked at the lyrics, she looked at him.
Occasionally, when he remembered the next line and didn’t need to look at the screen, he’d turn and look at her, and she would give a sweet smile.
...
"Blue memories suddenly turn into sunny summer"
"The warmth in the air isn’t far, winter doesn’t seem to linger"
...
"This summer blown by the wind"
"This summer blown by the wind"
At the end of the duet, the two exchanged a glance and tacitly changed the last word from ’that’ to ’this’.
As Lin Li clutched the microphone, the cold wind in the KTV followed his command, blowing wantonly in the room.
Thinking it was the air conditioner suddenly cooperating at this moment, Chen Yu Ying’s smile became even brighter.
"Wahoo!!!"
After the song ended, the three on the sofa immediately applauded for the duo.
"By the way, it’s already getting colder now, this summer, indeed officially ends, let’s toast one last time on National Day!" Lin Li put down the microphone, took his drink from the coffee table with his left hand, and opened the front camera with his right.
Everyone laughed and squeezed into the frame, capturing the moment of clinking glasses.
The group’s sing-along of "An Unforgettable Evening" ended, and they stood, quickly tidied up the trash, and left.
"Why have you been covering your butt?" Lin Li asked Bai Bufan in confusion.
"It’s nothing." After a whole afternoon of singing, Bai Bufan’s voice was a bit hoarse, he shook his head and naturally let go of his hand.
But when he let go, his expression changed, immediately crossing his arms behind his back again, explaining, "Just a habit of putting my hands behind, it feels comfortable."
Damn, what’s going on?
Why does it feel like there’s wind blowing on my butt since we left the family KTV?
Nervously smiling, Bai Bufan felt a slight anxiety inside.
Mama Yinglong, save me!
——After all, the Wind Control has already been activated, might as well not waste the remaining time.
"""

chapters.title: Chapter 264 - 217 The Most Convincing Proof of Being Biological
chapters.content:
Chapter 264: Chapter 217 The Most Convincing Proof of Being Biological
"Hello, Uncle."
"Hello."
After putting the keys back in their usual spot at the door and seeing the familiar business car and ’driver’, Lin Li gave a proper greeting and quickly sat back in his original seat.
Chen Yu Ying was still sitting in the passenger seat, keeping an eye on Chen Zhongping.
The vehicle started, bidding farewell to the mountain pavilion.
The girls were surprisingly quiet this time, as each was busy selecting photos for their social media, with messages popping up non-stop in the group chat.
Even Bai Bufan was choosing pictures for his social media.
"No need to fuss over selfies, no one looks at them anyway." Glancing over, Lin Li’s voice drifted lightly.
Bai Bufan: "...Damn."
That one stung a bit.
Seeing his friend’s mouth about to continue, Bai Bufan stretched out a hand to stop him:
"Lin Li, a kind word brings warmth to a cold winter,"
"Bufan, a harsh word is truly fun to hear."
Lin Li immediately chimed in.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Save it for later, just for Bao Wei."
While harsh words can be fun, Bai Bufan attempted to convince Lin Li to save these words to curse Zhou Baowei later.
"No worries, we’re all buddies here, everyone’s fair game; you get a slap, and Bao Wei gets two." Lin Li generously offered.
"You think you’re... so handsome?" Unable to joke along, Bai Bufan could only retaliate, but instinctively his words lacked power.
"Ha." Lin Li scoffed, brushing his hair back, "Right now, my stunning looks hold up the entire Class 4 of the first high school year, I’m the definite face of the class."
"Phooey—"
But Lin Li’s self-praise immediately drew disdain from Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu behind him.
Instead, Bai Bufan nodded in approval.
Lin Li gave a smug smile, as if to say, "See, I was genuinely praised by Bai Bufan."
"I don’t see you as the face of the class, but Lin Li, you definitely resemble a foundation; just looking at you makes me want to use a pile driver on your face a few times." Bai Bufan said.
Eh?
Lin Li: "Scram."
Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu burst into laughter.
"Dare to talk to me like this, was your mom bought in bulk?"
Frustrated, Lin Li chose to lash out, yet given they were in a car, not a single mother was truly "consumed."
...
In reverse order from the way there, they first dropped off Qu Wanqiu and Bai Bufan, and the car returned to Nansang.
Lin Li’s residential area appeared in front of them.
"OK, bye, see you tomorrow." With no luggage, Lin Li got out after opening the car door and greeted Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying.
"See you tomorrow."
"Lin Li." At this moment, the driver’s window rolled down, and Chen Zhongping called out to Lin Li walking towards the residential area.
"What’s up, Uncle?"
Chen Zhongping: "Are you interested in visiting a cement factory?"
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
Lin Li: "!"
"Of course, if there’s a chance, I’d definitely go." Lin Li nodded without hesitation, his eyes shining.
After all, he was sorted by the sorting hat into the civil engineering department.
Besides, mixing concrete seemed quite fun before it became a job; if there’s a chance, why not take a tour!
"Great, I’ll call you when the opportunity arises. You definitely have the makings of a pillar." Seeing Lin Li so on board, Chen Zhongping didn’t hesitate to compliment him.
"Thank you, Uncle." Lin Li bowed slightly in thanks, then quietly glanced at Chen Yu Ying.
"Thanks, class president."
But Lin Li, passing this look, saw the same confusion in her eyes.
Eh? So it wasn’t the class president who put in a good word for him with her dad? Then why is Old Deng suddenly so nice to him?
Seeing Lin Li politely thanking him, Chen Zhongping nodded approvingly.
...
Returning to the residential area, Lin Li went upstairs, used the key to open his home door, and saw Wu Min sitting on the sofa watching the living room TV.
"Back home?" Wu Min inquired.
Lin Li looked down at himself already inside the house, thought about it, and stepped back out: "I’m not back yet."
Wu Min: "?"
This was Lin Li’s vocal rebellion against the human habit of asking redundant questions.
Just like when Bai Bufan came out of the bathroom, there was always someone who would casually ask, "Having a meal?"
Utterly absurd, did they think Bai Bufan went to the bathroom to eat a meal, instead of, you know, using it?
"Sister Min, what’s for dinner?" Lin Li re-entered, took off his shoes, and asked.
Earlier today, Lin Li had already informed Wu Min that he would be back before dinner.
So there was definitely dinner prepared at home.
"Dongpo pork, garlic vermicelli shrimp, scallion oil fish, sweet and sour ribs..." Wu Min immediately started listing the dishes.
Lin Li was a bit moved: "Mom, I’ve only been away for a few days, there’s no need to make so much. I can’t finish it. It’s so sumptuous, it’s like I haven’t been home in four years."
Feeling moved, Lin Li eagerly lifted the food cover.
Wow, a golden legend.
On the dining table was a whole plate of dried small shrimps!
That’s all.
Lin Li’s smile froze on his face. He returned to the living room to question Wu Min: "Mom, where are my Dongpo pork, garlic vermicelli shrimp, scallion oil fish, and other dishes filled with motherly love?"
Wu Min didn’t even lift her eyelids, focused on watching TV: "That’s the menu from the community canteen today. If you’re hungry later, get there early. They cook less during holidays, go late, and it might be sold out."
Lin Li: "?"
"No cooking at home?" Lin Li was incredulous.
Even though he had announced he wouldn’t eat dinner at home in advance.
"Just me, why bother cooking? It’s better to eat something good out, especially when you’re not here, I might as well splurge." Wu Min laughed cheerfully.
Don’t disturb me, let me think.
"Mom, I have a heartfelt question. Am I really your biological son? If I was picked up from a heap of trash, just tell me, I can accept it." Thoughtful Lin Li, heartbroken, said.

chapters.title: Chapter 265 - 217: The Most Powerful Proof of Being Biological_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 265: Chapter 217: The Most Powerful Proof of Being Biological_2
"Of course you’re my biological child." Wu Min glanced at Lin Li.
"I don’t believe it. I want a paternity test! I’m definitely a child you snatched from traffickers or an orphanage!" Lin Li was unwilling to believe.
Wu Min sighed and looked at Lin Li, "If you were adopted or bought from traffickers, why would I choose someone like you? Do I have something wrong with my head?"
Lin Li: "..."
Eh?
Not adopted?
Lin Li sat on the ground, trying to use everything he had learned to counter Wu Min’s absurd claim.
Damn, I failed.
My mom’s words really sting.
"Hmm, no test needed, I must be biological." Lin Li conceded, perhaps his cooking skills but lack of love for it came from Wu Min’s genes.
Carrying his backpack, Lin Li headed towards his room, but Wu Min called out to stop him.
"Lin Li, your deliveries are all in the sunroom," Wu Min frowned slightly, "those backpacks, clothes, shields, and protective gear, what are you using them for?"
Wu Min wouldn’t open Lin Li’s deliveries without permission, but these items weren’t discreetly shipped, so seeing the descriptions outside was normal for Wu Min.
Lin Li immediately posed with an air of arrogance over the world:
"These are my tactical gear. I’m planning a rebellion, to take over Nansang Middle School armed. If Principal Nansang can be Mr. Wang, then why can’t I be Mr. Lin?"
Wu Min: "..."
This cursed child.
"I should’ve swapped for another child when adopting." Wu Min rubbed her temples in frustration, revealing a shocking secret as she waved her hand dismissively like swatting flies, "Don’t waste too much energy on this hobby; what’s important now is your studies."
"Haha, you probably don’t even know your adopted child’s rank in this month’s exam, do you?" Lin Li immediately became proud upon hearing this.
"If I didn’t know, you’d be getting scolded by me right now, Lin Li. You should understand how hard it is for me to hold back from scolding you."
"Hehe."
"Don’t get too arrogant, keep it up." In reality, Wu Min remained calm, having already bragged to relatives like the seventh aunt and eighth uncle, and siblings took turns boasting, "Mom always believed in your ability. Aim for a 985 or 211 university."
"I don’t like drinking, I’m not interested in bar dancing." Lin Li waved his hand dismissively and dragged his deliveries back into his room.
He took out a crumpled one-yuan note from his pocket, placed it in the cabinet, and flattened it.
This note carries pleasant memories too.
First, he went downstairs to have a meal and casually ate "Bai Bufan’s sausages" before returning to his room where he immediately opened all his deliveries.
There were many things: civilian-standard bulletproof vests, tactical backpacks, shields, isolation clothes, helmets...
He also bought weapons like tactical knives, fruit knives, iron rods. However, Lin Li had them delivered to a station instead of home, since if Wu Min saw these, she might really suspect he wanted to become an American-style boy at Nansang Middle School.
This scattered collection cost Lin Li over two thousand. This was already a result of exercising thrift.
As for quality... passable.
At Tokyo University, collecting these as non-professionals is considered a niche ’hobby’, which means high premiums for niche items; those of good quality have unit prices exceeding a thousand, which is normal.
A top-tier exploration and attack-defense gear set requires at least a hundred thousand.
After unpacking everything, Lin Li tested them by wearing or handling them.
Although Lin Li had gotten much stronger, his frame was still on the slim side. The sizes fit but weren’t snug, yet given the limitations, they were passable.
Today is the sixth, Sunday, and tomorrow begins a new week.
Lin Li continued studying driving test knowledge and awaited tonight.
While working on questions on his phone, a message from Bai Bufan popped up.
"Bai Bufan: Lin Li, if you suddenly fell into a movie, which film would you wish it to be?"
Lin Li laughed.
Low EQ: Buddy, give me some film codes.
High EQ: If you suddenly fell into a movie, which film would you wish it to be?
"Lin Li: ’Warhammer 40k: Space Marine’"
"Bai Bufan: ?"
"Bai Bufan: If you can use this, then you are this ’Like’ ’Like’ ’Like’
"Lin Li: I think the Emperor is still charming."
"Bai Bufan: Then you are very loyal, you better really want to go, don’t just talk loyalty, when asked everybody backs out. Besides this film, anything else?"
"Lin Li: You’ve got so many in your own cloud storage, why ask me? Haven’t you quit this crap?"
"Bai Bufan: I’m quitting right now, Lin Li, I’ve discovered a very effective quitting method. As long as you use once when you feel like using, you won’t want to use anymore. It’s super effective! You should try it too."
Lin Li: "?"
Who let this genius out?
Work hard, work when learning driving test knowledge, leisure time dedicated to refining Qingzheng Thunder Control Technique, time passes into late night, midnight approaches.
[Update complete]
Punctual update.
Lin Li immediately opened the interface, exceeding his expectations, was that the text still hadn’t appeared. However, as he expected, the illuminated button among three was once again the first one, which he guessed as ’Departure’.
He can go to that world again.
Lin Li stood up from his chair, took a deep breath, loosened up, then lay on the big bed.
Not going tonight.
The preparations aren’t done yet; no weapons on hand, not to mention Wu Min is at home. Lin Li’s plan at least needs to wait until tomorrow when Wu Min goes to work, then he can go in the evening.
If not smooth, delay it.
It’s basically concluded now that each week there’s an opportunity to ’return to reality’, no need to rush.
Delaying till the weekend this week is fine.
Even if delaying causes waste of this week’s chance, Lin Li won’t feel regretful.
No joke, Lin Li still feels some trepidation about that world, even with armor that revives you, he remains cautious, better to prepare as much as possible.
Open [Marketplace].
Spent 50 system currency to buy another "Recharge Crystal" upping inventory to 2, then utilized this week’s free refresh on its third slot.
"Random Quality Spirit Stone" and "Fortune Talisman," Lin Li won’t touch them for now.
[You’ve refreshed to A+ Combat Armor (Lin Li Perfect Model): 1000 system currency, replace?]
Another Mecha.
Two Mechas even priced the same, the only difference is the last one was B++, this time is A+.
Last time Lin Li could easily abandon, but this time he couldn’t.
Currently, he has 520 system currencies, still half missing, honestly speaking, accumulating five hundred system currencies in a week isn’t realistic, even when the next refresh opportunity comes, he couldn’t replace.
But after thinking for a moment, Lin Li chose to replace.
Because cumulative system currency has reached 2050, getting another 50 unlocks the fourth slot, providing one more choice.
Tend to wake early today, so Lin Li sleeps.
...
Despite no task binding, Lin Li still woke promptly.
Today Lin Li chose to head to the community park to practice.
"Good morning, Grandpa Zhou."
Seeing Lin Li, Zhou Youwei nodded happily.
Cunning remains cunning, being absent for several days really made morning exercise feel missing something.
Usually when Lin Li is nearby, imagining practicing is combating him, it really energizes the effort.
Focused over an hour passing, until feeling further practice would significantly diminish returns, Lin Li stopped.
The continuous drizzle over National Day cooled the weather, no longer making practice cause a sweaty mess.
And regarding personal condition, the exhaustive fatigue like Bai Bufan is early extinguished, after focused practice, at most the breath is slightly heavy.
Stood firmly, stabilized breathing, Lin Li turned towards Zhou Youwei still practicing Tai Chi.
Clearly sneakily observing him but immediately averting gaze pretending not to watch when noticing his attention.
Still sneakily learning, old trendy Korean style old man.
Perhaps it’s time to attempt mission two.
"Grandpa Zhou," Lin Li stepped forward, inquiring earnestly.
"What’s up?"
"Could we spar once again?" Lin Li sincerely asked.
Zhou Youwei was stunned.
Then Lin Li noticed Zhou Youwei seemingly trembling —— attention to detail after enhanced insight easily spots these small cues.
Does this excite him so much?
"Uh, Grandpa Zhou, if it’s not feasible it’s fine," Lin Li quickly added.
"Spar! Absolutely spar!" Zhou Youwei immediately shouted and gestured, cutting off Lin Li, his eyes seemed a little moist:
"I’ve waited for this day... for too long..."
Lin Li: "?"

chapters.title: Chapter 266 - 218: Lip Reading, Great! Lip Reading Must Be Learned
chapters.content:
Chapter 266: Chapter 218: Lip Reading, Great! Lip Reading Must Be Learned
Looking at the excited Zhou Youwei, Lin Li blinked.
Is it really necessary?
So Xiaozhou has wanted to spar with me for a while already?
Why didn’t you say so earlier? Based on our sisterly relationship, I would definitely have laughed and refused—who in their right mind would fight an old man for fun? If not for the system, I wouldn’t have made such a ridiculous request.
But for the current Lin Li, this is definitely good news.
A mutual pursuit, so to speak.
"That’s great, Grandpa Zhou. I was worried you wouldn’t agree. Shall we start now?" So Lin Li was already eager to spar with the old man.
If a war eagle can endure an old lady, Lin Li can surely endure an old man!
But Zhou Youwei quickly calmed down and took a cautious step back.
Lin Li: "?"
"I need a bit of time to prepare, I... I need to get myself into the best condition," Zhou Youwei spoke carefully.
At this point, Zhou Youwei hadn’t realized Lin Li’s trap. He definitely couldn’t follow the other’s pace; caution was key.
"This... this serious?"
Lin Li was confused, rubbed the back of her neck, and said quietly.
Zhou Youwei inwardly sneered. Flustered already? Sure enough, the cat’s out of the bag.
"How about this: let’s meet here at nine o’clock to spar, how about that?" Zhou Youwei squinted at Lin Li, continuing to press forward.
"Sure."
Lin Li had no objections; she could just go grab some breakfast.
...
At nine in the neighborhood park on a holiday, there were even fewer people than at six in the morning.
Lin Li didn’t cut it close and came down at eight fifty, only to find Zhou Youwei already waiting.
"Grandpa Zhou, should we start early or wait until nine?" Lin Li asked.
"Now."
Zhou Youwei nodded mysteriously.
Everything was ready, just lacking criminal evidence against Lin Li.
"Alright, Grandpa, let’s clarify first: friendly sparring, stop when necessary, and if either side falls or admits defeat, they lose. Is that okay?"
Lin Li stretched nearby, confirming while warming up.
Just don’t let anyone get seriously hurt.
However, Zhou Youwei appeared visibly healthy, and he hadn’t been short of breath for quite some time, suggesting he was taking good care of his body.
"Just start. I’m quite sturdy."
Still using these distractions, are we? But this time, I won’t be fooled.
"Alright."
Lin Li stood in front of Zhou Youwei, posed in the Wing Chun stance, then, after a sound effect—"Taiji, Lin Li!"
Zhou Youwei: "..."
That familiar feeling of darkness before one’s eyes returned.
It’s back, all back.
Lin Li couldn’t help it; mainly, the Body Refining Eighth Rank Technique taught more about health than combat, leaving actual fighting to intuition.
"Bring it on!" Zhou Youwei shouted.
Today is the day I reveal Lin Li’s true colors!
Hearing this, Lin Li made a loose fist and charged at Zhou Youwei.
Zhou Youwei smiled, just like last time!
Hehe.
I bet your gun has no bullets!
Having anticipated Lin Li’s move, Zhou Youwei let his arms fall.
Last time, he instinctively retaliated, giving Lin Li a chance to act hurt, but this time, with no hands raised, surely he wouldn’t fly off again?
Zhou Youwei’s eyes were filled with smugness, his lips curled in a smile, listening for the sound of a fist.
Wait a minute.
Why is there the sound of a fist?
Bu Hao! Lin Li’s gun seems to have bullets!
