When Lin Li’s hand landed on Zhou Youwei’s shoulder, Zhou Youwei’s eyes widened in shock—Lao Lin, are you serious?
And Lin Li’s wide eyes were also full of shock—Xiaozhou, are you faking it?
Damn, Xiaozhou, you’re pulling that sham again!
We’re so close and you’re still faking it with me. You’re being disrespectful! You’re shameless! You’re not being a good person!
Lin Li initially thought Zhou Youwei’s motionless stance was some Tai Chi move!
Now it was clear; it was just fake behavior. Fortunately, for safety’s sake, Lin Li didn’t use her full strength from the start, and having the buff of body control made it easy to pull back the force.
Almost all power was pulled back.
But Zhou Youwei, already unsteady, still staggered back and plopped down on the ground after Lin Li’s wrist nudged him lightly.
[Seek out a body cultivator with a certain level of achievement for sparring, and achieve victory or recognition (1/10)]
The task was unexpectedly partially completed.
"Grandpa Zhou, are you okay?" But Lin Li’s attention wasn’t on this; she looked cautiously at Zhou Youwei, who was gasping for air, not daring to approach: "...I practically pulled back all the force."
She looked around, searching for a camera to save herself.
Eh?
Did there really seem to be a camera?
"No, it’s nothing." Zhou Youwei said darkly, standing up at this point.
Lin Li breathed a sigh of relief; there’s still some respect for elders.
Realizing Lin Li was serious, Zhou Youwei perked up, started warming up, and was even more excited. If it’s serious, he wasn’t afraid!
"I wasn’t prepared just now, Lin Li, let’s go again."
"Grandpa, I’m not playing with you anymore."
Recalling how one punch almost cost Wu Min his home and car, turning himself into a second-generation debtor, Lin Li was a bit nervous, waved her hand, and backed away.
Zhou Youwei: "..."
I’ve gotten ready, and now you’re saying this?
"That was an accident! I wasn’t faking it!" The familiar look on Lin Li’s face urged Zhou Youwei to quickly explain.
"Goodbye, Grandpa."
"Come back here!"
"Happy National Day."
Lin Li ran even faster.

chapters.title: Chapter 267 - 218: Lip Reading Great, Lip Reading Must Be Learned_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 267: Chapter 218: Lip Reading Great, Lip Reading Must Be Learned_2
As a result, only Zhou Youwei with a bewildered expression was left in the community park.
Covering his humiliated face, Zhou Youwei first collected several cameras he had set up to record crime evidence and finally picked up the phone he had left on the pavilion.
Damn it, the whole thing was recorded as my crime evidence.
Zhang Fang, who was on a video call, shook her head earnestly upon seeing Zhou Youwei: "Old Zhou, it’s not right to fake injuries. Look at how you scared Xiaolin. After all your effort, is this what you wanted me to see?"
Zhou Youwei: "..."
Could it be... Could this also be part of Lin Li’s plan?
Zhou Youwei felt out of breath.
...
"No wonder the reward is just one ability. Although the number of people required is a bit high, it’s still relatively easy to complete," Lin Li thought to himself after returning home.
The rule that you lose if you fall was decided by the two of them, yet the system recognized such a victory in the challenge.
That makes it simple; I just need to find nine more body cultivators who meet the conditions.
After thinking for a moment, Lin Li began to search for nearby gyms on the map.
If those muscular guys aren’t body cultivators, then Lin Li doesn’t know what qualifies as one.
Actually, Xiaozhou could count, and probably the instructors or even students of taekwondo or sanda fighting classes would also count, but in this day and age, challenging gyms doesn’t seem popular. You can’t just show up at their door saying, "Hi, I’m here to fight. Oh, I won’t fight those who haven’t achieved anything or those who’ve achieved too much. I’m looking for someone with moderate achievements."
If confronted by a few guys practicing Chen Hegao’s unrestricted fighting style, who might aim for the groin right away, that would be disastrous.
It’s still the gym guys who are easier to find and deal with.
If I encounter someone with a sharp head, it’s possible to win them over without a fight.
Besides, Lin Li believes this is the mission’s purpose since he hasn’t even learned the official fighting cultivation technique yet.
Riding his bike to the nearest gym, Lin Li saw a huge banner nearby that read:
"Reading is to calmly talk to idiots; fitness is to make idiots calmly talk to you."
Very reasonable, Lin Li quite agreed.
"Hello." Upon entering, the front desk girl greeted Lin Li, "Is it your first time here? Is there anything I can help you with?"
The front desk was familiar with regular clients, and since Lin Li was looking around curiously, it was obvious it was his first time, so she asked.
"I want to apply for a card."
"Okay, may I ask which type of card you plan on applying for? Here, I recommend the annual card and lifelong card, which have the best value for money, plus you get personal training sessions as a bonus..." Seeing a potential performance boost, the front desk girl’s smile grew even brighter.
"A single-use card."
Front desk: "?"
"By the way, can I use the 9.9 yuan experience coupon from Meituan?"
The opportunity for better sales slipped away.
Experience, just experience. Applying for a single-use card, what’s that about!
The front desk nodded slightly helplessly: "Just show me the QR code after the purchase is completed. The experience coupon is limited to a one-time entry; please be cautious when leaving."
"Thank you." Lin Li secured the wristband as proof and then pushed open the gym door.
A DJ version of an English song Lin Li had never heard was playing, and it was quite catchy.
There wasn’t the expected sweaty smell; instead, there was a close-to-six-godly fragrance. Several muscular guys were working out, and after glancing at Lin Li, they returned to their routines.
In comparison with them, Lin Li, who had bulked up a bit, was slender like a bamboo pole again.
In front of the floor-to-ceiling mirror in the gym, several women wearing yoga pants and sports bras were posing provocatively amid their sweaty exertions.
Oda Nobunaga had already proven that instincts can’t be resisted.
Instinct urged Lin Li to take a glance, and then Lin Li widened his eyes and looked a second time.
Wait a minute.
Damn.
As everyone knows, yoga pants are exceptionally form-fitting.
But just now, when that woman squatted to take a photo, Lin Li somehow read her lips.
This is obscene, isn’t it?
Lin Li looked around at the bulky men again, and surprisingly, no one noticed this. Their eyes showed no lust, only a craving for muscles.
If Bai Bufan were here, he would definitely speak loudly to get her attention or act out as if playing basketball, then do a fadeaway shot, perhaps even knock himself down just to make this lip-reading lady notice him.
Although he always blabbers about small breasts small breasts, who the hell cares? In any case, Bai Bufan is very honest.
The woman also noticed Lin Li, but after one look, she stopped paying attention.
Though quite handsome and pleasant to look at, he wasn’t her type.
Judging someone based on appearance is indeed too vulgar and one-sided; she prefers using a bank balance for evaluation, finding a beauty in numbers.
The most expensive thing on Lin Li seemed to be the phone in his hand, so he didn’t make the cut.
She took out a bottle of mineral water, pouring it over her head as if it were sweat, and continued taking pictures for her fishing activities.
And Lin Li didn’t forget his mission. He first went to the equipment area and tried out the barbells and dumbbells but then frowned slightly.
Compared to a month ago, his strength now was vastly different, but when compared to others, merely talking about the force exerted, it was far from reaching inhuman levels. Whether it’s Qi Blood or comprehensive recovery ability, it mainly improved his endurance.
Even though there’s a [Power Charge] to assist, without formal training and unfamiliar with exertion techniques, Lin Li wasn’t confident about surpassing these muscle-bound guys in using the equipment.
Most fitness moves can’t rely on just right-hand strength; they need full-body coordination, which could be compromised by the overly strong right hand affecting the overall movement.

chapters.title: Chapter 268 - 218: Lip Language is Good, Lip Language Must be Learned
chapters.content:
Chapter 268: Chapter 218: Lip Language is Good, Lip Language Must be Learned
"First time at the gym?" A burly guy returning gym equipment set it down, took off his Bluetooth headphones, and asked Lin Li with a smile.
Lin Li glanced down. Not wearing white socks, no beard, not a buzz cut. Doesn’t look like someone from Nantong but rather a helpful big brother, so he nodded: "Yes."
"For your first time, I’d recommend starting with this..."
Zhai Kai earnestly began guiding Lin Li on how to work out.
He was genuinely helpful.
"...Thanks, bro, but, hey, can I challenge you a bit? I want to see the gap between us."
Lin Li nodded as he listened, and after the other finished speaking, he got straight to the point.
Kind of figured it out; let’s just try arm wrestling with the right hand only.
Upon hearing this, Zhai Kai immediately took off his vest, then rolled up the loose legs of his shorts, forcing them into ’triangle shorts,’ revealing his muscular leg muscles, and began posing in front of Lin Li.
"Keep it up, with a few years of solid training, you might look like me," Zhai Kai said proudly.
Lin Li: "..."
This isn’t the kind of challenge I meant.
"Hey, can you touch here with your hand?"
Noticing Zhai Kai’s biceps were about the size of his head, Lin Li curiously poked the middle of Zhai Kai’s back.
"Can’t reach!" Zhai Kai said proudly, "This is the badge of honor in fitness, only real strong guys can’t reach it."
"Impressive," Lin Li acknowledged sincerely.
Zhai Kai then lowered his voice and handed Lin Li a bottle of Six Gods, "You see that mosquito bite on the middle? Right below where you just poked. Can you scratch it for me and spray a bit of cologne too, thanks."
Lin Li: "?"
The most helpless person on earth has been found, the source of the Six Gods smell in the gym has been located.
Maybe, there’s no need to sprinkle itch powder on armless folks to speedrun Hell; gym beefcakes can achieve the same effect.
After helping out a bit, Lin Li spoke up: "Hey, can we arm wrestle?"
Might devices need full body strength, not Lin Li’s strong suit, so he wanted to try pure right-hand strength at arm wrestling first.
Lin Li felt he might have a winning chance here.
"Sure, I’ll spot you at a forty-five-degree angle," Zhai Kai gladly agreed, seeing Lin Li’s skinny arms and legs, he spoke confidently.
Lin Li stayed silent.
They went to the cafeteria table in the gym, there were a few guys nearby injecting themselves with tech.
Lin Li was a bit reserved, he checked the best way to apply strength in arm wrestling, then seriously posed, while the other side seemed much more relaxed, their hands casually laid on the table.
Their hands gripped each other, at a 45-degree angle, making it difficult for Zhai Kai to exert strength.
"Hey, when I say start, we’ll start." Lin Li took a deep breath, activated [Charge], and spoke.
"Okay." Zhai Kai was very relaxed, his body still wasn’t tense, but he did get slightly more serious, staring at their hands.
"Three—two—start!"
"Whoosh—"
In an instant, the opponent’s hand was pinned to the table by Lin Li.
[...and achieve victory or recognition (2/10)]
"Champions! We’re the champions! We will we will rock you!" Even this sneaky task could be completed? No wonder it’s my system! Pure Sword Tomb! Mighty Lin Li excitedly stood up and cheered, his voice thrilled.
Zhai Kai: "?"
He didn’t exert any strength at all!
"Where’s the one? Where was the ’one’ in the countdown just now?" He asked, eyes wide.
"I’m the one." Lin Li explained.
The name of the group with three people and a dog hasn’t even changed yet, what else would I be but one.
Zhai Kai: "???"
Birth!! Birth!!
Here I am, giving earnest fitness guidance to this newbie, and this is the betrayal I get in return!
Zhai Kai’s darkest day.
People are not what they were! To know someone’s face... but not their heart!

chapters.title: Chapter 269 - 219: What a Joke, Just Poop Properly!
chapters.content:
Chapter 269: Chapter 219: What a Joke, Just Poop Properly!
Lin Li’s cheering voice startled a few guys next to him who were browsing technology.
But very quickly.
"Are you really a number one? Let’s exchange WeChat, we can chat more in the future." A guy got up, leaned over, and asked Lin Li hopefully.
Lin Li: "?"
"Don’t mess with me, bro."
"I know, if anyone’s messing, it’s you messing with me."
Though this conversation had happened with Bai Bufan before, Lin Li couldn’t find it funny at all.
"Just joking, bro, sorry sorry, I’m not into guys..." Lin Li immediately stepped back, sincerely apologizing.
Even though he liked joking about being gay, jokes aside, he’d rather take a knife to the back than deal with that drama.
It’s fine for shields to clash, but spears against spears cause damage, so when encountering a real gay person in reality, Lin Li ran faster than anyone.
"Alright, nevermind, if you ever change your mind, feel free to find me." The guy still left Lin Li an option or rather a back door.
Lin Li smoothed the goosebumps on his arms.
"It’s nothing, he won’t do anything to you, who told you to call yourself number one."
"But that’s not important now, let’s go again, this time I’ll call it." Zhai Kai tapped the table with a bit of schadenfreude, and his gaze at Lin Li was somewhat unfriendly.
"Alright."
Normally, having won once, Lin Li would act cocky.
But Zhai Kai’s muscles clearly told Lin Li this wasn’t a normal situation, so Lin Li nodded and sat down again.
"Bro, can we set a rule that the one whose hand gets pressed down is the winner?" Lin Li asked before starting.
If the sparring rules could be set by himself, would the system agree?
"Huh? Why? No need, just do it normally." Zhai Kai frowned and then shook his head.
It was clear that he just wanted to save face, so Lin Li said no more and focused on his arm.
If he lost, so be it; if he won, it would be a chance to see if he could complete two tasks with the same person.
"Three, two, one, start!"
Zhai Kai widened his eyes because he found out that his and Lin Li’s hands were completely stuck at a forty-five-degree angle, not flipping over as he expected to pin Lin Li’s hand to the table.
And the stalemate only lasted a moment because neither the angle nor his body posture allowed for much strength exertion; when the explosive force disappeared, Zhai Kai could only watch his hand rapidly press downward, touching the table.
His opponent didn’t cheat this time, but he still lost.
Lin Li felt a bit regretful because no new task was completed; it seemed one person could only accomplish it once.
But fortunately, there were plenty of people in the gym.
"I’m still the champion! Next, please!!" Lin Li stood up and continued his cheer.
The purpose of his loud shouting just now was to attract more people’s attention here.
Plus, arm wrestling was something that attracted some attention in small circles, and quite a few people were already curious and turned their gaze here; hearing Lin Li’s voice, they came over.
"Wait a minute, again." Zhai Kai couldn’t sit still anymore, this time his unfriendly expression was gone, left with a bit of embarrassment; he got up and pressed on Lin Li’s shoulder, pushing him down.
Then he first squeezed Lin Li’s right hand, especially the forearm muscle, then pinched the bicep, looking astonished and puzzled: "Bro, how exactly are you producing that strength, is your hand solid?"
No numerical value at all, where’s this strength coming from?
Using some enhancement?
Then Zhai Kai continued:
"I let my guard down just now, let’s have a fair one this time, I’m a bit curious if your strength is really greater than mine."
By this time, some other fitness enthusiasts nearby also gathered around.
"Three, two, one, go!"
When they saw the two hands stalling in the middle, the onlooking muscular guys widened their eyes.
Zhai Kai’s arm girth was almost three times as that of Lin Li, who they perceived as a skinny stick, yet the two were in a stalemate; this scene was incredibly incongruent, not following the basic rules at all.
Was it a show match?
Lin Li was also somewhat surprised by this result; doubling his power, his right arm could already reach such a level.
—He didn’t need to double to even the play, Lin Li could totally win.
Lin Li hadn’t even reached his limit yet.
Furthermore, the endurance enhancement brought by Qi Blood had been Lin Li’s biggest change over the past month, and the power increase was just a subtle effect of everyday training and the nourishment from Spiritual Qi.
To know, Lin Li over these months had only been training an hour every morning; apart from refining the Spiritual Qi from items like "duck blood bottles" and "famous sword", he used maybe a few dozen inferior Spirit Stones on himself.
Being able to win doesn’t mean needing to win.
Winning didn’t provide any reward, and if Zhai Kai’s size lost, others watching might not dare to compete with him.
"Ah!!!"
So Lin Li, while faking a ’power exertion’, watched his hand get pressed to the table, expressing deep regret.
Just the self-discipline of being an actor.
"Bro, you’re still strong." Lin Li shook his ’fatigued’ hand and praised Zhai Kai.
"You’re the real deal, truly," face saved, Zhai Kai relaxed, chuckling and shaking his head, eyes on Lin Li’s hand: "Your strength is genuinely surprising, especially compared with your physique, hard to imagine."
"Really, Brother Kai, you didn’t hold back, did you?" The onlookers around were starting to get suspicious.
"Try it yourself if you don’t believe." Zhai Kai stood and vacated the seat opposite Lin Li.
He now needed others to acknowledge Lin Li’s strength, otherwise, however he described it, they wouldn’t fully believe.
"Let me try then." Zhai Kai’s words had an instant effect, and the next person sat down immediately.
[Seek out accomplished body cultivators for related sparring, and achieve victory or recognition (3/10)]
With significantly less strength than Zhai Kai, Lin Li could win quite easily, but still purposefully struggled a bit before winning.
Thus, after his opponent lost, the next challenger took over immediately.
...
As one loser after another stepped down, people realized, Lin Li was a powerful individual with a small frame yet an impressive amount of strength.
"What are you all doing?" A voice came from behind as the crowd split, revealing a guy possibly even a tad bigger than Zhai Kai, donning a thin jacket, likely just entering the gym, and a regular.
Scratching powder on his back, he still had to behave.
"Brother Zhu is here, we’re arm wrestling, testing strength; this kid, his build is slim but his strength is incredible, unbeatable, if he bulked up, unimaginable..." someone immediately introduced.
"Then I’ll give it a try as well?" Brother Zhu seemed intrigued at these words and put down his backpack.
"Bro, is his strength greater than yours?" Lin Li asked Zhai Kai in a low voice.
"About the same." Zhai Kai saved some face.
"Then just use that move." Lin Li squinted and smiled at the burly figure sitting across him, in the middle of taking off his jacket: "Bro, I’ll say when to start."
"Okay." Brother Zhu nodded.
Zhai Kai also grinned.
And showed no intention of warning.
They say having been through storms, one wishes to witness others soaking wet.
...
"Three—start!"
[Seek out accomplished body cultivators for related sparring, and achieve victory or recognition (10/10)]
[Task two completed.]
"We’re the champions! Bro! We’re the champions!" The person in front became the last one for the task; Lin Li stood up with tears of joy, hugged, and patted Zhai Kai’s back, helping scratch his itchy spots.
As for Brother Zhu, he silently stared at his unresponsive hand, mouth corners twitching: "..."
Damnit.
He looked up at the excited Lin Li and Zhai Kai.
Lin Li was a new face so it was hard to judge; this kid definitely seemed a bit sick, didn’t look like acting.
Zhai Kai, what the hell are you doing?
Did your protein shake today contain no protein, just regular powder? You drinking too much condensed milk? What’s got you so excited?
The onlookers, seeing this for the first time, finally realized that Lin Li wasn’t just a strong person with a small frame and an impressive amount of strength.
Lin Li was a small-framed but mighty, incredibly powerful sword tomb warrior.

chapters.title: Chapter 270 - 220: Biological Secrets Contain Natural Mysteries
chapters.content:
Chapter 270: Chapter 220: Biological Secrets Contain Natural Mysteries
Task completed, Lin Li was quite relieved.
And there wasn’t another derivative task popping up with ten times the difficulty.
In fact, Lin Li had even prepared to run around every gym in Xiling today, but it’s good that there wasn’t, saved a lot of effort.
He refused Brother Zhu’s good intention to stay and eat whole wheat wotou, after all, he said there was no wheat and no nest, afraid it might cause trouble if eaten, so Lin Li took off immediately.
Let Brother Zhai eat it.
[You have acquired the active ability "Soul of Martial Combat".]
[You have acquired the derivative ability "Soul of Martial Combat (Passive)"]
Can one ability really derive a new ability? This hadn’t happened before, Lin Li curiously checked the details.
[Soul of Martial Combat: Designate a single type of melee weapon, in the next hour, you will master the use of that weapon in melee, cooldown time is 24 hours, during ability activation and cooldown, "Soul of Martial Combat (Passive)" will be inactive.]
[Soul of Martial Combat (Passive): You will adapt more quickly to all melee weapons, and can use them more flexibly in close combat.]
So that’s how it is.
This looks way more impressive than [Empty-Handed Blade Catch], even just the passive it derives is enough to crush.
And melee weapons, what’s the definition of this stuff?
To determine the definition, Lin Li rode his bike with his eyes on the ground.
Easily, he found a disposable chopstick by the roadside.
Getting a feel, Lin Li’s hand naturally held it in a reverse grip, like holding a dagger.
Because Lin Li’s mind suddenly felt certain, this was the most suitable stance for exerting force.
He swung the chopstick in front of him a few times, listened to the light whooshing sound, and Lin Li chuckled.
Apparently, chopsticks also fall under the influence of the ability.
It seems that the ability’s melee weapon means an extremely broad sense of melee, something like chopsticks that’s more suitable to be called a concealed weapon also counts.
After tossing away the chopstick, Lin Li picked up a stone.
This part is quite sharp, convenient for hitting people, and holding it like this seems more fitting...
These guiding pieces of information just appeared in his mind.
Confirmed, as long as you’re holding it, it’s considered melee.
A rifle equipped with a bayonet would certainly be affected by this ability too.
But both the active and passive aspects of this ability stated that it would only enhance one’s melee weapon talent.
That is, if I really got hold of a gun with a bayonet, the information my brain provides can only assist in improving bayonet skills, not shooting or long-range aiming.
But that’s enough.
This definitely boosted Lin Li’s confidence in exploring ’reality’.
So why not enhance it further.
When selecting to use the "Ability Amplifier", the only available target was the overall Soul of Martial Combat, with no distinction between active and passive.
[You have used the "Ability Amplifier" on "Soul of Martial Combat".]
[Soul of Martial Combat (+1): Designate a single type of melee weapon, for the next two hours, you will master the melee use of that weapon, with one chance to change the designated weapon during the period, cooldown time is 24 hours, during cooldown, "Soul of Martial Combat (Passive)" will be inactive.]
The time was doubled, and there was one more opportunity to change the designated weapon, making it more applicable, while the passive remained unchanged.
Still satisfied.
Too bad there’s only one amplifier left.
Heading home, in preparation for a date with the beautiful lady, Lin Li continued to use Spiritual Qi to transform his Purity and Righteousness Thunder-Controlling Body.
Completing the one-month body forging task provided 20 inferior grades, plus a superior one, Lin Li currently lacked nothing in terms of Spiritual Qi.
The maximum amount of electricity his body could store was greatly increased, and the distance for long-distance discharges had already increased to twenty centimeters — it was only ten centimeters in the mountain pavilion days ago, which was a change in just a few days.
He could feel that before long, the Purity and Righteousness Thunder-Controlling Body could enter the next stage.
At that time, there should be another significant growth wave.
If there’s another chance, Lin Li will definitely go to Pingjiang, to let that thunder mage know who the real Thunder King is.
"Mom’s leaving first, won’t be sending you to school."
After dinner, while finishing kitchen clean-up, Wu Min said to Lin Li in the living room.
"Okay, Sister Min, to be honest, I’ll really miss you," Lin Li replied tearfully.
While choking up, he took Wu Min’s bag from the table, shoved it into her arms, and then pushed Wu Min to the door, opening it while making a ’please leave’ gesture.
Wu Min: "..."
Only his mouth would miss her.
After flicking Lin Li’s forehead, and organizing her stuff, Wu Min left as well.
"Great, it’s freedom!" Lin Li cheered at lightning speed.
The door opened again.
"Too bad, it’s loneliness." Lin Li teared up at lightning speed.
Wu Min was used to this, simply gesturing Lin Li to grab something she forgot from her room, and then left for real.
Lin Li wasn’t in a hurry to leave immediately, Wu Min might be spying on him, he only left for the station at five thirty, picking up the rest of his deliveries.
There wasn’t enough time and no need to unpack, Lin Li went to school for evening self-study.
...
"Konchikuwa, Bao Wei," Lin Li greeted Japanese Zhou Baowei in the hallway when he saw those guys still piling on each other.
Zhou Baowei pretended not to hear.
"Wrong, Lin Li, Bao Wei doesn’t understand this anymore, you need to use another one," Wang Ze chuckled upon hearing that.
"Hmm? It’s updated again?" Lin Li heard this, looked around to ensure no teachers were around, then took out his phone to check Bao Wei’s QQ Space.

chapters.title: Chapter 271 - 220: Biological Secrets Contain Natural Mysteries_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 271: Chapter 220: Biological Secrets Contain Natural Mysteries_2
"October 4th: If I don’t seriously lose weight tomorrow, in my next life, I’ll become one of Old Jiang’s people!"
"October 5th: If I don’t seriously lose weight tomorrow, in my next life, I’ll become Japanese!"
"October 6th: If I don’t stick to my diet tomorrow, I’ll be a pig in the next life!"
"October 7th: Oink oink oink oink, oink oink oink!"
"So you’ve already become Tianpeng, Bao Wei, you’re even better than Martin the Transformer, you’re the great Bao Wei Transformer." Lin Li laughed, patting Bao Wei’s shoulder with a chuckle.
"I’ve tried really hard, I’ve been following the weight-loss tutorials. I did seven times their training amount, but it’s still useless," Zhou Baowei scratched his head and said.
"Which part of the amount?" Lin Li’s sharp eyes instantly saw through the wordplay.
"The diet meals."
"Makes sense, you could eat seven servings a day, you’re this!" Lin Li gave a thumbs up.
"Wrong, just one sitting. You know, those diet meals are actually quite tasty."
"You’ve earned two thumbs up then."
After chatting with a few people in the hallway for a while, Lin Li went back to the classroom.
Bai Bufan was sitting at his desk, the window next to him was open, and the ceiling fan above was spinning with a creaky sound.
Would the ceiling fan cut off his head if it fell?
Since childhood, Lin Li has imagined such scenes and thought about how he would dodge and how far the blood would splatter.
Although Lin Li wasn’t afraid of mosquitoes, having other little bugs flying around was annoying.
"It’s the end of September, and we can’t even turn on the air conditioning. Nansang is really stingy," Bai Bufan helplessly pointed to the stand-up air conditioner behind him that couldn’t be turned on.
"When your mind is calm, it naturally cools down. If you can’t stand this little bit of heat, won’t you break down when you’re delivering food after graduation?" Lin Li looked at Bai Bufan with some disappointment.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Why is my future already doomed to be delivering food? Shouldn’t I be selling matches in winter?"
"Sure, I respect your choice."
"Wait, that’s not right!"
...
After evening self-study started, Xue Jian made his routine rounds and then called Lin Li and Bai Bufan out.
It wasn’t anything bad, it was just because they made it onto the school’s honor board, and since it was their first time, they needed to provide some words of "what they want to say" for the school records.
"Can we say anything?" Lin Li hoped as he asked.
"You can’t mention anything related to gambling, drugs, or porn."
Lin Li: "I want to say that silence is golden."
"And you?" Xue Jian turned to Bai Bufan.
Bai Bufan: "..."
At this moment, silence was more powerful than words.
Xue Jian: "..."
Xue Jian realized his silence and Bai Bufan’s silence were different.
"You two need to change yours."
Lin Li and Bai Bufan had no choice.
After all, rules are rules, and they’re not newly set today.
Finally, considering they both made it onto the honor board together, they decided to collaborate. Lin Li looked up, "Teacher, can I write, ’Without Bufan, I wouldn’t have achieved today’s results’?"
"That’s fine." At least it’s better than gambling, drugs, or porn, Xue Jian nodded.
Bai Bufan’s eyes widened, feeling a bit teary, then firmly nodded, "Teacher, then I’ll write, ’Without Lin Li, I wouldn’t have made such progress’."
"Alright."
Not wanting to spend more time with these two troublemakers, Xue Jian nodded and left.
"Good brothers!"
"For a lifetime!"
The two left behind exchanged glances, their brotherhood causing them to shed tears for each other.
Evening self-study continued, and Lin Li, having finished both homework and pre-study during the holiday, pretended to study but actually began cultivating in the classroom by holding a Spirit Stone.
After all, the transformation process of the Purity and Righteousness Thunder-Controlling Body doesn’t show any oddities.
Bai Bufan was catching up on the homework specially reserved for tonight from the National Day.
Writing while muttering:
"Domain, kingdom, class, order, family, genus, species, I see, in biological taxonomy, Kobe is class, Lao Da seems to have mentioned the anus many times, Father is delighted."
Lin Li: "?"
Thanking both Bufan and Kobe, Lin Li started clenching his anus while drinking water for health.
...
"I’m off, contact me through a message in a bottle if you need anything," as the evening self-study bell rang, Lin Li got up and said to Bai Bufan.
"Why so hurried? Where are you off to?" Bai Bufan barely got out of his seat and saw Lin Li was ready to bolt, so he curiously asked.
"I have a date."
"With whom?"
"Miss Beauty," Lin Li said as he walked toward the back door.
"Outside school?" Bai Bufan glanced at Chen Yu Ying who was still at her seat, his voice slightly lower, "Preparing to cheat so soon? Be careful or you’ll get caught."
"Beyond the planet."
Bai Bufan: "?"
The truth is always hard to believe. Ignoring Bai Bufan, Lin Li jogged to get downstairs, but suddenly remembered something, changing course toward the office.
"What’s up?" Xue Jian was about to get up and return to the teacher’s dormitory when he saw Lin Li running over and asked in confusion.
"Teacher, did the honor board ’want to say’ text get reported?" Lin Li looked at Xue Jian.
"Not yet, what’s up?" Xue Jian shook his head.
Lin Li smiled, "Can I change it?"
Xue Jian: "?"
"...Sure."
Bai Bufan, who cares about your brotherly feelings.
...
Riding back home, Lin Li unpacked all the deliveries he received that afternoon.
Baseball bat, steel rod, fruit knife, and dagger, and a bottle of pepper spray.
"This ability is quite something, I’m looking forward to situations where I’ll use it proactively. Will I really become a weapon master?"
Lin Li mused.
In front of him, the paper mannequin he had just crafted was marred with deep cuts in vital areas.
And good enough hits were all made by Lin Li, someone with no prior training.
Lin Li felt like there was a comprehensive weapon master in his mind. Each time he picked up a melee weapon, it would teach him how to use it, as long as he followed its guidance.
With enhanced bodily control, simple actions flowed smoothly and could entirely replicate the thoughts in his mind.
Without working at Da Run Fa slaughtering fish for a few years, it’s hard to have such fluidity.
However, some high-difficulty moves, while comprehended by the brain, the body still couldn’t perform them yet, needing time to settle.
Moreover, this target in front of him was stationary; real combat would be different, as the body would find it even harder to interpret and handle the brain’s instructions.
But it was already quite impressive.
If someone saw Lin Li’s actions, they would surely mistake him for someone from Changsha.
The act of stabbing Bai Bufan in the back tonight is probably also induced by this ability.
Just wonder why suddenly there was the urge to backstab, darn "close-combat spirit," causing him trouble.
Lin Li is good, close-combat spirit is bad.
Unfortunately, the dagger and fruit knife in hand had limited techniques, but with a sword or saber, it could look more stylish.
With iron rods and baseball bats, the brain has many tricks.
Unfortunately, even modern basic versions of these things cost several hundred, and most don’t have blades.
Blade versions are even more expensive.
They are less cost-effective compared to buying a chainsaw and becoming the bald Qiang.
Lin Li chose not to buy a chainsaw because it was too noisy. He wanted to sneak in silently, avoiding gunfire.
Putting the dagger back in its sheath, Lin Li returned to his room, turned on the air conditioner first, then wore a protective suit under his clothes, before donning the bulletproof vest, wrist guards, and other armor on his body.
Truth be told, the final result was somewhat bulky, even slightly hindering movement, and quite hot, but this way, Lin Li felt safe.
Purity and Righteousness Thunder-Controlling Body was fully charged, with the "Duck Blood Bottle" containing one-third human lust, one-third fear, and one-third empty for emergency use.
Finally, Lin Li took his cell phone, holding a tiny plastic box with a live ant inside, heading to the bathroom.
Placing disinfectant, alcohol, and other cleaning supplies next to him, ready to sanitize immediately upon return.
As he activated the stopwatch function on the backup phone placed on top of the washing machine, Lin Li clicked a button on the interface, still unexposed in the system.
His vision turned pale.
Miss Beauty, I’m coming!

chapters.title: Chapter 272 - 221: Lin Li Really Heartbroken This Time
chapters.content:
Chapter 272: Chapter 221: Lin Li Really Heartbroken This Time
White light flashed and disappeared again. What Lin Li saw before him was a familiar scene, the ruins and rubble, only it appeared darker due to wearing a helmet.
But overall, the sky was much like last time.
The location where I appeared should be the same spot where I returned last time.
Lin Li quickly turned around, but good news, Beauty, who had been chasing me, was nowhere to be seen.
Time in this world flows normally.
The time point of my return is inconsistent with the last time point.
Oh no, have I come back after a whole week and Beauty might have already gone far away?
Might she have already turned into someone else?
Lin Li scratched his green-haired head; even if Beauty had met with misfortune, I hope the culprit spared me a thought.
But before searching for Beauty, Lin Li began to check his own condition.
The steel bar at his waist, the fruit knife in the tactical backpack, the dagger on the thigh, all these were there.
Lin Li loosened his grip, and the small plastic box was there too, but the ants inside were gone.
They weren’t dead, but missing.
Were they left in the modern world? Or did they get ’disintegrated’ during the crossing?
If left in the modern world, does it mean only one living being can be carried across the two worlds by the system? Perhaps the virus in this world won’t use me as a medium to spread?
All these are merely speculations that need more evidence and experiments for verification.
Taking out his phone from his pocket, it’s functional.
Mobile service is crap, can’t even cover signals in another world, what kind of carrier is it then.
Lin Li opened the wireless network, none were available, a complete blank.
What do people in this world do without internet, do they not swipe TikTok?
Compass function seems normal too? It can stably point in one direction; does this world have a similar magnetic field?
Lin Li opened the camera, started recording, then placed the phone in the pocket on his chest.
Recording is necessary, but next time it’s better to buy a portable camera.
This time, I didn’t buy one because I’m broke.
"Hoo—"
Time to find Beauty.
But can’t act rashly. Don’t want to end up finding some hooligans instead of Beauty, ending up with a failed date and getting beaten.
As for how to search, sounds could lure nearby zombies out.
Lin Li’s idea was to first get onto one of the relatively ’tall’ buildings within the ruins, then throw things down to create noise, to see if it can attract nearby ’creatures’.
Then search for Beauty’s figure among the ’crowd’.
After all, even with preparation, Lin Li doesn’t think he can battle zombies for long without having actually chopped anyone before.
Need to take them down one by one.
"That building looks tall enough."
Having chosen a target, Lin Li took out the flashlight but didn’t turn it on, holding it cautiously as he started moving towards the building, while activating [Divine Power of Hearing].
The helmet was quite inconvenient at this time, limiting vision; better replace or modify it next time.
Before walking a few steps, Lin Li suddenly paused and squinted his eyes.
Sounds were coming from behind a fragmented stone wall.
Some soft, some heavy, surely footsteps.
After confirming this, Lin Li immediately ran to the nearest pile of debris, first listened and confirmed there were no other fellows hiding within it, then squatted down.
The lone footsteps approach, emerging.
Dirty hair, a hole in the head, half the cheek shaved off...
It’s Beauty!
She didn’t leave! Her heart has me!
Originally thought hunting for Beauty would take long and be dangerous, yet she now actively appeared before me, Lin Li’s excitement at the moment was palpable.
If Beauty regained her beautiful look before infection and let Lin Li hug and kiss her, Lin Li would be willing!
She seemed to be searching for something too, swaying her head and ’looking’ around with each step.
Perhaps...
Are she and I pursuing each other?
This unbelievable thought surfaced in Lin Li’s mind.
Could it be during this week, she’s been looking for me in this area all along? Otherwise, why hasn’t she left this area for so long.
Lin Li couldn’t help but tear up a bit.
What sincerity of love is this, the system didn’t lie after all, indeed it was love at first sight.
"Perhaps... she’s more worth cherishing than Xiaojing." Like Spiderman or Deadpool, the more tense or dangerous the situation, the more Lin Li said nonsense to keep calm.
Also known as Self-Imposed Calmness.
Forbid the entertainment of suffering, unless the suffering is one’s own.
Then, Lin Li gripped the steel bar tightly, licked the corner of his mouth under the helmet.
Besides fear of the unknown and combat, there’s a peculiar excitement.
People are always chasing a thrill.
Lin Li didn’t rush out to meet Beauty but continued to keep [Divine Power of Hearing] activated to listen for a while longer.
A minute passed, and Lin Li should be certain that within the range he could hear, the only sound came from the Beauty lady.
That’s good news.
It won’t be too easy to lure out other zombies later.
But Lin Li still didn’t go out.
Lin Li is not a straight man; he knows very well that no matter how old a woman is, she prefers surprises over routine. If he just walked out like that, how could he justify her week of waiting?
Wait a bit longer.
When she walks a few more meters forward, he can suddenly appear behind her and present the steel rod in his hand as her gift.
At that moment, the Beauty lady would surely be very happy, maybe even so surprised she’d faint.
"Clatter... clatter..."
For a moment, the only sounds in the space were the Beauty lady’s twisted legs and the friction of gravel on the ground.
She walked past.
Lin Li grinned maliciously and prepared to approach.
She turned her head.
Three eyes met — the Beauty lady was missing an eyeball.
Lin Li: "?"
Not a sister?
Did you activate Conqueror’s Haki?
He hadn’t even made a sound, so why did she turn her head? Can zombies in this world smell scents?
If so, she should have noticed him when she walked past earlier?
As Lin Li’s brain was thinking, it seemed the Beauty lady’s brain was also thinking.
Perhaps love transcends all, the Beauty lady recognized the person under the helmet as her drool-worthy Lin Li, and in the next second, let out a low growl and lunged at him.
Lin Li pulled out the steel rod and stuck it in his ear: "According to universal law, no one is allowed to attack someone who’s cleaning their ear!"
The Beauty lady was quite unethical, completely ignoring him, only wanting to hug Lin Li.
There was no other way, he could only give her the gift early. [Close Combat Spirit], designating weapon, steel rod, start!
No need to hesitate, even a lion uses its full strength to catch a rabbit. If worst comes to worst, he could retreat and wait for cooldown, so Lin Li straightforwardly used this ability.
Two hours, that’s enough.
As for the designated weapon, although there were more powerful daggers and fruit knives nearby, their attack range was too short. Lin Li preferred something long and thick.
As soon as he activated it, Lin Li felt like the steel rod in his hand was a part of his body, and a flood of information a thousand times richer than usual poured into his mind about how to wield the rod in ways that would incapacitate or even kill the opponent.
And a sense of confidence that as long as he thought about it, he could achieve it!
Is this the difference expertise makes?
The Beauty lady charging at him was now all vulnerabilities in Lin Li’s mind.
So Lin Li stayed in place, activated [Power Accumulation], and as the distance between them closed, when his mind signaled "it’s now," his body moved, and the steel rod swung in a big arc, slicing through the air with a roar.
"Madam, eat Lao Lin’s stick!" Lin Li suppressed his voice in a low growl.
"Crash!"
Lin Li didn’t aim for the arm; he went straight for the fatal neck. The steel rod easily pierced the surface rotting flesh and struck the cervical bone.
The powerful gift sent the Beauty lady flying into a wall, then falling unconscious to the floor.
He actually took her out in one strike.
But honestly, the Beauty lady was a bit off-putting.
Her head was now between Lin Li’s legs, sneaking a peek between Lin Li’s thighs.
Like she was in heat, it was really, really off-putting.
"Beauty lady, off you go!" Lin Li smiled slightly.
"Whoosh—"
Lin Li made a big kick, sending the Beauty lady’s head rolling at his feet flying away, and then he discovered something both terrifying and heart-wrenching.
Zombies’ skulls are also quite hard.
Grass!
"Hiss—ha—hiss—ha—my big toe!"
But Lin Li quickly put his foot down because he discovered the Beauty lady’s headless body was still moving, seemingly trying to stand up.
Damn it, can zombies this patch even play without nerfing?
Not finishing her off would be something only idiot villains do; Lin Li would be someone who even scrambles other people’s eggs if he had to sentence nine generations.
So seeing this scene, Lin Li didn’t hesitate and charged forward, unleashing his wild instincts, bursting into action, going at it with the rod!
After implementing the words above—
Lin Li had completely smashed her chest open, and those nauseating and mysteriously colored organs spilled all over the ground, even something that might be called a heart broke, and the Beauty lady finally stopped moving.
Now she should be dead beyond dead, right?
Lin Li still didn’t let his guard down; who knows if zombies in this world even have the concept of death. Even if she revived and stood up now, Lin Li wouldn’t be surprised, just curse the system’s mom.
No movement.
Should be dead.
Now finally he can get to business.
Lin Li took a deep breath, lifted his foot, covered it:
"Hiss—ha—hiss—ha—my big toe!"

chapters.title: Chapter 273 - 222 Beauty Lady Was So Moved That She Couldn’t Say a Word
chapters.content:
Chapter 273: Chapter 222 Beauty Lady Was So Moved That She Couldn’t Say a Word
No choice, the skull is really hard.
Lin Li is only wearing regular sneakers.
Hopefully, one kick won’t give him an ingrown toenail.
Your mom’s head, like a ball, gets kicked to the department store; the department store sells balls, selling your mom’s head.
This universally heartwarming little nursery rhyme, Lin Li still remembers and can sing. In hindsight, it seems childhood was indeed too immature, this kick must hurt a lot.
Lin Li arrived in front of the lovely lady forced into separate action, took a fruit knife from his backpack, and started to prepare for himself.
"Mm, ugh, mm."
During this time, Lin Li felt his stomach churning several times.
It was indeed disgusting. The only consolation was that there was not much of a rotten stench in terms of smell, but the scene was really too unbearable to look at. It felt like just one more glance would make him sick.
Therefore, Lin Li instinctively reached out to tighten his mask further, but his peripheral vision noticed that his gloves seemed to be even more miserable now, so he silently retracted his hand.
His hands now felt comparable to Sister Yu’s feet.
Who would dare lick them?
He should pray that the plastic gloves don’t leak like plastic bags; otherwise, Lin Li would definitely have a problem with them.
The fruit knife, at any rate, was brand new from the factory. Even if it’s not expensive, at least it’s still sharp now, so in less than half a minute, Lin Li disassembled the entire arm of the lovely lady, including both the upper and lower arms.
The first thing Lin Li removed was the lovely lady’s right hand, so in case an emergency arises when holding hands with all ten fingers of the left hand, his free dominant right hand can better handle it.
But since he was already there, Lin Li simply borrowed the other hand as well to use as his backup hidden energy source.
After all, when Lin Li asked the lovely lady’s opinion, she didn’t voice any disagreement.
Trying to hold her hand, the lovely lady’s hand was small and soft, as soft and falling off the bone as pig trotters stewed for a few hours.
Damn.
Lin Li suddenly realized that, in his memory, including with Wu Min, he had never interlocked fingers with the opposite sex before.
The lovely lady was the first.
"How can one have it both ways in this world, not failing Xiaojing, nor failing you?"
Holding one woman’s hand, he was thinking of another woman in his mind.
He really was a scumbag.
He suddenly somewhat understood Bai Bufan’s harem philosophy; it would be great if he could see Xiaojing and the lovely lady harmoniously together—that’s something Lin Li truly looked forward to.
His thoughts were drifting too far again. Returning to reality, he held the lovely lady’s right hand, hung the left hand around his neck like a scarf, and looked around.
Now, he had to wait for the sunrise.
Judging by Lin Li’s experience, this slightly bright sky should see a sunrise in at most one or two hours.
But in this world, Lin Li didn’t know if his common knowledge was valid.
Lin Li could stay in this world for a maximum of five hours. As soon as five hours pass, he would immediately return to reality.
Fighting zombies can’t get in the way of his schooling.
Also, one can infer that the time he can spend in this world is also limited—because the description of the hand-holding sunrise task specifically highlighted "even though currently, one can only stay briefly."
Otherwise, as long as he never pressed the second button, wouldn’t he just stay in this world forever?
As for how long this time is, to test it would require waiting for the weekend; he has to study tomorrow.
You can watch a sunrise anywhere, but Lin Li once again set his eyes on that ’tall building’ he noticed earlier, estimated to be 3.5 stories high.
Staying on the ’road’ between this building, it’s best to avoid wasting stamina with [Divine Power] on all the time; if he fails to notice a zombie’s approach and encounters love at a corner, the battle alone would be enough to trouble Lin Li.
Besides, as the saying goes, the higher you stand, the farther you can piss. A wide view helps Lin Li further explore this world; he can’t just wait idly before sunrise.
With the plan set, Lin Li immediately tiptoed towards the building.
After entering the building, Lin Li turned his flashlight to the lowest setting to look for the stairs up.
He would pause to listen and observe his surroundings with every step.
The most he could hear was his own deafening heartbeat.
This exploration into the unknown darkness, especially the real-life version, was indeed a bit scary... quite thrilling, especially when some steps triggered the noise of dislodging a few pebbles on the stairs.
Judging from the flashlight’s illumination, this building looked like a low office building. Inside, there were quite a few desks and things that should be computers.
Scaring himself.
Not anxious to explore too much, he led the lovely lady’s hand to the fourth floor, and nothing happened; there were no living beings inside the building.
Lin Li was crawling at the moment.
The fourth floor only had walls on the west and south sides that barely qualified as walls, with only a shallow layer of broken stones at the base as coverage in other directions.
From the tactical backpack, Lin Li took out a high-tech ultra-HD high-power-night-vision sniper monocular.
The name was just that long when he bought it, twelve bucks and nine cents. Whether the technology was legit was unknown, but the merchant’s heart was probably very black; Lin Li knew it was trash when he found it light and flimsy upon handling.
Just a plastic shell plus a broken lens, damn it, it didn’t even come with return shipping insurance, and the shipping cost to return would exceed the item price.
All one can say is you get what you pay for; it’s useful but not much.
At the northwest side of the view boundary, there was a zombie slowly moving.
To the east, by the street corner next to the adjacent building, there were also two zombies swaying idly.

chapters.title: Chapter 274 - 222 Beauty Lady Was So Moved That She Couldn’t Say a Word_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 274: Chapter 222 Beauty Lady Was So Moved That She Couldn’t Say a Word_2
Although it was already considered high ground, the low buildings still blocked the view, which is why Lin Li spent ten minutes cautiously checking the surroundings for all visible zombies.
If only there was a drone.
Lin Li truly felt the equipment gap now.
He really needed to find a way to earn some money.
"Believe me, I will definitely give you a better life." Lin Li patted the beautiful lady’s hand, comforting her.
Idle as he was, he placed his tactical backpack aside and used the beautiful lady’s hand to scratch his back like a back scratcher while contemplating.
Can I bring things from reality to this world, and take them back when I return?
It should be possible... Lin Li remembered that last time when he returned, the soles of his slippers were covered in dust.
Could he make some money by exporting things from this world back to reality?
In reality, there are many quick and easy ways to make money, which are documented in detail in the "Criminal Law".
A classic dumb question: The defense in prison is so tight, how do the inmates get in? The answer: They exploit legal loopholes to get in.
The people inside do speak nicely, but Lin Li didn’t want to associate with them.
He’s so handsome, talented, humorous... too many good traits, he’d be afraid of getting bullied.
Better to make money with dog trading.
But if he can only take inanimate objects, what should he bring?
Something easy to cash in, high return, exists in reality, and won’t draw attention when converting to cash.
Theoretically, the rebar embedded in the wall in front of him could also be sold, but the efficiency is too low. Moreover, the scrap metal collector might smile on the surface, but three minutes later the Demon Suppression Bureau would come asking about the rebar’s origin.
Besides, he’s not a sports student; breaking rebar with bare hands and bringing it back to reality would be a bit challenging.
Gold.
When Lin Li set the filtering criteria again, gold, the absolute standard answer, already appeared in his mind.
"This world has rebar, there are scrapped cars on the roads, and the items in the building are very familiar, it feels like this world’s tech tree and resource tree are very similar, so gold should exist."
Placing the beautiful lady’s hands on the rooftop, Lin Li, carrying a flashlight, went downstairs and began exploring the building.
Since he had confirmed beforehand there were no living creatures inside, Lin Li became much bolder.
"Xingsheng Trading Company."
Brushing off the dust from the papers, Lin Li softly read the words on them.
He wasn’t surprised by the Chinese characters.
What’s wrong with speaking some Chinese, aren’t cultivation techniques in the cultivation world also just traditional characters?
Poor means to set aside disputes, while being rich means it’s inherent since ancient times.
This implies that this world has been East University territory since ancient times.
The text was a business document, with no real meaning, so Lin Li spent nearly half an hour carefully researching the building.
Nothing valuable was found.
The drawers were all opened, containing only messy papers and notebooks.
Occasionally, a hidden gem—a drawer with a rotten hand clamped inside.
He couldn’t find anything valuable, even the poorest companies shouldn’t be like this; this building must have already been ransacked, but judging by the accumulation of dust, the last looting happened quite some time ago.
"I wonder if this world still has any survivors now." Lin Li sighed.
Having gained nothing, Lin Li returned to the top floor and could obviously feel the sky getting much brighter, especially in the east.
It seemed sunrise was not far off.
Lin Li set his mind straight.
Don’t miss the sunrise for exploration, losing the task would be unworthy.
In the meantime, organize thoughts.
The place with the most gold, aside from under Zhang Jiao’s control, would be gold shops and banks.
Especially gold shops, banks keep their gold in safes when not publicly displayed, even if found, might not be able to open; but gold shops don’t have that issue.
Based on the building density and the situation, this area before the zombie crisis shouldn’t be underdeveloped, there surely existed more than one gold shop and bank.
And even if the buildings were looted by survivors, during the apocalypse, gold can’t be traded for food, having no significance in survival stages, they’d only treat it like trash, so there’s a large chance the gold is still waiting in the ruins for me.
Now the issue was Lin Li wasn’t familiar with this ’city’, no city map before the zombie outbreak.
"Beautiful lady, why aren’t you even a little bit vain, where’s the jewelry on you?" Lin Li inspected the beautiful lady’s hands, finding only decayed flesh and no adornments, shaking his head in disappointment:
"Love is not possession but fulfillment, if you keep this up, I’ll go for someone better."
The beautiful lady remained silent, just waving her hands, probably hoping Lin Li wouldn’t leave.
"Okay, I’ll give you another chance, let’s watch the sunrise together."
Playing ultra-realistic house alone was pretty fun, Lin Li cheerfully taped their hands together with the beautiful lady’s, never to be separated.
This was because Lin Li wasn’t sure about the system’s nature, whether it would force him to keep holding hands throughout the entire sunrise to complete the task. To be safe, tying them together, he wouldn’t have to maintain constant attention.
"Uh..."
After waiting a few minutes on the rooftop, faint zombie growls could be heard.
Lin Li’s eyes narrowed instantly, saving energy by turning off the [Divine Hearing],and then crawling to the wall edge to peek.
The sounds were getting clearer, not only because of [Divine Hearing]being turned on but also because zombies were getting closer, and seemingly more than one.
Sure enough, first a zombie twisted its body and appeared running, then after a few seconds or teen seconds, emerged more than a dozen.
The sounds they made seemed to also attract nearby zombies to come towards here.
Lin Li curled up on the rooftop, brows furrowing.
His situation suddenly became much more dangerous.
As a kid, Lin Li played the "ground is lava" game where you absolutely can’t step on the ground, now the downstairs really was dangerous lava.
What triggered their riot? If they’re chasing something, why hadn’t he noticed at all?
Or is it just this world’s zombies’ daily madness?
Lin Li peered out again, noticing a few zombies seemingly noticed the beautiful lady (the body), slowly approaching her, standing in front of her.
They didn’t touch the body, just glanced at it, uninterestedly continuing to move around slowly nearby, while a few stayed put slightly swaying, dazed.
Why is this group of zombies as inexplicable as little fairies?
The sky was already showing faint light, tearing the ink-black darkness hovering over the city’s ruins.
Sunrise was near.
Kicking down doubts, Lin Li shrunk into the corner between two walls, tightly holding the beautiful lady’s hand, appreciating the sunrise.
The light began as a faint grayish-white, then gradually brightened with time, taking on orange-red colors, casting an ambiguous and eerie brilliance on the desolate buildings.
A bit tragically beautiful.
Wandering zombies appearing creepier under the orange-red light.
It was the most unreal sunrise Lin Li had ever seen in his life.
"Do you like it, madam?"
The beautiful lady didn’t speak, but gave a thumbs up, then started tapping 666.
"As long as you like it."
Lin Li and the beautiful lady hand in hand, leaned on each other, watching the sun rise high.
Listening attentively.
Not expecting zombie sounds, but—
[Task 4 completed]
[You have received rewards: Random Ability*1; Random System Item*1; 100 System Currency.]
[What a wonderful morning, magnificent scenery, comfortable environment, beautiful companion.
Modern beauty is truly intoxicating.
Your relationship with the beautiful lady has rapidly deepened while holding hands, so much so that she was moved to silence, but you can feel her desire to take things further with you.
So, modernity is all about indulgence, go enjoy it, extend the beauty, and have a wonderful day!]
[Mission Triggered!]
[Mission 2: Deeply kiss the beautiful lady on the forehead, say some sweet words; hold hands and shop with the beautiful lady for at least one hour, and outfit her with a new set of clothes; cook and enjoy a sumptuous dinner with the beautiful lady; engage in an intense bedroom exercise with the beautiful lady.]
[Mission Rewards: Physical Improvement: 10% increase in attractiveness, 50% enhancement of lower body physical strength; Random System Item*1; 200 System Currency.]
Lin Li: ᓖ뮤?

chapters.title: Chapter 275 - 223: So, You’re a Model Enthusiast Too?
chapters.content:
Chapter 275: Chapter 223: So, You’re a Model Enthusiast Too?
No, wait a minute.
Lin Li rubbed his eyes, then closed them, and opened them wide again.
Did this three times.
Not seeing things.
Lin Li: "..."
This damned system, do you even see what kind of tasks you’re issuing?!!
What do you mean the beautiful lady is too excited to speak? If she actually talked, you wouldn’t be happy! Heating up, which eye of yours sees our relationship heating up, huh? My ass?
And is this even one task? Isn’t this four tasks?
Four tasks but only one reward, seems like you also want to hang from a streetlight!
System! Open up the mic for your dad! Speak!
After cursing wildly in his mind, Lin Li started taking deep breaths to calm himself down.
That’s enough cursing, now with the tasks issued, it’s time to think about how to complete them.
Honestly, although the system wants me to engage in bed exercises with the beautiful lady in the last sub-task, Lin Li actually doesn’t find this very difficult to complete.
Holding hands with the beautiful lady watching the sunrise was no problem, so hugging the beautiful lady on the bed doing intense squats could also count as bed exercises.
So it’s possible to complete, worth a try.
Lin Li suddenly felt a jolt in his heart.
"Damn!"
Lin Li suddenly crawled to the south wall.
The beautiful lady seems a bit confused now, and damn it, I still have to kiss her forehead!
"Where’s my head? Where did I kick my head to?"
Lin Li widened his eyes and started searching.
Fortunately, after the morning, visibility improved a lot, and given Lin Li’s terrible aim comparable to the national soccer team, he quickly found that the beautiful lady’s head was only four or five meters away from her body.
Good to find it.
But now the problem appeared before Lin Li again.
The road isn’t what it used to be.
The zombies in this world apparently aren’t afraid of sunlight, as it doesn’t make them retreat whatsoever.
And now, a few zombies, either walking or standing, are gathered around both the lady’s body and her head.
Although some zombies have slowly moved elsewhere over time, as they lose their target, there’re still those few who refuse to move.
Feels like they were shut-ins when alive and hate moving around.
Especially the head, it’s under the foot of a slow-moving zombie, moving along with the pace.
Isn’t this just adultery in front of her husband?
Stop walking, you bastard!
Having the beautiful lady in his arms, is this jerk going to kick it away?
If I don’t come up with a solution soon, it’ll be more troublesome if it gets kicked two miles away.
And Lin Li felt that what he needed might not just be the head.
In that little hand-holding shopping task, there’s also a requirement to give the beautiful lady a whole new outfit.
An outfit, theoretically speaking, for the whole body, which means I also need the body leaning against the wall.
Even more of a headache.
Lin Li furrowed his brows, and to make matters worse, Lin Li had been in this world for over two hours, now the effect of [Soul of Close Combat] had worn off, no longer the master of steel bars, his combat power had greatly decreased, adding insult to injury.
Given the situation, let’s look at the rewards first.
Lin Li checked the system rewards.
[You’ve acquired the passive ability "Bloodthirsty".]
[Bloodthirsty: You’ll become more sensitive to blood, and blood will excite you. The more blood in your field of vision or in contact with your skin, the more your abilities will increase, up to 20%.]
[You’ve acquired the "Historical Purchase Opportunity" *1]
[Historical Purchase Opportunity: Use to specify any product refreshed in the [Mall], you’ll have an opportunity to purchase it at 1.5 times the price, rounding up the tens digit (for instance, an original price of fifty requires eighty system currency to purchase).]
If it’s an increase all-around, then it’s a useful passive ability.
As for the "Historical Purchase Opportunity", it’s somewhat of a chicken rib. Lin Li, wanting to say something he bought too few of now, might be the "Ability Amplifier", but it isn’t even a purchase at the original price, meaning buying an "Ability Amplifier" costs 150 system currency, feels a bit of a rip-off.
Lin Li looked at the [Mall].
Historically accumulated system currency had already reached 2150, unlocking the fourth product slot.
[Random Quality Spirit Stone...]
[...]
[Repair Crystal: 50 system currency (limited to 1 per day)]
[Unlockable refresh product slot 5 requires an accumulated 2800 system currency. (2150/2800)]
[Repair Crystal: Use on any mecha, attach to the mecha and it will be absorbed automatically, depending on the quality of the mecha, repair its damage between 50~100% within three seconds.]
It seems it can’t resolve the current situation.
But buying one anyway, so someday when I get a combat mecha, whether it’s out of power or damaged, there’s a solution.
After checking the gains, Lin Li continued to ponder the current predicament.
Considering my battle power now, rushing to grab the body and head and run isn’t a good idea.
Fighting is also not feasible.
Not to mention [Soul of Close Combat] has expired, even if it hadn’t, the zombies not in my field of vision around Lin Li now are surely much more than when I first arrived. After dealing with the rivals around the lady, more rivals would come to bother me.
The "Distant Pouch" has limited range.
Although my strength has increased considerably, and the range should have extended, even if it’s reachable, the items "Distant Pouch" can bring back have volume limits.
I can only get the beautiful lady (from fragment to fragment).
Lin Li crouched down, picked up a piece of rooftop debris, then threw it high to the ground.
"Plop."
The sound successfully attracted the attention of the zombies below, they all looked to where the stone fell.
The few closest to the sound moved toward its source, then began looking around.
"Ugh..."
With almost a 360-degree look around if Lin Li hadn’t pulled back his head quickly, he would’ve almost made eye contact with one of them.
This method is also very risky.
Recalling how the beautiful lady once precisely turned her head when I attacked her, Lin Li stopped throwing.
I’m not at the end of my rope yet.
Let’s look at the cultivator’s means, Lin Li took out the "Duck Blood Bottle".
Whether zombies can be affected by the "Duck Blood Bottle", Lin Li has yet to test.
Specially prepared emotions inside for today’s adventure, but during the battle with the beautiful lady, it was over in a flash, with no chance to use.
As the "Duck Blood Bottle" was refined, its casting distance reached fifteen meters, and Lin Li was at a high enough position to use it.
Only fear and lust were inside the bottle.
Well, fear, go!
Feeling the decrease in emotions inside the bottle, Lin Li raised an eyebrow, successful.
It seems zombies were categorized as human cultivators or demon beasts in human form by the "Duck Blood Bottle".
And the zombie Lin Li instilled with fear instantly let out a much louder howl, then ran forward trembling.
The effect was immediate.
Moreover, it seemed his movements attracted attention from other zombies, and several others not affected actively chased in the direction he fled, an unexpected surprise.
Lin Li immediately continued distributing the fear from the bottle to the zombies present.
"Ah Ah——"
"Ugh Ah——"
A series of roars sounded, and the zombies started scattering due to fear.
...
Fear ran out.
After all, only a third was stored in the first place, and these zombies are somewhat brainless, only knowing how to run forward when scared, resulting in a few remaining within the vicinity of the beautiful lady.
Once fear dissipates, zombies won’t doubt their emotions, but will stop moving.
Only lust remains in the bottle now.
Lin Li was actually quite curious about its effect.
Induce lust into the body.
The next second.
Lin Li’s pupils quaked, o.o turned into 0.0.
——the damned zombie started taking off its pants!
"Baby, don’t look." Lin Li immediately covered the beautiful lady’s elbow.
The zombie was engaging in self-love.

chapters.title: Chapter 276 - 224: Lin Li and all the beautiful ladies wish everyone a Happy Lunar New Year
chapters.content:
Chapter 276: Chapter 224: Lin Li and all the beautiful ladies wish everyone a Happy Lunar New Year
Aside from defying the heavens, Lin Li was at a loss for words to describe the scene before him.
Pants down right in the middle of the street, this zombie really had no sense of shame.
The pose was quite classic, body slightly leaning back, lower body thrust forward, loose head tilted upwards gazing at the sky,
with a certain kind of beauty in it, as if a person from the homeland was reaching for the sky.
But logically speaking, shouldn’t a male zombie in heat attack a nearby female zombie?
Why so self-reliant, solving it on his own?
Damn it, you self-righteous jerk! Even boys can rely on others sometimes! Don’t take everything upon yourself!!
Lin Li found himself tearing up for this dashing sight.
Of course, what’s more, unsightly was that being a zombie, most of the body’s parts were actually decayed. It seemed it no longer had this ability, resulting in the zombie’s clenched fist merely grabbing a pile of rotten meat.
Lin Li: "..."
This really was a bit inappropriate for children.
Luckily, the lovely lady should already be an adult, so in her company, he could legitimately and legally watch.
Not only watching, Lin Li sneakily took out his phone to record the scene in front of him.
Posting it on a niche website would definitely land it in the curiosity section, sitting at the same table as Sister Yu’s preferences.
The nearest zombie looked towards that "sunward" zombie with an emotionless face, showing nothing, while Lin Li continued to guide confidence into his own body.
This was a female zombie.
Because her movements after going into heat were markedly different from that guy’s next to her, she instantly sat down, legs apart, hand directly penetrating her own body.
The fun thoughts quickly ended as Lin Li’s brows furrowed.
Given the current situation, it would be better if the zombies went into heat to attack other opposite-sex zombies, at least moving away from their original positions.
Now, he could only try to generate fear himself and instill it to drive away other zombies.
In this environment, generating fear wasn’t difficult.
Honestly, if not for the Substitute Jade-faced Buddha providing maximum protection, just having Lin Li stay on the rooftop under these circumstances would generate a lot of fear.
But now, due to having the resurrection armor, the threshold for fear had been raised, requiring him to dance on the tightrope and take risks.
After all, fear and risk are inversely proportional.
Actively seeking appropriate danger was, according to Lin Li, the most suitable method for the moment.
He thought it through and acted, preparing to head downstairs.
Yu Guang noticed the system interface, remembered something, and his body slightly paused. He then tentatively switched his title, replacing the daily worn [Blood Crow Assassin] title, which was kept for situations other than practicing, with [Breath of the Demon].
[Breath of the Demon: When worn, greatly enhances perception of nearby demons and reduces their malice towards you, possibly even regarding you as a companion.]
Only then did Lin Li head downstairs.
Lin Li cautiously walked to the first floor and then stopped, his gaze filled with disbelief.
Because Lin Li realized he could sense the zombies outside the door.
The effective range of this title was very short, only a few meters ’nearby.’ While on the upper floors, it was too far, but now that he was closer, Lin Li immediately gained perception.
He could roughly determine the zombies’ positions behind the wall, as well as their general movements.
But Lin Li was a bit puzzled.
He hadn’t really expected this title to be useful; since he was here, he had to try it out.
The "Duck Blood Vial" had already determined that zombies were classified as human cultivators, and it couldn’t take effect on demonic insects.
Meaning it couldn’t work on demons.
So the current situation was, were zombies considered both human cultivators and demons?
Were zombies really that flexible?
However, for him now, it was good news; since the title was effective, the malice from these beings towards him should be significantly reduced now?
Lin Li licked the corner of his mouth with some anticipation.
He had to test it out somehow.
And he needed fear anyway.
Thus, Lin Li cautiously approached the broken doorway of the building. Just outside the door stood a zombie that he couldn’t see from the rooftop due to limited vision.
He pointed the "Duck Blood Vial" at himself, keeping the maximum effective range of [Breath of the Demon], and poked his head out of the doorway, deliberately knocking on the wall to make a sound.
The other party noticed immediately, turning its head, and their eyes met.
Since tension and fear were absorbed, Lin Li was very calm at this moment.
Reduced malice didn’t mean none, nor was it guaranteed. If this zombie had any intention of attacking him, Lin Li’s hand holding the metal rod inside the door would immediately retreat and counterattack.
The zombie withdrew its gaze and continued to stare blankly.
It really considered him as one of its own!
Lin Li’s eyes widened.
Damn, all along it could have been considered kin? In that case, I owe Beauty a bit of an apology, for we could have watched the sunrise hand-in-hand, without having to act separately.
Be more cautious in the next life.
At this point, in Lin Li’s view, counting the nearest one on the street, there were only four zombies left in total.
So Lin Li stepped out, extended a hand to hook over this zombie’s shoulder, sincerely locking eyes with it again, and seeing it made no move, he slowly led it into the building.
Once he reached the area with Beauty’s head and body, that zombie left the effective range of [Breath of the Demon]. Now was not the time to experiment with how zombies would react under such circumstances.
If they attack at that time, it will be very troublesome.
Then, Lin Li transferred all the emotions he had just absorbed from himself onto the furthest zombie, and watched as it trembled with fear and ran away. Through repeated guidance, he successfully made it leave his sight.
Very good, now on this street, there’s only myself, Tao Zhe’s public zombie, Dou Dizhu’s female zombie, and the beauty with a baby-like sleep.
Lin Li began to cautiously approach.
"Are you completely focused when self-touching?" Lin Li’s initial caution wavered when he discovered that neither of the couple looked his way after he made a noise by stepping on a stone, allowing him to be a bit bolder.
Just as expected, they were very focused.
Very good, Lin Li acknowledged this dedication to their activity.
You two are deserving of the title ’King and Queen of Intimacy.’
When the distance shortened to the range where the title influence kicked in, Lin Li’s tension completely eased.
Wait a moment.
Upon getting closer, Lin Li sharply noticed a gold bracelet on the wrist of Dou Dizhu, who was supporting herself on the ground!
"Hello, I’m a student, could you give it to me?" Lin Li stepped forward to ask.
No refusal.
That means giving.
Good person.
Once a bracelet is on, it’s generally hard to remove, but Lin Li knew a life hack: all you need to do is lather some soap water on the forearm, then chop the hand off, and it comes right off with a flick. You can try it if you don’t believe it.
However, Lin Li didn’t do that because he was worried that after attacking her, she wouldn’t see him as harmless anymore.
Combat must be avoided, so Lin Li took a mini plier from the tactical backpack behind him.
Just as well to test if this bracelet is real gold.
After all, gold is inherently soft and easy to snip.
"Snap."
Not only was it easily cut, but the inside and outside colors were consistent, unlike a gold-plated bracelet.
And Dou Dizhu seemed completely indifferent to the small incident beside her, continuing her activity with full concentration, though her hand speed had slowed, probably because her desire was gradually waning.
I also need to hurry up.
Throwing the snipped bracelet into the side pocket of the backpack, Lin Li tossed the beauty’s hands that were hanging around his neck and in his hand beside her body, then jogged off to retrieve her head from not far away.
Time to start a romance!
"Before meeting you, I never thought about marriage; after meeting you, I never thought about anyone else."
Lin Li gazed tenderly at the beauty’s face and began to express his feelings.
"I’ve always been a staunch materialist, except for you; with you, I hope there’s an afterlife..."
The celebrities’ famous quotes Lin Li memorized for his Chinese exam before the monthly test came in handy at this moment.
Before his memory improved, Lin Li’s favorite celebrity was Wozzky Shude, who had many sayings that perfectly fitted Lin Li’s essays and was his kindred spirit.
"..."
"Even if you are black, I’m willing to be your tampon."
A somewhat intoxicated Lin Li, immersed in his fervent and reckless expression of love, almost hysterical.
As everyone knows, determining if a black woman is pregnant doesn’t need a pregnancy test stick; just check if the cotton on the tampon is still there.
So being a tampon is a dangerous job, and that’s what makes this line touchingly humorous.
"...."
After frantically exhausting his supply of romance lines, Lin Li felt he should have met some of the system’s ’some’ requirements.
Next, should he kiss?
"Gulp."
Lin Li’s Adam’s apple bobbed slightly.
Looking at the beauty’s head, even though he was wearing a protective suit and mask, Lin Li found it a bit difficult to proceed - as for removing the mask and protective suit, that was absolutely out of the question for Lin Li, as he’d rather abandon this shitty task.
Holding the beauty’s head, Lin Li somewhat understood Old Eight.
If not for life, who would willingly eat shit?
Let’s do it, brothers!
Lin Li leaned in, and with a swift motion, brushed against it.
[Planted a deep kiss on the beauty lady’s forehead... (1/4)]
Fortunately, the system was somewhat humane.
In a shallow joy, Lin Li suddenly heard slight footsteps behind him.
Wait, [Demon Breath] didn’t react.
It’s not the two zombies handling credibility!
With that thought, Lin Li turned around and looked back.
Thus, still with his mouth attached to the beauty’s forehead, he locked eyes with a masked human-like figure.
"..."
"Hello, I’m not a pervert."
Hugging the head in his arms tightly, Lin Li said.

chapters.title: Chapter 277 - 225: Good Brothers! Happy New Year! A Lifetime of Happiness!
chapters.content:
Chapter 277: Chapter 225: Good Brothers! Happy New Year! A Lifetime of Happiness!
This figure that suddenly appeared, only made a sound when approaching this close, making it hard to discern gender, but from the details of the eyes barely exposed, Lin Li believed it should be a woman,
Her gaze first looked at Tao Zhe and Dou Dizhu nearby, and then locked onto Lin Li, who was holding Beauty’s head.
