Then tell me what materials you currently need the most, because I can’t bring too many things at once, and I can only bring what I can legally purchase in my world."
"Okay, time is of the essence, shall we head out now?" Ye Jing said.
She really didn’t want to wait for even a moment.
"No problem, just point me in a direction, an hour’s walk should be just right for me," Lin Li nodded, still having more than half an hour of his hand-in-hand shopping mission with Beauty Lady left—everywhere is a street, he can walk anywhere.
"The direction is roughly this way, shall I guide you specifically from the side?" Ye Jing pointed southwest, saying to Lin Li.
"Sure." Lin Li replied, then opened the snakeskin bag and took out one of Beauty Lady’s hands to hold.
Ye Jing’s gaze locked onto Beauty Lady’s arm, taking in the white lace gloves and black lace sleeves.
Then her gaze naturally shifted into the snakeskin bag.
Only to see:
Beauty Lady was wearing layers upon layers of strange clothing, left leg in black lace, right leg in white—if she were a normal human, it might be quite pretty.
But she wasn’t.
Even the strongest heart would shrink at this moment, Ye Jing’s pupils were shaking.
She reflexively glanced at Lin Li, then quickly turned her eyes away, pretending nothing happened.
Different world, terrifying indeed.
Lin Li: "?"
Lin Li touched his nose, a bit awkward yet amused as he slowly spoke:
"Ye Jing, if I say this really isn’t my fetish, would you believe me?"
"Mm."
"You ’mm’ but at least look at me while ’mm’ing..." Lin Li said, half crying, half laughing.
...
[A deep kiss on Beauty Lady’s forehead... (3/4)]
After revisiting the previous shopping routine, after more than half an hour later had passed, Lin Li saw the system’s notification.
OK, so next up there’s only the small task of cooking, Lin Li tossed Beauty Lady’s hand back into the snakeskin bag.
He pulled out a rib, scraped it with a fruit knife until a fly would slip off, a point where Bai Bufan would shake his head after seeing, then began madly wrapping it with cling film.
After completing these preparations, Lin Li stopped.
Because the system task required making a dinner, it emphasized dinner, but currently, in this world, it’s not even noon yet.
"Lin Li, I can already see people from our shelter sent out to gather materials."
After walking for a while, Ye Jing, who was leading the way ahead, suddenly stopped jumping, turned back, and said to Lin Li.
But her eyes mainly rested on those few zombies following Lin Li, performing stopping challenges.
Bringing them over would surely cause a commotion.
"Okay." Lin Li nodded, then looked around, pointed at one of the relatively tall buildings nearby, and said:
"I’ll wait for you guys in that building, you can come over when you’re ready, I’m not in a rush, just come at your own pace."
"Okay, thank you." Ye Jing nodded.
Lin Li then led his fangirls toward the building he had pointed to.
Idle time is wasted time, might as well prepare for the upcoming trade.
...
Although Lin Li said he wasn’t in a rush, in less than half an hour, Ye Jing arrived at the destination with her people.
Quite fast.
"Lin Li? Lin Li? Bai Bufan?" Ye Jing called quietly when she couldn’t find Lin Li in the building he had designated.
"Oi, I’m right here."
Hearing the voice, Ye Jing looked across the building where Lin Li stood, along with two zombies.
Still in Tao Zhe state.
Ye Jing: "?"
Seeing Ye Jing instinctively hide on the opposite side, Lin Li waved and loudly said: "You should know, in this state, they won’t attack anyone, it’s fine if they see you, just consider them my hired bodyguards."
This scene was indeed enough for the people from the shelter to tread carefully around him.
"Are you Lin Li?" At this point, two other people appeared next to Ye Jing.
One was a muscular man, though not as built as Zhai Kai, probably could touch his own back.
The other man wasn’t as robust, looked a bit older.
"Hello, yes I am, and you are?" Lin Li politely asked.
"I’m Hu Fei, and he’s Shi Dongchen, both from the shelter, heard about your situation from Ye Jing, here to trade with you," the muscular man spoke with an awkward pacing, and the man named Shi Dongchen next to him nodded.
"OK," Lin Li nodded, it didn’t matter who was up for trading, then extended his hand, "Did you bring the gold?"
Hu Fei took an item from his pocket and threw it toward the building Lin Li was in, and Lin Li caught it securely.
A small gold bar, weighing it in his hand, about twenty to thirty grams, bending it slightly with force, it should be gold.
"You should go to your world, and before night falls, bring back the one hundred packages of chocolate you promised Ye Jing, this value should cover it, we’ll wait for you here," Hu Fei said on the other side.
Lin Li, who was originally playing with the gold bar, felt puzzled after hearing this and scratched his head: "Weird."
"What’s weird?" Hu Fei asked with a frown, "There’s no problem with the gold."
"I said weird, it’s you," Lin Li looked up at Hu Fei.
"What about me?"
As everyone knows, Lin Li is the kind of miser who would dust off a single penny before putting it in his pocket.
So, regarding this piece of gold worth thousands, Lin Li wiped it with his bulletproof vest, huffed on it, then tossed it high in the air, and kicked it toward the opposite building.
The kick was a bit amateur, it veered off, hit a wall, and fell to the ground.
"Ding."
Nice sound, it’s well-minted gold.
"Why did you do that?" Seeing this, Hu Fei frowned.
Lin Li flipped Hu Fei the bird:
"Did I misunderstand this, am I supposed to be begging you for business? Forget the gold, you can try your luck on your own."
"I’m wondering how someone like you managed to survive in the apocalypse for two years until now?"
Lin Li wanted to spit, even had a sound building up.
Not that manners stopped Lin Li.
Spitting with a helmet on is self-harm.
Lin Li then put his arm around the two Tao Zhe’s shoulders and turned to leave.

chapters.title: Chapter 303 - 238 Giggle and Meow, You Guys Overdose on Medicine!!_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 303: Chapter 238 Giggle and Meow, You Guys Overdose on Medicine!!_2
This money came too fast.
Honestly, 1.8 million and 30 million are the same concept to Lin Li now—astronomical figures.
The last time Lin Li used the millions to describe something, it was the pixels of a smartphone.
"So what are you lacking the most right now?" Lin Li unceremoniously stuffed the bag of fortune into his backpack and then asked.
"Food, energy-supplementing food, like the chocolate you gave Ye Jing," Shi Dongchen immediately replied, "Or the most quickly-grown and easily-cultivated plant seeds in your world. These are the two things we lack the most now."
"Okay, got it. I’ll bring some over the next time I come," Lin Li nodded.
If the recent incident hadn’t happened, Lin Li would describe how much he’d bring, making a promise.
But now, forget it; whether to bring more or less, it all depends on his mood.
"May I ask, Little Brother Lin, when will you be back next time?" Shi Dongchen cautiously asked.
"I don’t know."
Lin Li gave a top-notch response.
Shi Dongchen: "?"
"What time is it in your world now?" Lin Li countered.
"Roughly around 10:35, though there might be some error because the watch hasn’t been adjusted for a long time," Shi Dongchen said after checking his watch.
"I have to wait until..." Lin Li’s words suddenly stopped.
Because just as he opened the system, he suddenly discovered a textless interface, and the button was no longer blank.
On the button representing ’departure’, it prominently showed [02.33.23].
Previously, he hadn’t paid attention to this interface, so he hadn’t noticed.
What is this? An in-system clock?
Then in the next second, it changed to [02.33.22].
Sure enough, it was a clock, though it seemed Middle Eastern-made.
This thing wasn’t here last week, clearly, it was just updated this week.
So is this a time travel limit?
Lin Li thought that was the only reasonable interpretation.
He compared it with his watch, and together they summed to about 5 hours exactly.
Is this the time limit for being in the apocalyptic world?
Shorter than expected, not even eight hours?
As for the other buttons, they didn’t even have numbers.
Seems like that’s all that was updated.
"Why are you all staring at me, is there something on my helmet?" Lin Li, coming back to his senses, found Ye Jing and the others looking at him and curiously asked.
Ye Jing: "..."
You’re the one who stopped talking halfway!
"You haven’t said until when you’ll be back," Ye Jing added softly.
"Oh, right, I forgot. If nothing unexpected happens, I should be back around two or three in the afternoon," Lin Li calculated the time.
The dinner mission seems unlikely, and even if the time is maxed out, it can only last until one in the afternoon.
Although he still doesn’t know the exact ratio of the time flow, if it’s the same as last time, it would be around an hour.
"So you’ll be back in the afternoon, is that the time you need for a round trip?" Shi Dongchen asked.
"No, it’s just that I don’t plan to go back now."
Although staying longer is meaningless, the issue is if he goes back now, the next time he can come around half-past eleven, with a limit of five hours, can only stay until four in the afternoon? The system doesn’t recognize if it’s dinner time, Lin Li also doesn’t know.
So this time Lin Li definitely wants to stay until the countdown ends.
By the way, Lin Li doesn’t know if this is a countdown for the time limit, just the right time to confirm.
Seeing Shi Dongchen’s expression change slightly, Lin Li maintained his tone: "I know you’re anxious, but don’t rush. It can’t be that I come and you can’t wait for even one second after that, right?"
"Sorry, we’re just anxious," Shi Dongchen nodded quickly, then added:
"Little Brother Lin, I want to ask, besides Gold, is there anything else you need? When it comes to cooperation, the broader the better, right? Maybe we can reach a win-win situation in other areas."
"You’re all struggling to survive; what else could you offer me?" Lin Li asked with some curiosity.
Honestly, with 1.8 million on hand, and after the mission completes, this world’s allure would be a bit lower for him.
"Maybe there is something."
Shi Dongchen’s eyes brightened, then gestured for the document transfer assistant, Ye Jing, to come over.
When Ye Jing hopped over to Lin Li’s side again, she was holding a stack of photos.
Lin Li looked them over and found they were all photos of women.
Posing seductively, dressed provocatively.
Lin Li: "..."
Why does this feel so familiar?
Isn’t this like Tianhong or Qingjue’s stuff?
"This is..." Lin Li looked at them for confirmation.
"What else could it be? Lewd dealings," Ye Jing rolled her eyes, clicking her tongue with slight disdain, "but it’s consensual, and there’s still some humanity in it."
"If you fancy any, you can freely choose your entertainment. There are no legal constraints on you here, you may do whatever you wish," Madam Shi Dongchen, rubbing his hands like a fly, said, "Making them pretend to be zombies for your amusement is completely acceptable too."
Lin Li: "?"
"Wait a minute, Ye Jing, what the hell have you been telling them?" Lin Li stared directly at Ye Jing.
Ye Jing turned her head slightly, looking guilty.
Lin Li didn’t reply immediately, instead taking out his phone, opening a locked file, and handing it to Ye Jing: "Assistant, help me transfer it."
Ye Jing, who had jumped back and forth multiple times in a short period: "..."
"Why do you have to talk across buildings!" Ye Jing muttered through gritted teeth.

chapters.title: Chapter 304 - 238 Giggle and Meow, You Guys Overdose on Medicine!!_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 304: Chapter 238 Giggle and Meow, You Guys Overdose on Medicine!!_3
Jumping back and forth between the two buildings is exhausting, you know!
The phone still ended up in Shi Dongchen’s hands.
He had also finished watching what Lin Li wanted to show him.
"Do you understand what I mean?" Lin Li asked when he saw the other looking up.
"Hmm." Shi Dongchen nodded bitterly.
The document he had just seen was a Xiling chicken-raising map created by Song Luping himself, rich in videos, not to mention, along with other videos collected by Lin Li.
The quality of those, compared to their shelter’s quality, was like heaven and earth.
After watching these videos, Shi Dongchen felt like his twelve zodiac symbols only had ten left.
Because his chickens and goats had died.
After surviving in the apocalypse for two years, he indeed somewhat forgot what those women living in the normal world, well-nourished, bathing every day, and constantly doing skincare, looked like.
How could Lin Li, from another world, possibly take a liking to the withered flowers here?
He was really overestimating himself.
Ye Jing took the phone back and handed it to Lin Li.
While indicating to return the photos, Lin Li casually asked, "By the way, is there someone in here with the stage name Xiaojing?"
"Yes, Ye Jing, please point it out." Shi Dongchen, still despondent, reacted a bit slowly, and his voice seemed a bit hollow.
"This is the one." Ye Jing pointed.
"The box of chocolates I gave you in advance, give her a piece, this is okay, right?" Lin Li looked at Shi Dongchen, asking, or rather demanding.
Shi Dongchen was first slightly stunned, then nodded: "No, no problem, we definitely respect your decision, but can I ask why?"
"No reason, this name is fated with me." Lin Li said.
Protecting the world’s best Light Duke Xiaojing, Tianhong Xiaojing, Apocalypse Xiaojing.
"Lin Li, I’ll change my name to Hu Xiaojing, and you give me a chocolate too!" Hu Fei, who had been kneeling beside, shouted loudly upon hearing.
Lin Li: "?"
"Hu Fei! Quiet, now is not the time for you to speak." Shi Dongchen slapped Hu Fei’s forehead when he heard this.
"You be quiet, Shi Dongchen, I am Hu Xiaojing, not Hu Fei!" Hu Fei turned his head, glaring at Shi Dongchen.
Shi Dongchen: "?"
Lin Li was now completely convinced that this guy wasn’t doing it on purpose at all.
An idiot wouldn’t be acting like someone who wasn’t acting.
"Sorry for making Little Brother Lin laugh, just ignore him." Shi Dongchen could only say to Lin Li.
"No," Lin Li shook his head with a smile, opened his backpack, took out a portion of food originally reserved for himself, since there’s no need for a ’next meal’ anyway, and threw it directly to Hu Fei: "Hu Xiaojing, it’s yours."
Hu Fei reached out to catch it, immediately opened it, stuffed it into his mouth in chunks, and his eyes lit up.
Shi Dongchen next to him was stunned, the action of swallowing was very obvious.
"Lin Li, I’m sorry, I lied to you again, I didn’t tell you one word less, actually... My real name is Ye Xiaojing." Ye Jing pressed her hands on Lin Li’s shoulders, staring longingly at Lin Li... behind the backpack.
Lin Li: "?"
"Ye Jing, I recognize your shamelessness." Lin Li gave a thumbs up, fumbled in the bag, but only a few candies were left.
Luckily, Ye Jing took them without complaint, happily.
"You can just call me Xiaojing in the future."
"You’re much older than I am, I’m afraid calling you that would shorten my life." Lin Li waved his hands.
"Lin Li, you’re really bold."
Watching the two chatting, Shi Dongchen laughed: "Haha, I suddenly remembered, I’m actually called Shi Xiao too..."
Lin Li shook his bag: "Nothing left."
Shi Dongchen: "..."
Damn! Changed my name too late!
Shi Dongchen awkwardly laughed, then added:
"I heard from Ye Jing that the technological development of our two worlds has different focuses, so we also have some conventional weapons and tools that might be valuable to you and could serve as trade chips? Additionally..."
Shi Dongchen knew that just relying on gold was not enough. To keep Lin Li, this ’gate between the two worlds,’ a more lasting and stable relationship was needed elsewhere.
As for something that might be more precious in the shelter, he was still hesitant about whether to mention it now.
"If it’s completely different from my world, maybe there’s a need? But without seeing them firsthand, I can’t say if I would find it useful." Lin Li said casually upon hearing that.
Things from another world surely have their value, and a very high one.
But for a seventeen-year-old without grand ambitions, it’s hard to say.
"That’s great! We sincerely invite you to our shelter for a visit. Rest assured, Ye Jing has already informed us of your concerns, but you needn’t have such thoughts at all.
We will absolutely not harm you, nor will we have any ill intentions towards you, I swear on my life that we will treat you as the most honored guest..." Shi Dongchen said immediately when he heard this.
"I’ll also swear on Xiaojing’s name!" Hu Fei, still munching away, chimed in.
Even though one swears on ’life’ and the other on ’name,’ the weight might be about the same.
"I’ll talk about it once I return." Lin Li merely said.
Before having the right tools or abilities, Lin Li must avoid being discovered that his entry and exit points are fixed.
"...Okay." Shi Dongchen nodded, swallowing his words: "Ye Jing, give this to Little Brother Lin."
So the document transmission assistant handed a round-shaped object to Lin Li.
"What is this?"
"This is a pair of signal devices, as long as the distance doesn’t exceed three thousand meters, when one is pressed, the other will ring, so we can contact each other in this way." Shi Dongchen explained.
"I see." Lin Li nodded, took it, "Then this afternoon when yours rings, or if it hasn’t rung by three or four o’clock, come here to wait for me."
"Alright." Shi Dongchen nodded.
"You guys continue gathering your supplies, I have to control these two zombies here, I’ll take them away from you first." Lin Li said lightly.
Take care of killing and burying, as the zombies were brought in by him and need to be dealt with by himself.
The lust within the bottles was already empty, even if they wouldn’t attack him after they weren’t Tao Zhe in the past, but upon seeing Ye Jing and the others, they would charge at them first.
"Thank you."
Seeing that Lin Li really didn’t want to talk any further, Shi Dongchen didn’t try to hold him back.
"Then I’m leaving, you won’t send anyone to track me, will you?" Lin Li asked, hooking Tao Zhe’s shoulders on his way out.
"Of course not."
"Doesn’t matter, if you do, make sure not to let me find out, or you know what the result will be." Lin Li waved as a farewell.
"There will be no such thing as tracking."
Lin Li left with the beautiful lady and the self-defense gentlemen.
In fact, he didn’t go far, just a hundred meters away.
Hiding in a building, after letting the two zombies wander on their own, Lin Li began organizing his belongings.
This time returning to reality, many things were simply unnecessary to bring back.
After all, they had to be brought over, backpacks, bulletproof vests, crossbows... It’s better to leave these in this world.
It’s only one or two hours, and no one would take them.
Also to bring them more food—at least with their behavior afterward, Lin Li was still satisfied.
So Lin Li found a building, placing all the items he didn’t need to take back and the beautiful lady at a relatively hidden high spot, where zombies were almost impossible to wander to.
As for that signal device, Lin Li specifically put it in another building.
Then it was just waiting for time to pass, resting on the spot.
Today, keeping in a high mental state for over two hours was still a bit tiring.
[0.00.00]
The countdown ended, a white light flashed, and Lin Li sat in the bathroom of reality.

chapters.title: Chapter 305 - 239 Zhang Haoyang, come here, I want to ask you something
chapters.content:
Chapter 305: Chapter 239 Zhang Haoyang, come here, I want to ask you something
Lin Li immediately paused the timer on the backup machine.
One minute and forty-one seconds.
Five hours in the apocalypse, but only one minute and forty-one seconds in reality.
The time flow rate ratio is approximately 1:180, with that one second likely being operational error.
If I’m in one world, then that world is the slower one, meaning if I go on Monday at midnight, about 56 minutes would pass in the alternate world?
Based on past experiences, that sounds about right.
"Is the flow of time really this subjective? Why would it use me as a reference point?"
"Or is it actually using the system as the reference, like this apocalypse world is an extension of the system?"
Lin Li racked his brain but couldn’t figure out the answers to these questions, so he simply gave up.
Upon inspecting himself, the situation was similar to last time; flesh related to zombies didn’t come back. When Lin Li took out the plastic box from his pocket—the ant corpse and legs were gone.
Which means ant corpses can be taken from reality to the apocalypse, but not brought back to reality.
Great, that way, if I die in the apocalypse, even if time runs out, my corpse won’t be transported back to scare Wu Min! The system is really considerate!
Lin Li gave a thumbs-up to the system, details show warmth, it really does, Lin Li was dying laughing.
The system interface, the third button lit up, with a number "20" on it.
It’s not a countdown, just a fixed "20."
Honestly, Lin Li had some guesses about what this number might mean.
Just like the weekly free refresh is only once, could this button be used to refresh the weekly visits to the apocalypse world?
Now that this number has appeared, does it mean he needs "20" system currency to refresh once?
But Lin Li had no intention of clicking it.
The unit is important.
Who knows if the unit could be "20 wives the host’s future romantic luck could marry."
Without confirmation, Lin Li would still not click it.
Recalling that Bai Bufan was still waiting for his message, Lin Li picked up his phone.
"Lin Li: It’s okay, I just took a little nap, now I feel fine, no need to ask for leave for me tomorrow or rather today."
"Bai Bufan: ?"
"Bai Bufan: Then my breakfast is saved?"
Stay true to your original intention.
"Bai Bufan: Are you really okay or just pretending? Don’t push yourself, take a leave if necessary, rest if needed, and leave the world if you must."
Ignore it, we’ll meet in a few hours anyway, Lin Li freshened up and rested.
...
"According to unofficial history, when Cao Cao saw the bound Lu Bu at Xia Pi City and White Gate Tower, he actually had the intention to subdue the first warrior of the Three Kingdoms and asked, ’Would you be willing to surrender and become my underling?’
Lu Bu was overjoyed at these words, as that was his intention all along, so he immediately shouted, ’I am willing!’
Cao Cao, hearing this, ceased his efforts, ’Indeed, great warriors have pride, then let me grant you an honorable death!’
And so, Lu Bu was strangled and beheaded."
Bai Bufan’s voice was always so distinctive.
Wild knowledge plus one.
"The honorable death I heard of doesn’t match yours?" Entering from the front door, after giving Chen Yu Ying’s breakfast, Lin Li came to the back row and said with a smile.
"’Humans should tend to humans, monsters should tend to monsters, this is the rule of nature, and also the cycle of life’!" Bai Bufan raised his arm and called out, "Is this the honorable death you heard of?"
"Bingo!" Lin Li snapped his fingers.
The Demon King is the most upright in ’Maze Dry’, bar none.
Breakfast was distributed.
Lin Li was just about to ask what assignments to collect next when the corner of his mouth twitched.
"You two neat freaks."
Seeing Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei take their breakfast, Bai Bufan then took a bottle of alcohol from the drawer to spray and disinfect, while Zhou Baowei put on a mask beside him, eagerly waiting for Bai Bufan to finish so it would be his turn.
Paying so much attention to disinfection, who are they guarding against? So hard to guess.
"Lin Li, open your mouth, this is a breath freshener." After spraying the breakfast, Bai Bufan turned his head with the alcohol towards Lin Li.
Eyes wide open, Zhou Baowei: What about me?
Lin Li also smiled and pointed at his arm, "Bufan, look up, this is a respiratory tract scarf."
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Hold up!"
The breath freshener wasn’t sprayed, but the scarf was indeed put on.
"Wrong, wrong, wrong!" Almost ending up like Lu Bu, Bai Bufan rubbed his neck after Lin Li let go and curiously asked, "What was up with you last night? Still feeling unwell?"
"It’s fine, last night’s discomfort was just an illusion."
"Oh, an illusion, sigh, an illusion."
"Really that regretful?" Lin Li smiled.
"Haha, how could it be, I was up all night praying for you, learning ’Rebirth Spell,’ ’Human Salvation Scroll’ and all that." Bai Bufan emphasized brotherhood and then remarked, "Lin Li, what do you think happens after we die?"
"Switch a new desk partner, embrace a bright tomorrow, it’s the same whether you die or I die."
"Makes sense."
...
"Ring—"
The bell rang for the last class in the afternoon, and after the geography teacher packed up the lesson plan and left the classroom, the class instantly became lively.
Bai Bufan, who had been standing at the back of the class, happily returned to his seat:
"Come on, let’s go downstairs! Epic battle with Class 3! Let’s show those math Olympiad guys who only know books the power of our parallel class!"
As for why Bai Bufan was standing at the back during class, it was because the teacher had asked him why Middle Eastern architecture had thick walls and small windows.

chapters.title: Chapter 306 - 239 Zhang Haoyang, come here, I want to ask you something_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 306: Chapter 239 Zhang Haoyang, come here, I want to ask you something_2
The correct answer is that the Middle East Region is primarily subtropical, tropical desert climate, characterized by large temperature differences between day and night, thick walls, small windows, which help with heat insulation and cold prevention.
But Bai Bufan’s answer was ’thick walls for bulletproofing, small windows, convenient for shooting’.
Then he just stood there.
For this one time, Lin Li was willing to stand up for Bai Bufan; Bufan’s answer wasn’t wrong!
Of course, if you ask Lin Li if he truly stood up for Bufan.
Then the conversation would need to be reconsidered.
"Let’s go!" Lin Li nodded and began stretching his muscles.
Starting this week, those fun projects are set to begin competing one after another, and like tug-of-war, which can’t be conducted multiple times in a short period, with only two teams participating in one match, it naturally has to start early.
Today is the first round; there was no drawing lots, simply class one versus class two, class three versus class four, and so on.
The top ten will start drawing lots.
"I’ve already investigated class three," Chen Tianming came up and said.
"What’s their level?" Bai Bufan inquired.
"I’m already studying the finals’ opponent," Chen Tianming replied.
Bai Bufan: "..."
"If we lose because of your jinx, you better be prepared to stand on your head facing the sun, Tianming," Bai Bufan commented.
"Don’t worry, it’s solid. Feels like their whole class’s weight combined is not as heavy as Bao Wei," Chen Tianming waved his hand, then with some expectation added, "I hope class seventeen can advance too, eventually facing us, so win or lose, it’ll become a topic for me and Qiaoqiao."
Zhou Baowei: "Chen Tianming, damn it, what am I in your eyes?"
Chen Tianming, entering his simp mode, ignored him.
"He’s Qiaoqiao’s fun toy," Lin Li answered for him.
"What toy?"
"Collar," Bai Bufan answered.
"That makes sense," Zhou Baowei nodded, then clasped his fists, speaking with a murderous intent:
"To add weight for the afternoon competition, I’m deliberately not pooping; this time, we will definitely win."
Lin Li, Bai Bufan: "?"
"During the tug-of-war, you must stand last; if you stand in front, I’m quitting," both said in unison.
Humans do break limits when exerting strength.
Standing behind Zhou Baowei, such a scenario requires medicine.
Especially when shouting ’pull!’, who knows where Zhou Baowei might have done the pulling.
Zhou Baowei: "?"
"Don’t worry; someone mature and stable like me will definitely stand at the end of the rope as the anchor," Zhou Baowei said calmly.
"Weight and stability are visible, but mature is reversed; you are more like thoroughly cooked," Lin Li commented.
Zhou Baowei: "..."
"Old Jian’s here, come out quickly, let’s go." Wang Ze poked his head in the door, calling out to the group.
Tug-of-war is a mix of male and female, eight boys and eight girls, only freshmen have this competition because after class distribution, some classes might not be able to gather eight boys or girls.
The monk class and nun class have no human rights.
In such class competitions, students not participating also naturally need to go cheer for their class, so class four first came out as a whole team, then casually went downstairs.
Basketball court.
When class four came down, the court was already crowded with people since many classes gathered here.
However, the school only prepared four tug-of-war ropes, some classes had to wait for others to finish.
"That little girl is so cute," Zhang Haoyang pointed in the distance, whispering.
On the court’s edge, a doll-like little girl was very noticeable in her bubble skirt instead of a uniform, tiptoeing, trying to peek out from the crowd, clutching a melting lollipop.
Probably the daughter of a teacher.
"You should all stand in a line and distribute one each--," Lin Li glanced at Zhang Haoyang upon hearing.
"Really? Give me!" Zhang Haoyang got excited, Pan Hong possessed.
"Lin Li, why did I receive a 5.56?" Bai Bufan raised his hand, puzzled.
"Would you come if I didn’t say that?" Lin Li no longer pretended.
Zhang Haoyang: "..."
You two damn it.
"Still giving addresses? Going or not?" Lin Li looked at Zhang Haoyang.
"Giving! But I have a request; 5.56 bullets are still too big. Can we switch to smaller calibers like .22? I prefer smaller ones," Zhang Haoyang nodded, sincerely giving his suggestion.
Lin Li: "?"
This needs the smallest too?
Damn.
"You damn stubborn!" Lin Li laughed and swore.
"Don’t worry, buddy, my obsession is purely with anime stuff. If anyone really tried anything bad in reality, the whole family would suffer," Zhang Haoyang laughed, explaining to ease Lin Li and the others’ murderous intent.
"By the way, Bufan, want to go shooting this weekend?" Since 5.56 was mentioned, Lin Li suddenly remembered and turned to ask Bai Bufan.
Last week, due to lack of time, Lin Li gave up on real shooting experience.
But this weekend is normal, and now Lin Li has both time and money, so with the idea, why not execute it?
Going alone is a bit boring, better to share the fun, so Lin Li plans to bring Bai Bufan along.
As for the girls, he can ask them later.
One prospers, all rise!
"Tianming said your size is off, I’m not joining you, afraid I’ll feel inferior," Bai Bufan expressed refusal.
Lin Li: "...I’m talking about real guns."
"Real guns? How do you play real guns?" Bai Bufan sounded confused.
"I plan to go to a live ammunition shooting club this weekend to try real guns, asking if you want to come?"
"Huh? How do you go? Where? Is there such a place here?" Bai Bufan seemed bewildered, completely unfamiliar with it.

chapters.title: Chapter 307 - 239 Zhang Haoyang, come here, I want to ask you something_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 307: Chapter 239 Zhang Haoyang, come here, I want to ask you something_3
"There’s a live ammunition shooting club over in the Pingjiang Yushun District. My plan is to take the high-speed train there on Saturday morning, try it out in the afternoon, and take the train back in the evening, all in a day." Lin Li shared his plan.
Lin Li had never experienced live ammunition shooting before, and he had never taken a plane, a high-speed train, or a subway due to his lack of enthusiasm for traveling.
These are all things he could experience.
"Can we go at our age?" Bai Bufan asked.
"Yes, we can. I asked their customer service online, but we’ll have fewer guns to choose from." Lin Li nodded. He had already looked into it online in advance.
"Sounds tempting," Bai Bufan nodded. Which boy hasn’t dreamed of playing with real guns? "How much would it cost, including the round-trip train fare?"
"The train tickets aren’t that much, just two stops, about sixty round-trip. Including expenses at the club, if you fire a few more clips, it would be over a thousand." Lin Li spoke truthfully.
"Oh, just... how much?!" Bai Bufan yanked Lin Li’s collar and exclaimed, "Over a thousand?!"
That’s like three Spring Breeze Elves (Bear One, Bear Two, Baldy Strong)!
He still needed to save some of that money to be a ’2D-to-3D lifer’!
’2D-to-3D lifer’—reality money injected into the two-dimensional world.
Although he had this dream, if the cost was this high, then maybe he’d have to suppress it for now.
After all, only the unattainable are called dreams.
Bai Bufan felt he was doing it to preserve the dignity of his dream.
"I’ll handle the expenses at the club." Lin Li laughed dismissively upon hearing this.
Bai Bufan: "?"
Bai Bufan released Lin Li’s collar, carefully tidied it up, and softly asked, "Could you say that again?"
"It’s on me." Lin Li repeated.
"You’re going to pay for me to fire bullets costing over a thousand?" Bai Bufan couldn’t believe it.
"Yup."
"You’ve got that kind of money?"
"Yup."
"Lin Li, do you have a mirror?"
"Nope."
"Heh," Bai Bufan chuckled mockingly, "Lin Li, even if you don’t have a mirror, you should at least have some piss to look at yourself. Why don’t you go take a leak and see if you look anything like my dad?"
Lin Li was all set to retort but was stunned by the last word.
Bai Bufan’s remarks threw him off completely.
"Dad, why so quiet? Don’t you even have some piss? No worries, I’ve got plenty today; I’ve drunk a lot of water. It’s definitely not yellow and won’t tarnish your glorious countenance." Bai Bufan’s tone was full of flattery.
Indeed, Bai Bufan was known for adapting and thriving in any situation.
"Just don’t pee on my shoes, or I’ll smack you." Lin Li laughed.
"Seriously, Lin Li, are you for real? What’ve you been up to lately? Are you really treating us?" Bai Bufan was puzzled, "Or is there some special deal at that place?"
"I’ll explain later, let’s focus on the tug-of-war first." Lin Li motioned with his head.
The referee was already here, using a dustpan with powder to redraw the victory line more prominently.
Everyone started taking their positions.
There’s a knack to lining up for tug-of-war. Class Four had Zhuo Yongfei and Chen Tianming in the front, with Zhou Baowei as the mainstay at the end, and the boys and girls arranged by height in the middle.
So, Lin Li, the tallest in Class Four, took the second-to-last position.
"Are those Class Three’s people?" Bai Bufan squinted at the Class Three students taking their positions, waved casually, "Tianming was right, a bunch of nobodies, we don’t even need to use Plan B."
Lin Li didn’t pay attention to Bai Bufan at this moment.
He was in his zone.
When someone handed him the powder, Lin Li pinched a little between his thumb and forefinger, spread it carefully on his thumb’s base, then pressed his nose close, inhaling sharply.
After savoring it for a few seconds, Lin Li frowned and shook his head at the person:
"Boss, this stuff isn’t pure, the quality feels off. Or am I using it wrong and there’s another method?"
Xue Jian: "..."
Old Jian’s mouth twitched uncontrollably.
Why in the world was Lin Li so adept at this?!
If the student he taught turned out to know how to do this, his reputation would be ruined.
But fortunately, if anyone were to do this, it would be Lin Li; he could believe it.
Xue Jian held back from dropping the whole box of anti-slip powder on Lin Li’s head—fearing the kid might get high on the spot—and scolded, "Stop fooling around and rub it on your hands."
"Got it." Lin Li nodded, grabbed some anti-slip powder, and rubbed it on his hands.
This powder increases friction and also protects hands from rope burns.
"Lin Li, Bai Bufan, everyone, keep it up." Chen Yu Ying, who had a camera hanging around her neck, cheered on the side.
Chen Yu Ying wasn’t too strong and didn’t participate in this event.
"Don’t worry, class monitor, I’ve got my ’Celestial Eye’ open, there’s no way we can lose." Lin Li dabbed some anti-slip powder on his forehead, making a ’third eye’, before saluting with two fingers.
"Good to hear." Chen Yu Ying laughed, lifting her camera to snap a photo of Lin Li’s antics.
Class Three didn’t seem to have anyone particularly strong, and since this was a team effort, Lin Li didn’t need to hold back and could exert his full strength.
Tug-of-war was best of three, and if they lost the first round, Lin Li could go into "Full Power Mode" and double up in the next.
So, Lin Li could make a significant difference by himself.
"Darn it, why am I just ’everyone’ while you two have names?" Wang Ze, sandwiched between Lin Li and Bai Bufan, was focusing on something else.
"You guys can get ready now." The referee whistled, and the surroundings fell silent.
"The team that pulls the red rope across their line wins. Don’t use force yet! If you start early, you lose! Best of three, you must stay standing during the match, no sitting or lying down, and no deliberate release of the rope..."
After explaining the rules, the referee placed the whistle in his mouth.
"Beep—"
"Go! Go! Class Four! Go!"
"Class Three! Go! Class Three! Go!"
"One—two—pull!!! One—two—pull!!!"
"Wang Ze!!"
In a flash, loud shouts filled the area, deafening.
The strength difference was evident, as the red rope moved lopsidedly towards Class Four’s side.
"One, two, pull!!"
"Wang Ze!!"
"One, two, pull!!"
"Wang Ze!!"
"Beep—"
The whistle blew after just a few seconds, ending the first round!
Naturally, the winner was Class Four.
"Class Four wins! We’ll start the second round in five minutes!"
"We are the champions!! We are the champions!!" Even though the match wasn’t over, the one-sided nature of the initial contest paved the way for an expected outcome.
"Lin Li!! We’re the champions!" Wang Ze turned, shaking Lin Li’s shoulder excitedly, wiping his anti-slip powder off on Lin Li’s clothes.
He didn’t understand why Lin Li was shouting his name instead of the team’s chant during the match, but maybe that was their bond.
That was until Wang Ze noticed an unusual look in Lin Li’s eyes.
"Wha-what’s up?" Wang Ze asked, puzzled.
Lin Li looked down.
So did Wang Ze.
"Whoa, Lin Li, nice taste! The pattern on your shoe’s upper looks just like the sole pattern of my shoe!" Wang Ze ’exclaimed’, realizing they had a similar taste!
Lin Li remained silent, only smiling.
"Haha, no wonder I felt uneven ground, but I was too focused on pulling to notice. So, it was you messing around, you cheeky person." Wang Ze patted Lin Li’s shoulder heartily, laughing.
Lin Li remained silent, only smiling.
"You were always calling my name; honestly, I was quite touched, thinking you wanted me to give it my all with you, or maybe my name gave you strength, haha."
Lin Li remained silent, only smiling.
Wang Ze could no longer laugh; he grabbed Lin Li’s shoulders, sincerely and hopefully asking:
"Bro, you’ll bring me breakfast tomorrow, right?"
Lin Li, with a face that said ’What am I going to do with you?’, shook his head, smiled at Wang Ze, and said:
"You want three hard-to-fulfill wishes, Wang Tongxue? So greedy, what do you think I am, a genie in a lamp?"
Wang Ze: "?"

chapters.title: Chapter 308 - 240 Bai Bufan Indicates that All Class Four Members Need Economic Planning
chapters.content:
Chapter 308: Chapter 240 Bai Bufan Indicates that All Class Four Members Need Economic Planning
"When did I ever make three wishes?" Wang Ze didn’t catch on and asked in confusion.
Bai Bufan, who was waiting for chaos, immediately shook his head at Wang Ze with a helpless look as if watching an idiot:
"Wang Ze is such an idiot, huh."
"Class time, let’s analyze an example sentence: ’Bro, you’ll still bring me breakfast tomorrow, won’t you?’."
"In this sentence, first you wished to continue being bros with Lin Li, then you wished for tomorrow to exist, and finally wished for breakfast. Isn’t that three wishes?
Lin Li saying you’re greedy is spot on. You really are like a Kinder Surprise Egg, wishing for all three things at once."
Bai Bufan analyzed it thoroughly.
Wang Ze: "..."
Damn.
That’s how the three wishes work?
I’ll battle it out with you guys, masters of linguistic arts.
Looking at Lin Li’s smile, Wang Ze felt like although he was in school, he was getting further from academic halls and closer to the chaotic ones.
"Wang Ze, I think Lin Li mainly feels that asymmetry is not visually pleasing. Trust me, if you step on a pattern here too, he’ll be happy immediately." Bai Bufan enjoyed the commotion, thinking that without someone dying for fun, it wouldn’t be right.
Wang Ze swung an imaginary punch at Bai Bufan, squatted down, wiped Lin Li’s shoe with his palm, and looked up at Lin Li with innocent eyes.
"These are new shoes." Lin Li’s voice was cold.
Wang Ze: "Where’s the old pair? Where’d you recycle them?"
Lin Li: "?"
Continuing with a nuclear-friendly smile, Lin Li began pressing his finger joints, making crackling sounds: "Wang Ze, whenever I see you, I feel a strange anger."
Without being able to continue flattering, Bai Bufan’s voice came over:
"In the stomach?"
Lin Li, Wang Ze: "?"
"It’s okay, I understand you, Lin Li. Before, I used to spend money recklessly without budgeting, but ever since I saw Wang Ze, I’ve automatically started keeping track of my expenses daily. So it’s normal to feel a strange anger. It’s a sign of having life."
Bai Bufan was delighted to find a like-minded friend and patted Lin Li on the shoulder.
"Let’s release this strange anger together, not now, another day."
Lin Li, Wang Ze: "?"
"You’re also an inverse earth star!" Wang Ze stared wide-eyed and covered his butt.
Only others used to fear being bent by him; now there were experts.
Class 4-1 was completely ruined.
But Wang Ze actually still appreciated Bai Bufan because if it weren’t for him, Lin Li’s strange anger would remain focused on him.
—Now it’s vented on him instead.
"Beep—!!"
The five-minute break quickly passed, and the referee blew the whistle, signaling the start of the second round.
"Wait a sec, let me grab some powder. My hands are all clean, weird." The trio paused their antics as Wang Ze looked at his restored skin tone hands and wondered.
Lin Li glanced at his front and back, shoulders covered with a terribly white school uniform, and chuckled.
The second round victory came even faster than the first, given the obvious paper strength—it wasn’t like rallying the troops would flip the odds.
A small win was still a win, and while the guys celebrated, Chen Yu Ying snapped photos from the side.
"Class rep, how did the photos turn out?" Lin Li naturally extended his hand to inquire.
"I took a lot. Want to take a look?" Chen Yu Ying nodded and handed the camera hanging around her neck to Lin Li.
"I want to see them too! Let me have a peek!" A few guys nearby gathered around.
Opening the camera album, Lin Li began browsing the photos.
Wang Ze and Bai Bufan, who crowded around, gradually fell silent.
Apart from the celebration photos just taken, most of the earlier photos were from the tug-of-war competition.
As a result, the rope stood taut, classmates’ faces distorted with bulging veins: front row Chen Tianming and Zhuo Yongfei gritted their teeth, faces flushing red; middle row girls Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu had messy hair, twisted expressions; the rear, carrier Zhou Baowei grimaced horribly as if exerting all his strength.
But this certainly wasn’t Chen Yu Ying’s fault; after all, tug-of-war, it’s normal for such heroic scenes to be recorded that way.
However.
However!
There was a beast standing in the middle, holding the rope with both hands but seemingly effortless, with hair perfectly neat, a confident smile, and even sometimes, during camera moments, winks!
Beast, beast indeed.
In the captured moments, besides this beast, everyone else exerted all their strength, while the beast seemed more like he was just enjoying it.
Thus, the resulting arrangement for Class 4’s tug-of-war lineup was displayed as "hideous monstrous pig muck, budget-conscious handsome Lin Li, hideous ugly athletic muck, hideous noble dog muck."
Upon noticing everyone’s gaze directed at him, Lin Li blinked innocently: "What’s the matter? I’m just naturally photogenic. Why those expressions?"
"You only care about looking good, aren’t even exerting effort, huh!"
"Red Stone! Lin Li, this is like we’re fighting on the front lines while you handle logistics and entertain our partners at the rear!"
"Red! Let Lin Li strip! I’m ready to pull! Already holding back!"
Lin Li’s exclusive handsomeness evidently stirred public anger, causing the crowd’s gaze to grow increasingly dangerous.
Everyone seemed to have a strange anger in their stomachs.
"Don’t passive-aggressively criticize me. Although I’m pretty photogenic, I did use my strength properly; I didn’t drag everyone down," Lin Li emphasized hastily.

chapters.title: Chapter 309 - 240 Bai Bufan Indicates that All Class Four Members Need Economic Planning_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 309: Chapter 240 Bai Bufan Indicates that All Class Four Members Need Economic Planning_2
For a master like him, showcasing strength far beyond a freshman while maintaining his image is not difficult.
Besides, Class Three isn’t worth Lin Li going all out.
"You’re talking nonsense, how could anyone use strength in this state!"
"Ha-ha!" Lin Li snorted, it was time to let this useless bunch know his prowess: "Come on, let’s arm wrestle—what the hell are you guys doing! Let go!"
Lin Li realized belatedly.
This group didn’t care at all how many bowls of noodles he ate, they just purely wanted him dead.
Proving oneself was undoubtedly a trap, but these guys were pretty nice, didn’t even plan for him to self-prove.
...
"Hey hey!" Bai Bufan, holding a camera, wiggled his eyebrows at Lin Li, who was lying on the ground after some ’interaction’ with the basketball hoop, and Zhou Baowei beside him, motioning them to come over.
"What’s up?" Lin Li, covered head to toe in anti-slid powder, walked over, confused.
"I just discovered something interesting," Bai Bufan, after ensuring no one’s eavesdropping, whispered to the two, "according to my precise calculation, the class monitor took a total of fifty-two photos, of which thirty-nine featured Lin Li, and twenty-six featured Zhou Baowei, do you know what this means?"
Zhou Baowei asked, "What does it mean?"
"Bao Wei, it means that the class monitor has you in her heart, always subconsciously taking photos of you! She must have some feelings for you!" Bai Bufan congratulated Zhou Baowei first, then disdainfully looked at Lin Li, "As for you, Lin Li, it means your damn face is too big, no matter how it’s photographed, it always gets in the frame! It’s such bad luck."
Zhou Baowei: "?"
Lin Li: "!"
"No!!!" Lin Li was indeed hurt by Bai Bufan’s words, he painfully knelt on the ground, wailing his heart out, pounding the basketball court with his fists:
"Damn it, damn it, why do I have such a big face, why do I insult those photos like this, I’d be better off dead, aaahh!!"
Zhou Baowei: "..."
Fists hardened, knuckles stiffened.
These two beasts further honed their beastly traits.
Bai Bufan didn’t mistake the name; he deliberately nauseated others!
Insult with oblique words, point at a deer and call it a horse, pointing at Zhou but meaning Lin!
And Lin Li immediately connected, when he said ’better off dead’ did he mean himself, even need to say it?
Zhou Baowei squatted down, sure enough, Lin Li was crying hysterically, as if laughing maniacally.
Zhou Baowei couldn’t believe it, if after class sorting he was still in the same class with these two, after three years, would there be anyone in society who could still hurt him?
Intolerable, there was no need to tolerate anymore!
"Mount! Tai! Meteorite! Drop!"
Zhou Baowei made a big jump, sitting on the back of kneeling Lin Li.
Lin Li: "?"
Lin Li passed, aged seventeen.
Seeing Lin Li became speechless as his supporting arms started to tremble, Bai Bufan took two steps back in fear, and clicked his tongue:
"Damn, found something more pressuring than Bao Wei’s shoes."
Lin Li struggled to lift his head, Bao Wei’s weight reminded him of another authentic big fat pig, mnemonic linkage activated, he stuttered:
"Bufan, do you think if a general raises his butt, would that be... temple?"
Bai Bufan: "?"
"If that’s a temple, then temple is also a temple eye, then how do you do the fourth exercise of the general’s eye-protection drill, press temple and rub eye socket?"
In Lin Li’s eyes, there was no loyalty, only the thirst for knowledge.
Zhou Baowei, Bai Bufan: "?"
Shhh, let us think.
Who the hell taught you to define a temple like that?
Though it seems not entirely unreasonable.
"Lin Li, congrats, just got word, the general really likes your speech and invites you to tour Pyongyang, free of charge! And also wants to award you an international honor, but it must be collected in person."
Bai Bufan gave a thumbs up.
Dare to raise a temple, Lin Li is the one for this.
"Lin Li, Bao Wei, come over, this class could be a formidable opponent."
The three turned towards the voice, it was Wang Ze, who was watching other class competitions from the crowd, his expression slightly solemn at this moment.
Looks like he was scouting the enemy.
"Be there." Bai Bufan ran over.
"Be there." Zhou Baowei patted the mule under his butt.
Lin Li was left speechless.
When Lin Li reached Wang Ze’s side, he understood what Wang Ze implied by challenging.
This class had at least three Zhou Baoweis.
One of those Zhou Baoweis, even with Zhou Baowei beside, wasn’t Baowei enough, slightly showing a tender demeanor.
After watching a match, this class won too easily, with just a whistle, the rope steadily moved towards their class.
Also won with a 2 to 0 sweep, the opposing side didn’t even struggle.
"Which class is this?" Bai Bufan asked.
"Class Nine." Wang Ze sighed, "One of the guys is specialized in shot put, I know him, but didn’t expect there’re a few Baoweis in his class too, who the hell could beat them?
And they seemed to have no weaklings, even if we start Plan B, it might be to no avail."
"I have Plan C." In four there must be 1.333 idea kings, Bai Bufan pushed his non-existent glasses, lowered his voice: "But it requires us few brothers to collaborate."
"How?" Three looked at him.
"First, someone needs to have time," Bai Bufan looked at Zhou Baowei, "Bao Wei, you have time?"
"Yeah, I don’t have much going now, nothing keeping me busy lately." Zhou Baowei nodded, he’s indeed quite free.
"Then perfect, here’s the thing guys, I’ll get some cyanide, Lin Li you destroy the school’s surveillance system, Wang Ze you find out their daily habits, figure out the best time to poison, Bao Wei you prepare what to say when turning yourself in." Bai Bufan clearly articulated, issuing tactical orders.

chapters.title: Chapter 310 - 240 Bai Bufan States That All Class 4 Members Need to Conduct Economic Planning_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 310: Chapter 240 Bai Bufan States That All Class 4 Members Need to Conduct Economic Planning_3
Lin Li and Wang Ze nodded: "Yes, sir!"
Zhou Baowei: "?"
"Wait! What the hell did you just ask me about my time?!" he suddenly realized.
"Don’t worry, don’t worry. Even though poisoning four people gets you life at sixteen, with good behavior, you can definitely get it reduced to a fixed term and then parole. So, it only takes thirty years, maybe even less. See you then, Bao Wei," Bai Bufan explained.
Zhou Baowei: "?"
"Damn! I don’t have time for that! I don’t have time!"
"This is a great opportunity for you to avoid thirty years of hard work, Bao Wei. Don’t be ungrateful," Lin Li frowned and advised, "Besides, you’re unwilling to kill a few people for the class, that’s a bit selfish."
Zhou Baowei: "..."
"Who the hell are you to call it avoiding thirty years of hard work? And who the hell are you to define selfishness like that?"
"It’s just true, haven’t you heard this saying? College is easy for four years, hard for forty years after graduation. But if you’re struggling in college for four years, you’d be struggling for forty-four years in total," Lin Li shrugged and analyzed.
"How to reduce the struggle in life, besides finding a rich woman, is meeting King Yama."
Zhou Baowei: "..."
He couldn’t refute them.
He wasn’t good with words, so he couldn’t outtalk Lin Li and Bai Bufan.
But he knew other ways.
"Tai! Mountain! Meteorite! Crash!"
Lin Li: "Wait! I just revived, new character, don’t do—"
Before he finished speaking, Lin Li died again, aged seventeen.
...
Because no one was willing to spend that time, the idea man’s idea failed.
Had to react to events as they came.
The other classes didn’t seem to have particularly strong opponents.
After tug of war ended, Wang Ze went to train, Bao Wei needed to return to the dorm first, Lin Li and Bai Bufan headed to the cafeteria for dinner.
Bai Bufan elbowed Lin Li and asked, "Getting back to the point, are you really throwing a live gun party this weekend?"
"Yes." Lin Li nodded.
"So, did you really strike it rich?" Bai Bufan frowned.
"Sort of."
"How did you make it?"
"Last night when I got home exhausted, my mom suddenly called me and told me our family actually has thirty million in assets, and the past seventeen years were just for my training. Now the seventeen-year period is over, and they welcome the rich second generation back," Lin Li nodded.
Bai Bufan didn’t take it seriously, laughed and said, "Haha, I’ve also fantasized like that and even went to probe my mom. But she said she’s still waiting for my grandma’s call. Once my grandma calls her, she’ll contact me."
"Haha." Lin Li nodded.
The little joke quickly faded, and the two continued walking towards the cafeteria, no further conversation,
silence.
silence.
si—
"You damn well better deny it to me too! Tell me you were joking just now! Lin Li! Hurry up, say it’s not true, you’re joking, then I’ll laugh heartily, pat you on the shoulder, and say, Lin Li, wow, you’re so humorous, this gag is new and good! Then we can continue cracking poor jokes and cursing this damn world!"
The silence quickly faded, Bai Bufan grabbed Lin Li’s collar, pressed his forehead against Lin Li’s forehead, veins visible, he roared.
The other students around were startled.
Lin Li just stared at Bai Bufan.
Smiling was Lin Li’s protective color.
"This isn’t real! Right! This isn’t real!"
"You can’t really encounter this thing, right? You can’t betray your class, right? Lin Li, I can’t accept it!"
Lin Li didn’t think this scene was funny; he only saw a hopeless Bai Bufan.
One... who saw a brother driving a Land Rover after all, a hopeless Bai Bufan.
"You can’t really have thirty million!" Cold violence is truly terrifying, and Lin Li remained silent, Bai Bufan stuttered, giving a final dying struggle.
"Alright, alright, I was just kidding." Lin Li finally couldn’t bear seeing Bai Bufan like that and spoke helplessly.
"Exactly, it should be like this, scared me to death, almost truly believed you became a rich second generation. Really, I’m feeling sorry for you." Bai Bufan wiped the imaginary sweat off his forehead, looking both relieved and regretful.
"Just one million eight hundred thousand." Lin Li finished.
Bai Bufan’s hand froze at his forehead while still wiping sweat.
After great joy and sorrow, emotions were hard to stir anymore. Bai Bufan looked at Lin Li with difficulty, seeking a real answer.
Lin Li patted Bai Bufan’s shoulder, "In one’s life, there are always many unexpected events."
Bai Bufan shook his head, "But I hate surprises."
"I mean unexpected wealth."
"Come to think of it, sometimes I quite like surprises." Bai Bufan nodded.
"I wasn’t talking about you; I was talking about myself," Lin Li smiled.
"I hate surprises, all surprises." The chameleon lesson really needs to take some tips from Bai Bufan.
"Specifically, it indeed involves my family a bit, not easy to say. Just think of it as I won ten million yuan lottery yesterday, and got a considerable amount of wealth that I can spend freely, no big deal if I spend more," Lin Li patted Bai Bufan’s shoulder and said.
After thinking, it seems not quite right to mention becoming a rich second generation, let’s settle it in this way.
Bai Bufan no longer had the energy to mock, he reached for Lin Li’s pocket and took out the meal card: "Five dishes and a soup, don’t refill the rice."
Lin Li: "Mm."
Bai Bufan became more desperate.
Damn, Lin Li is really playing.
The sunny October day is so cold, Bai Bufan really wanted to put his hand in someone else’s wallet to warm it up.

chapters.title: Chapter 311 - 241: Neither A nor B, I Won’t Play with You Anymore
chapters.content:
Chapter 311: Chapter 241: Neither A nor B, I Won’t Play with You Anymore
Oh man, Lin Li’s really hit it big.
Bai Bufan sincerely feels happy for Lin Li (five cents per message, remember to delete the content in the brackets).
"You didn’t forget your brothers after getting rich, so I guess you’re somewhat decent." In the cafeteria, Bai Bufan sighed.
Even though he doesn’t fully understand, he’s come to accept this reality.
There’s no other choice but to accept it.
"What kind of joke is this, having money doesn’t mean forgetting your roots. Brothers are always the most important; you’re always my number one choice." Lin Li waved his hand, saying firmly.
"Haha." Bai Bufan couldn’t be bothered to display any emotion.
Bai Bufan will never forget, Bao Wei and his "corpse without organs that was used for a ghost marriage to bring good fortune."
"You don’t believe your pal," Lin Li, questioned, got angry, "Let me put it this way, if I’m in a toilet with no paper, and I have only your photo and a cheque for 1.8 million, I’ll choose you without hesitation.
That’s because you’re always my first choice."
Lin Li spoke emotionally, his voice sincere.
Bai Bufan: "?"
You’re his number one choice in that situation!?
That’s definitely chosen without hesitation.
Bai Bufan believes him.
Because if it were him in that situation, he’d also choose Lin Li first; rounding it up, that’s a mutual journey.
"Why didn’t you say your longing for me is turning yellow?" Bai Bufan sneered.
"Eh? Could work, your version is more artsy, Korean-style, next time I’ll say this to Bao Wei." Lin Li, hearing this, compared and pondered for a bit, then gave a thumbs-up.
Then, Lin Li suddenly fell into philosophical contemplation: "But, Bufan, sometimes using your photo to wipe ten times and still can’t get it clean, I start to wonder, is mankind actually like a crayon? Never truly clean?"
Bai Bufan almost spat out his drink.
"Could you first detach my photo from the scenario, and I’m eating curry chicken, don’t say such messed-up things!"
"If you weren’t eating this, I wouldn’t say it, you know, when I first encountered this color and texture."
"Damn! So you’re pure sword!"
After eating, on the way back to the classroom.
"At least we’re doing well now; others worry about how to make money, while we’re worried about how to spend it." Bai Bufan quickly adjusts his mood, speaking cheerfully.
"What does that have to do with you?" At this point, Lin Li must execute justice.
"I’m the same, how to make two hundred last till next month." Bai Bufan looked at Lin Li, his expression slightly sorrowful: "Isn’t this considered ’worrying about how to spend money’?"
"I understand now." Lin Li nodded.
"By the way, Lin Li, how about buying my life?" Bai Bufan asked hopefully:
"Ahem, born overseas (outside Shanghai), only lived nearly sixteen years, without much wear and tear. My brain hasn’t been used much, smooth, without scratches or damage, the body hasn’t been used much, typically stays indoors.
Personality is rare and high-priced, a little sickly feeling, though slightly flawed, mainly just a bit ill now.
Has the admirable trait of working tirelessly to achieve goals, however, this can’t be paid in one go, needs installments, hence delivered in four phases: exhausted, rest; forget, eat.
Moreover, there’s considerable appreciation potential, as I’m a ’moonlight clan,’ buying me and painting white turns me into a ’white moonlight,’ able to be unforgettable to many."
Bai Bufan finished his pitch, looking at Lin Li expectantly.
"Those things I don’t care much about." Lin Li shook his head, appearing to truly consider the idea of buying Bai Bufan’s life: "Buying you could be feasible, but I need to confirm some other conditions."
"Which ones?"
"Do you shed hair?" Lin Li inquired.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"Do you have fixed toilet times? Oh, you should, witnessed during National Day, then let’s change the question, do you bite people? Can you resist the urge to eat feces? Can you—"
Bai Bufan: "..."
You jerk.
"You’re right, I do bite people!" Bai Bufan, quickly retorts defensively.
After some playful bantering, Lin Li asks:
"So are you definitely going or not?"
"If you truly have money and aren’t bluffing like Bao Wei, then I’m definitely going along, why miss a free opportunity." Bai Bufan nodded, then asked, "So it’s just us two, the ’one dog’ combo?"
Last time’s National Day accommodation was covered by the class monitor; if you’re hosting this time, it’s better to ask her too."
"I haven’t asked the ’third person’ yet, I feel even if I host, they might not be interested in traveling far for a day just to shoot guns, but I’ll ask them at lunchtime tomorrow." Lin Li nodded.
...
"So, go experience live ammunition shooting this weekend?"
The next day at noon, upon hearing Lin Li’s idea, Chen Yu Ying seemed slightly surprised.
"Yeah, class monitor, interested?" Lin Li nodded.
"Why suddenly have this idea?"
"No guy can refuse guns, just like no guy can refuse white stockings and black stockings."
"That’s specifically you, right." Hearing Lin Li relate to this topic, Chen Yu Ying helplessly rubbed her forehead, then expressed concern:
"Interest is fine, but are you really hosting? That should cost a lot, right?"
"Class monitor, you know me, I never force myself, let alone for face value. Don’t worry, I can only say, for this experience alone, including you all with me, expenses are trivial for me.
So you all don’t need any mental burden, just go and enjoy, shoot however you want."

chapters.title: Chapter 313 - 241: Unwilling to A and Unwilling to B, Won’t Play with You Anymore_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 313: Chapter 241: Unwilling to A and Unwilling to B, Won’t Play with You Anymore_3
"From the factory?" Qu Wanqiu asked in confusion, "Is it made at Ah San’s factory, where the quality is questionable?"
Apple has factories all around the world, and the quality varies significantly across them. The worst, naturally, is from that populous country with over a billion people in the East.
Reflecting.
However, Lin Li shook his head and denied it: "It’s not that factory."
"So what is it?" Qu Wanqiu was completely puzzled.
"It’s the factory of 16."
"Ah? I don’t get it, what do you mean by the factory of 16." Qu Wanqiu still didn’t understand.
"Well, it’s, uh, the factory that’s above the number 16." Lin Li had to explain in more detail.
"..."
"..."
Qu Wanqiu, Ding Sihan: "?"
Wait a minute.
This factory...
"Lin Li, that’s called square root, you could’ve just said it’s Apple 4! Square root of 16 is square root of 16, what are you doing saying factory of Apple 16!!" Qu Wanqiu couldn’t hold back anymore and raised her voice, critiquing.
"Oh, oh, right, it’s called square root, I remember now." Lin Li ’suddenly realized’.
Qu Wanqiu: "..."
Sure, "just remembered" now.
Only Lin Li can describe Apple 4 like that.
As a result, the $1800 pants got a second shoe print kicked out on them.
Deservedly so.
"Forget it, forget it, Apple 4 is just a few years younger than me, I don’t need it, and I’m not that interested in shooting anyway, I’m really not going." Qu Wanqiu shook her head and said.
"Alright then, you’re just missing out on a freebie opportunity." Lin Li nodded, not bothering to insist.
"That’s okay," Qu Wanqiu shook her head, "Lin Li, just calculate how much on average each person spent, and transfer the guest money to me, that’s fine. It’s the thought that counts, whether I go or not doesn’t matter."
Lin Li chuckled at this: "Qu Wanqiu, what kind of skincare do you use regularly? Maintaining such a thick skin?"
"Bleh bleh—"
"I don’t know why you’re hosting us, but since you volunteered to be the sucker, I’m not holding back." Ding Sihan patted Lin Li’s shoulder before heading back to class, "Lin Li, work hard, and hopefully in the future, whenever we hang out, it’ll be AA, you pay the A, and I’ll play with a cheeky smile."
Lin Li initially widened his eyes, but then relaxed when he realized Ding Sihan meant something different from what he thought, blinking quirkily.
Haha, turns out you meant AA system, I thought you meant AA system.
"What kind of expression is that?" Ding Sihan asked in confusion.
"Nothing," Lin Li quickly shook his head, "AA system is AA system, AA system is fine, no problem with AA system."
Ding Sihan furrowed her brow, then suddenly widened her eyes.
Remember, don’t think only guys have dirty minds, most girls can be just as bold in this area.
"Lin Li! You pervert! You’re such an enormously ultimate pervert! What kind of things are you thinking about!?" The moment Ding Sihan realized it, she shouted, blushing.
The punched and kicked Lin Li: "?"
"No, little BB," Lin Li was genuinely aggrieved this time; seventeen is the age when one can’t take injustice, so Lin Li fumed silently:
"I didn’t say anything, I’m just calmly standing here fetching water, playing this sensitive burner that produces water with just a touch, is this perverted?"
Only those who slander Lin Li know how wronged Lin Li is, who the real pervert is, Lin Li doesn’t want to say.
Even calling someone a pervert requires basic fairness, right?
Ding Sihan: "?"
"Who is little BB? I’m little Ding di—no wait!! Who told you to keep calling me like that!! Call me Ding Sihan! It’s Ding Sihan!"
Ding Sihan hesitated while refuting, almost choking herself.
Lin Li clicked his tongue.
Women are truly unreasonable, first Qu Wanqiu yelled at him, now Ding Sihan is yelling at him.
Seeing the absent-minded Lin Li, Ding Sihan said nothing, purely punching and kicking.
Qu Wanqiu found it amusing, so she said nothing, purely abetting the evil.
Human nature is inherently evil; three minutes later, looking at his pants seemingly involved in a stampede when all he did was fetch water, Lin Li sighed helplessly.
Eternal Nansang, why do you treat me so.
...
"Jia Bao and Lin Daiyu, Xue Baocai."
"Chen Guanxi Zhang Baiju, Xie Tingfeng."
The boys were in the back cabinets studying Chinese couplets when Wang Ze rushed in:
"Everyone, situation’s dire, the drawing results just came in, and we’ll be facing Class 9 this afternoon, the same one as Bao Wei’s class yesterday."
"Who drew the unlucky lot?" Chen Tianming widened his eyes, "I’m going to kill them. Wang Ze, it wasn’t you, was it?"
Class 17 made it through, Chen Tianming was hoping for a sweet encounter with a legendary tale to tell.
As long as they face Class 17, losing is winning; winning is also winning!
"It wasn’t me, I wasn’t that unlucky, they drew." Wang Ze waved his left hand, then began swatting his right hand.
"Don’t bully your partner, flying you all those planes over these years isn’t easy," Bai Bufan stepped up to mediate the marital situation and then touched his chin, "Looks like we’ll have to resort to skullduggery if we want to have a fighting chance."
"Tianming, what’s your mindset as the top of Class 4?" Bai Bufan, Wang Ze, and others all turned their eyes toward Chen Tianming at this moment.
"Which class is Class 17 pulling against?" Chen Tianming first inquired.
"Class 20, based on my analysis of their combat ability, advancing to the top 5 shouldn’t be a problem." Wang Ze responded.
Chen Tianming heard this and swallowed a mouthful of saliva.
B Plan is a plan prepared long ago.
But as the cost, he might lose something forever...
However...
If Class 17 can win...
Carrying the promise of encountering Class 17! He has an absolutely unlosable reason!
"I’ve had this mindset for a long time." With these thoughts, Chen Tianming nodded.
...
Basketball court.
After class ended in the afternoon, everyone from Class 4 gathered here.
Class 9 arrived bit by bit.
When the two Zhou Baoweis, along with a Zhou Baowei Plus, walked toward the tug-of-war rope, there was a strong tremor across the basketball court.
Even Lin Li didn’t absorb powder this time; he started applying anti-slip powder and warming up meticulously.
Lin Li’s own strength is undoubtedly greater than anyone on the other side, even Bao Wei Plus isn’t much in comparison.
But from a collective aspect, even Lin Li isn’t fully confident of winning.
"Both sides ready, take your positions." The referee drew the lines again, held the middle red line, and spoke to the two classes.
"Chen Tianming, why are you wearing a mask."
With Chen Tianming at the forefront of the tug-of-war team, Zhuo Yongfei took his position and noticed the masked Chen Tianming behind him, asking curiously.
Chen Tianming didn’t respond, only continuing to apply powder to his hands.
Zhuo Yongfei raised an eyebrow, thinking Chen Tianming didn’t want to talk to him and didn’t insist, adjusting his posture.
"Zhuo Yongfei, no matter what happens, look ahead and don’t turn back." Chen Tianming’s voice echoed softly.
Zhuo Yongfei turned his head instinctively, but Chen Tianming stopped him with a hand: "Don’t turn back!"
"Listen to me, look forward, use your strength, don’t rest, and don’t turn back."
Zhuo Yongfei: "?"
Are you trying to be "The Fatty" from "Grave Robbers Chronicles" here?
"All prepare!" The referee said, already placing the whistle into his mouth.
Then Zhuo Yongfei heard Chen Tianming roar from behind: "Nansang Grade One Class Nine! Sixteen weaklings! Who dares face me! Fire at me! Fire at me!"
"Damn!"
The lead soldier from Class 9 almost stumbled, the referee who was ready to blow the whistle pulled his collar to cover his nose and lower face, turning around, his body shaking.
The audience erupted in a huge wave of noise, the Class 9 team’s movement was visibly shaky, a few girls bit their lips desperately, their shoulders shaking like sieves.
When all the attention was directed at the side, who the hell can resist looking?
Chen Tianming, what the heck did you do!
Zhuo Yongfei decided to turn his head.
Damn, it’s the Great Qing’s second assassin!
Knowledge consolidation: Great Qing’s first assassin is Lin Li with makeup on the field trip bus.
Mom, this makeup was done by Lin Li, wasn’t it?
Damn, if you’re painting sausage lips, just paint sausage lips, inserting scallions into nostrils, what’s that all about?

chapters.title: Chapter 314 - 242: In the future, you will favor the two of them, right?
chapters.content:
Chapter 314: Chapter 242: In the future, you will favor the two of them, right?
Zhuo Yongfei’s entire body tensed up, veins bulging on his forehead, as he fiercely bit down on his lip to keep from laughing himself.
Damn.
Shouldn’t have turned back.
"Look forward! Zhuo Yongfei! Don’t forget your responsibility!" Chen Tianming shouted sternly.
"Sorry!" Zhuo Yongfei admitted his mistake and turned back around.
"Referee! Start the match! Start the match!" Class Nine had already lost their morale; now was the perfect opportunity to press the attack. Bai Bufan, Lin Li, and others saw their plan working and yelled from behind.
After all, the longer Class Nine stared at Chen Tianming’s face, the more desensitized they would become. Timing was crucial.
Chen Tianming felt the gazes around him, maintaining calmness and aloofness.
The ups and downs don’t faze me; all’s still on me.
It’s true, by behaving this way, I might lose all chances of dating at Nansang Middle School today.
But since when would I care about that?
Among all the beauties, I only spice things up with Qiaoqiao, slurping and licking!!
As the prominent face of Class Four in tug-of-war, Chen Tianming had already prepared to sacrifice himself!
As long as I get to meet Qiaoqiao, I’m willing to burn everything for her.
Moreover, Class Seventeen is competing too, and Yao Qiaoqiao is one of the participants; she won’t see this.
As for later... History is written by the victors.
"Teacher! Please start the match!" Hence, Chen Tianming calmly followed and urged the referee, "Stop dragging it on!"
"I didn’t drag!" The referee, who was laughing, suddenly turned around to refute, "I was just laughing!"
Chen Tianming: "?"
Wait a second.
You damn.
"If you didn’t drag, then let’s start, teacher!" Chen Tianming said with a cold face.
"Oh haha, okay, Class Nine, quickly reorganize!" The referee, not feeling offended by the student’s tone, managed to suppress laughter and nodded, whistling towards Class Nine as a signal.
Class Nine immediately adjusted their stance, but some couldn’t hold back laughter again after glancing at Chen Tianming, especially since he was still dead-serious.
What a wicked plan Class Four had!
They finally realized.
"Ready—"
"Today I will use the bathroom on my own, Dad and Mom, don’t underestimate me—"
Chen Tianming’s haunting tune floated towards Class Nine at this moment.
A person with a funny painted face sang a nursery rhyme in a completely serious tone.
The difficulty of holding back laughter in this situation can’t be understood by outsiders.
Zhuo Yongfei’s lips were bloodless from biting too hard.
Damn lips, don’t laugh supplement!
Why didn’t I listen to Chen Tianming, why did I turn around!
"Beeep—" The referee picked up the whistle that had fallen on his neck due to laughter, put it back in his mouth, and blew hard!
[Charge], go!
This time Lin Li held nothing back, giving it his all from the get-go.
"Go Class Four! Go Class Four!"
"One—Two—Pull!!! One—Two—Pull!!!"
The moment the whistle sounded, the red rope jolted towards Class Four. When Class Nine started exerting force, they found they couldn’t stem the downward spiral, the red rope wobbling and moving towards Class Four!
"Beeep—"
"Class Four wins! Second round starts in five minutes!"
The referee announced the result.
"We’re champions again! We’re champions again!" This time Wang Ze, who hadn’t stepped on Lin Li’s shoes, excitedly turned around and hugged Lin Li.
"Turns out Class Nine isn’t as strong as I imagined; I didn’t even exert as much force as yesterday." Bai Bufan said smugly.
"I’m gonna go mock Yu Cheng."
Wang Ze trotted over to the opposing shot put athlete to mock him, pointing with a thumbs-down.
Smart move indeed, teasing from a distance, knowing stepping closer wasn’t wise.
Second-class contributor Lin Li merely smiled without a word, concealing his achievements.
The combined force of Wang Ze and Bai Bufan wasn’t greater than his.
As for the first-class contributor—
Lin Li, Bai Bufan, and Zhou Baowei exchanged glances, nodded, and shouted towards the front:
"Brother Tianming, strengthen our Class Four!"
"Brother Tianming, strengthen our Class Four!"
Facing the request from his classmates, Chen Tianming only left them with a back brimming with stories, but his right fist slowly raised high, symbolizing victory!
Representing that he heard everyone’s voices!
The tug-of-war players of Class Nine were indeed struggling to hold back now.
What kind of class is Class Four? Seems like a lot of fun.
"Referee, this... haha, damn cheating, right?"
"Isn’t this a bit unfair, feels like we’re being disrupted."
A few students who took tug-of-war seriously started protesting to the referee.
"Is this considered interference? Ugly people have no rights? Brother Tianming was born looking like this! An original face, never had surgery! Haters, stop being bitter!" Lin Li and Bai Bufan’s fans came to defend upon smelling the situation.
"Did your mom give birth to you with two scallions in your nose?"
"Genetic mutation, umbilical cord turned into scallions, why not?"
"Alright, reasonable."
Chen Tianming: "..."
You’ve defended well, please don’t defend next time.
The referee smiled and shook his head at the protesting students from Class Nine: "Not considered cheating; interference would be verbal abuse or physical contact, but this kind of self-painting doesn’t count."
The most important thing for a fun event is fun, there’s not much prize for winning, just a few points.
So, who said this makeup isn’t good? It’s fantastic.
Upon hearing this, Class Nine didn’t contest further, admitting Class Four indeed pulled off a great stunt.

chapters.title: Chapter 315 - 242: In the future, you will favor the two of them, right_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 315: Chapter 242: In the future, you will favor the two of them, right_2
But we can’t just sit here and wait for death.
The students of Class Nine subconsciously fixed their gaze on the person standing at the very front of their class.
The guy took two steps back: "?"
"What? Wait?"
"Five minutes left! Who brought something to make us look ugly?! Quick! We need to use the foreigner’s skills to conquer them!"
"I have a red pen here!"
"I have a hair tie here!"
"I have socks here!"
"I even have two cigarette butts here!"
"And I have some spit here!"
"What the hell, who the f*ck used a cigarette butt to burn my ass?"
"Did you say thank you?"
——The last few lines were all shouted by Lin Li and Bai Bufan as they blended in.
Class Nine began to torment their classmates.
And after Bai Bufan and Lin Li were driven away, the two went back to look after their brother, with Bai Bufan massaging Chen Tianming’s shoulders and Lin Li touching up his makeup.
"Monitor, sorry, but our brother doesn’t want any photos taken." Upon seeing Chen Yu Ying sneaking closer with her camera, Lin Li immediately stepped forward to drive her away, blocking the camera lens.
"Just one photo, please," Chen Yu Ying prayed with her hands folded.
"I said no, you can’t." Lin Li’s tone remained firm, but his fingers blocking the camera quietly opened up a crack, just enough for the lens to peek through.
"Click."
Chen Tianming: "?"
The cinema’s hired bodyguards? What kind of crappy professionalism is this?
"Chen Tianming, thank you for your sacrifice. Pfft, without you, we might have lost." After taking the photo, Chen Yu Ying smiled as she spoke to Chen Tianming.
Chen Tianming felt a bit embarrassed, scratching the back of his head, just about to return the politeness, when Bai Bufan firmly pressed his head back: "How many times have I told you, don’t point the gun at your own people."
Chen Tianming: "..."
You motherf*cker.
Beside them, Wang Yuezhi’s eyes widened.
So, this is all it takes to be praised?
And even be praised with a smile?
Isn’t this my forte?
Wang Yuezhi’s eyes lit up, checking the time, realizing there were still a few minutes before the next round, he had time.
He dashed towards the dormitory.
Hearing Chen Yu Ying say that, it wasn’t just Wang Yuezhi who reacted, but also his midday good buddy Lin Li.
"Without me, the class would lose too, Monitor, won’t you give me some credit?" It’s not that we lack but rather fear the imbalance, Lin Li wasn’t pleased.
"Alright, alright~ You also did a great job." Chen Yu Ying smiled, coming forward to placate the childish Lin Li.
...
The five minutes quickly passed, and the second round was about to begin.
The lead boy of Class Nine, now with a face full of messy marker drawings, his hair in a heap (literally), and two cigarette butts found on the ground hanging by his ears, stood lifelessly at the very front.
However, this level of attack was a mere joke to Class Four.
