"Coach, that’s inaccurate. You shouldn’t use ’everyone’. Some can’t catch it." Lin Li raised his hand again upon hearing this.
"Who?" Coach Shi asked instinctively.
Lin Li: "Jesus, he has holes in his hands."
Coach Shi: "?"
Bai Bufan: "Venus can’t either, she has nothing on her hands."
Coach Shi: "..."
Coach Shi covered his face with his hand, sighed deeply, and leaned on the wall nearby, gently but continuously knocking his head against the bulletproof glass.
Money is hard to earn!! Sh*t is hard to eat!!
Who the hell said the birth rate is low nowadays!?
Where the hell is it low!? There’s always two at a time!!
Meanwhile, next door.
Coach Lu, who was normally explaining to Ding Sihan and Chen Yu Ying, was attracted by the noise next door. She looked up and saw her colleague looking utterly desperate, banging his head against the wall.
If his gun didn’t have a magazine in it, Coach Lu would have suspected he would fire a shot at himself the next second.
A fit of rage, a full-on rage, just a rage.
"What happened over there?" Coach Lu asked puzzled.
However, Coach Shi didn’t hear through the glass and kept banging.
Chen Yu Ying blinked, looking at the innocent-looking yet fervently chatting Lin Li and Bai Bufan behind Coach Shi, and awkwardly smiled at Coach Lu: "It’s nothing, should be normal."
"That’s right, but Sister Lu, you better advise Coach Shi to get some psychological counseling later." Ding Sihan chimed in.
Coach Lu: "?"
Her gaze also turned to those two guys.
What are these geniuses?
Coach Shi painfully adjusted his mindset, showing a ’smile’ again.
"Which one of you wants to go first?" He directly skipped the lengthy introduction and opened the glass door, asking.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan exchanged a glance; with their bond, no more words were needed, they nodded to each other and stepped forward: "I’ll go first."
Coach Shi: "..."
He thought they would be courteous towards each other, looks like he was overthinking.
The two of them exchanged glances, a spark of electricity seemed to pass between their eyes.
"What the hell!" Bai Bufan suddenly shouted.
Whoa, why did it feel like I was just zapped with something?
The remote attacker Lin Li hid his skill and fame.
Finally, following the principle of humanity first and fist first, Lin Li went first.
Lin Li and Coach Shi went in, closing the door behind them.
Coach Shi got back into work mode, demonstrating the correct stance and grip.
"When shooting, be mindful; the recoil isn’t especially large, but you should still maintain the correct posture. Hold the gun with both hands, arms straight, body slightly leaning forward, eyes, the front sight, and the target aligned. Remember, smoothly pull the trigger without haste."

chapters.title: Chapter 329 - 246 I’m Putting It Here Here Here_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 329: Chapter 246 I’m Putting It Here Here Here_3
Coach Shi began to demonstrate the standard posture.
Lin Li was ready to learn, but suddenly remembered he had another ability.
[Mimicry].
[Mimicry: Specify a behavior pattern, talent, or ability you’ve seen in person in the past month when you use it. After using, you will mimic 50%~150% of that behavior pattern, talent, or ability for one hour. The specific rate depends on your physical condition and ability at the time of use.
You can accumulate one usage every 48 hours, with a mimicry ability storage limit of 2.]
With a thought, Lin Li hoped... he could mimic Coach Shi’s firearm skills?
[Mimicry successful, mimic rate "150%".]
Seeing the system prompt, he not only successfully mimicked but far exceeded Coach Shi.
However, Lin Li realized his brain had no reaction; no firearms knowledge surged in like "soul of close combat".
"Alright, you can give it a try now." Although noting Lin Li’s distraction, Coach Shi just sighed inwardly, tied the handgun to the safety rope, and then reminded:
"Remember, safety first. Keep the muzzle pointing at the target, don’t put your finger on the trigger until you’re ready to shoot.
Spent shells must not be taken away; before any major movement, like picking something up or bending, you must report to me first, or I might impulsively take you down."
"Okay, got it."
Lin Li nodded and took the gun from Coach Shi’s hand.
His hand subconsciously aimed at the target ten meters away, following a more standard action than Coach Shi’s.
Lin Li raised an eyebrow. So it’s muscle memory being directly mimicked, without involving the brain?
"Alright, you can start anytime now. On your first shot, try not to miss the target—"
"Bang! Bang!"
Before Coach Shi finished speaking, Lin Li had already fired.
To be honest, the gunshots were much louder than Lin Li imagined, even wearing earmuffs, it felt a bit buzzing.
After shooting, Lin Li confidently looked at the screen.
Two closely spaced bullet holes formed a single hole in the center of the 10-meter target.
"Coach, help me adjust to the 30-meter target."
Coach Shi: "?"
What do you mean? Did you already shoot?
Hitting a ten-ring on a ten-meter target isn’t hard, but two ten-rings in succession is no easy feat, especially for a complete novice?
This kid... is quite impressive!
"Is this really your first time? Never secretly practiced at home?" Coach Shi asked, operating both the ten-meter target to lower and the 30-meter target to rise, with curiosity.
"Handgun practice every two days, if I’m in the mood once a day," Lin Li said shyly.
Coach Shi: "..."
What kind of handgun have you been practicing?
"Young man, moderation is key. Don’t wait until you’re middle-aged to lament, the world has no more well diggers." But, unphased, Coach Shi continued his lesson with all his experience, irrespective of whichever handgun.
Lin Li: "?"
What’s this lament over an ocean for? There’s plenty of water.
Though confident in his robust health, Lin Li felt a bit concerned.
"The 30-meter target is ready." Looking at the screen which had switched views, Coach Shi signaled.
"Bang! Bang! Bang!"
Lin Li raised his hand, almost immediately performing a triple shot.
Ten-ring, eight-ring, nine-ring.
Coach Shi opened his mouth wide, speechless for a long time.
Previously, it might have been attributed to luck; now, it’s purely skill.
And it’s already reached a level even Coach Shi finds hard to achieve.
Lin Li also looked at his results—not his own but 150% of Coach Shi’s results.
Apparently, the coach’s level was just average—this might be Coach Shi’s 150% limit; it couldn’t maintain consistent hits due to spread and dispersion of trajectory.
Huh?
Suddenly, Lin Li thought of a question.
Mimicry seems to not just be limited to mimicking others’ abilities?
Currently, his ability to shoot handguns was perceived by himself, doesn’t it mean he can mimic it too?
[Mimicry successful, mimic rate "150%".]
Lin Li raised an eyebrow, damn it works again, and at the extreme rate.
This adds up, meaning his shooting skills for the next hour are at 225% of Coach Shi’s?
His feel of the handgun indeed changed once again.
The scope of [Mimicry] is behaviors seen in the past month; so does it mean as long as he mimics ’himself’ every month, this ability becomes permanently activatable?
And it could get stronger, until one can only mimic their own [100%], stabilizing?
No, as long as he continues body and skill training, ideally, his physical condition should be stronger each use, maybe achieving [105%], [110%]?
Lin Li thought it was feasible.
Moreover, Lin Li’s comprehension was quite good now, and wasn’t hands-on teaching less useful than this ’direct teaching through embodiment’ experience right in front?
Teaching by instruction pales against the ghost teaching directly.
Though no new knowledge surged to his mind, relying on memory and comprehension of these physical sensations definitely enhanced his inherent firearm skills.
With these thoughts, Lin Li felt satisfied, rested the gun on the table, and prepared to leave, letting Bai Bufan in.
"Lin Li, do you want to fire an R-rated cannon?" But Coach Shi suddenly stopped Lin Li.
Lin Li: "?"
"Want to play fighter planes? Want to play handguns? Desire the clash of blood and flesh, yearning for audible resonances, striving for everything a man desires? They all belong to R-rated items!" Coach Shi now looked like a salesman, enthusiastically speaking.
But Lin Li wasn’t fooled, squinted at Coach Shi:
"Coach, just say it’s recruitment."

chapters.title: Chapter 330 - 247: The Art of Language is Comforting from the Moment One Speaks
chapters.content:
Chapter 330: Chapter 247: The Art of Language is Comforting from the Moment One Speaks
The coach blinked and gave a thumbs up, "Smart!"
"Not to brag, Lin Li, but if this was really your first time firing a live round, and you did this well, I think you’d make a great soldier. You might even become a legendary soldier king, with lots of potential and a bright future ahead."
Coach Shi was sincerely impressed and spoke earnestly.
Lin Li: "..."
"I’m only a high school freshman, coach." Lin Li politely declined.
This isn’t my true talent.
Besides, what would happen to my daily tasks in Genshin Impact if I joined the army?
Lin Li thought to himself that he’s not really suited for hardship. Even a few days of military training would leave him exhausted and whining like a dog, let alone joining the army.
"Aren’t you about to turn adult? High school grade isn’t an issue." But Coach Shi didn’t think it mattered.
"What?! Coach, how do you know which grade I’m in? And can we even join the army if we’re into bromances?" Lin Li exclaimed in shock.
Coach Shi: "?"
Damn you.
"I just mentioned it casually, it’s not a big deal." Coach Shi waved his hand with a smile, at Tokyo University, they really respect individual choices.
Leaving Coach Shi to pick up the spent shells inside, Lin Li left the shooting platform.
As soon as he walked out, Bai Bufan earnestly grabbed Lin Li’s hand and said sincerely:
"Lin Li, promise me, when we do... uh... outdoor activities together in the future, if we encounter a brown bear, let’s not point our guns at each other’s knees, okay?"
Even though Bai Bufan was outside, he could clearly see Lin Li’s scores through the glass.
What the heck, how am I supposed to compete now?
Bai Bufan felt that when he sees a brown bear, the next moment he’ll see blood gushing from his knees and Lin Li’s retreating figure.
Lin Li chuckled at his words, "Don’t worry, I won’t."
"Good brother." Bai Bufan was moved.
"—The risk of shooting at the knees is still too high. If in desperation, you decide to go down fighting and shoot me while I’m escaping, what then?
It’s not safe, so I’d definitely aim for your eyes. That way, even if you’re unlucky and just get blinded but not killed, you still won’t be able to hit me again, and you can’t escape. The brown bear will surely target you first." Lin Li finished his sentence.
Bai Bufan: "..."
Damn you.
Even harsher than shooting at the knees, there’s really no chance given.
"Lin Li, I don’t know what you’re pretending to be, seriously," seeing Lin Li was determined to put him in a tough spot, Bai Bufan sneered, "I’m giving you face, and you’re still so smug, really—just let me say, if I had hands, I’d hit your scores too."
"Oh—" Lin Li nodded with a prolonged tone.
"Just you wait!"
Bai Bufan pushed open the door and went inside. Seeing Coach Shi preparing to adjust the target distance back to ten meters, he gestured that it wasn’t necessary:
"No need, coach, with my skills, I can start directly at the thirty-meter target. You see, some people’s lifetime achievement is just a casual baseline for others." Bai Bufan said nonchalantly.
Coach Shi: "?"
But this time, Coach Shi didn’t say much.
He realized that although these two kids might seem like idiots, they’re actually quite skilled idiots, and shouldn’t be judged by their appearance.
Just based on looks, Bai Bufan seemed a bit more incapable, looking like a child who couldn’t take care of himself.
So... maybe this guy was indeed stronger than Lin Li.
Have some faith!
"Hold the gun with both hands, arms straight, body slightly leaning forward..." So Coach Shi began to guide him on the shooting posture again.
"I’m ready!"
"Bang!"
Bai Bufan went down.
—After Bai Bufan fired this shot, he instinctively tried to bypass the safety rope to perform a move of blowing away the gun’s smoke, which was impossible due to the safety rope’s restrictions. However, because there was a tendency for the gun muzzle to lift, he was already floored.
But you can’t blame Coach Shi for this, it was just a display of the opponent’s diligence, and instead, Bai Bufan took the initiative to apologize.
The thirty-meter target is indeed quite far. After apologizing, Bai Bufan looked at the screen beside him.
The picture was serene, with only the three bullet holes Lin Li left on the target paper.
Bai Bufan tilted his head and made eye contact with Coach Shi.
"Coach, the network seems to be lagging." Bai Bufan pointed at the screen.
Coach Shi: "..."
"Kid, is there a chance you missed the target?" Coach Shi asked politely.
Bai Bufan’s posture was not very standard, plus it was his first experience using a handgun, missing the thirty-meter target was a normal outcome.
"No, it’s definitely the network." Bai Bufan shook his head.
Coach Shi laughed and pressed the target switch, and the target on the screen started descending in real-time.
Bai Bufan: "..."
"Coach, could it be that I hit so accurately that it perfectly overlapped Lin Li’s previous ten-ring bullet hole, so it looks like I missed?" Bai Bufan came up with a new excuse.
Coach Shi: "..."
"You can fool your buddy, but don’t fool yourself. If your buddy gets tricked, it doesn’t matter, we’ll laugh it off, but I hope after you say this, you’ll wipe your eyes and make sure the tears don’t fall on the gun barrel.
A brother believing you won’t lose a piece of meat, but don’t make it so you believe it yourself. If your buddy gets fooled, it’s really no big deal, and we’ll laugh it off, I’m not trying to break your defense. Just wipe your tears and think carefully, who else will believe these words besides your buddy?"
Lin Li’s calm voice came through the glass door, sounding muffled.
"Damn!" Bai Bufan couldn’t hold it any longer.
"Accident, accident, let’s go again!"
He raised his hand, aimed once more, this time the gun took longer to go off.
"Three rings, not bad." This time he hit the target, and with no extra moves, Coach Shi looked at the screen and commented.

chapters.title: Chapter 331 - 247: The Art of Language Is Making People Feel Comfortable as Soon as You Speak_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 331: Chapter 247: The Art of Language Is Making People Feel Comfortable as Soon as You Speak_2
Third shot, score of 2.
"Alright, Coach. I’m completely familiar with the thirty-meter target now. Continuing wouldn’t be a challenge. Personally, I’m more looking forward to the ten-meter target. It’s a worthy opponent," Bai Bufan said.
Damn it, keep shooting the thirty-meter target. Who knows if after five shots, my total score would even exceed Lin Li’s single shot!
Coach Shi: "...Okay."
Tough talk.
After switching to the ten-meter target, the performance naturally improved a lot. The first shot scored seven, the second shot eight.
After completing five shots, it was now time for Bai Bufan’s most feared part—leaving the room to face Lin Li.
Watching Bai Bufan turn around and leave the room, Lin Li, who had been waiting for a long time, smiled.
"Bufan, do you know what’s useful about being born as me?"
"Wait a sec—"
"Talent, of course!"
"Bufan, do you know what to look for when making tea?"
"Shut up!"
"Find some teaware yourself."
"Bufan, do you know the periodic table of elements?"
"Damn it!"
"Arsenic is not at the top, erbium, cerium, rhodium, tellurium, and niobium need to be refined."
"Bufan, compared to the beach at Shanting, I prefer the beach over at Sanya. Do you know why?"
"Because there are no stones, only sand!"
Bai Bufan: "..."
Damn.
You b******.
"Alright, alright, alright, bro. It’s about time we stopped. My bad, my bad." Seeing that Lin Li still intended to continue, Bai Bufan covered his ears, despairing.
If I had known during the National Day, I wouldn’t have mocked Lin Li so much during the stone-skipping session. Now, I’m the victim getting the turn.
"Mainly, I haven’t practiced for a long time, so I was a bit rusty." Seeing Lin Li finally stop, or maybe temporarily out of words, Bai Bufan felt he was capable again and tried to justify himself.
"Damn, are you playing billiards here? You’ve even come up with a cosmic-level defense," Lin Li sneered.
Whether it’s playing basketball or billiards, there’s always someone who has to say something like this before starting a game.
If they win, it’s pure strength; if they lose, it’s understandable.
"I’m not pretending, Lin Li, when was the last time you shot a handgun?" Bai Bufan immediately questioned.
"The day before yesterday."
"I haven’t done it since a week before I went home! I’m inherently rustier than you. Plus, look at the scores, you’re 10, 10, 10, 8, 9; declining in a spiral, while I am 0, 3, 2, 7, 8, spiraling upward. Isn’t it clear what this means?
From a dialectical long-term perspective, my future is promising, while you have no future!" Bai Bufan argued logically.
Lin Li didn’t refute, just looked at Bai Bufan with a mocking gaze, as if he was looking at an idiot, smiling warmly.
"Damn!!"
That gaze is so damn hurtful.
...
"So, are you guys still playing?"
The afternoon passed with the sound of gunfire. After finishing three rounds of shooting, the four of them returned to the club’s inner hall to rest, and Lin Li asked the other three.
"Not interested. I’d rather shoot with you than shoot with you," Bai Bufan said, utterly bored.
After three rounds, Bai Bufan’s target shooting scores were brutally outclassed by Lin Li, and even after switching to a more uncontrollable rifle, this guy could still maintain his scores even with bursts, as if he got more practiced.
Indeed, that’s exactly what happened, [imitated] the [imitation]’s [imitation] took full responsibility.
"Let’s not play anymore. We’ve played enough. I want to take some photos with the background here later," Ding Sihan also shook her head.
"Yeah, I’ve experienced it, that’s enough," Chen Yu Ying also agreed.
"Alright, then let’s not continue," Lin Li lazily nodded, leaning back on the sofa. After all, his original purpose of experiencing live shooting was to get up close and handle a gun, to make some preparations for potential future scenarios, and now [imitations] had overachieved this task.
If there’s such a situation in the apocalypse, this ability would work very well.
"And the gun is so heavy! Much heavier than I imagined, and it makes my shoulder and chest hurt," Chen Yu Ying gently rubbed her knitted cardigan, complaining.
Instinctively controlling his gaze, Lin Li glanced over.
Chen Yu Ying’s curves were indeed excellent, not quite voluptuous yet, but already quite prominent. It’s known that for Asians, except for someone as exceptionally gifted as Yu Yu, there are few at this age with such features— of course, not many at this age wear push-up bras either.
Especially combined with her height, which is considered tall among the girls in the class, she’s already quite impressive.
As the saying goes, girls blossom at eighteen; the future is promising; perhaps it will bear rich fruit.
That damn rifle, ruinous gun, good chest.
"Is it very painful? Class President, need a rub?" Lin Li ceased his laziness, sitting up straight to ask.
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
"Ewww~~~" Upon hearing this, Ding Sihan immediately hugged her chest and started raising a ruckus.
"Lin~ Li~ while shooting~ my hemorrhoids also got really sore~~" Bai Bufan, not wanting to miss out on the chaos, contributed by shouting in a high-pitched voice.
"No need, you pervert." Chen Yu Ying’s face turned crimson, raising her compact legs until her knees touched her chest, her eyes lowered, shrinking into the corner of the sofa as if wanting to hide herself.
"What, what the hell are you all up to? I was talking about rubbing shoulders! Shoulders!" Lin Li laughed while defending himself, "Can’t you all stop having such dirty minds?"
"You better be," Ding Sihan scoffed.
Lin Li looked at Ding Sihan.
"What does that look of yours mean?" Sensing the undisguised ’sigh of lament and pity’ locked onto her hands covering her chest, Ding Sihan squinted her eyes and said.
"Xiaodingding, just try to be happier in the future, happiness is good for you," Lin Li sincerely advised.

chapters.title: Chapter 332 - 247: The Art of Language Is Making People Feel Comfortable as Soon as You Speak_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 332: Chapter 247: The Art of Language Is Making People Feel Comfortable as Soon as You Speak_3
"Why?" Ding Sihan was still cautious.
"Because girls who love to laugh don’t have bad figures. Joy lifts the cup," Lin Li explained.
Ding Sihan: "?"
"Who the hell told you that ’joy lifts the cup’ means this kind of cup! Lin Li, quickly order me a bunch of bullets, it’s urgent!" Ding Sihan angrily threw the sofa cushion or pillow at Lin Li while reaching out in a mock plea.
"No way, you rejected it yourself before." Lin Li shook his head with a smile.
What is this urgency, Lin Li still doesn’t know?
"Then lend me some money, I’ll pay you back right away." Annoyed, Ding Sihan continued to reach out.
"You want to pay me back with bullets to my forehead, right? No way, hahahaha." Lin Li chuckled and refused.
After saying that, Lin Li looked at Chen Yu Ying, who was giggling on the side, and solemnly shook his head: "Class monitor, you better stop laughing, I personally think you’re just fine right now, but if you really want to lift it up...that’s fine too."
Long live big chests! Hooray! Loyalty!
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
"Pervert! Don’t say it again!" The flush that had just receded suddenly came back with a swish.
Pillow +1 by Lin Li’s side.
"Here I go, here I go." Seeing this, Bai Bufan assumed it was his turn to be attacked and then retaliate, raising his hand eagerly while holding a pillow with the other ready to throw it at Lin Li’s head.
"Do you want to have a pillow fight with me?" Lin Li scoffed at the idea, pointing to the pile of pillows around him, showing off his ammo stockpile.
Bai Bufan blinked, realizing he seemed to have only one pillow.
Darn it, Lin Li won’t retaliate against the other two, but against him.
So Bai Bufan decided to negotiate: "Lin Li, do you know what pillow fights have in common with black people?"
"The harder you fight, the more cotton there is?" Lin Li thought before responding.
"Exactly, considering these pillows aren’t ours, let’s cease fire." Bai Bufan nodded, putting down the pillow, "It would be bad if we ruin them."
"Okay."
Coach Shi, coming over with the bill, happened to hear this sentence: "..."
You two are just having too much fun.
Then who the hell is going to make up for the part of the merit I deducted?
...
At the club, the four took more photos and bought some souvenirs for memory before planning to head back the same way.
"Lost again, where did it go wrong."
On the subway, Bai Bufan looked at a couple across from him, an unattractive guy with a pretty girl, and sighed in dismay.
Hearing Bai Bufan, Lin Li, whose hearing had surpassed normal people, hesitated after capturing the keywords and then spoke: "Bufan, have you ever thought that they might be from the same dormitory?"
Bai Bufan: "?"
Bai Bufan leaned in to listen and suddenly realized that the pretty ’girl’ was actually speaking with a male voice!
Song Luping once said that some technicians may not be good at massage techniques, but just speaking can make people comfortable.
This ’pretty girl’ might look great but makes people uncomfortable when speaking.
As for whether they’re comfortable or not when speaking, that’s yet unknown.
"So you lost because Bao Wei refused to be a ’male girl’." Lin Li concluded.
"Why Bao Wei! Can’t Tianming or Ze Yu do it? I can’t accept a feminized Bao Wei!! Won’t it still be Bo Gang!" Bai Bufan whispered in frustration on the subway.
"All good."
"Darn it, men becoming feminine, women becoming childish, children turning dark, dark people picking cotton, what’s going on in this world."
However, knowing the truth didn’t make Bai Bufan feel better; instead, he sighed more deeply, expressing such sentiments.
Lin Li sighed upon hearing this too.
Because Coach Shi couldn’t hear this, Lin Li felt it was a pity.
Dinner was still at the same restaurant; they ordered the two dishes the four liked most at lunch and other dishes they couldn’t experience due to serving size at noon, which made for quite the experience.
Plus, the faucet in the men’s restroom was repaired, said to be the result of two customers filing anonymous complaints one after the other at noon, showing good efficiency.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan gave thumbs up to those two customers and also to the restaurant.
Since the high-speed rail tickets were purchased in advance, the four didn’t stay in Pingjiang and headed to the train station, ready to return to Xiling.
"Hope Lin, the Great, keeps it up. I want to go to Disney next week, preferably abroad, thank you." While waiting for the high-speed rail at the departure level, Ding Sihan smiled as she spoke.
"You want to go to Disney? Xiaodingding, do you want to see if I look like Disney?" Lin Li retorted upon hearing this.
This was Wu Min’s signature move.
Master of mimicry!
When Lin Li asked her for something as a child, she would become like it.
"You want a summoner for the Digimon? Lin Li, look at your mom, does she look like a Digimon?"
"You want to eat the crab from whatever? Lin Li, see if your mom looks like this crab?"
Lin Li would typically reply, "No, looks like an incompetent mother who abuses children."
Then Lin Li would use his backside to hit the feather duster hard, demonstrating the power of his rear.
Ding Sihan took a serious look and replied completely differently from what Lin Li imagined:
"Hey, Lin Li, what you just said really does make it look like it, otherwise why is there a Prince here?"
Lin Li: "?"
ᓖ뮤?
"Hahaha darn it, Ding Sihan, you’ll say anything to get a freebie!" Lin Li couldn’t hold it when he found Ding Sihan didn’t change her tune, but sincerely praised.
What drove the kid to this extent, saying such things.
"What do you mean, it’s all sincere." Ding Sihan said sincerely.
Lin Li was touched: "But I’m broke."
Ding Sihan was also moved: "Poor ghost, scram."
Lin Li laughed, pointing at Ding Sihan.
"Later, do your best. Actually...anyway, if there’s an event, I’ll call you all."
Lin Li stroked his chin, initially prepared to speak, but hesitated for a moment and refrained from saying what he had intended.
Inviting the "three dogs" for checkups next week...would it seem crazy?
This craziness isn’t just mental, it might make them think something’s physically wrong too.
Dammit, when we’re all high schoolers then, will they go for ultrasounds together?
Lin Li thought, when the day comes, if he supports Bai Bufan to line up outside the ultrasound room, people will definitely look at him strangely, right?
"Bufan, are you interested in going to the hospital?" Lin Li still asked tentatively.
"Why go to the hospital?" Bai Bufan asked, surprised.
"Heard there’s an ultrasound." Lin Li couldn’t hold his laughter after saying it, "Darn."
Wait, darn, this ’darn’ seems to make his words even more nonsense.
"...Pregnant, huh." Bai Bufan managed to keep a serious face while asking.
"That works too." Lin Li accepted the answer, keeping a straight face and nodding.
"Hahahahaha darn it! Beastly!!"

chapters.title: Chapter 333 - 248: Lin Li is born, Bai Bufan is also born
chapters.content:
Chapter 333: Chapter 248: Lin Li is born, Bai Bufan is also born
The high-speed train arrived, and because we still bought tickets for pairs of twos, the four of us were separated.
According to the ticket, two of them went to their seats.
There was someone already sitting in the seat, next to a woman, but this time she wasn’t wearing black stockings.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan exchanged a glance: Encore?
"Hello, sir."
"Come on, come on, you’re sitting at A and still coming so slow, no manners." The man, wearing Bluetooth headphones and watching short videos, looked up impatiently at Lin Li, took off one earbud, and stood up.
"No, sir, did you take the wrong seat?" Lin Li asked.
"What?" The man frowned at this, then checked the ticket interface and confirmed with the seat information several times before showing Lin Li, speaking more impatiently: "07B, that’s right! You guys are the ones who got the wrong seats! Can’t you see? Annoying, go, go, go."
He immediately sat back down.
Mumbling a few phrases in dialect, which wasn’t from Yushun District, but judging by the tone, it wasn’t anything good.
The ticket information he just showed indeed had 07B as the seat.
"But—" Lin Li tried to continue, but was interrupted before he could finish.
"Get lost, get lost, what ’but’ this and ’but’ that, don’t bother me." The man continued watching his phone without even looking at Lin Li.
"I’m sorry, I’m sorry." At seventeen, the age where you can tolerate grievances, Lin Li sincerely apologized after getting a cold glare thrown at him, then pulled Bai Bufan away.
"Did we really make a mistake? Car 06, 07A and 07B..." After walking away, Bai Bufan was puzzled but not confident, took out his phone to check several more times since it was his first time on a high-speed train today, mistaking it is understandable.
"No need to look, the seat is right." Lin Li waved his hand dismissively.
"Huh? Then why is that uncle’s seat also 07B, double booking?" Bai Bufan was puzzled.
"No, I just saw the train number on that b-ticket, it’s not this train, it’s the one across, he got on the wrong train." Lin Li smiled.
"Then why are we leaving our seat?"
"Wait, wait!"
Bai Bufan abruptly stopped talking, looked at Lin Li, blinked, then gradually his face was filled with restrained laughter: "Oh, you bastard, I swear, Lin Li, you’re something else."
"If he had been a bit more polite, I would have explained to him."
Lin Li chuckled softly.
"Agreed, he starts with swearing right off the bat, I hate people who swear without any manners." Bai Bufan agreed, rubbing his hands with anticipation: "But we should remind him when we get off, otherwise, I’d regret not seeing him go all frantic."
Although Lin Li was a bastard, fortunately, Bai Bufan wasn’t a good guy either.
"Sure." Lin Li nodded, he had the same thought, "And it’s best when the train is just about to start again."
"Still, Lin Li, you’re considerate." Bai Bufan gave a thumbs up, "For that moment, it’s worth standing for half an hour."
"No need, I did some homework before coming, the indicators next to the seats on the high-speed train have meanings, red means occupied all the way, green means the seat hasn’t been sold, yellow means not sold until the next stop, although there might be a delay, but as long as we wait till the train starts, find a green or yellow seat, it’ll be fine.
Although we can’t sit together, it doesn’t matter."
Lin Li explained.
Bai Bufan’s eyes lit up, he really didn’t know about this.
"Even better!"
So as they waited for the train to start to find a seat, the two of them stood by the entrance connecting the cars, eagerly watching 07B, afraid the man would get up and leave, making them miss the fun.
But seeing Bai Bufan standing awkwardly next to him, Lin Li asked curiously:
"What are you doing? You look like you need to pee urgently."
"Because I really do need to pee a bit right now." Bai Bufan nodded.
Lin Li: "?"
"Why don’t you go pee? There are toilets on the high-speed train. Actually, they are right in this car." Lin Li was surprised, pointing towards the toilets to indicate.
"It’s not the right time yet." Bai Bufan shook his head, "I hope to contribute to the nation’s development."
Lin Li: "?"
"Speak human, would you?"
"Lin Li, have you heard of a project that benefits the country and the people, the South-to-North Pee Diversion?" Bai Bufan’s eyes shone as he said this, full of youthful enthusiasm, expressing his commitment to the nation:
"I drink a lot of water in Yushun District in the South just to bring the water to the North to urinate in Nansang."
"In order to solve the imbalance of water resources in our country."
"For the country, for the people of Nansang, I’m willing to endure, to hold back, it’s nothing!"
Hearing this, Lin Li was moved to tears by Bai Bufan’s spirit of self-sacrifice:
"Moved to tears, what an idiot."
...
The high-speed train arrived.
"Chen Yu Ying: Why haven’t you two come out yet? @Lin Li @Bai Bufan."
"Lin Li: Wait for us for a moment, we’re timing it."
"Chen Yu Ying: ?"
As the sound indicating the train doors were about to close rang out, Lin Li and Bai Bufan exchanged a glance and approached the man with a smile.
"Why is it you two again!" The man, interrupted again with a tap on the shoulder, saw it was the people who bothered him last time and angrily wanted to act.
"Hello, uncle, I just realized something, you got on the wrong train." Lin Li bent over politely to greet him.
"Uncle, shouldn’t you be on the high-speed train heading to Bridge Town? But we’re on the one going to An Sect." Bai Bufan followed up politely, "Oh dear, it seems like you really got on the wrong train."
——With the train number Lin Li remembered, it was easy to check where the man’s original train was going.

chapters.title: Chapter 334 - 248: Lin Li is born, Bai Bufan is also born_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 334: Chapter 248: Lin Li is born, Bai Bufan is also born_2
Man: "?"
When the man was stunned, the two quickly left.
—There was no time to watch his reaction, if they didn’t leave, the door would close.
But fortunately, windows are the eyes to the soul.
As the two got off the train, they found the window next to the man, and saw that he had stood up, looking panicked, but the train door was already closed and even started to slowly move away. Lin Li and Bai Bufan laughed happily.
The man also noticed Lin Li and Bai Bufan outside the window and realized what had happened. He started angrily banging on the window, pointing at them and talking.
The high-speed train’s windows are soundproof, so they couldn’t hear clearly.
"What’s he saying, Lin Li?" Bai Bufan asked with a smile.
"Hey, nano rescue, buddy." Lin Li laughed as he replied.
Chen Yu Ying and Ding Sihan, seeing Lin Li and Bai Bufan finally come out, walked over.
Before they asked what had happened, they saw the two transforming into carrier-based aircraft pilots, making a ’takeoff’ gesture to the high-speed train, and then switching to a taunting funny face.
Chen Yu Ying, Ding Sihan: "?"
...
Their confusion cleared up once they understood the situation.
"Ahh, you’re so mean, you two, so mean." Ding Sihan laughed so hard her words were broken, "Why didn’t you call me over to see that man’s expression! Darn, hogging it all to yourselves!"
"Indeed, quite bad." Chen Yu Ying nodded with a smile.
"Firstly, Bai Bufan is the eunuch. I’m not the eunuch." Lin Li explained with a laugh, "Secondly, I don’t think it’s bad at all. That man started it with me, how can we repay resentment with virtue?"
"I wasn’t calling you bad just now, that man was bad, you’re good." Chen Yu Ying said with a light laugh and nodded at Lin Li.
"What? So that’s how it is! Oh my virtue!" Lin Li, feeling vindicated, started to sing: "Xiling has a Chen Qing Tian~ unwavering and impartial, discerning loyalty and treachery~"
Chen Yu Ying: "..."
"What a ridiculous name! Lin Li, retract it! You’re not good, you’re also bad, you’re also deceitful." Unable to bear the name, Chen Yu Ying immediately corrected the judgment.
Look at those puffed cheeks, squeezing them would surely be fun.
"Why the hell did you suddenly pinch my butt?" attacked, Bai Bufan jerked his head around to question Lin Li.
"You don’t understand my regret." Lin Li, with a deep, melancholy gaze, sighed: "Life is a series of concessions, concessions, until we retreat... and seek the lesser evil."
Bai Bufan: "?"
Where’s the reservoir you’re pining for here? Where’s this nutcase from?
...
"Do you really want me to ask my dad to give you two a ride home?" After leaving the station, Chen Yu Ying paused at the door and turned to ask.
Today, there was no further plan, so it was time for each to go home, thus her question.
—In the evening, it wasn’t the family driver who’d come to pick her up, but Chen Zhongping.
"No need, class rep. If it were your family driver picking you up, I’d agree, but since it’s your uncle, I’ll still go back with Bufan on the bus." Lin Li said with a smile.
Lin Li’s bicycle was still at the school gate, so indeed he would first return to school with Bai Bufan later.
Didn’t come in the morning, but here to pick up at night, Old Chen doesn’t know what he’s worried about.
Could it be he’s worried that he might think today’s fun isn’t enough and will suggest not going home just yet, continuing to play until home urges them back, and incidentally find an opportunity to pinch the class rep’s cheeks?
"Okay then, when you get to school or home, let us know in the group chat. I’ll make sure not to let him come next time." Chen Yu Ying nodded with a smile, without insisting.
After all, with her dad around, indeed it might make them uncomfortable instead.
The four of them first went to the bus stop, then the two girls continued to the parking lot, so they parted ways:
"See you tomorrow then."
"When you think about it, we see each other every day." Lin Li waved with a smile.
At school on Friday, a date on Saturday, and again for night study on Sunday evening.
"Isn’t that nice, bye-bye~" Chen Yu Ying waved with a smile as well.
At this point, a lot more people were waiting for the bus, no longer as empty as eight or nine in the morning.
It turns out there are so many people taking the bus.
Lin Li indeed had no such concept.
After waiting for a few minutes, the corresponding bus arrived, and everyone queued to get on.
"Lin Li, the class rep is calling you." Bai Bufan said after inserting the coins, directing Lin Li inside the bus.
"Huh? She hasn’t left?" Lin Li turned around confused, seeing Bai Bufan quickly passing by him.
Lin Li felt a jolt and turned to see Bai Bufan.
The county’s buses weren’t big, with only about a dozen seats per bus, and now, the last seat had been taken by Bai Bufan.
Lin Li: "..."
"Bai Bufan, you dropped your coin on the ground, pick it up." Lin Li gently smiled as he suggested.
Some kind of friend, using sneaky tricks on his own people.
"It’s just standing for twenty minutes, if you can’t stand for twenty minutes now, how are you going to manage standing all day as a security guard later?" Bai Bufan said with disdain.
That sounded familiar, like when he mocked Bai Bufan about delivering food in the past, and now the boomerang came back to smack him in the head.
Deserved.
Not a big deal, just twenty minutes, Lin Li went to stand beside Bai Bufan and looked at the other passengers on the bus.
Lin Li noticed they were actually the only young people; aside from them, there were either elderly or tired middle-aged people, with some nearly writing "corporate slave" on their faces.
In the morning, he had not encountered this group, purely because it wasn’t rush hour.

chapters.title: Chapter 335 - 248 Lin Li is born, Bai Bufan is also born_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 335: Chapter 248 Lin Li is born, Bai Bufan is also born_3
It’s clearly Saturday today.
"Bufan, let me test you, do you know which character becomes more and more invincible as their story progresses and gets updated, yet keeps getting comically and pathetically defeated in the storyline?" Lin Li bent down to ask Bai Bufan.
"Vegeta? He got smashed by Frieza in the Frieza arc and lent Cell a helping hand in the Cell arc..." Bai Bufan thought for a moment before answering.
"No, it’s the labor law." Lin Li’s map of the Yan Kingdom was very short.
Bai Bufan: "?"
Bai Bufan paused for a moment, then looked around the bus, instantly understanding why Lin Li had suddenly asked such a question. He gave Lin Li the finger, laughing and cursing, "Lin Li, don’t you dare get me kicked off the bus."
"If I ever become a boss, I definitely won’t tolerate overtime. Damn it, if any of my employees dare to work illegal overtime, I’ll confiscate their illicit earnings." The more Lin Li thought about it, the angrier he got, and so he made this grand vow.
We, as capitalists, should dedicate our lives to society, establish a belief for the universe, inherit the knowledge of the saints, and bring peace to the world for all future generations.
Bai Bufan: "?"
What did Lin Li just say?
Was it in Chinese?
Such an obscure language.
"You were born to be a boss." Bai Bufan gave a thumbs up, then sighed deeply:
"How many women, in order not to take the bus, have become the bus themselves? And how many men, to own a bus, ride the bus every day?"
"Life, oh life, so fleeting, so fleeting."
The philosopher Bai Bufan and the capitalist Lin Li exchanged a glance, appreciating each other’s thoughts.
The bus gradually became crowded, and more people began to stand.
"Young people today rarely have the virtue of respecting the elderly and cherishing the young, sigh." An aunt who just got on the bus glanced around, finding no space, and chose to stand beside Bai Bufan, muttering to herself, "Sigh, my poor back, it’s tough standing at this age."
Bai Bufan: "..."
Shit.
Auntie, why are you specifically using Mandarin? Worried I won’t understand the dialect if I’m not local?
Shit.
Already squeezed to the side, Lin Li was secretly delighted.
"Sigh——"
"Sigh——"
"If only a kind young person would give this old lady a seat."
The aunt started sighing madly, patting her old waist.
This could no longer be called a hint; it was outright.
But actually, it was almost our stop.
So Bai Bufan got up.
"Oh, young man, so kind of you, thank you." The aunt was already eager to sit down as Bai Bufan stood up.
Bai Bufan hobbled on one leg, grabbing the handrails around him, hopping away from his seat. Hearing this, he turned back, pointed to his seat for the aunt, nodding to indicate she could sit.
Lin Li, Aunt: "?"
"Young man... is there a problem with your leg?" The aunt hesitated mid-air, looking at Bai Bufan, asking with a guilty conscience.
Bai Bufan waved his hand, struggling on one leg to move toward Lin Li.
"Hey, young man, don’t go, come back, come back, you sit here." Now the aunt was anxious, feeling the seat was incredibly hot, gesturing to Bai Bufan.
"Hey! Don’t go! Don’t go!"
Bai Bufan shook his head, opened his mouth: "Aba aba."
Then, looking somewhat anxious, he pointed to Lin Li, then to the aunt, then to his own mouth: "Aba! Aba! Aba!"
Lin Li: "(;☉_☉)?"
After a brief moment of confusion, Lin Li’s mischievous mind took over.
——Light bulb moment!
He immediately stepped forward to support Bai Bufan, apologizing to the aunt: "Auntie, he’s mute and can’t speak. He means for you to sit; he doesn’t need it, he’s young, it’s no problem for him."
Bai Bufan’s eyes lit up!
Lin Li not only understood his intentions and collaborated perfectly but even helped cover for his name!
Bro! Ther!
"Aba aba!" Bai Bufan gave Lin Li a thumbs up, then continued using body language and aba aba to urge the aunt to sit.
"What am I sitting for? Quickly let him come sit, come on, come on, you sit, what’s with this young man, priority to the disabled!" The aunt now wouldn’t dare sit for another second, especially feeling the curious gazes of the other passengers around her, speaking quite anxiously.
"No need, no need, we’re just about to arrive, it’s the next stop, please sit." Lin Li waved his hand quickly.
This was the only non-lie in their words, as the bus was about to reach Nansang Middle School, which was their destination.
So, Lin Li and Bai Bufan, two supposed disabled people, limped off the bus supporting each other.
Leaving behind the bus, with a seat available but stubbornly not sitting, watching them leave, the aunt lamented as she saw their bleak and bitter backs.
She was deeply confused.
What did I just do?
"You beast! Bai Bufan! You’re a total beast!" After confirming the bus drove away, Lin Li gave a hearty kick to Bai Bufan’s good leg, laughing and cursing, "The aunt didn’t mean any harm; she just purely wanted a seat, and you were so vicious!"
"Right back at you, haha." Bai Bufan laughed heartily, "I did give her my seat."
Then Bai Bufan said regretfully:
"I can’t take the bus for some time now, or getting exposed next time would be troublesome."
"Alright, I’m heading home too."
Reaching the school gate, Lin Li unlocked his bicycle and got on, saying to Bai Bufan.
"OKOK, my plane is taking off soon, so I won’t keep you for dinner." Bai Bufan nodded, waving goodbye to Lin Li.
The failure of today’s hand job was very painful, but hard work makes up for clumsiness. Bai Bufan believed that as long as he worked hard, he would surpass Lin Li before his kidneys gave out.
"Shit, even if you did invite me for dinner, I wouldn’t dare imagine what’s on the menu." Lin Li shouted while riding away, looking back and laughing.

chapters.title: Chapter 336 - 249: Lin Li Puts on His Pants and Doesn’t Recognize Anyone Anymore
chapters.content:
Chapter 336: Chapter 249: Lin Li Puts on His Pants and Doesn’t Recognize Anyone Anymore
October 20th, Sunday.
[Seek and personally experience... (100/100; 1/4).]
Completing the number part of Task Four wasn’t difficult at all.
The security gates didn’t need purchasing, as some mall entrances already had these devices. If there were no other people waiting and the security guards didn’t mind, going back and forth a few times quickly fulfilled the remaining count.
As for the types portion.
Lin Li had already purchased a full medical check-up package.
It was from a private medical check-up facility.
The CT scan was routine and naturally included in the package, and the ultrasound diagnostic machine was also at the private facility Lin Li went to. Lin Li bought an additional one so they could experience it together.
Although usually, these private institution check-ups are bought in bulk by large companies to distribute as employee benefits, making individual purchases is certainly not as cost-effective as going to a public hospital.
But for Lin Li, spending a little extra to save on appointment and queue time was worth it.
And since he bought the premium package, even if Lin Li needed to change the time temporarily, it was completely fine.
A regular check-up typically costs a few hundred to over a thousand yuan out of pocket, but Lin Li’s package was nearly six thousand yuan for just one check-up, even in a small place like Xiling.
If people didn’t know, they might think Lin Li was living Little Chen Yu Ying’s life now.
It can only be said that the account balance gave Lin Li the courage to live.
Lin Li enjoys playing with the gold under the bed in his spare time, polishing it until it shines with a water glow.
As for the MRI, Lin Li specially went to the hospital this morning to try and book one.
The doctor, upon learning that Lin Li was not experiencing any discomfort, merely wanted to have an MRI to spot early signs of hidden diseases, naturally tried to dissuade him, saying it was completely unnecessary and alternative check-ups would suffice.
Of course, it was meant for Lin Li’s own good, but due to his persistence and earnest request, the doctor eventually refrained from further dissuasion and issued a checklist.
After all, MRI scans have no side effects, and they are used for the prevention of diseases in physical examinations, except most cannot afford the cost — an MRI for one body part generally costs over a thousand.
Lin Li didn’t need a full-body scan. The checklist marked for the brain, which should take about half an hour.
However, Lin Li also informed the doctor that if a patient needed an MRI but couldn’t get an appointment, they could inform him at any time to swap his appointment for theirs.
After all, there is only one machine like this in the entire Nansang. He didn’t want his task to affect those in genuine need.
If such negligence led to a tragedy, Lin Li feared he would end up like the aunt who replaced Bai Bufan’s slot, waking up at night slapping himself and saying, "I’m such an idiot."
Even if the MRI couldn’t be done, it didn’t matter. In his information search, Lin Li found that metal detectors, beyond the basic electromagnetic induction principle, also had a detector using shortwaves.
Perhaps it could be considered a new type.
But due to its limited applicable scenarios, they are few in number. Lin Li only found one priced over two thousand yuan on a second-hand platform. Luckily, it was nearby. If the MRI failed, he could spend a few hundred to borrow it for testing, having it scan him.
Night fell.
Lin Li moved several large boxes of chocolate, compressed dry food, and other groceries he bought last evening from the supermarket to the bathroom and unpacked them all into snakeskin bags.
He also brought two packets of seeds, but he doubted whether they would "pass review."
[Update complete.]
At the scheduled time, the message arrived as expected. Lin Li opened the cross-world interface, but unfortunately, it was the same as squeezing toothpaste — no visible update was seen.
After switching out a bottle of five "Grain Avoidance Pills," Lin Li chose to refresh this slot.
[You have refreshed a "Quality Upgrade Talisman": 100 system currency, replace?]
[Quality Upgrade Talisman: Place on a refined magical artifact, nourish with Spiritual Qi to possibly enhance the artifact quality. Difficulty increases with higher current artifact quality, minimum chance is 1%. If enhancement fails, the next success probability for this artifact will increase.]
Enhancing the artifact quality?
Lin Li only possessed two artifacts, one being the "Substitute Jade-faced Buddha" and the other the "Bottle of Hidden Emotions and Desires." Enhancing artifact quality would indeed be beneficial; if it could increase the revival armor’s uses, that would be a great gain, but the ’minimum’ provided seems a bit low.
Yet, for top-tier artifacts, even a 1% chance of enhancement doesn’t seem low.
Lin Li’s unknown point now is the effectiveness rate on artifacts of different qualities and what quality his two artifacts belong to.
The system hadn’t stated.
Is he supposed to blindly use it combined with the "Fate Talisman"?
The trial-and-error cost becomes somewhat high all of a sudden, unable to ensure success, and with only 480 system currency in total, testing once would consume 250.
If it failed, Lin Li would feel foolish, like a fool.
So even after replacing the item slot, Lin Li did not make a purchase.
He decided to wait until a suitable scenario arises.
After preparing, taking a deep breath, collecting the items in front of him, a flash of white light occurred, and Lin Li was already on Mingyuan Star.
"Phew—"
With a long exhale, Lin Li dropped several large snakeskin bags beside him.

chapters.title: Chapter 337 - 249: Lin Li Puts on His Pants and Doesn’t Recognize Anyone Anymore_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 337: Chapter 249: Lin Li Puts on His Pants and Doesn’t Recognize Anyone Anymore_2
The things I left here last week show no signs of being tampered with.
Lin Li stepped forward to check his watch; the time was exactly as he estimated. It was 2 PM in Yunguang City, and nearly an hour had passed since he last left, to be precise, close to 56 minutes.
1:180.
He opened a bag. As expected, things involving living entities like seeds weren’t brought over either.
He looked at the system interface.
[5.29.55]
The countdown showed such numbers.
Lin Li frowned slightly.
If he remembered correctly, he calculated last time that the longest he could stay was only five hours, right?
This time there’s an extra half-hour? It’s impossible that he calculated wrong by such a large margin, it must have just come up this time.
Will there be more each time?
Noting this change and suppressing the doubts that needed more information to validate, Lin Li switched to the title "Breath of the Demon."
He retrieved the communication device he had left in another building and pressed it, dragging all his belongings, including the lovely Ms. Beauty, to the rendezvous point with Ye Jing and the others.
As he approached, he could see the hopeful looks of the three people. Lin Li felt that they hadn’t left at all during that hour.
"Come over and get it yourself." After shouting this at the three of them, Lin Li led a few zombies clad in pink clothes into a nearby building and shook them off.
Ye Jing was, of course, the first to arrive.
"The food you wanted, I couldn’t bring the seeds." Lin Li indicated that she could open it to take a look.
Shi Dongchen and Hu Fei also came over.
When Ye Jing opened one of the bags, she saw bundle upon bundle of chocolates tightly wrapped in plastic, far exceeding the anticipated hundred pieces, her excitement was visible.
Not to mention, it wasn’t just one bag.
Shi Dongchen opened his bag, revealing a pile of biscuits, looking dense enough to fill stomachs, with some canned food beside them.
To his surprise, there was a third bag.
The bag Hu Fei opened contained a zombie corpse, stacked with seductive lingerie.
Hu Fei: "?"
"Hello, sister-in-law!"
Damn, he hit the jackpot with this hidden item. Hu Fei took a step back, knelt down in front of the charming Ms. Beauty, and banged his head three times, loudly proclaiming.
Lin Li: "?"
"Who told you to call her sister-in-law?"
"Lin Li, Shi Dongchen is useless, make me your little brother!" Hu Fei turned to Lin Li, eyes full of hope.
Shi Dongchen: "..."
"It’s not about being a brother or not; even if I take you as my little brother, she won’t be your sister-in-law." Lin Li said with amusement, unable to get angry with Hu Fei.
"I get it! Lin Li, in the future when the sister-in-law asks, I won’t spill the beans about you and the little sister-in-law." After seriously thinking for a long time, Hu Fei finally looked up and said solemnly.
"..."
Great thinking, next time try not to think.
Lin Li laughed relaxedly, waved his hands to give up explaining, and instead looked at Shi Dongchen, repeating:
"Couldn’t bring the seeds."
"Understood, no problem! With these, our immediate crisis is already solved! Thank you! Lin Li, thank you so much, we’ll go back and break down the rest of the gold pieces to bring to you!"
Shi Dongchen didn’t feel disappointed upon hearing this; the number of food items in front of him frankly exceeded his expectations.
He originally thought it would be ideal if Lin Li’s attitude could fill up one backpack, but he didn’t expect him to drag along two entire snake-skin bags full.
Each of these bags required both of Shi Dongchen’s hands just to lift them briefly.
It seems Lin Li’s heart is far kinder than how he presents himself; perhaps if he approached differently initially, the results might have been better.
Unfortunately, there’s no going back in time.
"I’m not in a hurry for gold bars; if convenient, just bring me some water and cooking and dining utensils." Lin Li waved his hand, speaking nonchalantly.
Back home, there’s still nearly two million unspent Gold; Lin Li’s only purpose in coming to the apocalypse this time is to complete mission two and collect the reward.
The current priority is to create an "evening meal" environment to avoid a system judgment failure for mission completion.
"Okay! Cooking and dining utensils, right? We’ll head back and prepare them right away!"
Shi Dongchen wasn’t afraid of Lin Li making requests; he feared Lin Li having none. Hearing this, he nodded rapidly and agreed.
"Then...shall we take these things and head back now?" he asked testily.
"Yeah."
"Alright, alright, if you need anything, just press the communicator to contact us, and we’ll be here immediately!" Shi Dongchen said, then looked at Hu Fei: "Hu Fei, take the stuff and let’s go."
Hu Fei remained motionless, still bowing to Ms. Beauty.
"Hu Xiaojing!" Shi Dongchen shouted.
"What?!" Hu Fei replied, head still on the ground.
"Take the bags, we’re heading back to the shelter!" Shi Dongchen said, somewhat frustrated.
"Only my big brother and sister-in-law can order me around; you’re no longer my big brother, Shi Dongchen."
"Little Brother Lin, could you..." Shi Dongchen laughed, sounding sorrowful.
Lin Li, on the other hand, found Hu Fei increasingly amusing, so he simply took out an entire bundle of chocolate from the snake-skin bag and placed it beside Hu Fei:
"No matter how your shelter divides it, this bundle is yours. Now, take these things and go back with them."
Only then did Hu Fei stand up, holding onto the chocolate, and cheerfully said to Lin Li: "Big brother, only Lin Li is my big brother!"
"What if Shi Dongchen offers to give you two bundles separately?" Big Brother Lin asked.

chapters.title: Chapter 338 - 249: Lin Li Puts on Pants and Doesn’t Recognize People_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 338: Chapter 249: Lin Li Puts on Pants and Doesn’t Recognize People_3
"Then he’s my brother!" Hu Fei answered every question.
Upon hearing this, Lin Li gave a thumbs-up, truly a steady fence-sitter.
Only after being permitted did Hu Fei carry a snake-skin bag in each hand and follow Shi Dongchen to leave.
Lin Li noticed that Hu Fei’s arm veins didn’t bulge at all; this really isn’t within a normal human’s range. Even using [Strength Reserve], I can’t be as relaxed as him.
If only I could awaken some kind of supernatural ability.
Anything like time stop, hypnosis, or world modulation mode would do, Lin Li’s not picky.
Ye Jing disappeared from sight first, presumably diverting the nearby zombies, to prevent Hu Fei from being attacked on the way back to the shelter.
After all three left, Lin Li found a building nearby and went upstairs, lying on the snake-skin bag, gazing at the sky, waiting for time to pass and for the kitchenware to arrive.
When Ye Jing returned with Hu Fei, nearly two hours had passed.
The afternoon in the apocalypse, four o’clock.
It’s about time to start preparing dinner.
Which, in this environment, is quite a big project.
"Big brother! Sister-in-law! Where are you people!" Hu Fei shouted loudly in the middle of the road while carrying the snake-skin bag, seemingly unconcerned about attracting zombies.
"Over here."
When Ye Jing and Hu Fei came up, Lin Li opened the snake-skin bag that had contained food not too long ago.
Now, on top, there’s a barrel of water, and underneath, all sorts of tableware and kitchenware are laid out.
It seems to have been specially cleaned, most of it’s quite clean.
"Is this barrel of water enough?" Ye Jing came over to ask.
"It’s enough." Lin Li nodded, taking things out one by one and laying them out.
"Uncle Shi stayed at the shelter to handle the supplies you sent, and will come over once he’s done. If you have any instructions, just press the communicator now and he’ll come right away." Ye Jing explained afterward.
"Okay, no need right now."
At the bottom, there’s even an irregularly shaped gold nugget, like they said, freshly knocked down, heavy, weighing at least ten pounds conservatively.
That’s at least three hundred thousand.
Though not really needed, as someone who’s transcended high-level interests, Lin Li is still happy to obtain it.
"Is there anything you need help with? I can cook a little too." Seeing Lin Li begin to organize the tableware, Ye Jing volunteered herself.
"There really is." Lin Li nodded.
"Great!"
Lin Li pointed to the snake-skin bag and said to Ye Jing, who was rolling up her sleeves to wash her hands, "Help me assemble Beauty Madam."
Ye Jing: "?"
"Make sure she retains her human form, thanks." Lin Li said politely.
"Alright..." Ye Jing put down her rolled sleeves, swallowed a gulp, and started this arduous task.
"Sister-in-law, if you hurt yourself tell me..." Standing in front of Beauty Madam, she hesitated for a while. Remembering Shi Dongchen’s reminder, she softly said.
—— Shi Dongchen: Ye Jing, remember, from now on, Beauty Madam is no longer a zombie; she’s a living, breathing Beauty Madam!
"Big Brother Lin Li, what should I do then?" Hu Fei squatted nearby, took a piece of chocolate from his pocket, and asked while eating.
"Can you cook?"
"I can eat very well."
"Then just stay there and chat with me." Lin Li said with a smile.
Hu Fei nodded, then looked up at the sky: "Sky, hmm, sky, sky like a sky, sky..."
Afterward, he scratched his head: "Big Brother Lin Li, my, I can only talk about this much."
"Hu Fei, what’s your supernatural ability?" Ignoring Hu Fei’s hardcore sky talk, Lin Li asked while handling the ingredients.
"Big brother, I’m called Hu Xiaojing." Hu Fei emphasized before answering.
"Alright, Xiaojing, what’s your supernatural ability?"
"I’m very hard, I’m hard all over." Hu Fei said, picking up a piece of stone from the ground and banging it against his forehead.
Apart from leaving a dust mark, there was indeed no injury.
"Does your strength remain unaffected?"
"Oh, it does too, I’m also very strong."
"Can you beat zombies?"
"I can beat them, they can’t grab or bite me, but I can keep hitting them, I’m not afraid of zombies at all, uh, dummies like me I’m not afraid." Hu Fei seemed to recall zombies have mutated species, and specifically added.
"How did you awaken?"
"I became strong suddenly while fighting zombies."
"..."
After question and answer covered mostly Hu Fei’s personal information, Lin Li shifted to ask about the shelter’s condition.
"How many people are at your shelter now?"
"Big Brother Lin Li, I promised my bro and others not to talk about the shelter casually with outsiders." Hu Fei heard the words, hesitated for a while, and said.
"Then wouldn’t it be fine if you seriously said it?" Lin Li said, puzzled.
Hu Fei was stunned for a moment, then realized, eyes even cleared: "Oh, right!"
"Big Brother Lin Li, we have more than two hundred people at our shelter now..." Hu Fei’s attitude suddenly became much more upright, even his sitting posture turned serious, and began to disclose information genuinely.
Ye Jing on the side: "..."
The guy’s already dumb, and you teased him.
She didn’t stop it, though, Shi Dongchen and her, their intention now was to strengthen Lin Li’s connection with the shelter as much as possible, hoping he might ’visit’ the shelter or even choose a place to ’live’ or at least make a stop.
Regarding shelter information, after receiving those foods, Lin Li even if he asked her now, she’d still tell him everything in detail.
...
Putting bone meatballs in boiling water to cook, Lin Li also gained understanding of the shelter’s situation.
It wasn’t too big or too small, roughly around two hundred people.

chapters.title: Chapter 339 - 249: Lin Li Puts on His Pants and Doesn’t Recognize People_4
chapters.content:
Chapter 339: Chapter 249: Lin Li Puts on His Pants and Doesn’t Recognize People_4
Living underground, to be precise, it’s the entire underground parking lot of a residential area opened up and utilized, quite a large area.
To prevent the shelter from being discovered by zombies, their main way of leaving the shelter is to take a nearly hundred-meter tunnel, from an area outside the residential area to reach the surface.
There’s a passage directly out from within the residential area; their ’farmland’ is also inside the community, but its use must be cautious to ensure that zombies nearby have been lured away by Ye Jing.
There aren’t many with extraordinary abilities, only about twenty, and most of them have fairly useless skills; Ye Jing and Hu Fei are already considered the top talents of the shelter.
The shelter now relies on two methods for food: continuing to collect from the outside, and cultivating crops within the residential area, but it’s insufficient—they haven’t truly had a full meal in a long time.
Water source relies on storing rainfall and filtering, which is much better than the food situation.
The shelter’s electricity previously depended on fuel-powered generators, but now it’s mainly sustained by solar power, barely maintaining enough illumination.
The firearms on hand consist of only a dozen or so usable guns, and ammunition is down to over a thousand rounds—almost a thousand of which are damp and likely problematic.
Indeed, the shelter lives very hard.
"Whew—"
Lin Li opened the pot lid, and steam rose.
It’s already six-thirty in the evening on Mingyuan Star, and the sky gradually starts to darken; although zombie activity is unrelated to day or night, invisibility itself poses a threat to humans.
There’s less than an hour remaining in their stay limit for this world.
Pouring out the dishes, Lin Li held a bowl, scooped up a meatball with a spoon, and went to Ye Jing’s side.
"Open your mouth."
"Ah—"
"I want you to help open Beauty’s mouth."
Ye Jing: "..."
Ye Jing immediately shut her mouth.
Damn, so embarrassing! Want to find a hole and crawl into it!
Then, according to Lin Li’s instructions, helped, watching Lin Li scoop a spoonful of meat soup into Beauty’s mouth, leaking out again.
"Help me push it into her stomach, thanks." Lin Li didn’t care about this outcome, said to Ye Jing.
Felicitous, with Ye Jing around, he doesn’t need to do these disgusting tasks himself.
Ye Jing: Shit.
"Is it delicious?"
After Ye Jing finished, Lin Li looked at Beauty.
This time, without a hint from Lin Li, Ye Jing manipulated Beauty to nod.
"If it’s delicious, eat more. Why don’t you eat it all? I’ve actually already had enough, good looks are quite filling." Lin Li said, looking expectantly at the system.
No response.
Shit, good looks aren’t allowed to be eaten?
No way around it then.
Lin Li replaced with a brand-new spoon, washed it several times, and then removed his helmet and mask, first using the fan method to smell.
Only to say that his cooking talent is still steadily performing, while the seasoning and ingredients brought from Earth, the cooked taste is still quite fragrant and appetizing.
Looking at the dish collaborated with Beauty, Lin Li took a deep breath.
It should be safe and sound.
Down the hatch, brothers!
[Deeply kiss Beauty’s forehead... (4/4)]
[Task two completed.]
[You have received a reward: Physical Improvement: Image charm increased by 10%, lower body physical strength increased by 50%; Random system item*1; System currency*200.]
[You have received "Secondary Title (50%)".]
[Secondary Title: Upon use, you can wear an additional secondary title, whose effects apply at 50%.]
Finally, damn it, completed.
His hard work wasn’t in vain.
[Wonderful encounter coming to an end, no feast lasts forever, she isn’t your only, and you’re not her eternal, you both clearly understand this.
But it’s okay, time never stops though beauty is eternal.
For your fateful bond with Beauty, draw a perfect finish line!]
[Task triggered!]
[Task Two: Drive Beauty home, after the final bed exercise, leave without saying goodbye when she’s asleep.]
[Task reward: Title: Put on pants and deny; Physical Improvement: Image charm increased by 10%; Random system item*1; System currency*100.]
[Put on pants and deny: When worn, as long as you’re wearing pants, no one can identify or recognize your identity information by any means, but you can’t see everyone’s faces.]

chapters.title: Chapter 340 - 250: Those who want to sign up, quickly press 1, only 5 slots available
chapters.content:
Chapter 340: Chapter 250: Those who want to sign up, quickly press 1, only 5 slots available
To be honest, when I saw the new task pop up, Lin Li’s heart skipped a beat.
He thought the damn system was going to continue torturing him along with the beautiful lady.
Lin Li is good at finding amusement in hardships, but it doesn’t mean he likes to suffer. However, after reading the task introduction, Lin Li finally breathed a sigh of relief.
Compared to the previous two tasks, this one was much more acceptable.
And it seemed like it might be the last task in this series.
Lin Li raised an eyebrow slightly. It wasn’t hard to notice that the system seemed to end every strongly continuous series of tasks with a "title" as part of the reward.
He had four titles on hand, as well as "The Fruit of Persistence" and "Nonchalant Once Dressed," all of which were granted under similar circumstances.
Yet, this discovery didn’t seem very significant.
Lin Li looked at this title and, to be honest, found it difficult to evaluate.
What was difficult to evaluate wasn’t the ability of the title, but its effect.
Seriously?
Stupid system, your title reward doesn’t match well with the task’s prologue, does it?
The pretentious prologue was supposed to put a beautiful end to his encounter with the beautiful lady, so what does rewarding a title like "Nonchalant Once Dressed" mean?
Such behavior, according to his mentor Song Luping, is like Park Changfan not paying, which is extremely vile.
However, the effect of the title wasn’t as offbeat as its name.
With this title equipped, he could completely conceal his identity information, at the expense of not being able to see others’ faces.
This was undoubtedly disproportionate.
Because according to the description of the title, he could still identify others by their clothes and voices, just not see their faces. However, others couldn’t identify him through any means.
It was suspected to have the same effect as Superman’s glasses.
This would be a useful title whether in reality or the post-apocalyptic world.
However, this task...
"Ye Jing, does your shelter have any vehicles?" Lin Li looked at Ye Jing.
"Vehicles? Yes, do you mean usable ones?" Ye Jing was stunned for a moment before replying.
"Yeah." Lin Li nodded.
"We have two in use that we’ve modified to minimize noise and armor, and a few others that haven’t been used in a long time; not sure if they’re faulty. Do you need a vehicle now? If so, I can immediately go back and have someone bring one over?" Ye Jing replied in a flurry.
Her urgency was due to two reasons: Lin Li’s task had a high priority,
and she didn’t want to continue upsetting the beautiful lady’s stomach.
"Sure, as long as there are vehicles." Lin Li nodded.
It’s good that there are existing vehicles in this world.
Otherwise, if Lin Li wanted to bring a car from reality, a sedan wouldn’t suffice, and he’s not sure if the system would recognize bicycles or tricycles.
Although Lin Li still had "Repair Crystal," which should be able to repair scrap vehicles by the roadside, it was better not to use it if unnecessary.
As for the differences in driving between the two worlds, Lin Li felt that with his understanding, having them teach him a bit would allow him to learn quickly.
The first element of the task had been found, but there was still another element.
"Home."
Where is the beautiful lady’s home?
Is it enough just to send her back to where they met, or does he need to find the beautiful lady’s real, former home in this ruined Yunguang City and send her home?
Lin Li leaned towards the latter, as it required some ’bedroom activity,’ but if it was the latter, wouldn’t that be like finding a needle in a haystack?
If the beautiful lady was a beggar from outside, then no amount of searching through Yunguang City would suffice.
"Ye Jing." Lin Li looked at Ye Jing again.
"Yes?"
"Can you help me confirm her identity information? Primarily, I need to know where she lived—when she was alive."
Glancing at the beautiful lady, who sat beside him, Ye Jing: "?"
Ye Jing looked at the beautiful lady, whose appearance was barely humanoid due to all the damage, and fell silent.
"Well, that’s probably... a bit..." Ye Jing was troubled.
"Never mind, it’s indeed difficult for you guys, we’ll talk about it later. Can you drive?" Lin Li waved his hand, and changed the topic.
"Yes."
"Alright, I might need you to teach me how to drive vehicles from your world at some point. For now, go back and bring the vehicle here.
Oh, I’m not sure whether I can return the vehicle to you, but as a return favor, I’ll soon be back on Earth and help bring you at least another batch of food, no less than this time."
Walking all over this vast world is tiring in itself, and the vehicle will also be useful after completing this task, so there’s no need to return it.
The cars are definitely more valuable to the shelter than gold, but no problem, Lin Li can always afford a reward that satisfies them.
If two bags aren’t enough, he’ll offer four, and if four aren’t enough, then eight, and if eight aren’t enough, Lin Li will even ask Shi Dongchen if he wants to fly up.
"Alright, I’ll head back right away! It’s fine, you don’t need to return it! Hu Fei... Hu Xiaojing, you stay here for now." Ye Jing got up and left immediately, not taking Hu Fei with her.
"When you get back, I might have already left, but as before, wait for contact via the communicator." Lin Li added.
It’s unrealistic to complete this task in the remaining time. Even just fetching and returning with the vehicle means he’ll likely already be back in reality, not to mention that Lin Li needs to find a safe place to store things and leave.
When she brings the car, he can return with two boxes of food.

chapters.title: Chapter 341 - 250: Those who want to sign up, quickly press 1, only 5 slots available_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 341: Chapter 250: Those who want to sign up, quickly press 1, only 5 slots available_2
"Okay, no problem." Ye Jing responded, hopping away.
Only Lin Li, Hu Fei, and the Beauty Lady were left upstairs.
After repacking the Beauty Lady into the burlap sack — she was still a crucial mission item — Lin Li noticed Hu Fei staring eagerly at Xiling’s meatball soup and pointed to it with a smile:
"Eat it all if you want."
"Brother Lin Li is my real brother!" Hu Fei laughed, approaching and started eating.
Lin Li turned to the system.
Equipping [Lightning Attractor] in the secondary title slot, the effect was indeed halved.
Having two title slots was quite useful, like having an extra optional buff slot. Wondering what happens if the [Change When the Pants Are On] effect is reduced by 50%.
He lifted his leg, kicked forward, the sound breaking through the air.
The "Physical Strength" improvement had never been obtained before; Lin Li clearly felt it.
Not only was he stronger, but even when he punched his legs hard, the pain was less than before.
It seemed the strength enhancement was quite hardcore, with defense included.
Now, if Lin Li were to kick the Beauty Lady in the head again, it definitely wouldn’t hurt as much as before.
Darn, if the strength keeps increasing, wouldn’t it be disastrous if ingrown nails prevent the doctor from cutting even the nails?
Before Lin Li could delve deeper into this blind spot, he heard a crunching sound behind him.
Lin Li turned back, then fell into a contemplative silence.
Hu Fei was biting into pieces of the porcelain bowl.
"You’re... eating even that?" Lin Li asked in astonishment.
"Doesn’t taste good." Hu Fei shook his head.
"Then why are you eating it?"
"Brother Lin Li told me to eat it all." Hu Fei chewed the porcelain bowl like chocolate, showing difficulty but with determined eyes.
Lin Li: "..."
Hu Fei was dumb, but he was obedient.
"I meant for you to finish the meatballs, not the bowl. Stay here and wait for Ye Jing, I’ll be off now, see you in a few hours." Lin Li smiled, then dragged away the Beauty Lady along with his other gear.
"I bid Brother and Sister-in-law farewell on their journey."
...
Just like last time, after making preparations to return, Lin Li waited for the system to automatically send him back to reality.
[0.01.57]
Looking at the recorded time on the backup device, Lin Li calculated and frowned.
The ratio was off.
He stayed for five and a half hours, and according to a 1:180 ratio, about 110 seconds should have passed in reality, 1 minute and 50 seconds would be normal.
Even if he made a mistake, the discrepancy shouldn’t be as large as a whole seven seconds.
Lin Li took out a calculator and calculated using 1 minute 57 seconds, discovering the time flow ratio became 1:169, roughly 1:170.
The ratio had decreased.
What does this mean? Does it imply that as the system updates, the time flow would increasingly approach reality, or does this occur with more visits, or is it inherently random?
The system remained silent, just groveling.
Given the circumstances, better take a shower first.
No point in overthinking it, perhaps yelling at the system would be relieving.
...
Morning.
After exercising, Lin Li carried breakfast and biked to school.
The somewhat old bicycle was pedaled furiously, consistently maintaining this speed.
Though appearing to exert effort, Lin Li remained relaxed, without fatigue.
The physical strength enhancement indeed covered every aspect.
Endurance, explosiveness, and jumping ability in his legs had notably increased.
Standing long jump could reach over 3 meters without any extra effort, and for vertical jumps from a standing position, the performance was impressive — though Lin Li couldn’t measure exact numbers by himself, he could now touch a half-meter higher.
Estimations showed it’s now possible to dunk easily.
Sigh, the time he could normally be human was already limited, soon he might not even qualify as human.
With his current jumping ability, coupled with his height, reach, and insight, when playing with those clumsy hand friends, wouldn’t his blocks just leave them speechless?
Lin Li decided that after the sports day ends, Bai Bufan would come to hate basketball forever.
Aims to target him.
Isn’t cultivating just to witness Bai Bufan’s tearful expressions like flowers?
School.
At the staircase entrance, today’s gossip, though late, was really late.
Lin Li entered from the front door and was startled by Wang Ze’s peculiar smile.
Thought it was some prank at first, but upon seeing half the boys in class wearing the same expression, he recalled it was Bufan’s laugh theory from last week’s workday start, so he followed suit with a smile.
Damn, within this class, just a casual sentence from last week could be recalled today; good job there, but glad there’s still a chance for reassignment.
There’s hope.
As for Bai Bufan, no wonder there was no gossip today, lying on the desk sleeping pathetically.
Probably stayed up late again last night.
After giving the girls their breakfasts they asked him to buy, Lin Li cleared his throat and shouted at Bai Bufan:
"Bufan!"
"Abandon, abandon!" Bai Bufan jumped with a start at the call, clutched his textbook, and began reciting words, "One bench, Abandon!"
The recitation style embarrassed Koukou.
Carefully scanning around, Bai Bufan realized it wasn’t the teacher arriving, but Lin Li calling him, and glared angrily at Lin Li, "What!? Why!?"
Lin Li smiled, took a breath, and began loudly chanting:
"I couldn’t do what you asked me last weekend. This weekend, the hotel has no waterbeds or themed rooms, and the room can only accommodate four creatures. Aren’t you making things difficult for the reception by ordering eight male companions for yourself? You’ll have to prepare the scented candles, whips, collars, and lubricants yourself, but the hotel has already printed Bao Wei’s photo on the toys for you, so you can use them directly then.
You didn’t respond to my message, so I can only tell you now."

chapters.title: Chapter 342 - 250: Those who want to sign up, quickly press 1, only 5 slots available_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 342: Chapter 250: Those who want to sign up, quickly press 1, only 5 slots available_3
The whole class fell silent.
Then burst into laughter.
"Why is there a photo of me too?" Zhou Baowei couldn’t laugh.
Bai Bufan: "?"
"You’re slandering me again! Get lost!"
"Bufan, Bufan, you stay up late so often, I don’t even dare to imagine how short your lifespan might be. You wouldn’t want me to bury you, would you?"
