"And then you’ll add insult to injury, right?" Bai Bufan chuckled cynically.
"No, if you ever face difficulty, I’ll definitely give you a hand," Lin Li’s smile was warm, then he became serious, "But remember, only once."
"Is that the extent of our friendship?"
"Has nothing to do with friendship, it’s just if someone helps multiple times, that’s damn romance, not brotherhood."
Bai Bufan: "(;☉_☉)?"

chapters.title: Chapter 393 - 267: The World Trembles for My Heart
chapters.content:
Chapter 393: Chapter 267: The World Trembles for My Heart
"Moreover, those who only help you a little when you encounter difficulties aren’t just ordinary guys, they’re the wicked and insidious ones, because they’re definitely planning to take advantage of your predicament to pressure and coerce you.
We’ve read enough books, just replace the female lead who’s being blackmailed and humiliated with yourself."
"In our class, the one who’s most willing to help you a little more and has the most potential is Wang Ze. When you have a date with him at night, you might consider developing in this direction." Lin Li analyzed seriously and suggested.
"Damn it." Bai Bufan laughed and cursed, "Forget it, just give me a hand, one hand is enough, thanks."
If you’re looking for a change of heart, you have to look at Bai Bufan.
While chatting simply, after cheering for Qu Wanqiu during the women’s 1500 meters, the next project that needed cheering was the shot put event Zhou Baowei was participating in.
The two headed to the shot put field.
"Lin Li, Bai Bufan, go over and help out."
As they passed the high jump area, a girl failed her jump and fell from the mat.
The referee for this event was Class Four’s PE teacher, You Jun, so he called out to the two passing by.
Lin Li and Bai Bufan nodded, went over to set the fallen high jump bar back in place, then subtly disappeared without needing any praise from You Jun.
You Jun: "?"
I freaking asked you two to help the girl who fell off the mat, not to fix the bar.
Even when given the chance, you’re useless, huh?
If you two manage to date, I might as well eat shit.
... Fine, Lin Li’s conditions are a bit more favorable now, but Bai Bufan, if you can date, I might as well eat shit.
"I’m afraid of girls, why didn’t you help her?" Bai Bufan asked as they left.
"I’ve been betrayed three times, I’m afraid she’ll falsely accuse me." Already trained by Xiaozhou to become a master of avoiding scams, Lin Li said with an air of control.
"Makes sense."
"Baowei, good luck, try to get second place." Reaching the shot put field, Bai Bufan encouraged Zhou Baowei, who was stretching.
As for first place, it had already been secured by the shot put athlete from Class Nine. Zhou Baowei would need to become a second Zhou Baowei just to beat him.
"Try to finish the battle in seventeen minutes." Lin Li requested.
"Why seventeen minutes, do you have something going on later?" Zhou Baowei curiously asked.
"Because the high school girls’ 800 meters is next, Lin Li has to cheer for the class leader." Bai Bufan answered for Lin Li.
"What if it doesn’t end in seventeen minutes?" Zhou Baowei felt the time to test friendship had come.
"Baowei, I believe in you."
"According to the procedure, with so many rounds for so many people, it really can’t end in seventeen minutes. It’s not about belief or not." Zhou Baowei spread his hands innocently.
"What I mean is, because I believe in you, if you haven’t finished by then, I’ll trustingly put my back into your hands. This is the bond between brothers!"
Lin Li placed his hand on Zhou Baowei’s shoulder and said passionately:
"Only you, can I entrust my back to!"
Zhou Baowei: "..."
You friggin’.
Low emotional intelligence: I’m going to find the class leader.
High emotional intelligence: Only you can I entrust my back to.
"Lin Li, during the match later, can you stand on the grass, that might improve my performance, okay?" Zhou Baowei pleaded.
"Haha, no thanks."
"Please, brother."
"I’m also pleading on behalf of Baowei, I really want to see this."
"This isn’t a matter of pleading, is it? You two are killing me!"
...
Finally, the time came to use the special power reserved for Chen Yu Ying, [Control the Wind].
With only two laps in the 800 meters, and no athletes in the same grade, Chen Yu Ying came in third at the finish line, not far from first and second.
If Lin Li controlled the wind to blow against the first two the entire time, maybe he could help Chen Yu Ying get first.
However, Lin Li felt such targeting was unnecessary.
Improving your own performance and making others’ lower, Lin Li thought the latter didn’t quite fit.
As in the morning, after handing water to Chen Yu Ying, who was supported by Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu, Lin Li accompanied the three around the inner side of the track for a small cool-down walk.
Chen Yu Ying sipped the water in small sips, her brow furrowed and never relaxed. After walking for a while, she looked down at her left ankle and said somewhat uncertainly, "When I sprinted to the finish line just now, I stepped wrong, and my ankle... seems to have twisted a bit."
"Hmm? Is it serious?" Upon hearing this, Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu immediately looked over and asked with concern.
"It shouldn’t be serious, just a lingering slight pain that hasn’t yet affected my walking." Chen Yu Ying hastily waved her hand to stop the two from worrying too much.
"Well, better go to the medical point to check it anyway." Lin Li came over.
Since the sports meet is usually when injuries happen more easily, the school had logically set up a medical station on the field.
Even though Lin Li had [Healing], even if [Healing] now was more powerful than when it could only half remove bruises, it was still not really up to par. It was better to let the doctors see first.
"Okay." Chen Yu Ying didn’t insist and nodded.
Arrived.
"It’s just a sprained ankle, not serious, rest for a day or two, and it will be fine." The doctor on duty took a look at Chen Yu Ying’s situation, reassured her, and sprayed some Yunnan Baiyao on her ankle.
"Strenuous activities can worsen the condition, so if there are any more events, it’s best to skip them; also, avoid standing for too long, nothing else really."
"Okay, thank you, teacher."

chapters.title: Chapter 394 - 267: The World Trembles for My Heart_2
chapters.content:
Chapter 394: Chapter 267: The World Trembles for My Heart_2
"No need."
After simply rubbing her ankle with her hand to help the medication absorb, Chen Yu Ying put her shoe back on and prepared to get up.
Seeing Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu ready to help her up again, she smiled and waved her hand, "No need, I just needed you guys to help me before because I was too tired after running; now I can walk on my own, it’s just a little pain."
"Class Rep, later I’ll give you a massage, and you won’t even feel that little pain." Lin Li, who had been standing by, started rubbing his hands together like a fly.
"I don’t believe you, you weirdo." Chen Yu Ying shrank her foot back upon hearing this, distancing herself half a step from Lin Li.
"Believe it or not, find a place to sit down and rest first. Let’s go, to the stands."
There were not many empty chairs at the medical point, and students would come by one after another. It was definitely not appropriate to sit here for too long, and this place was relatively far from the class’s base.
The stands were just right, being closer, and Chen Yu Ying could watch the rest of the competition without having to move.
"Okay." Chen Yu Ying nodded.
Even though Chen Yu Ying said she didn’t need help, Ding Sihan and Qu Wanqiu still supported her to the class’s seating area on the stands.
There weren’t many people in the stands, most were involved in activities at their respective class bases.
There were more pigeons here, presumably the same ones released during the opening ceremony, surprisingly not recaptured.
"So, Yu Ying, why don’t you sit and rest for a bit? I’ll accompany Ding Sihan to the registration?" Qu Wanqiu and Ding Sihan didn’t sit down but asked after Chen Yu Ying was seated.
"Sure, I’m fine."
"Lin Li, Ying Bao is all yours now," Ding Sihan said, pointing at Lin Li’s nose.
"Just leave her to me. Don’t you all know by now what kind of person I am? I’ll definitely ruin the class rep’s purity. Once she’s alone with me, her life is over," Lin Li confidently patted his chest, taking on the responsibility like a man should.
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
"Good, if she’s not ruined when I get back, you’re done for! Call us if anything happens, I’m off to the registration," Ding Sihan gave an approving nod and then went with Qu Wanqiu to the registration area.
Chen Yu Ying: "???"
Before she could question him, there was a rustling sound by her ear. Turning back, she saw Lin Li getting up, placing her coat and phone, along with other items, on the seat, and starting to roll up his sleeves.
"Lin Li, what are you doing?" Chen Yu Ying asked with a slight amusement.
"Completing the mission Ding Sihan entrusted to me." Lin Li squatted in front of Chen Yu Ying, looking up into her eyes as he spoke, "Class Rep, hurry, take off your shoes and socks, let me give you a massage."
"No way." Chen Yu Ying playfully glared at Lin Li and instinctively pulled her foot back towards her body.
But she forgot she was wearing loose sports shorts. When her thigh lifted, the shorts began to naturally fall due to gravity, revealing more than half of her fair thigh.
Just looking at them, they seemed smooth and soft, and they probably felt very comfortable to the touch.
Slurp slurp.
Bai Bufan, get the hell off of me!
"Lin Li——"
Lin Li’s gaze was becoming more and more excessive; he didn’t even pretend not to be looking.
When Chen Yu Ying realized, she put her leg down, but to her helpless amusement, when Lin Li’s neck and gaze followed her leg down, she couldn’t resist stretching out her hand to tap his head, muttering:
"Peeping Tom..."
"Only the wrongly accused know how unjustly they’ve been accused," Lin Li said deeply.
"Lin Li, I really want to kick you, but I’m afraid it might just make you happier, what a dilemma, sigh." Looking at the pretending-to-be-deep Lin Li, Chen Yu Ying let out a deep sigh, filled with exasperation.
"Class Rep, you really see things clearly."
"Tch—" Chen Yu Ying lightly raised her uninjured right foot and bumped her shin against Lin Li’s squatting shin, pretending it was a kick.
"But seriously, Class Rep, I really do have a massage technique that can speed up your ankle’s absorption of medication and self-repair. Let me try it, okay?" Lin Li smiled as he returned to the main topic.
"I don’t believe it." Chen Yu Ying still shook her head.
"Class Rep, when have I ever lied to you?" Lin Li’s expression turned even more wounded.
From Lin Li’s perspective, Chen Yu Ying rested against the sky and sunlight, quietly watching him, with an increasingly rich smile and teasing look on her face.
Uh, it seems quite often.
"But this time, you’ll believe me, won’t you?" Lin Li stretched out his index finger and pointed at himself, licked his lips, and flashed a brilliant smile.
Yes.
When Lin Li looked at her with such a confident smile, Chen Yu Ying already believed him.
"But if it doesn’t get better, Lin Li, you’re done for," but Chen Yu Ying still said this with her mouth.
"Of course!"
Chen Yu Ying glanced at Lin Li again, leaned down to undo her shoelaces, her ponytail falling down, brushing against Lin Li’s bent knee, tickling him.
As her sneakers came off, the dry autumn wind slipped between her toes, making them curl unconsciously.
"Why are the toes and heel parts of your white socks still white? Shouldn’t they be a little gray and black?" Lin Li made a sharp comment as he stared at the pure white socks.
"That’s because you’re not hygienic," Chen Yu Ying laughed disdainfully, then hooked her fingertips under the cuff of her cotton sock, pulling it down to reveal the shiny ankle, and the faint pink mark from the sock around her ankle. She then moved it slightly forward, waving it in front of Lin Li: "Let’s get started."
From a close-up view, her ankle was already slightly swollen, but it wasn’t very noticeable.

chapters.title: Chapter 395 - 267: The World Trembles for My Heart_3
chapters.content:
Chapter 395: Chapter 267: The World Trembles for My Heart_3
Lin Li wasn’t shy about reaching out to hold her foot. After all, as a doctor, when treating patients, gender doesn’t matter.
Even if Bai Bufan had twisted his ankle, Lin Li would still be breathing just as hard.
It’s all the same.
The feel of her skin, cool from the recently sprayed Yunnan Baiyao, as he holds her heel, while his right thumb mischievously rubs across the arch of her foot. Chen Yu Ying’s spine suddenly straightens, her instep forming a graceful arc, suppressing the urge to laugh. She glares at Lin Li, ashamed and annoyed, "Lin Li—"
"Class monitor, don’t move around, you’re affecting my massage treatment." Lin Li doesn’t even look up, turning the tables on her.
And then his head gets knocked.
"Let’s begin."
[Healing], activate.
Lin Li has Chen Yu Ying keep her left foot suspended by herself while both his hands start roaming and kneading her ankle.
Although there’s no need to move around to achieve healing, it’s always necessary to put on the appearance of performing a massage.
To ensure he can cover all the injured areas and reach the ten-second maximum duration of his ability for a single area, Lin Li kneads seriously.
"Class monitor, how is it, feeling a bit better?" After several dozen seconds, seeing no response from Chen Yu Ying, Lin Li looks up and asks, puzzled.
His gaze follows her calf upwards, and the next moment, he unexpectedly locks eyes with hers, looking down.
——Chen Yu Ying rests her chin on the palm, propping her hand on her thigh, attentively and quietly observing Lin Li’s massage.
Hence, the distance is very close.
He can even feel the strands of hair on his forehead touching Chen Yu Ying’s cheek as he looks up.
There’s less than ten centimeters between their eyes, and every detail on the girl’s face is unbelievably clear, under the faintly trembling eyelashes, Lin Li can see himself reflecting distinctively in her pupils.
The distant noise from the sports ground suddenly fades away, as if the world has paused.
Lin Li instinctively raises his hand slowly.
Pang! The sound of a referee’s gunshot rings out from afar.
"Class monitor? Hey, hey?" His action stalls, and Lin Li lowers his hand, slightly leaning back to regain his senses.
"Hmm?" Chen Yu Ying sits up straight, fiddling with a lock of hair that falls at her temples.
"I was asking if you’re feeling a bit better." Lin Li already has his head down again, his voice gentle as he asks.
"Yes," Chen Yu Ying nods, her eyes lowering as she looks at Lin Li’s hands, then gradually shifting to the crown of his head, whispering, "I was feeling a dull ache, but now it’s eased a lot."
"Ha? What did I say? Isn’t it amazing? And you didn’t believe me!" Lin Li boasts, unable and unwilling to hide his pride and demand for credit.
"Amazing, amazing." Chen Yu Ying praises with a hint of perfunctoriness, instinctively wanting to wiggle her ankle, but upon realizing Lin Li was holding it, she restrained herself.
She looks up towards the distant sports field.
Eh?
Chen Yu Ying suddenly notices Bai Bufan and Zhou Baowei not too far away, laughing and pointing in her direction.
When they notice her gaze, they suddenly turn 180° towards the other direction, while Bai Bufan makes an imaginary jump shot, and Chen Yu Ying can almost imagine his awkward laughter.
Zhou Baowei also takes a shot but without jumping.
No, he jumps, as there’s a noticeable tremor in the stands.
Chen Yu Ying looks down at Lin Li in front of her, a blush flashing across her face.
It seems he didn’t jump after all; perhaps the vibration she felt had nothing to do with Zhou Baowei.
"Lin Li, I think I didn’t bring my water." Turning, suddenly feeling thirsty, Chen Yu Ying looks around both sides and asks.
"The bottle I gave you?" Lin Li raises his head, thinks for a moment, then nods: "You didn’t have it when you came over, probably left it at the medical station, are you thirsty now?"
"Mm, a little bit."
Lin Li instinctively pats his pockets on both sides, then glances at his side.
He lifts Chen Yu Ying’s jacket to discover half a bottle of water.
"There’s only half a bottle left that I’ve drunk, I’ll fetch another bottle for you from the medical station later." Lin Li immediately says.
He can’t leave yet, [Healing] can’t be paused, and the ability only lasts one minute, it must not be wasted.
"Or you could compromise and drink from my half bottle?" Lin Li suggests with a smile as he gestures with his chin.
"Let’s compromise then." The water is lifted, the cap effortlessly twisted open, Chen Yu Ying tilts her head back as the liquid flows from the elevated bottle mouth.
Gulps.
The cherry-colored lips are moistened anew, who dares to kiss?
"Tastes good." She says.
"Of course it does, I’ve drunk from it, it’s Sweet." Lin Li seamlessly transitions, as though this were not an odd thing at all.
"I meant I was very thirsty, dummy." Chen Yu Ying retorts after drinking from the nearly empty bottle, then caps it and knocks it against Lin Li’s head, "Meaning I was so thirsty I had no choice but to compromise!"
"Right."
The one-minute ability time ends, Lin Li releases his hands and stands up: "Class monitor, the massage is about done, does it still hurt?"
"It seems... it doesn’t hurt at all?" Chen Yu Ying states uncertainly.
She doesn’t know if it truly doesn’t hurt anymore, or if her elevated spirits have made her overlook the slight pain that doesn’t affect much.
"Not for nothing, learning this massage." Lin Li checks, seeing that the redness and swelling in Chen Yu Ying’s ankle have completely disappeared, feeling like the treatment is done.
It seems that the [Healing] ability has also ’grown’ nicely with his own growth.
"What kind of massage is this? So magical." Chen Yu Ying moves her left foot for a bit more, discovering the absence of any blockage feeling, asking curiously.
"To whom would you give it if taught?" Lin Li inquired.
Chen Yu Ying blinks, "Si Han?"
"Then it’s really regrettable, class monitor, this is Lin Family’s secret art, only teachable to Lin Family members." Lin Li has no choice but to shake his head.
Just as Chen Yu Ying is about to laugh and tease a few words, her face suddenly flushes, unsure what she’s thought about, she turns away her gaze.
Return to her senses, and Lin Li is staring at his own hand.
Thankfully, without giving it a sniff, salvation isn’t beyond Lin Li yet.
"What are you doing, Lin Li?" Chen Yu Ying asks.
"I heard hands can get athlete’s foot too." Lin Li turns his head to explain.
"They can, athlete’s foot is a fungal infection, not just..." Chen Yu Ying nods, abruptly halting her speech, after deliberating for three seconds, she stares at Lin Li and asks, cheeks slightly puffed, "Lin Li, what did you just think?"
"I was worried the lovely feet might have—"
Lin Li’s words are cut short by a flying water bottle.
Lin Li catches the empty water bottle with precision, then squints his eyes: "Using my magic against me, leaving not a drop for me? Class monitor, you’ve angered me, I will retaliate in the kindest way possible."
"What do you mean by kindest way?" Chen Yu Ying tilts her head, not quite grasping Lin Li’s meaning.
Lin Li closes the distance, smiling gently.
Then he picks up the shoe off the ground and sprints away.
Chen Yu Ying: "?"
Lin Li runs to a distance, turns back and waves to Chen Yu Ying, laughing loudly as he delivers a pun so corny it borders on genius: "Class monitor, what defeats you isn’t innocence, it’s ’shoelessness’."
Innocence is indeed very kind.
"Lin Li!!" Now realizing this is the kind way of retaliating, after being stunned for a while, Chen Yu Ying calls to Lin Li with a flushed face, "Lin Li! You elementary schooler! Give it back to me!"
Chen Yu Ying thinks she wants to scold him, that she is angry, but as the words leave her mouth, it’s as if she can hear the amusement in her own voice.
"Come get it yourself!" Lin Li makes a face in the distance.
"Fine, I’ll come!"
Chen Yu Ying stands up, presses her lips together, slightly puffing out her cheeks, hopping on one foot towards Lin Li,
"Hey, hey, hey, don’t trip! Here, here, here—" Lin Li approaches with her shoe.
As the pursuit turns into a meeting problem, doves perched in the stands take flight upon the pair’s movement, the flapping of wings covering the uncontrollable pounding of two young hearts.
